GSP33vacbhamu:8: śāśvatāya namaskurmo vedāya ca bhavāya ca //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:19: karaṭadantā vā ; tathā cedaṃ brabmeti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:21_0: sa cāyam ākīṭapataṅgebhya ā ca devarṣibhyaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasyedaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo
GSP33vacbhamu:22: na hi jātu kaścidatra saṃdigdhe 'ahaṃ vā nāhaṃ vā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:27: tadālambanatve hi 'yo 'haṃ bālye pitarāvanvabhūvaṃ sa eva sthāvire praṇaptṝnanubhavāmi' iti pratisaṃdhānaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:28: na hi bālasthavirayoḥ śarīrayorasti manāgapi pratyabhijñānagandho yenaikatvaṃ adhyavasīyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:29: tasmādyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣu yadanuvartate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā kusumebhyaḥ sūtram /
GSP33vacbhamu:30: tathā ca bālādiśarīreṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi parasparamahaṅkārāspadamanuvartamānaṃ tebhyo bhidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:31_0: api ca svapnānte divyaṃ śarīrabhedamāsthāya taducitānbhogānbhuñjāna eva pratibuddho
GSP33vacbhamu:31_1: manuṣyaśarīramātmānaṃ paśyan 'nāhaṃ devo manuṣya eva' iti devaṣaśarīre bādhyamāne
GSP33vacbhamu:32: api ca yogavyāghraḥ śarīrabhede 'pyātmānamabhinnamanubhavatīti nāhaṅkārālambanaṃ dehaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:34: indriyabhede 'pi 'yo 'hamadrākṣaṃ sa evaitarhi spṛśāmi' ityahamā-lambanasya pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:37: 'kṛśo 'ham' 'andho 'ham' ityādayastu prayogā asatyapyabhede kathañcit 'mañcāḥ krośanti' ityādivadaupacārikā iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:38: tasmādidaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sphuṭatarāhamanubhavagamya ātmā saṃśayābhāvādajijñāsya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:40: tathā hi- saṃsāranivṛttirapavarga iha prayojanaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:42: sa cedayamanādiranādinā ātmayāthātmyajñānena sahānuvartate, kuto 'sya nivṛttiḥ avirodhāt ?
GSP33vacbhamu:45: na ca 'aham' iti sarvajanīnasphuṭatarānubhavasamarthita ātmā dehendriyādivyatiriktaḥ śakya upaniṣadāṃ sahasrairapyanyathayitum, anubhavavirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:47: tasmādanubhavavirodhādupacaritārthā evopaniṣada iti yuktamutpaśyāma ityāśayavānāśaṅkya pariharati- yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarayoḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:48: atra ca yuṣmadasmat ityādiḥ mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ ityantaḥ śaṅkāgranthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:56: citsvabhāva ātmā viṣayī, jaḍasvabhāvā buddhīndriyadehaviṣayā viṣayāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:57: ete hi cidātmānaṃ visinvanti avabadhnanti ; svena rūpeṇa nirūpaṇīyaṃ kurvantīti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:58: parasparānadhyāsahetau atyantavailakṣaṇye dṛṣṭāntaḥ - tamaḥ prakāśavat iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:59: na hi jātu kaścitsamudācāradvṛttinī prakāśatamasī parasparātmatayā pratipattumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:66: yathā kusumādbhedena gṛhyamāṇe 'pi sphaṭikamaṇāvatisvacchatayā japākusumapratibimbodgrāhiṇi 'aruṇaḥ sphaṭikaḥ' ityāruṇyavibhrama ityata idamuktam - taddharmāṇāmapi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:67: itaretaratra dharmiṇi dharmāṇāṃ bhāvo vinimayaḥ, tasyānupapattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:68: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ - rūpavaddhi dravyamatisvacchatayā rūpavato dravyāntarasya tadvivekena gṛhyamāṇasyāpi cchāyāṃ gṛhṇīyāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:69: cidātmā tu nīrūpo viṣayī na viṣayacchāyāmudgrāhayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:83: mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ yadyapi tathāpīti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:84: idamatrākūcam - bhavedetadevaṃ yadi 'aham' ityanubhave ātmatatvaṃ prakāśeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:87: na caitānyupakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraiḥ kriyāsamabhihāreṇedṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni śakreṇāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:88: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati yathā 'aho darśanīyā aho darśanīyā' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:97: na hyāgamajñānaṃ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyamupahanti yena kāraṇābhāvānna bhavet ; api tu tāttvikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:100: tathā ca varṇe hrasvatvadīrghatvādayo 'nyadharmā api samāropitāḥ tattvapratipattihetavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:101: na hi laukikāḥ 'nāgaḥ' iti vā“nagaḥ“iti vā padātkuñcaraṃ vā taruṃ vā pratipadyamānā bhavanti bhrāntāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:102: na cānanyaparaṃ vākyaṃ svārtha upacaritārthaṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:103: uktaṃ hi - 'na vidhau paraḥ śabdārthaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:104: jyeṣṭhatvaṃ ca anapekṣitasya bādhyatve hetuḥ na tu bādhakatve,
GSP33vacbhamu:108: tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram - 'paurvāparye pūrvadaurbalyaṃ prakṛtivat' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:113: api ca ye 'pyahaṅkārāspadamātmānamāsthiṣata tairapyasya na tāttvikatvamabhyupetavyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:114: 'ahamihaivāsmi sadane jānānaḥ' iti sarvavyāpinaḥ prādeśikatvena grahaṇāt uccataragiriśikharavartiṣu mahātaruṣu bhūmiṣṭhasya dūrvāpravālanirbhāsapratyayavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:115: na cedaṃ dehasya prādeśikatvamanubhūyate na tvātmana iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:116: na hi tadaivaṃ bhavati 'aham' iti, gauṇatve vā na 'jānānaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:117: api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartata iti yatra prayoktṛpratipattroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:120: naiyamikāgnihotravacane 'gnihotraśabdaḥ prakaraṇāntarāvadhṛtabhede kuṇḍapāyināmayanagate karmaṇi 'māsamagmihotraṃ juhoti' ityatra sādhyasādṛśyena gauṇaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:122: na tvahaṅkārasya mukhyor'tho nirluṭhitagarbhatayā dehādibhyo bhinno 'nubhūyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:124: na cātyantanirūṭhatayā gauṇe 'pi na gauṇatvābhimānaḥ sārṣapādiṣu tailaśabdavaditi veditavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:125: tatrāpi snehāttilabhavādbhede siddha eva sārṣapādīnāṃ tailaśabdavācyatvābhimānaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:128: tadiha vyāpakaṃ vivekavijñānaṃ nivartamānaṃ gauṇatāmapi nivartayatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:129: na ca bālasthaviraśarīrabhede 'pi 'so 'ham' ityekasyātmanaḥ pratisaṃdhānadehādibhyo bhedenāstyātmānubhava iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:131: parīkṣakā api hi vyavahārasamaye na lokasāmāmyamativartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:133: bāhyā apyāhuḥ -'śāstracintakāḥ khalvevaṃ vivecayanti na pratipattāraḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:134_1: śarīrādyabhedagrahādātmanaḥ prādeśikatvamabhimanyate nabhasa iva ghaṭamaṇikamallikādyupādhyavacchedāditi yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:135: na cāhaṅkāraprāmāṇyāya dehādivadātmāpi prādeśika iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:137: aṇupariṃmāṇatve 'sthūlo 'ham, dīrghaḥ' iti ca na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:139: kiñca asminpakṣe avayavasamudāyo vā cetayet, pratyekaṃ vāvayavāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:140: pratyekaṃ cetanatvapakṣe bahūnāṃ cetanānāṃ svatantrāṇāmekavākyatābhāvādaparyāyaṃ viruddhadikkriyatayā śarīramunmathyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:142: samudāyasya tu caitanyayoge vṛkṇa ekasminnavayave cidātmano 'pyavayavo vṛkṇa iti na cetayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:144: ya evāvayavo yadā viśīrṇastadā tadabhāve na cetayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:147: etena 'sthūlo 'ham andho 'ham gacchāmi' ityādayo 'pi adhyāsatayā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:148: tadevamuktena krameṇa ahaṃpratyaye pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutiḥ apratyūhaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvasukhaduḥkhaśokādyātmatvamahamanubhavaprasañjitamātmano niṣeddhumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:154: iti śabdasūcitaśca śarīrādyanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ ca prameyajātaṃ pramāṇena pramāya tadupādānaparivarjanādiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:155: anyonyadharmāṃścādhyasya anyonyasmindharmiṇi dehādidharmān janmamaraṇajarāvyādhyādīnātmani dharmiṇi adhyastadehādibhāve samāropya,
GSP33vacbhamu:156: tathā caitanyādīnātmadharmān dehādāvadhyastātmabhāve samāropya 'mamedaṃ jarāmaraṇaputrapaśusvāmyādi' iti vyavahāro vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:158: atra ca adhyāsavyavahārakriyābhyāṃ yaḥ kartā unnītaḥ sa samāna iti samānakartṛkatvena 'adhyasya vyavahāraḥ' ityupapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:159: pūrvakālatvasūcitamadhyāsasya vyavahārakāraṇatvaṃ sphuṭayati - mithyājñānanimittaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:161: tadevamadhyāsasvarūpaṃ phalaṃ ca vyavahāramuktvā tasya nimittamāha - itaretarāvivekena iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:163: atha aviveka eva kasmānna bhavati, tathā ca nādhyāsa ityata āha - atyantaviviktayordharmadharmiṇoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:164: paramārthato dharmiṇoratādātmyaṃ vivekaḥ dharmāṇāṃ cāsaṃkīrṇatā vivekaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:167: iha tu paramārthasataḥ cidātmano 'nyanna dehādyasti vastusat,
GSP33vacbhamu:168: tatkutaḥ cidātmano bhedāgrahaḥ kutaśca tādātmyavibhramaḥ ityata āha - satyānṛte mithunīkṛtya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:170: satyaṃ cidātmā, anṛtaṃ buddhīndriyadehādiḥ ; te dve dharmiṇī mithunīkṛtya yugalīkṛtyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:171: na ca saṃvṛtiparamārthasatoḥ pāramārthakaṃ mithunamastītyabhūtatadbhāvārthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:172: etaduktaṃ bhavati - apratītasyāropāyogādāropyasya pratītirupayujyate na vastusatteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:174: āropyasya pratītau satyāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropanibandhanā ca pratītiriti durvāraṃ parasparāśrayatvamityata āha - naisargika iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:178: tataśca pūrvapūrvamithyājñānopadarśitasya buddhīndriyaśarīrādeḥ uttarottarādhyāsopayoga ityanāditvāt bījāṅkuravanna parasparāśrayatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:180: advā pūrvapratītimātramupayujyate ārope, na tu pratīyamānasya paramārthasattā /
GSP33vacbhamu:181: pratītireva tu atyantāsato gaganakamalinīkalpasya dehendriyādeḥ nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:182: prakāśamānatvameva hi cidātmano 'pi sattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā vā dvaitāpatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:183: sattāyāścārthakriyākāritāyāśca sattāntarārthakriyākāritāntarakalpane anavasthāpātāt prakāśamānataiva sattā abhyupetavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:185: asattve vā na prakāśamānāḥ ; tatkathaṃ satyānṛtayormithunībhāvaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:188: ityāśayavān āha ākṣeptā- ko 'yamadhyāso nāma iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:190: samādhātā lokasiddhamadhyāsalakṣaṇamācakṣāṇa evākṣepaṃ pratikṣipati- ucyate- smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:197: tasya ca dṛṣṭatvamātramupayujyate na vastusatteti dṛṣṭagrahaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:198: tathāpi vartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ nāropopayogīti pūrva- ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:205: asti hi svastimatyāṃ gavi pūrvadṛṣṭasya gotvasya paratra kālākṣyāmavabhāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:206: asti ca pāṭaliputre pūrvadṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra māhiṣmatyāmavabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:207: avabhāsapadaṃ ca samīcīne 'pi pratyaye prasiddham, yathā nīlasyāvabhāsaḥ pītasyāvabhāsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:219: asaṃbandhāgrahaṇasārūpye 'pītaṃ tapanīyapiṇḍaṃ' 'pītaṃ bilvaphalaṃ' ityādau pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pītatvaśaṅkhatvayorāropyāha 'pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:221: evaṃ vijñātṛpuruṣābhimukheṣvādarśodakādiṣu svaccheṣu cākṣuṣaṃ tejo lagnamapi balīyasā saureṇa tejasā pratisrotaḥ pravartitaṃ mukhasaṃyuktaṃ mukhaṃ grāhayet,
GSP33vacbhamu:227: na hi sarpātadabhāvena rajjvādayo vā sphaṭikādayo vā raktādiguṇayogino na pratibhāsante,
GSP33vacbhamu:229: tathā sati maruṣu marīcikānicayam 'uccāvacamuccalattuṅgataraṅgabhaṅgamāleyamabhyarṇabhavatīrṇā mandākinī' ityabhisaṃdhāya pravṛttaḥ tattoyamāpīya pipāsāmupaśamayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:231: na ca marīcirūpeṇa salilamavastusat svarūpeṇa tu paramārthasadeva dehendriyādayastu svarūpeṇāpyasanta ityanubhavāgocaratvātkathamāropyanta iti sāṃpratam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:232: yato yadyasanto nānubhavagocarāḥ kathaṃ tarhi marīcyādīnāmasatāṃ toyādyātmatayānubhavagocaratvam ?
GSP33vacbhamu:233: na ca svarūpasattvena toyādyātmanāpi santo bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:235: api tu bhāva eva bhāvāntarātmanā abhāvaḥ svena rūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:242: na ca viṣayasya samastasāmarthyavirahe 'pi vijñānameva tattādṛśaṃ svapratyayasāmarthyādadṛṣṭāntasiddhasvabhāvabhedamupajātamasataḥ prakāśanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:248: vijñānasvarūpameva asataḥ prakāśa iti cet. kaḥ punareṣa sadasatoḥ saṃbandhaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:249: asadadhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ sato jñānasya asatā saṃbandha iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:250: aho batāyamatinirvṛtaḥ pratyayatapasvī yadasya asatyapi nirūpaṇamāyatate /
GSP33vacbhamu:251: na ca pratyayastatrādhatte kiñcit, asata ādhāratvāyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:252: asadantareṇa pratyayo na prathata iti pratyayasyaivaiṣa svabhāvaḥ na tvasadadhīnamasya kiñciditi cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:253: aho batāsya asatpakṣapātaḥ yadayamatadutpattiḥ atadātmā ca tadavinābhāvaniyataḥ pratyaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:256: tatkimidānīṃ marīcayo 'pi toyātmanā satattvāḥ yadanubhavagocarāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:258: dvividhaṃ ca vastūnāṃ tattvam- sattvamasattvaṃ ca tatra pūrvaṃ svataḥ, paraṃ tu parataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:265: tathā ca samīcīna iti na bhrānto nāpi bādhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:266: addhā ! na bādhyeta yadi marīcīnayaṃ atoyātmatattvānatoyātmanā gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:267: toyātmanā tu gṛhṇan kathama bhrāntaḥ, kathaṃ vā abādhyaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:268: hanta ! toyābhāvātmanāṃ marīcināṃ toyabhāvātmatvaṃ tāvanna sat,
GSP33vacbhamu:272: na cāropitaṃ rūpaṃ vastvantaram ; taddhi marīcayo vā bhavet, gaṅgādigataṃ toyaṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:273: pūrvasminkalpe 'marīcayaḥ' iti pratyayaḥ syāt, na 'toyam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:274: uttarasmiṃstu 'gaṅgāyāṃ toyam' iti syāt, na punaḥ 'iha' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:275: deśabhedāsmaraṇe 'toyam' iti syāt, na pula 'iha' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:283: ata eva pūrvadṛṣṭamiva ; tattvatastu na toyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:284: na ca pūrvadṛṣṭam ; kiṃ tu anṛtam anirvācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:286: apūrvo 'pi pūrvamithyāpratyayopadarśita iva paratra cidātmanyadhyasyata iti upapannam,
GSP33vacbhamu:292: na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyaḥ arthakriyākāritā vā iti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:293: sa cāyamevaṃlakṣaṇako 'dhyāsaḥ anirvacanīyaḥ sarveṣāmeva saṃmataḥ parīkṣakāṇām ;
GSP33vacbhamu:294: tadbhede paraṃ vipratipattirityanirvacanīyatāṃ draḍhayitumāha- taṃ kecit iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:299: yadyapi na bāhyaṃ vastusat tathāpyanādyavidyāvāsanāropitamalīkaṃ bāhyam ; tatra jñānākārasyāropaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:302: 'nedaṃ rajatam' iti bādhakasya idantāmātrabādhenāpyupapattau na rajatagocaratocitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:303: rajatasya dharmiṇo bhādhe hi rajataṃ ca tasya dharma idantā ca bādhite bhavetām ;
GSP33vacbhamu:306: tathā ca rajataṃ bahirbādhitamarthādāntare jñāne vyavatiṣṭhata iti jñānākārasya bahiradhyāsaḥ sidhyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:307: kecittu- jñānākārakhyātāvaparituṣyanto vadanti- yatra yadadhyāsaḥ tadvivekāgrahanibandhano bhrama iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:308: aparitoṣakāraṇaṃ cāhuḥ- vijñānakāratā rajatāderanubhavādvā vyavasthāpyeta, anumānādvā /
GSP33vacbhamu:310: anubhavo 'pi rajatapratyayo vā syāt, bādhakapratyayo vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:312: sa hi idaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamāvedayati na tvāntaram /
GSP33vacbhamu:313: 'aham' iti hi tadā syāt, pratipattuḥ pratyayādavyatirekāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:317: sa kiṃ purovarti dravyaṃ rajatādvivecayati āho jñānākāratāmapyasya darśayati ?
GSP33vacbhamu:318: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:322: na caiṣa rajatasya niṣedhaḥ, na ca idantāyāḥ, kiṃ tu vivekāgrahaprasañjitasya rajatavyavahārasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:323: na ca rajatameva śuktikāyāṃ prasañjitaṃ rajatajñānena /
GSP33vacbhamu:324: na hi rajatanirbhāsasya śuktikālambanaṃ yuktam, anubhavavirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:329: na ca rajatajñāne śuktikā bhāsate, iti kathamālambanam ?
GSP33vacbhamu:331: api cendriyādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajanane sāmarthyamupalabdhamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānasaṃbhavaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:338: tathā ca 'rajatam','idam' iti ca dve vijñāne smṛtyanubhavarūpe /
GSP33vacbhamu:340: doṣavaśāttadgataśuktitvasāmānyaviśeṣasyāgrahāt tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛtiṃ janayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:342: tathā ca rajatasamṛteḥ purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:345: iti dve ete api grahaṇasmaraṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravartayataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:346: kvacitpunargrahaṇe e mithaḥ agṛhītabhede, yathā 'pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:347: atra hi vinirgacchannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kācasyeva svacchasya pītatvaṃ gṛhyate pittaṃ tu na gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:351: tadupapattau ca prāktanasya pratyayasya bhrāntatvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:352: tasmādyathārthāḥ sarve vipratipannāḥ saṃdehavibhramāḥ, pratyayatvāt, ghaṭādipratyayavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:354: yasmin śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsa iti lokaprasiddhiḥ nāsāvanyathākhyātinibandhanā,
GSP33vacbhamu:355: kiṃ tu gṛhītasya rajatādestatsmaraṇasya ca gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa gṛhītamātrasya yaḥ 'idam' iti puro 'vasthitāddravyamātrāttatprajñānācca vivekaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:358: anye tu- atrāpyaparituṣyantaḥ- yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:359: atredamākūtam- asti tāvadrajatārthinaḥ 'rajatamidam' iti pratyayātputovartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:363: kiṃ tu grahaṇasmaraṇe eva mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataścāgṛhītabhede,
GSP33vacbhamu:365: atha samīcīnajñānasārūpyamanayorgṛhyamāṇaṃ vā vyavahārapravṛttihetuḥ, agṛhyamāṇaṃ vā sattāmātreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:366: gṛhyamāṇe 'pi 'samīcīnajñānasārūpyamanayoridamiti rajatamiti ca jñānayoḥ' iti grahaṇam,
GSP33vacbhamu:367: atha vā 'tayoreva svarūpato viṣayataśca mitho bhedāgrahaḥ' iti grahaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:368: tatra na tāvatsamīcīnajñānasadṛśī iti jñānaṃ samīcīnajñānavadvyavahārapravartakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:369: na hi 'gosadṛśo gavayaḥ' iti jñānaṃ gavārthinaṃ gavaye pravartayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:370: 'anayoreva bhedāgrahaḥ' iti tu jñānaṃ parāhatam ; na hi bhedāgrahe anayoriti bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:372: tasmātsattāmātreṇa bhedāgrahaḥ agṛhīta eva vyavahāraheturiti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:373: tatra kimayamāropotpādakrameṇa vyavahārahetuḥ, āho anutpāditāropa eva svata iti ?
GSP33vacbhamu:374: vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ- cetanavyavahārasya ajñānapūrvakatvānupapatteḥ āropajñānotpādakrameṇaiva- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:375: nanu satyaṃ cetanavyavahāro nājñānapūrvakaḥ, kiṃ tu aviditavivekagrahaṇasmaraṇapūrvaka iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:379: kathaṃ cāyamidaṅkārāspade pravarteta yadi tu na tadicchet ? anyadicchatyanyatkarotīti vyāhatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:380: na cedidaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamiti jānīyāt kathaṃ rajatārthī tadicchet ?
GSP33vacbhamu:384: so 'yamupādānopekṣābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇaścecanaḥ avyavasthitaḥ idaṅkārāspade rajatasamāropeṇopādāna eva vyavasthāpyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:398: yadyadarthinaṃ yatra niyamena pravartayati tajjñānaṃ tadviṣayaṃ yathobhayasiddhasamīcīnarajatajñānam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:401: tatra bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām- kiṃ śuktikātvasya 'idaṃ rajatam' iti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvam āhosvit dravyamātrasya puraḥsthitasya sitabhāsvarasya ?
GSP33vacbhamu:404: tathā hi-'rajatamidam' ityanubhavannanubhavitā purovarti vastu aṅgulyādinā nirdiśati /
GSP33vacbhamu:410: tat bodhakatvena svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti vyutpādayadbhirasmābhiḥ parihṛtaṃ nyāyakaṇikāyāmiti neha pratanyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:411: diṅmātraṃ cāsya smṛtipramoṣabhaṅgasyoktam ; vistarastu brahmatattvasamīkṣāyāmavagantavya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:412: tadidamuktam- anye tu yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:413: yatra śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsastasyaiva śuktikāderviparītadharmakalpanāṃ rajatatvadharmakalpanāmiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:414: nanu santu nāma parīkṣakāṇāṃ vipratipattayaḥ, prakṛte tu kimāyātamityata āha- sarvathāpi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:416: tena sarveṣāmeva parīkṣakāṇāṃ mate anyasyānyadharmakalpanānirvacanīyāvaśyaṃbhāvinītyanirvacanīyatā sarvatantrasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:419: api tu laukikānāmapītyāha- tathā ca loke anubavaḥ śuktikā hi rajatavadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:423: ekasya tvabhinnasya bhedabhramo na dṛṣṭa iti kutaḥ cidātmano 'bhinnānāṃ jīvānāṃ bhedavibhrama ityata āha- ekaścandraḥ sadvitīyavat iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:427: na khalvapratibhāsamāne purovartini dravye rajatasya vā taddharmāṇāṃ vā samāropaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:428: pratibhāsamāne vā na tāvadayamātmā jaḍo ghaṭādivatparādhīnaprakāśa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:429: na khalu sa eva kartā ca karma ca bhavati, virodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:430: parasamavetakriyāphalaśāli hi karma, na ca jñānakriyā parasamavāyinīti kathamasyāḥ karma ?
GSP33vacbhamu:431: na ca tadeva svaṃ ca paraṃ ca, virodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:435: ātmā jaḍo 'pi sarvārthajñāneṣu bhāsamāno 'pi kartaiva na karma,
GSP33vacbhamu:437: yathā hi caitrasamavetakriyayā caitranagaraprāptāvubayasamavetāyāmapi kriyamāṇāyāṃ nagarasyaiva karmatā,
GSP33vacbhamu:444: tathā hi- yo 'yamarthaprakāśaḥ phalaṃ yasminnarthaśca ātmā ca prathete sa kiṃ jaḍaḥ svayaṃprakāśo vā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:445: jaḍaścet viṣayātmāvapi jaḍāviti kasmin kiṃ prakāśeta aviśeṣāt, iti prāptamāndhyamaśeṣasya jagataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:449: na ca nilīnameva vijñānamarthātmānau jñāpayati cakṣurādivaditi vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:450: jñāpanaṃ hi jñānajananam, janitaṃ ca jñānaṃ jaḍaṃ sannoktadūṣaṇamativarteteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:453: tathāpi kimāyātaṃ viṣayātmanoḥ svabhāvajaḍayoḥ ? etadāyātaṃ yattayoḥ saṃvidajaḍeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:454: tatkiṃ putraḥ paṇḍita iti pitāpi paṇḍito 'stu ?
GSP33vacbhamu:455: svabhāva eṣa saṃvidaḥ svayaṃprakāśāyā yadarthātmasaṃbandhiteti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:456: hanta putrasyāpi paṇḍitasya svabhāva eṣa yatpitṛsaṃbandhiteti samānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:457: sahārthātmaprakāśena saṃvitprakāśo na tvarthātmaprakāśaṃ vineti tasyāḥ svabhāva iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:459: tathā ca na svayaṃprakāśā saṃvit, na ca saṃvit arthātmaprakāśa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:460: atha saṃvidarthātmaprakāśo na saṃvido bhidyete, saṃvideva tau /
GSP33vacbhamu:462: ātmārthau saheti tāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvidarthātmaprakāśau saheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:477: tasmāccandre 'nubhūyamāne iva dvitīyaścandramāḥ svaprakāśādanyor'thaḥ anirvacanīya eveti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:479: na ca anirvācyārthabhedaḥ prakāśaṃ nirvācyaṃ bhettumarhati, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:480: na ca arthānāmapi parasparaṃ bhedaḥ samīcīnajñānapaddhatimadhyāste ityupariṣṭādupapādayiṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:481: tadayaṃ prakāśa eva svayaṃprakāśa ekaḥ kūṭastho nityo niraṃśaḥ pratyagātmā aśakyanirvacanīyebhyo dehendriyādibhya ātmānaṃ pratīpaṃ nirvacanīyamañcati jānātīti pratyaṅ,
GSP33vacbhamu:488: kasmādayamayukta ityata āha - sarvo hi puro 'vasthite viṣaye viṣayāntaramadhyasyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:489: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yatparādhīnaprakāśamaṃśavacca tatsāmānyāṃśagrahe karaṇadoṣavaśācca viśeṣāgrahe anyathā prakāśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:490: pratyagātmā tu aparādhīnaprakāśatayā na svajñāne kāraṇānyapekṣate, yena tadāśrayairdeṣairduṣyet /
GSP33vacbhamu:491: na cāṃśavān, yena kaścidasyāṃśo gṛhyeta, kaścinna gṛhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:492: na hi tadeva tadānīmeva tenaiva gṛhītamagṛhītaṃ ca saṃbhavatīti na svayaṃprakāśatāpakṣe adhyāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:494: na hi śuktau apuraḥsthitāyāṃ rajatamadhyasyati 'idaṃ rajatam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:495: tasmādatyantagrahe atyantāgrahe ca nādhyāsa iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:499: tatkathaṃ nādhyāsa ityata āha- yuṣmatpratyayāpetasya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:501: tathā ca yo viṣayī sa eva cidātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:509_1: anavacchinno 'pi vastuto 'vacchinna iva abhinno 'pi bhinna iva akartāpi karteva abhoktāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:511: na hi cidekarasasyātmanaḥ cidāṃśe gṛhīte agṛhītaṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:512: na khalu ānandanityatvavibhutvādayaḥ asya cidrūpādvastuto bhidyante, yena tadgrahe na gṛhyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:513: gṛhītā eva tu kalpitena bhedena na vivecitā ityagṛhītā ivābhānti /
GSP33vacbhamu:514: na ca ātmano buddhyādibhyo bhedastāttvikaḥ yena cidātmani gṛhyamāṇe so 'pi gṛhīta eva bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:516: tasmāccidātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśasyaiva anavacchinnasya avacchinnebhyo buddhyādibhyo bhedāgrahāt tadadhyāsena jīvabhāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:518: tathā hi- kartā bhoktā cidātmā ahaṃpratyaye pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33vacbhamu:519: na ca udāsīnasya tasya kriyāśaktirbhogaśaktirvā saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:520: yasya ca buddhyādeḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātasya kriyābhogaśaktī na tasya caitanyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:521_2: iti ca janturiti ca kṣetrajña iti ca ākhyāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:524: tasmāccidātmano 'vyatirekāt jīvaḥ svayaṃprakāśo 'pi ahaṃpratyayena kartṛbhoktṛtayā vyavahārayogyaḥ kriyata ityahaṃpratyayālambanamucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:525: na ca adhyāse sati viṣayatvaṃ viṣayatve ca adhyāsaḥ ityanyonyāśrayatvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33vacbhamu:529: jīvo hi cidātmatayā svayaṃprakāśatayā aviṣayo 'pi aupādhikena rūpeṇa viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:531: na vayamaparādhīnaprakāśatayā aviṣayatvenādhyāsamapākurmaḥ, kiṃ tu pratyagātmā na svato nāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:533: tathā ca sarvathāprathamāne pratyagātmani kuto 'dhyāsa ityata āha- aparokṣatvācca pratyagātmaprasiddheḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:534: pratīca ātmanaḥ prasiddhiḥ prathā, tasyā aparokṣatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:535: yadyapi pratyagātmani nānyā prathāsti tathāpi bhedopacāraḥ, yathā 'puruṣasya caitanyam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:536: etaduktaṃ bhavati- avaśyaṃ cidātmā aparokṣo 'bhyupetavyaḥ tadaprathāyāṃ sarvasyāprathanena jagadāndhyaprasaṅgādityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:537: śrutiścātra bhavati- 'tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:538: tadevaṃ paramārthaparihāramuktvā abhyupetyāpi cidātmanaḥ parokṣatāṃ prauḍhavāditayā parihārāntaramāha- na cāyamasti iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:540: kasmādayaṃ na niyama ityata āha- apratyakṣe 'pi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:542: nabho hi dravyaṃ sat rūpasparśavirahānna bāhyendriyapratyakṣam /
GSP33vacbhamu:543: nāpi mānasam, manaso 'sahāyasya bāhye apravṛtteḥ ; tasmādapratyakṣam /
GSP33vacbhamu:544: atha ca tatra bālā avivekinaḥ paradarśitadarśinaḥ kadācitpārthivacchāyāṃ śyāmatāmāropya,
GSP33vacbhamu:547: tatrāpi pūrvadṛṣṭasya taijasasya vā tāmasasya vā rūpasya paratra nabhasi smṛtirūpo 'vabhāsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:552: tatkimarthamayamevādhyāsa ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyutpāditaḥ nādhyāsamātramityata āha- tametamevaṃlakṣaṇamadhyāsaṃ paṇḍitā avidyeti manyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:554: taducchedāya ca vedāntāḥ pravṛttā iti vakṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:555: pratyagātmanyanātmādhyāsa eva sarvānarthahetuḥ na punā rajatādivibhramā iti sa evāvidyā,
GSP33vacbhamu:556: tatsvarūpaṃ cāvijñātaṃ na śakyamucchettumiti tadeva vyutpādyaṃ nādhyāsamātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:560: na caivaṃ pṛthagjanā api manyante adhyāsam, yena na vyutpādyetetyata uktam-“paṇḍitā manyante“iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:561: nanu iyamanādiratinirūḍhanibiḍavāsanānubaddhā avidyā na śakyā niroddhum,
GSP33vacbhamu:563: iti yo manyante taṃ prati tannirodhopāyamāha - tadvivekena ca vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇam,
GSP33vacbhamu:566: pratyagātmani khalu atyantavivikte buddhyādibhyaḥ buddhyādibhedāgrahanimitto buddhyādyātmatvataddharmādhyāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:568: adhyāsāpabādhātmakaṃ vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ vidyā cidātmarūpaṃ svarūpe vyavatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:570: atinirūḍhanibiḍhavāsanānuvidvā avidyā vidyayā apabādhitāpi svavāsanāvaśātpunarudbhaviṣyati pravartayiṣyati ca vāsanādikāryaṃ svocitamityaya āha - tatraivaṃ sati,
GSP33vacbhamu:572: tatkṛtena doṣeṇa guṇena vā aṇumātreṇāpi sa na saṃbadhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:574: cidātmano guṇena caitanyānandādinā antaḥkaraṇādi na saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:575: etaduktaṃ bhavati - tattvāvadhāraṇābhyāsasya hi svabhāva eva sa tādṛśaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:577: tattvapakṣapāto hi svabhāvo dhiyām, yathāhurbāhyā api--
GSP33vacbhamu:581: viśeṣatastu cidātmasvabhāvasya tattvajñānasya atyantāntaraṅgasya kuto 'nirvācyayā avidyayā bādha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:584: 'ahamidam' 'mamedam' iti lokavyavahāraḥ“iti tatra vyapadeśalakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ kaṇṭhoktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:588: tattvaparicchedo hi pramā vidyā ; tatsādhanāni pramāṇāni kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇi ?
GSP33vacbhamu:589: nāvidyāvantaṃ pramāṇānyāśrayanti, tatkāryasya vidyāyā avidyāvirodhitvāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:590: santu vā pratyakṣādīni saṃvṛtyāpi yathā tathā ;
GSP33vacbhamu:591: śāstrāṇi tu puruṣahitānuśāsanaparāṇi avidyāpratipakṣatayā nāvidyāvadviṣayāṇi bhavitumarhantītyāha - śāstrāṇi ca iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:596: ayamarthaḥ- pramātṛtvaṃ hi pramāṃ prati kartṛtvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:601: na ca kūṭasthanityaścidātmā apariṇāmī svato vyāpāravān /
GSP33vacbhamu:604: kiṃ naśchinnamityata āha- na hīndriyāṇyanupādāya pratyakṣādivyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:605: vyavahriyate aneneti vyavahāraḥ phalam, pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānāṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:606: indriyāṇi iti indriyaliṅgādīnīti draṣṭavyam, 'daṇḍino gacchanti' itivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:611: atha svayameva kasmānna pravartante ityata āha- na cādhiṣṭhānamantareṇendriyāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:613: na jātu karaṇānyanadhiṣṭhitāni kartrā svakārye vyāpriyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:616: kṛtamatrātmādhyāsenetyata āha- na cānadhyastātmabhāvena dehena kaścidvyāpriyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:620: evamanadhyastātmabhāvaṃ dehendriyādi vyāpārayan bhaviṣyati tadabhijñaḥ pramātā ityata āha- na caitasminsarvasmin,
GSP33vacbhamu:628: ātaścādhyāsāśrayāṇi pramāṇānītyāha- na ca pramātṛtvamantareṇa pramāṇapravṛttirasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:629: pramāyāṃ khalu phale svatantraḥ pramātā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:633: kathaṃ caiṣa cidātmakartṛko bhavet, yadyantaḥkaraṇaṃ vyāpāravat cidātmani nādhyasyet ?
GSP33vacbhamu:634: tasmāditaretarādhyāsāccidātmakartṛsthaṃ pramāphalaṃ sidhyati, tatsiddhau ca pramātṛtvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:642: āgamopapattipratipannapratyagātmatattvānāṃ vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇyeva pramāṇānītyata āha- paśvādibhiścāviśeṣāt iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:643: vidantu nāma āgamopapattibhyāṃ dehendriyādibhyo bhinnaṃ pratyagātmānam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:645: yādṛśo hi paśuśakuntādīnāmavipratipannamugdhabhāvānāṃ vyavahārastādṛśo vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:649: etadeva vibhajate- yathā hi paśvādaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:650: atra ca śabdādibhiḥ śrotrādīnāṃ saṃbandhe sati iti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:653: tathā hi- śabdādisvarūpamupalabhya tajjātīyasya pratikūlatāmanusmṛtya tajjātīyatayopalabhyamānasya pratikūlatāmanumimata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:658: śāstraṃ tu 'jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta' ityādi na dehātmādhyāsena pravartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:660: tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram- 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāttasmātsvayaṃ prayoge syāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:661: na ca dehādi bhasmībhūtaṃ pāralaukikāya phalāya kalpata iti dehādyatiriktaṃ kañcidātmānamadhikāriṇamākṣipati śāstram ;
GSP33vacbhamu:665: adhikāraśāstraṃ hi svargakāmasya puṃsaḥ paralokasaṃbandhaṃ vinā na nirvahatīti tāvanmātramākṣipet,
GSP33vacbhamu:669: prayoktā hi karmaṇaḥ karmajanitaphalabhogabhāgī karmaṇyadhikārī svāmī bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:675: te tvavidyāvantamanuśāsato nirmṛṣṭanikhilāvidyamanuśiṣṭaṃ svarūpo vyavasthāpayantītyetāvāneṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:678: yadyapi virodhānupayogābhyāmaupaniṣadaḥ puruṣaḥ adhikāre nāpekṣyate tathāpyupaniṣadbhyo 'vagamyamānaḥ śaknotyadhikāraṃ niroddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:679: tataśca parasparaparāhatārthatvena kṛtsna eva vedaḥ prāmāṇyamapajahyādityata āha- prāk ca tathābhūtātma- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:681: tasmāttu purastātkarmavidhayaḥ svocitaṃ vyavahāramabhinirvartayanto nānupajātena brahmajñānena śakyā niroddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:683: yathā-'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti sādhyāṃśaniṣedhe 'pi 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta' iti śāstraṃ pravartamānaṃ 'na hiṃsyāt' ityanena na virudhyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:685: avajitakrodhārātayaḥ puruṣā niṣedhe adhikriyante, krodhārātivaśīkṛtāstu śyenādiśāstre iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:686: avidyāvatpuruṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātivartata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva sphuṭayati- tathā hi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:695: dehatādātmyamātmanyadhyasya dehamarthaṃ putrakalatrādisvābhyaṃ ca kṛśatvādivat āropyāha- ahameva vikalaḥ, sakalaḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:696: svasya khalu sākalyena svābhyasākalyāt svāmīśvaraḥ sakalaḥ saṃpūrṇo bhavati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:697: tathā svasya vaikalyena svāmyavaikalyāt svāmīśvaro visalo 'saṃpūrṇo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:698: bāhyadharmā ye vaikalyādayaḥ svābhyapraṇālikayā saṃcaritāḥ śarīre tānātmanyadhyasyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:699: yadā ca paropādhyapekṣe dehadharme svāmye iyaṃ gatiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:700: tadā kaiva kathā anaupādhikeṣu dehadharmeṣu kṛśatvādiṣu ityāśayavānāha- tathā dehadharmān iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:702: tato 'pyantaraṅgasyāntaḥkaraṇasya adhyastātmabhāvasya dharmān kāmasaṃkalpādīn ātmanyadhyasyatīti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:703: tadanena prapañcena dharmādhyāsamuktvā tasya mūlaṃ dharmyadhyāsamāha- evamahaṃpratyayinam /
GSP33vacbhamu:709: caitanyamupapādayati- taṃ ca pratyagātmānaṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ tadviparyayeṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:714_0: tadanena antaḥkaraṇādyavacchinnaḥ pratyagātmā idamanidaṃrūpaścetanaḥ kartā bhoktā
GSP33vacbhamu:715: pramāṇaprameyavyavahāradṛḍhīkṛtameva śiṣyahitāya svarūpābhidhānapūrvakaṃ sarvalokapratyakṣatayā adhyāsaṃ sudṛḍhīkaroti- evamayamanādiranantaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:722: virodhipratyayaṃ vinā kuto 'sya prahāṇamityaya uktam- ātmaikatvavidyāpratipattaye /
GSP33vacbhamu:723: pratipattiḥ prāptiḥ, tasyai, na tu japamātrāya, nāpi karmasu pravṛttaye /
GSP33vacbhamu:726: etaduktaṃ bhavati- asmatpratyayasyātmaviṣayasya samīcīnatve sati brahmaṇo jñātatvāt niṣprayojanatvācca na jijñāsā syāt ;
GSP33vacbhamu:727: tadabhāve ca na brahmajñānāya vedāntāḥ paṭhyeran ;
GSP33vacbhamu:731: āropitaṃ hi rūpaṃ tattvajñānenāpodyate, na tu vāstavamatattvajñānena /
GSP33vacbhamu:732: na hi rajjvā rajjutvaṃ sahasramapi sarpadhārāpratyayā apavaditumutsahante /
GSP33vacbhamu:733: mithyājñānaprasañjitaṃ tu rūpaṃ śakyaṃ tattvajñānena apavaditum,
GSP33vacbhamu:737: tatkathaṃ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāmātmaikatvapratipādanamartha ityata āha- yathā cāyamarthaḥ ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:738: śarīrameva śarīrakam ; tatra nivāsī śārīrako jīvātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:739: tasya tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyaparamātmarūpatayā yā mīmāṃsā sā tathoktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:741: yadyapi ca 'aviśiṣṭastu vākyārthaḥ' iti nyāyāt mantrāṇāmiva vedāntānāmarthaparatvamautsargikam,
GSP33vacbhamu:742: yadyapi ca vedāntebhyaḥ caitanyānandaghanaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvarahito niṣprapañca ekaḥ pratyagātmā avagamyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:744: mohamayamātmānamavagāhamānenāhaṃpratyayena sedehabādhavirahiṇā virudhyamānā vedāntāḥ svārthātpracyutā upacaritārthā vā japamātropayogino vā ityavivakṣitasvārthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:745: tathā ca tadarthavicārātmikā caturlakṣaṇī śārīrakamīmāṃsā nārabdhavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:746: na ca sarvajanīnāhamanubhavasiddha ātmā saṃdigdho vā saprayojano vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:747: yena jijñāsyaḥ san vicāraṃ prayuñjīta- iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:751: evaṃ ca vedāntā nāvivakṣitārthāḥ, nāpi upacaritārthāḥ, kiṃ tu uktakṣaṇāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:753: tasya ca vakṣyamāṇena krameṇa saṃdigdhatvāt prayojanatvācca yuktā jijñāsā- ityāśayavān sūtrakāraḥ tajjijñāsāmasūtrayat,
GSP33vacbhamu:759: kiṃ tu brahmamīmāṃsākhyatarketikartavyatānujñātaviṣayairvedāntairāhitaṃ nirvicikitsaṃ brahmajñānameva samastaduḥkhopaśamarūpamānandaikarasaṃ paramaṃ prayojanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:762: yathā svagrīvāgatamapi graiveyakaṃ kutaścidbhramānnāstīti manyamānaḥ pareṇa pratipāditamaprāptamiva prāpnoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:763: jijñāsā tu saṃśayasya kāryamiti svakāraṇaṃ saṃśayaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:765: tathā ca śāstre prekṣāvatpravṛttihetusaṃśayaprayojanasūcanāt yuktamasya sūtrasya śāstrāditvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:770: tasya mīmāṃsāyāḥ śāstram, sā hyanena śiṣyate śiṣyebhyo yathāvatpratipādyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:776: tadevaṃ sūtratātparyaṃ vyākhyāya tasya prathamapadaṃ atha iti vyācaṣṭe- tatrāthaśabda ānantaryārthaḥ parigṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:777: teṣu sūtrapadeṣu madhye yo 'yaṃ athaśabdaḥ sa ānantaryārtha iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:781: 'atha yogānuśāsanam' iti ca ; tatkimatrādhikārārtho na gṛhyata ityata āha- nādhikārārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:783: jijñāsā tāvadiha sūtre brahmaṇaśca tajjñānācca śabdataḥ pradhānaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:784: na ca yathā 'daṇḍī praiṣānanvāha' ityatra apradhānamapi daṇḍaśabdārtho vivakṣyate evamihāpi brahmatajjñāne iti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:786: tadavivakṣāyāṃ tadasūcanena kākadantaparīkṣāyāmiva na brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ prekṣāvantaḥ pravarteran /
GSP33vacbhamu:787: na hi tadānīṃ brahma tajjñānaṃ ca abhidheyaprayojane bhavitumarhataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:789: karmapravṛttyupayogitayā upacaritārthānāṃ vā japopayogināṃ vā 'hum' ityevamādīnāmivāvivakṣitārthānāmapi svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvasya saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:790: tasmātsaṃdehaprayojanasūcanī jijñāsā iha padato vākyataśca pradhānaṃ vivakṣitavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:791: na ca tasyā adhikāryatvam, aprastūyamānatvāt, yena tatsamabhivyāhṛto 'thaśabdo 'dhikārārthaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:794: na ca jijñāsā mīmāṃsā yena yogānuśāsanavadadhikriyeta ;
GSP33vacbhamu:795: nāntatvaṃ nipātya 'māṅ māne' ityasmādvā 'mānapūjāyām' ityasmādvā dhātoḥ 'mānbandha-' ityādinā anicchārthe sani vyutpāditasya mīmāṃsāpadasya pūjitavicāravacanatvāt ;
GSP33vacbhamu:799: na ca svārthaparatvasyopapattau satyāṃ anyārthaparatvakalpanā yuktā, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:802: tathā ca maṅgalahetutvāt pratyahaṃ brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti sūtrārthaḥ saṃpadyata ityata āha- maṅgalasya ca vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:803: padārtha eva hi vākyārthe samanvīyate, sa ca vācyo lakṣyo vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:804: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ vā lakṣyaṃ vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:806: na ca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śabdavyavahāre dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:807: tatkimidānīṃ maṅgalārtho 'śabdaḥ teṣu teṣu na prayoktavyaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:808: tathā ca oṅkāraścāthaśabdaśca dvāvetau brahmaṇaḥ purā /
GSP33vacbhamu:810: iti smṛtivyākopa ityata āha- arthāntaraprayukta eva hyathaśabdaḥ śrutyā maṅgalaprayojano bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:811: arthāntareṣvānantaryādiṣu prayuktaḥ athaśabdaḥ śrutyā śravaṇamātreṇa veṇuvīṇādhvanivanmaṅgalaṃ kurvan maṅgalaprayojano bhavati anyārthamānīyamānodakumbhadarśanavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:813: tena ca iha ānantaryārthasya sataḥ śravaṇamātreṇa maṅgalārthatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:816: tadyathā- iyamevāthaśabdaṃ prakṛtya vimṛśyate 'kimayamathaśabda ānantarye athādhikāre' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:819: na ca prakṛtānapekṣā, tadanapekṣasya tadviṣayatvābhāvena asamānaviṣayatayā vikalpānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:820: na hi jātu bhavati- kiṃ nitya ātmā, atha anityā buddhiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:821: tasmādānantaryaṃ vinā pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣa ihāthaśabdaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:825: sā ca pūrvaprakṛtārthāpekṣatve 'pyathaśabdasya sidhyatīti vyartha ānantaryārthatvāvadhāraṇāgraho 'smākamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:828: na ceha kalpāntaropanyāsa iti pāriśeṣyādānantaryārtha eveti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:829: bhavatvānantaryārthaḥ, kimevaṃ satītyata āha- sati cānantaryārthatva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:830: na tāvadyasya kasyacidatrānantaryam iti vaktavyam, tasyābhidhānamantareṇāpi prāptatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:832: na cānantaryamātrasya dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:833: tasmāttasyātrānantaryaṃ vaktavyaṃ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:837: dharmajijñāsāyā iva brahmajijñāsāyā api yogyatvāt svādhyāyādhyayanānantaryam,
GSP33vacbhamu:841: tasmādvedādhyayanānantaryameva brahmajijñāsāyā apyathaśabdārtha ityata āha- svādhyāyānantaryaṃ tu samānaṃ dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:842: atra ca svādhyāyena viṣayeṇa tadviṣayamadhyayanaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:843: tathā ca 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' ityanenaiva gatamiti nedaṃ sūtramārabdhavyam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:845: codayati - nanviha karmāvabodhānantaryaṃ viśeṣaḥ dharmajijñāsāto brahmajijñāsāyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:846: asyārthaḥ- 'vividiṣanti yajñena' iti tṛtīyāśrutyā yajñādīnāmaṅgatvena brahmajñāne viniyogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:849: tatrāpi ca na vākyārthajñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvo yajñādīnām, vākyārthajñānasya vākyādevotpatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:850: na ca vākyaṃ sahakāritayā karmāṇyapekṣata iti yuktam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:854: tasmin sati tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjanaṃ tataśca tadbodha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:855: na ca vedāntavākyānāmeva svārthapratyāyane karmāpekṣā na vākyāntarāṇāmiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33vacbhamu:857_0: nanu 'tattvamasi' iti vākyāt tvaṃpadārthasya kartṛbhoktṛrūpasya jīvātmano nityaśuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvena
GSP33vacbhamu:863: tasmāt 'tattvamasi' ityādeḥ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā,
GSP33vacbhamu:868: ata eva śrutiḥ- 'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:870: vijñāya tarkopakaraṇena śabdena prajñāṃ bhāvanāṃ kurvītetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:873: yajñādisaṃskṛto hi puruṣaḥ ādaranairantaryadīrghakālairāsevamāno brahmabhāvanāmanādyavidyāvāsanāṃ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:875: ata eva smṛtiḥ- 'mahāyajñaiśca yajñaiśca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:878: asti hi smṛtiḥ- 'ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet' /
GSP33vacbhamu:880: anye tu 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena' ityādiśrutibhyaḥ tattatphalāya coditānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃyogapṛthaktvena brahmabhāvanāṃ pratyaṅgabhāvamācakṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:883: ata eva pāramarṣaṃ sūtram 'sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:885_0: tasmāt yadi śrutyādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vā pāramarṣaṃ sūtraṃ sarvathā yajñādikarmasamuccitā
GSP33vacbhamu:889: karmāvabodhena hi karmānuṣṭhānasāhityaṃ bhavati brahmopāsanāyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:894: kiṃ kārye yathāgneyādīnāṃ paramāpūrve cirabhāviphalānukūle janayitavye samidādyapekṣā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:898: sa cotpādyo vā syāt yathā saṃyavanasya piṇḍaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:903: na khalu ghaṭādisākṣātkāra iva jaḍasvabhāvebhyo ghaṭādibhyo bhinna indriyādyādheyo brahmasākṣātkāro bhāvanādheyaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:905: tato bhinnasya vā bhāvanādheyasya sākṣātkārasya pratibhāpratyayavat saṃśayākrāntatayā prāmāṇyāyogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:907: na khalu anumānāvagataṃ siddhaṃ vahniṃ bhāvayataḥ śītārtasya śiśirabharamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasya sphurajjvālājaṭilānalasākṣātkāraḥ pramāṇāntareṇa saṃvādyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:910: na ca kūṭasthanityasya sarvavyāpino brahmaṇa upāsanāto vikārasaṃskāraprāptayaḥ saṃbhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:916: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- pratisīrāpanaye pāriṣadānāṃ nartakīviṣayaḥ sākṣātkāro bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:925: na hi sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:926: ārohapariṇāhavat dravyamiti vā śataśo 'pi jñānamabhyasyamānaṃ puruṣa eveti niścayāya paryāptam,
GSP33vacbhamu:928: nanūktaṃ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā yuktimayena ca vyavasthāpyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:937: na caiṣa sākṣātkāro mīmāṃsāsahitasyāpi śabdapramāṇasya phalam,
GSP33vacbhamu:941: na cāyamanubhavato brahmasvabhāvo yena na janyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:944: na hi śābdajñānaprakāśyaṃ brahma svayaṃ prakāśaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:945: sarvopādhivihīnaṃ hi svayañjyotiriti gīyate, na tūpahitamapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:949: anyathā caitanyacchāyāpattiṃ vināntaḥkaraṇavṛtteḥ svayamacetanāyāḥ svaprakāśatvānupapattau sākṣātkāratvāyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:952: iha tu brahmasvarūpasya upādhikaluṣitasya jīvasya prāgapyaparokṣatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:954: jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhabuddhatvādisvabhāvo brahmeti gīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:958: antaḥkaraṇavṛttau brahmasākṣātkāre janayitavye asti tadupāsanāyāḥ karmāpekṣeti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:963: yadyucyeta niścite 'pi tattve viparyāsanibandhano vyavahāro 'nuvartamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:964: yathā guḍasya mādhuryaviniścaye api pittopahatendriyāṇāṃ tiktatāvabhāsānuvṛttiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:966: tasmādavidyāsaṃskārānuvṛttyā karmānuṣṭhānam, tena ca vidyāsahakāriṇā tatsamuccheda upapatsyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:968: karmaṇo vā taducchedakasya kuta ucchedaḥ iti vācyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:970: yathā payaḥ payo 'ntaraṃ jarayati svayaṃ ca jīryati,
GSP33vacbhamu:971: yathā viṣaṃ viṣāntaraṃ śamayati svayaṃ ca śāmyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:972: yathā vā katakarajo rajo 'ntarāvile pāthasi prakṣiptaṃ rajo 'ntarāṇi bhindat svayamapi bhidyamānamanāvilaṃ pāthaḥ karoti,
GSP33vacbhamu:976: tathāpi tānapyayaṃ vyavahārapratyayānmithyeti manyamāno vidvān ca śraddhatte,
GSP33vacbhamu:977: pittopahatendriya iva guḍaṃ thūtkṛtya tyajannapi tasya tiktatām /
GSP33vacbhamu:981: kriyākartrādisvarūpavibhāgaṃ ca vidvasyamāna iha vidvānabhimataḥ karmakāṇḍe /
GSP33vacbhamu:982: ata eva bhagavān avidvadviṣayatvaṃ śāstrasya varṇayāṃbabhūva bhāṣyakāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:985: na cānadhikṛtena samarthenāpi kṛte vaidikaṃ karma phalāya kalpate,
GSP33vacbhamu:987: tena dṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu śaktaḥ pravartamānaḥ prāpnotu phalam, dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:988: adṛṣṭārtheṣu tu śāstraikasamadhigamyaṃ phalamanadhikāriṇi na yujyata iti nopāsanākārye karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:991: evaṃ niṣedhavidhayo 'pi manuṣyādhikārā iti tadabhimānarahitasteṣvapi nādhikriyeta paśvādivat ;
GSP33vacbhamu:992: tathā cāyaṃ niṣiddhamanutiṣṭhan na pratyaveyāt tiryagādivaditi bhinnakarmatāpātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:996: anuvartamānaṃ ca mithyeti manyamāno na śraddhatta ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:997: kimato yadyevam ? etadato bhavati- vidhiṣu śrāddho 'dhikārī nāśrāddhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1003: api tu niṣidhyamānakriyonmukho nara ityeva pravartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1004: tathā ca sāṃsārika iva śraddhāvagatabrahmatattvo 'pi niṣedhamatikramya pravartamānaḥ pratyavaitīti na bhinnakarmadarśanābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1008: 'na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvamānaśuḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:1011: tathā ca 'vividiṣanti yajñena' ityādyāḥ śrutayo virudhyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:1016: vastutaḥ pradhānasyāpi vedanasya prakṛtyarthatayā śabdato guṇatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1019: na hi 'rājapuruṣamānaya' ityukte vastutaḥ pradhāno 'pi rājā puruṣaviśeṣaṇatayā śabdata upasarjana ānīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1028: etāni ca nityāni upāttaduritanibarhaṇena puruṣaṃ saṃskurvanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1029: tathā ca śrutiḥ- 'sa ha vā ātmāyājī yo veda idaṃ me 'nenāṅgaṃ saṃskriyata idaṃ me 'nenāṅgamupadhīyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1033: nityanaimittikānuṣṭhānaprakṣīṇakalmaṣasya ca viśuddhasattvasyāviduṣa eva utpannavividiṣasya jñānottapattiṃ darśayatyātharvaṇī śrutiḥ-
GSP33vacbhamu:1034: '.................. viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1036: kḷptenaiva ca nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nityehitenopāttaduritanibarhaṇena puruṣasaṃskāreṇa jñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvopapattau na saṃyogapṛthaktvena sākṣādaṅgabhāvo yuktaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1040: sa hi anityāśuciduḥkharūpe saṃsāre nityaśucisukhakhyātilakṣaṇena viparyāsena cittasattvaṃ malinayati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1041: ataḥ pāpanivṛttau pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya anityāśuciduḥsvarūpatvamapratyūhamavabudhyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1046: tataḥ śravaṇādikrameṇa tajjānātītyārādupakārakatvaṃ tattvajñānotpādaṃ prati cittasattvaśuddhyā karmaṇāṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1051: evaṃ ca ananuṣṭhitakarmāpi prāgbhavīyakarmavaśāt yo viśuddhasattvaḥ saṃsārāsāratādarśanena niṣpannavairāgyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1054: iyameva ca puruṣadhaureyabhedamadhikṛtya pravavṛte śrutiḥ- 'yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1056: ata eva na brahmacāriṇa ṛṇāni santi yena tadapākaraṇārthaṃ karmānutiṣṭhet /
GSP33vacbhamu:1057: etadanurodhācca 'jāyamāno vai brāhmaṇastribhirṛṇavā jāyate' iti gṛhasthaḥ saṃpadyamāna iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1062: tasmāttasyānantaryamatha-śabdārthaḥ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati yasmiṃstu sati bhavantī bhavatyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:1068: 'gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanī bhūtvā pravrajet' iti jābālaśrutirgārhasthyena hi yajñādyanuṣṭhānaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1071: iṣṭvā ca śaktito yajñairmano mokṣe niveśayet //
GSP33vacbhamu:1078: 'hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasaḥ' ityathāgraśabdābhyāṃ kramasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1083: ata eva 'yadahareva virajettadahareva pravrajet' iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1085: aviśuddhasattvo hi mokṣamicchannālasyāttadupāye 'pravartamāno gṛhasthadharmamapi nityanaimittikamanācaranpratikṣaṇamupacīyamānapāpmā adhogatiṃ gacchatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1088: pāṭhasthānamukhyapravṛttipramāṇakastu kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- śeṣaśeṣitve pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1089_0: śeṣāṇāṃ samidādīnāṃ śeṣiṇāṃ cāgneyādīnāṃ ekaphalavadupakāropanibaddhānāṃ ekaphalāvacchinnānām
GSP33vacbhamu:1091: yatra tu na śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ nāpyekādhikārāvacchedaḥ yathā sauryāryamṇaprājāpatyādīnām,
GSP33vacbhamu:1094: na ceha dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāve śrutyādīnāmanyatamaṃ pramāṇamasatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1095: nanu śeṣaśeṣibhāvābhāve 'pi kramaniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ yathā godohanasya puruṣārthasya dārśapaurṇamāsikairaṅgaiḥ saha,
GSP33vacbhamu:1096: yathā vā 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta' iti darśapūrṇamāsasomayoraśeṣaśeṣiṇorityata āha- adhikṛtādhikāre vā pramāṇābhāvāt- iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1097: svargakāmasya hi darśapūrṇamāsādhikṛtasya paśukāmasya sato darśapūrṇamāsa-
GSP33vacbhamu:1100: na ca vyāpārāntarāviṣṭaṃ śrūyate yatastadaṅgakramamatipatet ; appraṇayanāśritaṃ tu pratīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1106: yathāgneyādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāmekasvargaphalāvacchinnānām ; yadi vā jijñāsyabrahmaṇaḥ aṃśo dharmaḥ syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1107: yathā caturlakṣaṇīvyutpādyaṃ brahma kenacitkenacit aṃśenaikena lakṣaṇena vyutpādyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1108: tatra caturṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ jijñāsyābhedena parasparasaṃbandhe sati kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1112: jijñāsāyā vastuto jñānatantratvāt jñānaphalaṃ jijñāsāphalamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1120: bhavitā ca bhāvakavyāpāranirvartyatayā tattantra iti tataḥ prāgjñānakāle nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1124: codaneti vaidikaṃ śabdamāha, viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya lakṣaṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1125: pravṛttabhedaṃ vibhajate- yā hi codanā dharmasya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1128: sā ca svasādhye puruṣavyāpāre bhāvanāyāṃ tadviṣaye ca yāgādau ; sa hi bhāvanāviṣayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1131: bhāvanāyāstaddvāreṇa ca yāgāderapekṣitopāyatāmavagamayantī tatrecchopahāramukheṇa puruṣaṃ niyuñjānaiva yāgādidharmamavabodhayati nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1132: brahmacodanā tu puruṣamavabodhayatyeva kevalaṃ na tu pravartayantyavabodhayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1134_1: puruṣo brahmāvabodhyata iti samānatvaṃ dharmacodanābhirbrahmacodanānāmityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1143: api cātmajñānavidhipareṣu vedānteṣu nātmatattvaviniścayaḥ śābdaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1144: na hi tadā ātmatattvaparāste, kiṃ tu tajjñānavidhiparāḥ, yatparāśca te ta eva teṣāṃ arthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1150: yasminnasati brahmajijñāsā na bhavati sati tu bhavantī bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1156: tathā sati eṣa viparyāsādanyaḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1162: etaduktaṃ bhavati- mā bhūt idaṃ ṛtaṃ nityam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1165: nityatvaṃ satyatvaṃ tadyasyāsti tannityaṃ satyam ; tathā cāsthāgocaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1167: tadeteṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocareṣu viṣayaviṣayiṣu yadṛtaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vyavasthāsyate tadāsthāgocaro bhaviṣyati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1168: yattvanityamanṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati tāpatrayaparītaṃ tattyakṣyata iti so 'yaṃ nityānityavastuvivekaḥ prāgbhavīyādaihikādvā karmaṇo viśuddhasattvasya bhavatyanubhavopapattibhyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:1169: na khalu satyaṃ nāma na kiñcidastīti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1170: tadabhāve tadadhiṣṭhānasyānṛtasyāpyanupapatteḥ, śūnyavādināmapi śūnyatāyā eva satyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1171_0: athāsya puruṣadhaureyasyānubhavopapattibhyāmevaṃ sunipuṇaṃ nirūpayataḥ ā ca satyalokāt
GSP33vacbhamu:1171_1: ā cāvīceḥ jāyasva mriyasva iti viparivartamānaṃ kṣaṇamuhūrtayāmāhorātrārdhamāsamāsartvayanavatsarayugacaturyugamanvantarapralayamahāpralayamahāsargāvāntarasargasaṃsārasāgarormibhiraniśamuhyamānaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1176_0: rāgādikaṣāyamadirāmattaṃ hi manaḥ teṣu teṣu viṣayeṣūccāvacamindriyāṇi pravartayat
GSP33vacbhamu:1176_1: vividhāśca pravṛttīḥ puṇyāpuṇyaphalā bhāvayat puruṣamatighore vividhaduḥkhajvālājaṭāle
GSP33vacbhamu:1178: so 'yamasya vairāgyahetuko manovijayaḥ śama iti vaśīkarasaṃjña iti cākhyāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1179: vijitaṃ ca manastattvaviṣayaviniyogayogyatāṃ nīyate ; seyamasya yogyatā damaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1180: yathā dānto 'yaṃ vṛṣabhayuvā halaśakaṭādivahanayogyaḥ kṛta iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1182: ata eva śrutiḥ- 'tasmācchānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet,
GSP33vacbhamu:1184: tadetasya śamadamādirūpasya sādhanasya saṃpat, prakarṣaḥ, śamadamādisādhanasaṃpat /
GSP33vacbhamu:1185: tato 'sya saṃsārabandhanānmumukṣā bhavatītyāha- mumukṣutvaṃ ca iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1186: tasya ca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabrahmajñānaṃ mokṣasya kāraṇamityupaśrutya tajjijñāsā bhavati dharmajijñāsāyāḥ prāgūrdhvaṃ ca ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1187: tasmātteṣāmevānantaryaṃ na dharmajijñāsāyā ityāha- teṣu hi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1188: na kevalaṃ jijñāsāmātram, api tu jñānamapītyāha- jñātuṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:1192: atraivaṃ paricodyate- satyaṃ yathoktasādhanasaṃpattyanantaraṃ brahmajijñāsā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1201: sa yāvadādeyaṃ tāvadādāya nivartate ; yathā vā dhānyārthī sapalālāni dhānyānyāharati,
GSP33vacbhamu:1204: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante, bhikṣukāḥ santīti sthālyo nādhiśrīyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:1205: api ca dṛṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ candanavanitādisaṅgajanma kṣayitālakṣaṇena duḥkhenāghrātatvādatibhīruṇā tyajyetāpi,
GSP33vacbhamu:1208: tathā ca 'akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsyayājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1213: tasyārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ- yasmādveda eva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1214: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ- satyaṃ mṛgabhikṣukādayaḥ śakyāḥ parihartuṃ pācakakṛṣīvalādibhiḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1217: na hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamannaṃ viṣaṃ parityajya madhumiśraṃ śakyaṃ śilpivareṇāpi bhoktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1222: atra ca brahmapadena tatpramāṇaṃ veda upasthāpitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1223: sa ca yogyatvāt 'tadyatheha karmacitaḥ' ityādiḥ 'ataḥ' iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛśya hetupañcamyā nirdiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1225: yathā svargādeḥ kṛtakasya sukhasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgaḥ tathā brahmaṇo 'pītyata āha- tathā brahmavijñānādapi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1226: tenāyamarthaḥ- ataḥ svargādīnāṃ kṣayitāpratipādakāt brahmajñānasya ca paramapuruṣārthatāpratipādakāt āgamāt yathoktasādhanasaṃpat ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1229: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapradarśanena prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ brahmaṇe jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ parāsto veditavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1230: 'tādarthyasamāse prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyam' iti kātyāyanīyavacanena yūpadārvādiṣveva prakṛtivikārabhūteṣu caturthīsamāsaniyamāt aprakṛtivikārabhūte ityevamādau tanniṣedhāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1234: brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte tatrānekārthatvādbrahmaśabdasya saṃśayaḥ- kasya brahmaṇo jijñāsā ?- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1239: tamimaṃ saṃśayamapākaroti- brahma ca vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇam iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1240: yato brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya tajjñāpanāya paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayati tato 'vagacchāmaḥ paramātmajijñāsaiveyaṃ na vipratvajātyādijijñāsā, ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1243: saṃbandhamātraṃ ca śeṣa iti brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte brahmasaṃbandhinī jijñāsetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1244: tathā ca brahmasvarūpapramāṇayuktisādhanaprayojanajijñāsāḥ sarvā brahmajijñāsārthā brahmajijñāsayāvaruddhā bhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:1248: tathā cāpratijñātārthacintā pramāṇādiṣu bhavet- iti ye manyante tānpratyāhabrahmaṇa iti karmaṇi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1250: icchāyāḥ pratipattyanubandho jñānam, jñānasya ca jñeyaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:1251: no khalu jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vinā nirūpyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1256: na hi candramasamādityaṃ vopalabhya kasyāyamiti saṃbandhyanveṣaṇā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1262: nanu satyaṃ na jijñāsyamantareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1264: brahma tu śeṣatayā saṃbhantsyata ityata āha- jijñāsyāntara iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1267: nigūḍhābhiprāya eva dūṣayati- evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1268: vācyasya karmatvasya jijñāsayā prathamamapekṣitasya prathamasaṃbandhārhasya cānvayaparityāgena paścātkathañcidapekṣitasya saṃbandhimātrasya saṃbandho,
GSP33vacbhamu:1272: cedakaḥ svābhiprāyamudghāṭayati- na vyarthaḥ brahmāśritāśeṣa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1278: tadevamabhimataṃ samāsaṃ vyavasthāpya jijñāsāpadārthamāha- jñātum iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1284: nāpi tayorupāyaḥ ; tasminsatyapi sukhabhedasyādarśanāt, anuvartamānasya ca duḥkhasyānivṛtteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1285: tasmānna sūtrakāravacanamātrādiṣikarmatā jñānasyetyata āha- avagatiparyantam iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1286: na kevalaṃ jñānamiṣyate kiṃ tvavagatiṃ sākṣātkāraṃ kurvadavagatiparyantaṃ sanvācyāyā icchāyāḥ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:1287: kasmāt ? phalaviṣayatvādicchāyāḥ tadupāyaṃ phalaparyantaṃ gocarayatīccheti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1289: na hyanapekṣaṇīyaviṣayamavagatiparyantamapi jñānamiṣyata ityata āha- jñānena hi pramāṇenāvagantumiṣṭaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:1290: bhavatu brahmaviṣayāvagatiḥ, evamapi kathamiṣṭetyata āha- brahmāvagatirhi puruṣārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1293: kiṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ vigalitanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgaparamānandaghanabrahmāvagatirbrahmaṇaḥ svabhāva iti saiva niḥśreyasaṃ puruṣārtha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1303_1: na pratibhātīva parādhīnaprakāśa iva dehendriyādibhyo bhinno 'pyabhinna iva bhāsata
GSP33vacbhamu:1303_2: iti saṃsārabījāvidyādyanarthanibarhaṇātprāgaprāpta iva tasminsati prāpta iva bhavatīti
GSP33vacbhamu:1310: tacca na kevalebhyo vedāntebhyaḥ api tu brahmamīmāṃsopakaraṇebhya iti icchāmukhena brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ pravartyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1312: tatra phalavadarthāvabodhaparatāṃ svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ sūtrayatā 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' ityanenaiva pravartitatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1314: yadyapi ca dharmamīmāṃsāvat vedārthamīmāṃsayā brahmamīmāṃsāpyākṣeptuṃ śakyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1316: nāpi brahmamīmāṃsāyā adhyayanamātrānantaryamiti brahmamīmāṃsārambhāya nityānityavivekādyānantaryapradarśanāya cedaṃ sūtramārambhaṇīyamityapaunaruktyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1318: etena sūtreṇa brahmajñānaṃ pratyupāyatā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyata ityuktam ; tadayuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1323: vedāntavākyasamutthena niścayajñānena viṣayīkṛtam ; tato na jijñāsitavyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1326: tarhi na tadvedāntāḥ pratipādayantīti sarvathāprasiddhaṃ naiva śakyaṃ jijñāsitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1327: anubhūte hi priye bhavatīcchā na tu sarvathānanubhūtāpūrve /
GSP33vacbhamu:1331: sa cettannāvabodhayati, kutastasya tatra prāmāṇyam ? na ca pramāṇānantaraṃ brahmaṇi prakramate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1332: tasmātprasiddhasya jñātuṃ śakyasyāpyajijñāsanāt aprasiddhasyecchāyā aviṣayatvāt aśakyajñānatvācca na brahma jijñāsyamityākṣepaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1342: tatastu prāk dehādyabhedena taddharmajanmajarāmaraṇādiduḥkhayogādityata uktam- mukta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1343: sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiva kevalo 'nādyavidyāvaśāttu bhrāntyā tathāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1344: tadevamanaupādhikaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ darśayitvā avidyopādhikaṃ rūpamāha- sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisamanvitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1346: kutaḥ punarevaṃbhūtabrahmasvarūpāvagatiḥ ityata āha- brahmaśabdasya hi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1347: na kevalam 'sadeva somyedam' ityādīnāṃ vākyānāṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayā itthaṃbhūtabrahmāvagatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1352: tadevaṃ tatpadārthasya śuddhatvādeḥ prasiddhimabhidhāya tvaṃpadārthasyāpyāha- sarvasyātmatvācca brahmāstitvaprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1353: sarvasya pāṃsulapādakasya hālikasyāpi brahmāstitvaprasiddhiḥ ; kutaḥ ? ātmatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1355: pratītimeva apratītinirākaraṇena draḍhayati- na na iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1356: na na pratyeti 'ahamasmi' iti, kiṃ tu pratyetyeveti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1357: nanu 'ahamasmi' iti ca jñāsyati mā ca jñāsīdātmānamityata āha- yadi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1359: ahaṅkārāspadaṃ hi jīvātmānaṃ cenna pratīyāt 'aham' iti na pratīyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1361: brahmaṇi tu kimāyātam ityata āha- ātmā ca brahma ; tadaḥ tvamāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1362: tasmāttatpadārthasya śuddhabuddhatvādeḥ śabdataḥ tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmanaḥ pratyakṣataḥ prasiddheḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1364: tvaṃpadārthasya brahmabhāvāvagamaḥ 'tattvamasi' iti vākyādupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1365: ākṣeptā prathamakalpāśrayaṃ doṣamāha- yadi tarhi loka iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1367: tatra 'tattvamasi' iti vākyādyadi brahma ātmatvena prasiddhamasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1368: 'ātmā brahmatvena' iti vaktavye 'brahma ātmatvena' iti abhedavivakṣayā gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1369: pariharati- naḥ ; kutaḥ ? tadviśeṣaṃ prati vipratipatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1373: anyathā anāśrayā bhinnāśrayā vā vipratipattayo na syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1374: viruddhā hi pratipattayo vipratipattayaḥ ; na cānāśrayāḥ pratipattayo bhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:1376: na hi 'anityā buddhiḥ' 'nitya ātmā' iti pratipattivipratipattī /
GSP33vacbhamu:1378: tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmano lokataḥ siddhiḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1380: tasmāt sāmānyataḥ prasiddhe dharmiṇi viśeṣato vipratipattau yuktastadviśeṣeṣu saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1381: tatra tvaṃpadārthe tāvadvipratipattīrdarśayati- dehamātram ityādinā bhoktaiva kevalaṃ na karttā ityantena /
GSP33vacbhamu:1382: atra dehendriyamanaḥkṣaṇikavijñānacaitanyapakṣe na tatpadārthanityatvādayaḥ tvaṃpadārthena saṃbadhyante, yogyatāvirahāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1387: tvaṃpadārthavipratipattyā ca tatpadārthe 'pi vipratipattirdarśitā- vedāprāmāṇyavādino hi laukāyatikādayastatpadārthapratyayaṃ mithyeti manyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:1389: tadevaṃ tvaṃpadārthavipratipattidvārā tatpadārthe vipratipattiṃ sūcayitvā sākṣāttatpadārthe 'pi vipratipattimāha- asti tadvyatirikta īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti kecit /
GSP33vacbhamu:1395: tasyāpi jīvātmabhyo 'pi vyatirekāt na tvaṃpadārthena sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti svamatamāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1397: bhokturjīvātmano 'vidyopādhikasya sa īśvaraḥ tatpadārtha ātmā ; tata īśvarādabhinno jīvātmā,
GSP33vacbhamu:1403: tathāpi kimarthaṃ brahmamīmāṃsā ārabhyate ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1411: tadavirodhinaśca ye 'nye 'pi tarkā adhvaramīmāṃsāyāṃ nyāye ca vedapratyakṣādiprāmāṇyapariśodhanādiṣūktāḥ t upakaraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1422: atra yadyapi brahmasvarūpajñānasya pradhānasya pratijñayā tadaṅgānyapi pramāṇādīni pratijñātāni,
GSP33vacbhamu:1424: tatra yadyāvadanubhūyate tatsarvaṃ parimitamaviśudadhamabuddhaṃ vidhvaṃsi ca ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1425: na tenopalabdhena tadviruddhasya nityaśuddhabuddhasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1426: na hi jātu kaścitkṛtakatvena nityaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1427: na ca taddharmeṇa nityatvādinā tallakṣyate, tasyānupalabdhacaratvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1429: evaṃ ca na śabdo 'pyatra prakramate, atyantāprasiddhatayā brahmaṇo 'padārthasyāvākyārthatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1433: mā bhūdanubhūyamānaṃ jagattaddharmatayā tādātmyena vā brahmaṇo lakṣaṇam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1434: tadutpattyā tu bhaviṣyati deśāntaraprāptiriva saviturvrajyāyā iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1444: pradhānakālagrahalokapālakriyāyadṛcchāsvabhāvābhāveṣūpaplavamāneṣu satsu sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisvabhāvaṃ brahma jagajjanmādikāraṇamiti kutaḥ saṃbhāvanetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1447: nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasya#iti cetanabhāvakartṛkatvasaṃbhāvanayā pradhānādyacetanakartṛkatvaṃ nirupākhyakartṛkatvaṃ ca vyāsedhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1448: yatkhalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate taccetanakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā ghaṭādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:1449: vivādādhyāsitaṃ ca jagannāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākṛtam ; tasmāccetanakartṛkaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1450: cetano hi buddhāvālikhya nāmarūpe ghaṭa iti nāmnā rūpeṇa ca kambugrīvādinā bāhyaṃ ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1451: ata eva ghaṭasya nirvartyasyāpyantaḥ saṃkalpātmanā siddhasya karmakārakabhāvaḥ 'ghaṭaṃ karoti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1453: tathā cācetano buddhāvanālikhitaṃ karotīti na śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1455: cetanā grahā lokapālā vā nāmarūpe buddhāvālikhya jagajjanayiṣyanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:1458: kecitkartāro bhavanti, yathā sūdartvigādayaḥ, na bhoktāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1459: kecittu bhoktāraḥ, yathā śrāddhavaiśvānareṣṭyādiṣu pitāputrādayaḥ, na kartāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1462: deśādīni ca tāni pratiniyatāti ceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1470: evaṃ ya eva sukhinasta eva kadācidduḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1471: sarvametadākasmikāparanāmni yādṛcchikatve ca svābhāvikatve cāsarvajñāsarvaśaktikartṛkatve ca na ghaṭate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1476: ekasyā api hi śarīraracanāyā rūpaṃ manasā na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ kadācit,
GSP33vacbhamu:1481: kasmātpunarjanmasthitibhaṅgamātramihādigrahaṇena gṛhyate na tu vṛddhipariṇāmāpakṣayā apītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1485: tenālpāvayavādavayavino dvitantukāderanya eva mahānpaṭo jāyata iti janmaiva vṛddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1487: dharmiṇo hi hāṭakāderdharmalakṣaṇaḥ pariṇāmaḥ kaṭakamukuṭādiḥ tasyotpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1493: tathā sati hi tatpratipādake 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni' iti vedavākye buddhisthīkṛte jaganmūlakāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1494: anyathā tu jāyate asti vardhate ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe tatpratipādakaṃ nairuktavākyaṃ buddhau bhavet ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1501: nanvevamapi utpattimātraṃ sūcyatām ; tannāntarīyakatayā tu sthitibhaṅgaṃ gamyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1504: utpattimātraṃ tu nimittakāraṇasādhāraṇamiti nopādānatvaṃ sūcayet ; tadidamuktam- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1508: tadanena prabandhena pratijñāviṣayasya brahmasvarūpasya lakṣaṇadvāreṇa saṃbhāvanoktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1531: śabdāvirodhinyā tadupajīvinyā ca yuktyā vivecanaṃ mananam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1534: yathā dharmo na puruṣabuddhisāhāyyam, evaṃ brahmaṇyapi kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1541: yadyapi dharmajijñāsāyāmapi sāmagryāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ vyāpāraḥ tathāpi sākṣānnāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1542: brahmajijñāsāyāṃ tu sākṣādanubhavādīnāṃ saṃbhavo 'nubhavārthā ca brahmajijñāsetyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1545: nanu bhavatu brahmānubhavārthā jijñāsā ; tadanubhava eva tvaśakyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1552: anuṣṭhānasya ca vināpyanubhavaṃ śābdajñānamātrādeva siddheḥ ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1571: evaṃ nārāsthitasparśananiṣedho brahmaghnaśca tadvāraṇavidhiḥ- ityevañjātīyakā vidhipratiṣedhā arthavantaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1575: yasmādgrahaṇāgrahaṇayoruditānuditahomayośca virodhāt samuccayāsaṃbhave tulyabalatayā ca bādhyabādhakabhāvābhāve sati agatyā vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1577: kiṃ tu sāmānyaśāstrasya sparśananiṣedhasya dhāraṇavidhiviṣayeṇa viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1578: etaduktaṃ bhavati- vidhipratiṣedhaireva sa tādṛśo viṣayo 'nāgatotpādyarūpa upanītaḥ yena puruṣasya vidhiniṣedhādhīnapravṛttinivṛttyorapi svātantryaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1579: bhūte vastuni tu neyamasti vidhā, ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1585: bhūte 'pi vastuni vikalpo dṛṣṭaḥ, yathā 'sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1586: tatkathaṃ na vastu vikalpyate, ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1591: savāsanendriyamanoyonayo vā yathā 'sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā' iti sthāṇau saṃśayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1594: na tu puruṣatattvaṃ vā sthāṇutattvaṃ vāpekṣante, samānadharmadharmidarśanamātrādhīnajanmatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1595: tasmādayathāvastato vikalpanā na vastu vikalpayanti vā anyathayanti vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1597: kiṃ tu vastutantram ; atastato vastuviniścayo yuktaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1600: evamuktena prakāreṇa bhūtavastuviṣayāṇāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyasya vastutantratāṃ prasādhya brahmajñānasya vastutantratāmāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1610: na tu vedāntavākyāni tadadhīnasatyatvānīti kathaṃ vedāntavākyagrathanārthatā sūtrāṇāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1620: yathā ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭamapyanumānaṃ brahmaṇi na pravartate tathopariṣṭānnipuṇataramupapādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1629: atra ca pradhānādiviṣayatvasaṃśaye nirṇayavākyam- ānandādhyeva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1630: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yathā rajjvajñānasahitarajjūpādānā dhārā rajjvāṃ satyāmasti rajjvāmeva ca līyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1631: evamavidyāsahitabrahmopādānaṃ jagat brahmaṇyevāsti tatraiva ca līyata iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:1637: na kevalaṃ jagadyonitvādasya bhagavataḥ sarvajñatā, śāstrayonitvādapi boddhavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1640_1: nityanaimittikakāmyakarmapaddhatiṣu ca brahmatattve ca śiṣyāṇāṃ śāsanāt śāstramṛgvedādiḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1642: na kevalaṃ mahāviṣayatvenāsya mahattvam, api tvanekāṅgopāṅgopakaraṇatayāpītyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1644: purāṇanyāyamīmāṃsādayo daśa vidyāsthānāni ; taiḥ tayā tayā dvāropakṛtasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:1647: taiḥ tayā tayā dvārā vedān vyācakṣāṇaistadarthaṃ cādareṇānutiṣṭhadbhiḥ parigṛhīto veda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1654: sarvajñasya hi jñānaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ śāstrasyāpyabhidhānaṃ sarvaviṣayamiti sādṛśyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1657: sarvajñasya guṇaḥ sarvaviṣayatā ; tadanvitaṃ śāsatram, asyāpi sarvaviṣayatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1664: adyatve 'pyasmadādibhiryatsamīcīnārthaviṣayaṃ śāstraṃ viracyate tatrāsmākaṃ vaktṛṇāṃ vākyājjñānamadhikaviṣayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1665: na hi te te asādhāraṇadharmā anubhūyamānā api śakyā vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1667: vistarārthamapi vākyaṃ na vaktṛjñānena tulyaviṣayamiti kathayituṃ #
GSP33vacbhamu:1671: vedasya yasmāt mahato bhūtāt yoneḥ saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1672: tasya mahato bhūtasya brahmaṇo niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1685: devarṣayo hi mahāpariśrameṇāpi yatrāśaktāḥ tadayamīṣatprayatnena līlayaiva karotīti niratiśayamasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ coktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1686: aprayatnenāsya vedakartṛtve śrutiruktā 'asya mahato bhūtasya' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1687: ye 'pi tāvat varṇānāṃ nityatvamāsthiṣata tairapi padavākyādīnāmanityatvamabhyupāyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1691: varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ ca kālato deśato vā paurvāparyāyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1692: vyaktiścānityeti kathaṃ tadupagṛhītānāṃ varṇānāṃ nityānāmapi padatā nityā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:1695: yathā hi yādṛśaṃ gātracalanādi nartakaḥ karoti tādṛśameva śikṣyamāṇānukaroti nartakī,
GSP33vacbhamu:1697: evaṃ yādṛśīmānupūrvīṃ vaidikānāṃ varṇapadādīnāṃ karotyadhyāpayitā tādṛśīmevānukaroti māṇavakaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1702: yathāhuḥ- 'yatnataḥ pratiṣedhyā naḥ puruṣāṇāṃ svatantratā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1704_1: paramātmano nityasya vedānāṃ yonerapi na teṣu svātantryam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1706: yathā hi yāgādibrahmahatyādayor'thānarthahetavo brahmavivartā api na sargāntare vipariyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1712: evaṃ sargāntareṣvapīti tadanurodhāt sarvajño 'pi sarvaśaktirapi pūrvapūrvasargānusāreṇa vedānviracayanna svatantraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1715: na caikasya pratibhāne anāśvāsa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1716: na hi bahūnāmapyajñānāṃ vijñānāṃ vā āśayadoṣavatāṃ pratibhāne yukta āśvāsaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1719: tatpratyayena cārvācīnānāmapi tatra saṃpratyaya ityupapannaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śāstrayonitvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1725: tasyaiva tu lakṣaṇasyānena anumānatvāśaṅkāmapākṛtya āgamopadarśanena brahmaṇi śāstraṃ pramāṇamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1731: kim ākṣepe- śuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvatayā upekṣaṇīyaṃ brahma bhūtamabhidadhatāṃ vedāntānāmapuruṣārthopadeśināmaprayojanatvāpatteḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1733: na khalu laukikāni vākyāni pramāṇāntaraviṣayamarthamavabodhayanti svataḥ pramāṇam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1738: yadi tvasaṃnidhānāttatparatvaṃ na rocayante, tataḥ saṃnihitopāsanādikriyāparatvaṃ vā vedāntānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:1739: evaṃ hi pratyakṣādyanadhigatagocaratvenānapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ ca prayojanavattvaṃ ca sidhyatīti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1750: akriyārthatve 'pi brahmasvarūpavidhiparā vedāntā bhaviṣyanti ; tathā ca 'vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt-'
GSP33vacbhamu:1754: vedāntānāṃ cājñātaṃ brahma jñāpayatāṃ tathābhāvāt , ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1762: na tvatra viniyogādayo na santi ; santo 'pyanyato labdhatvātkevalamavivakṣitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1763: tasmāt bhāvanāviṣayo vidhirna siddhe vastuni bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1768: evaṃ ca sati uktarūpe brahmaṇi śabdasyātātparyāt pramāṇāntareṇa yādṛśamasya rūpaṃ vyavasthāpyate na tacchabdena virudhyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1789: 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni' iti tu vākyaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtaṃ jagadutpattisthitināśakāraṇamiti ceha smāritamiti na paṭhitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1790: yena hi vākyamupakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate sa eva vākyārtha iti śābdāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1793: iti ca jīvasya brahmātmanopasaṃhārāt tatparataiva vākyasya /
