GSP33vacbhamu:2182: sarvameva hi vākyaṃ nedantayā vastubhedaṃ bodhayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2185: tena pramāṇāntarasiddhe laukike evārthe yadā gatiridṛśī śabdasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:2188: tvaṃpadārtho hi pramātā pramāṇādhīnayā pramityā prameyaṃ ghaṭādi vyāpnotītyavidyāvilasitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2189: tadasya aviṣayībhūtodāsīnatatpadārthapratyagātmasāmānādhikaraṇyena pramātṛtvābhāvāt tannivṛttau pramāṇādayastisro vidhā nivartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2190: na hi pakturavastutve pākyapākapacanāni vastusanti bhavitumarhantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2192: vigalitaparāgvṛttyarthatvaṃ padasya tadastadā tvamiti hi padanaikārthatve tvamityapi yatpadam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2193: tadapi ca tadā gatvaikārthyaṃ viśuddhacidātmatāṃ tyajati sakalānkartṛtvādīnpadārthamalānnijān //
GSP33vacbhamu:2206: tathā ca viśuddhavijñānotpādo mokṣa iti nirvartyo mokṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2207: anyeṣāṃ tu saṃskārarūpāvasthāmapahāya yā kaivalyāvasthāvāptirātmanaḥ sa mokṣa iti vikāryo mokṣaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2209: tadetayoḥ pakṣayorna nityatā mokṣasya, kāryatvāt, dadhighaṭādivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:2210: 'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate' iti śruterbrahmaṇo vikṛtāvikṛtadeśabhedāvagamādavikṛtadeśabrahmaprāptisvarūpāsanādividhikāryā bhaviṣyati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2211: tathā ca prāpyakarmatā brahmaṇa ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2217: jīvastu brahmaiveti kiṃ kena prāpyatām? bhedāśrayātvātprāpterityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2218: atha jīvo brahmaṇo bhinnastathāpi na tena brahmāpyate, brahmaṇo vibhutvena nityaprāptatvādityāha - #
GSP33vacbhamu:2225: tena hi tatkusumaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ lākṣārasasavarṇaṃ phalaṃ prasūte ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2229: guṇo hi brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo vā bhinno vā ? svabhāvaścet kathamādheyaḥ, tasya nityavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2237: aśuddhiḥ satī darpaṇe nivartate ; na tu brahmaṇi asatī nivartanīyā, nityanivṛttatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2240: brahmasvabhāva eva mokṣo 'nādyavidyāmalāvṛta upāsanādikriyayātmani saṃskriyamāṇe 'bhivyajyate, na tu kriyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2246: nāvidyā brahmāśrayā, kiṃ tu jīve ; sā tvanirvacanīyetyuktam ; tena nityaśuddhameva brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:2248: kriyā hi brahmasamavetā vā brahma saṃskuryāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2250: na tāvadbrahmadharmaḥ kriyā, tasyāḥ svāśrayavikārahetutvena brahmaṇo nityatvavyāghātāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2252: na hi darpaṇe nighṛṣyamāṇe maṇirviśuddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2260: anādyanirvācyāvidyopadhānameva brahmaṇo jīva iti ca kṣetrajña iti cācakṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2263: tadabhedādhyavasāyāt ; yathā aṅgarāgadharmaḥ sugandhitā kāminīnāṃ vyapadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2264: tenātrāpi yadāśritā kriyā sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇaviṣayīkṛtā tasyaiva saṃskāro nānyasyeti na vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2265: tattvatastu na kriyā na saṃskāra iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2266: sanidarśanaṃ tu śeṣamadhyāsabhāṣye eva kṛtavyākhyānamiti neha vyākhyātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2278: śukraṃ dīptimat ; avraṇaṃ duḥkharahitam ; asrāviraṃ avigalitam, avināśīti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:2281: nanu mā bhūnnirvartyādikarmatācatuṣṭayī ; pañcamī tu kācit vidhā bhaviṣyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:2282: yayā mokṣasya karmatā ghaṭiṣyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2284: ebhyaḥ prakārebhyo na prakārāntaramanyadasti, yato mokṣasya kriyānupraveśo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2285: etaduktaṃ bhavati- catasṛṇāṃ vidhānāṃ madhye 'nyatamatayā kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāptam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2286: sā ca mokṣādvyāvartamānā vyāpakānupalabdhyā mokṣasya kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāvartayatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2288: tathā ca tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo 'narthakānītyata upasaṃhāravyājenāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2290: atha jñānaṃ kriyā mānasī kasmānna vidhigocaraḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2291: kasmācca tasyāḥ phalaṃ nirvartyādiṣvanyatamaṃ na mokṣaḥ ? iti codayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2298: jñānaṃ mānasī kriyā ; tviyaṃ brahmaṇi phalaṃ janayitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:2304: vastusvarūpanirapekṣaiva codyate#- yathā devatāsaṃpradānakahavirgrahaṇe devatāvastusvarūpānapekṣā devatādhyānakriyā ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2306: yā sā kriyā hi nāma#iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2307: na hi 'yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ dhyāyedvaṣaṭkariṣyan' ityasmādvidheḥ prāgdevatādhyānaṃ prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2308: prāptaṃ tvadhītavedāntasya viditapadatadarthasaṃbandhasyādhigataśabdanyāyatattvasya 'sadeva somyedam' ityādeḥ 'tattvamasi' ityantātsaṃdarbhāt brahmātmabhāvajñānam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2311: na hyasau svasāmagrībalalabdhajanmā manujecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā śakyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2315: tayoranvayavyatirekāvadhṛtasāmarthyayoḥ sākṣātkāre vā anādyavidyāpanaye vā vidhimantareṇa prāptatvena puruṣecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā aśakyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2318: yathā devatādhyānakriyāyāḥ ; na hyatra vastusvarūpeṇa kaścidvirodhaḥ ; kvacidvastusvarūpavirodhinī,
GSP33vacbhamu:2323: na ca te pramattagītāḥ ; tulyaṃ hi sāṃpradāyikam ; tasmādvidheyenātra bhavitavyamityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2325: satyaṃ śrūyante liṅgādayaḥ ; na tvamī vidhiviṣayāḥ, tadviṣayatve 'prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2327: sa eva ca heya upādeyo vā, yaṃ puruṣaḥ kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2328: tatraiva ca samarthaḥ kartādhikṛto niyojyo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2329_1: iti prayuktā api liṅādayaḥ pravartanāyāmasamarthā upala iva kṣurataikṣṇyaṃ kuṇṭhamapramāṇībhavantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2333: asāmarthye tu na kartṛtā ; tato nādhikṛtaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2335: yadi virodhābhānna vidhivacanāni, kimarthāni tarhi vacanānyetāni vidhicchāyānīti pṛcchati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2340: anyataḥ prāptā eva hi śravaṇādayo vidhisarūpairvākyairanūdyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2342: tathāhi- tattadiṣṭāniṣṭaviṣayepsājihāsāpahṛtahṛdayatayā bahirmukho na pratyagātmani manaḥ samādhātumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2343_1: udghāṭyata iti pravṛttiviśeṣakaratā anuvādānāmastīti saprayojanatayā svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvamupapadyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2345: svato 'sya puruṣārthatve siddhe yadanuṣṭhānānaṅgatvaṃ tadbhūṣaṇaṃ na dūṣaṇamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2359: yadi hi padānāṃ kāryābhidhāne tadarthasvārthābhidhāne vā niyamena vṛddhavyavahāre sāmarthyamabadhṛtaṃ bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:2362: atha tu bhūte 'pyarthe padānāṃ loke śakyaḥ saṃgatigrahaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2363: tata upaniṣadāntatparatvaṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayāvagamyamānamapahnutya na kāryaparatvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum,
GSP33vacbhamu:2366: yadi tatparaḥ prayogo na loke dṛśyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:2368: na tāvattatparaḥ prayogo na dṛśyate loke,
GSP33vacbhamu:2372: nāpi bhūtārthabuddhirvyutpannapuruṣavartinī na śakyā samunnetum, harṣāderunnayanahotoḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2373_0: tathā hi- aviditāryajanabhāṣārtho draviḍo nagaragamanodyato rājamārgābhyarṇaṃ devadattamandiramadhyāsīnaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2373_2: paṭavāsopāyanārpaṇapuraḥsaraṃ 'diṣṭyā vardhase devadatta putraste jātaḥ' iti vārttāhāravyāhāraśravaṇasamanantaramupajātaromāñcakañcukaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2375: na cāyamapratipādayan harṣahetumarthaṃ harṣāya kalpata ityanena harṣaheturartha ukta iti pratipadyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2376: harṣahetvantarasya cāpratīteḥ putrajanmanaśca taddhetoravagamāttadeva vārttāhāreṇābhyadhāyīti niścinoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2379: evaṃ ca brahmasvarūpajñānasya paramapuruṣārthahetubhāvādanupadiśatāmapi puruṣapravṛttinivṛttī vedāntānāṃ puruṣahitānuśāsanācchāstratvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2382: yathā rūpādiviṣayaṃ cakṣurādi ; tathā caitāni ; tasmāttatheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2386: upanīya advayaṃ brahma savāsanāmavidyāṃ hinastīti brahmavidyāmāha ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2395: anyaśeṣaṃ hi bhūtaṃ dravyaṃ cikīrṣitaṃ sadutpattyādyāpyaṃ saṃbhavati, yathā 'yūpaṃ takṣati' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2402: upaniṣadāmanārabhyādhītānāṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayā puruṣapratipādanaparatvena puruṣasyaiva prādhānyenedaṃ prakaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2404: ataḥ svaprakaraṇasthaḥ so 'yaṃ tathāvidha upaniṣadbhyaḥ pratīyamāno na nāstīti śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2406: mānāntarogocaratvenāgṛhītasaṃgatitayā apadārthasya brahmaṇo vākyārthatvānupapatteḥ kathamupaniṣadarthatetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2409: tathāpi prakāśātmana eva satastattadupādhiparihāṇyā śakyaṃ vākyārthatvena nirūpaṇam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2411: na hi prakāśaḥ svasaṃvedano na bhāsate ; nāpi tadavacchedakaḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2412: tena 'sa ena neti netyātmā' iti tattadavacchedaparihāṇyā bṛhattvādāpanācca svayaṃprakāśaḥ śakyo vākyāt brahmeti cātmeti ca nirūpayitumityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2417: na hi jātu rajjvabhāve rajjvāṃ bhujaṅga iti vā dhāreti vā vibhramo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2418: api cātmānaḥ prakāśasya bhāsā prapañcasya prabhā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2419: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2420: na cātmanaḥ prakāśasya pratyākhyāne prapañcaprathā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2424: sarvajanīnāhaṃpratyayaviṣayo hyātmā kartā bhoktā ca saṃsārī,
GSP33vacbhamu:2426: ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ, te eva vaidikāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2427: te eva ca teṣāmarthā ityaupaniṣadamapyātmapadaṃ tatraiva pravartitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:2432: tatsākṣitvena#-ahaṃpratyayaviṣayo yaḥ kartā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātopahito jīvātmā-tat sākṣitvena,
GSP33vacbhamu:2435: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadyapi 'anena jīvenātmanā' iti jīvaparamātmanoḥ pāramārthikamaikyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2446: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati ātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2447: api cātaḥ sarveṣāmātmatvādeva na heyo nāpyupādeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2448: sarvasya hi prapañcajātasya brahmaiva tattvamātmā ; na ca svabhāvo heyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2450: tasmāddheyopādeyaviṣayau vidhiniṣedhau na tadviparītamātmatattvaṃ viṣayīkuruta iti sarvasya prapañcajātasyātmaiva tattvamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2455: yaśca paramārthāsan asau prakṛtiḥ rajjutattvamiva sarvavibhramasya vikārasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:2457: puruṣastu paramārthasan ; nāsau kāraṇasahasreṇāpyasan śakyaḥ kartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2458: na hi sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśata ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2460: puruṣa eva hi sarvasya prapañcavikārajātasya tattvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2465: atha mā bhūtsvarūpeṇa puruṣo heya upādeyo vā ; tadīyastu kaściddharmo hāsyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2469: api cātmanaḥ paramārthasato dharmo 'pi paramārthasanniti na tasyātmavadanyathātvaṃ kāraṇaiḥ śakyaṃ kartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2479: na hi somaśarmaṇi prakṛte tadguṇābhidhānaṃ parisaṃcaṣṭe viṣṇuśarmaṇo guṇavattām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2484: na hi te kriyārthā ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2488: dravyaguṇaśabdānāṃ ca kriyārthatvenaiva bhūtadravyaguṇābhidhānam, na svaniṣṭhatayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2489: yathāhuḥ śāstravidaḥ 'codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantam' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2493: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-na tāvatkāryārthā eva svārthe padānāṃ saṃgatigraho nānyārtha ityupapāditaṃ bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiṃ darśayadbhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2496: na hi pratyekaṃ svapradhānatayā guṇapradhānabhāvarahitānāmekavākyatā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2505: tathā cārthāntarasaṃsargaparatāmātreṇa vākyārthapratyayopapattau na kāryasaṃsargaparatvaniyamaḥ padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2511: na tādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃsargaḥ ; kiṃ tu kāryeṇa saha prayojanaprayodanilakṣaṇo 'nvayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2518: na hi kriyārthaṃ bhūtamupadiśyamānamabhūtaṃ bhavati, api tu kriyānivartanayogyaṃ bhūtameva tat /
GSP33vacbhamu:2519: tathā ca bhūter'the 'vadhṛtaśaktayaḥ śabdāḥ kvacitsvaniṣṭhabhūtaviṣayā dṛśyamānā mṛtvā śīrtvā vā na kathañcitkriyāniṣṭhatāṃ gamayitumucitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2520: na hyupahitaṃ śataśo dṛṣṭamapyanupahitaṃ kvaciddṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2521: tathā ca vartamānāpadeśā astikriyopahitā akāryārthā apyaṭavīvarṇakādayo loke bahulamupalabhyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2525: na hi pṛcchatā puruṣasya vā tarūṇāṃ vāstitvanāstitve pratipitsite ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2526: kiṃ tu puruṣasya svāmibhedastarūṇāṃ ca prakārabhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2527: praṣṭurapekṣitaṃ cācakṣāṇaḥ svāmibhedameva prakārabhedameva ca prativyakti,
GSP33vacbhamu:2530: upapāditā ca bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiḥ prayojanavati padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2535: tasmādbhūtamapi prayojanavadevopadeṣṭavyaṃ nāprayojanam ; aprayojanaṃ ca brahma,
GSP33vacbhamu:2545: api ca ye 'pi kāryaparatvaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāmāsthiṣata,
GSP33vacbhamu:2547: 'na surā pātavyā' ityādīnāṃ na kāryaparatā śakyā āsthātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2548: kṛtyupahitamaryādaṃ hi kāryaṃ kṛtyā vyāptaṃ tannivṛttau nivartate, śiṃśapātvamiva vṛkṣatvanivṛttau /
GSP33vacbhamu:2550: viṣayaścāsya sādhyasvabhāvatayā bhāvārtha eva pūrvāparībhūto 'nyotpādānukūlo bhavitumarhati, na dravyaguṇau /
GSP33vacbhamu:2551: sākṣātkṛtivyāpyo hi kṛterviṣayaḥ ; na ca dravyaguṇayoḥ siddhayorasti kṛtivyāpyatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2552: ata eva śāstrakṛdvacaḥ- 'bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdāstebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2554: bhāvasya svataḥ dravyaguṇaśabdānāṃ tu bhāvayogātkāryāvamarśa iti bhāvārthebhya evāpūrvāvagatiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2564: bhāvārtho hi kārakavyāpāramātratayāviśiṣṭaḥ kārakaviśeṣeṇa dravyādinā viśeṣyata iti dravyādistadanubandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2565: tathā ca bhāvārthe vidhīyamāne sa eva sānubandho vidhīyata iti dravyaguṇāvaviṣayāvapi tadanubandhatayā vihitau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2566_1: cānyataḥ prāptatayā tadanuvādena tadanubandhībhūtadravyādiparo bhavatīti sarvatra
GSP33vacbhamu:2567: etena 'yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavati' ityatra saṃbandhaviṣayo vidhiriti parāstam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2579: nanu vyāpāraviṣayaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ kathamavyāpārarūpaṃ saṃbandhaṃ gocarayet ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2580: na hi 'ghaṭaṃ kuru' ityatrāpi sākṣānnāmārthaṃ ghaṭaṃ puruṣaprayatno gocarayati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2582: tasmādghaṭārthāṃ kṛtiṃ vyāpāraviṣayāmeva pratipadyate, na tu svarūpato ghaṭaviṣayām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2583: uddeśyatayā tvasyāmasti ghaṭo na tu viṣayatayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2585: ata eva 'āgneyaḥ' ityatrāpi dravyadevatāsaṃbandhākṣipto yajireva kāryaviṣayo vidheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2586: kimuktaṃ bhavati“āgneyo bhavati“iti ? āgneyena yāgena bhāvayediti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2587: ata eva 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsyāṃ yajate',
GSP33vacbhamu:2588: 'ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajate' ityanuvādo bhavati 'yadāgneyaḥ' ityādivihitasya yāgaṣaṭkasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:2589: ata eva ca vihitānūditasya tasyaiva 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta' ityādhikārasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2595: evaṃ ca prajāpativratanyāyena paryudāsavṛttyāhananāpānasaṃkalpalakṣaṇayā tadviṣayo vidhiḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2597: na ca sati saṃbhave lakṣaṇā nyāyyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2598: 'nekṣetodyantam' ityādau tu 'tasya vratam' ityadhikārātprasajyapratiṣedhāsaṃbhavena paryudāsavṛttyānīkṣaṇasaṃkalpalakṣaṇā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2601: tadabhāve ca tadvyāptasya kāryasyābhāva iti na kāryaparatvaniyamaḥ sarvatra vākye ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2603: nanu kasmānnivṛttireva kāryaṃ na bhavati, tatsādhanaṃ vetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2611: na ca rāgataḥ pravṛttasya hananapānādāvakasmādaudāsīnyamupapadyate vinā vidhārakaprayatnam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2612: tasmātsa eva pravṛttyunmukhānāṃ manovāgdehānāṃ vidhārakaḥ prayatno niṣedhavidhigocaraḥ kriyeti nākriyāparamasti vākyaṃ kiñcidapīti āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2613: na ca hananakriyānivṛttyaudāsīnyavyatirekeṇa nañaḥ śakyamaprāptakriyārthatvaṃ kalpayitum# /

GSP33vacbhamu:2617: na caite śakye vidhātum, rāgataḥ prāptatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2618: na cātra nañaḥ prasajyapratiṣedho vidheyaḥ. tasyāpyaudāsīnyarūpasya siddhatayā prāptatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2623: tasmādyatpibeddhanyādvetyanūdya tanneti niṣidhyate, tadabhāvo jñāpyate ; na tu nañartho vidhīyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:2633_1: ca tato nivṛttimupalabhya bālo vyutpitsuḥ prayojyavṛddhasya pravṛttinivṛttihetū icchādveṣāvanumimīte /

GSP33vacbhamu:2656: tayā khalvayaṃ cetana āpātato ramaṇīyatāṃ paśyannapyāyatimālocya pravṛttyabhāvaṃ nivṛttimavabudhya nivartate /

GSP33vacbhamu:2708: yatpunaraśarīratvaṃ tadasya svabhāva iti na śakyaṃ nivartayitum,
GSP33vacbhamu:2712: na mithyājñānanimittaṃ saśarīratvam api tu dharmādharmanimittam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2714: tannivṛttau ca prāyaṇameveti na jīvato 'śarīratvamiti śaṅkate- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2720: vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhajanitau hi tau nāsati śarīrasaṃbandhe bhavataḥ ;

GSP33vacbhamu:2723: yadyucyeta satyamasti parasparāśrayatvam, na tveṣa doṣaḥ, anāditvāt, bījāṅkuravat ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2726: na hi yato dharmādharmabhedādya ātmaśarīrasaṃbandhabhedastata eva śarīrasaṃbandhāt sa dharmādharmabhedaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2745: prasiddho vastubhedo yasya puruṣasya sa tathoktaḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:2751: śuklabhāsvarasya dravyasya puraḥsthitasya sati śuktikārajatasādhāraṇye yāvadatra rajataviniścayo bhavati tāvatkasmācchuktiviniścaya eva na bhavati ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2780: na tāvanmanananididhyāsane pradhānakarmaṇī apūrvaviṣaye amṛtatvaphale ityuktamadhastāt /

GSP33vacbhamu:2799: te ca sādhyasādhanetikartavyatābhedādhiṣṭhānā dharmotpādinaśca tadadhiṣṭhānā na brahmātmaikye sati prabhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:2801: na kevalaṃ dharmapramāṇasya śāstrasyeyaṃ gatiḥ, api tu sarveṣāṃ pramāṇānāmityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2805: advaite hi viṣayaviṣayibhāvo nāsti ; na ca kartṛtvam, kāryābhāvāt ; na ca kāraṇatvam, ata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:2811: yathā svaduḥkhena duḥkhī, yathā svasukhena sukhī, tathā putrādigatenāpīti so 'yaṃ gauṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2814: dehendriyādiṣu tvabhedānubhavānna gauṇa ātmābhimānaḥ ; kiṃ tu śuktau rajatajñānavanmithyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2816: tadasattve tu na lokayātrā, nāpi brahmātmaikatvānubhavaḥ, tadupāyasya śravaṇamananāderabhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2828: tato niyamena prāgbhāvāt ; tena tadabhāve kāryaṃ notpadyata iti /

GSP33vacbhamu:2843: yastu sākṣātkāro bhāvikaḥ, nāsau kāryaḥ, tasya brahmasvarūpatvāt /

GSP33vacbhamu:2872: tathā ca pradhānameva sarvajñaṃ ca sarvaśakti ca /

GSP33vacbhamu:2885: tathedapi 'tā āpa aikṣanta' tatteja aikṣata ityādyupacāraprāye kṣutam tadaikṣata ityaupacārikameva vijñeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2886: anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi iti ca pradhānasya jīvātmatvaṃ jīvārthakāritayāha /

GSP33vacbhamu:2893: tathā sarvajñaṃ prastutya śvetāśvataramantrro 'pi - sakārāṇāṃ karaṇādhipādhipa- iti prādhānābhiprāyaḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:2911_1: niratiśayotkarṣe sārvajñyaṃ kāryamutpadyata iti pradhānavasthāyāmapi tanmātraṃ vivakṣitvāvivakṣitvā
GSP33vacbhamu:2914: nahi kiñcidekaṃ kāryaṃ janayedapi tu bahūni /

GSP33vacbhamu:2929: teṣu teṣu khalvāmnāyapradeśeṣu tadaikṣata ityevañjātīyakairvākyairīkṣituḥ kāraṇajjagajjanmākhyāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2939: pārthivatve tulya iva maṇerbimbodgrāhitā na loṣṭādīnām /

GSP33vacbhamu:2952: tadvṛttayā svaṃ vā paraṃ vā veditumutsahante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2953: no khalvandhāḥ sahasramapi pānthāḥ panthānaṃ vidanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2954: cakṣuṣmatā caikena cedvedyate, sa eva tarhi mārgadarśī svatantraḥ kartā netā teṣām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2955: evaṃ buddhisattvasya svayamacetanasya citibimbasaṃkrāntyā cedāpannaṃ caitanyasya jñātṛtvaṃ,

GSP33vacbhamu:2964: nityasyātmano jñānaṃ pariṇāma iti ca bhedābhedapakṣamapākurvadbhirapāstam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2965: kūṭasthasya nityasyātmano 'vyāpāravata eva bhinnaṃ jñānaṃ dharma iti copariṣṭādapākariṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2967: tasya kartā īśvaro jñātā sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:2968: tathā ca śrutiḥ- tapasā cīyate brahma tato 'nnamabhijāyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:2976: vyācikīrṣāyāṃ copacaye sati tato nāmarūpamannamadanīyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ vyācikīrṣitamabhijāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2977: tasmādavyākṛtādvyācikīrṣitādannātprāṇo hiraṇyagarbho brahmaṇo jñānakriyāśaktyadhiṣṭhānaṃ jagatsūtrātmā sādhāraṇe jāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2981: tebhyaśca satyākhyebhyo 'nukrameṇa lokāḥ bhūrādayaḥ teṣu manuṣṭādiprāṇino varṇāśramakrameṇa karmāṇi dharmādharmarūpāṇi jāyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2986: yasya bhagavato jñānamayaṃ tapo dharmo nāyāsamayam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2988: kiñca nāmarūpamannaṃ ca vrīhiyavādi jāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2990: kṣetrajñānāṃ ca satyapi caitanye sargādau viṣayānīkṣaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2996: iha tu mukhyasyautsargikatvena niścaye sati saṃśayābhāvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3004: na ca pradhānaṃ paramāṇavo vā tadatiriktasarvajñeśvarādhiṣṭhitā jagadupādānamiti sāṃprataṃ kāryatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3005: kāraṇātkāryāṇāṃ bhedābhāvāt kāraṇajñānena samastakāryaparijñānasya mṛdādinidarśanenāgamena prasādhitvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3010: sadupādānatve hi siddhe jagatastadupādānaṃ cetanamacetanaṃ veti saṃśayya mīmāṃsyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:3016: bahu syām' iti cācetanaṃ kāraṇamātmana eva bahubhāvamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:3018: yadyapyākāśādyā bhūtasṛṣṭistathāpi tejo 'bannānāmeva trivṛtkaraṇasya vivakṣitatvāttatra tejasaḥ prāthamyāttejaḥ prathamamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3022: tadyathā- prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3024: tathā pṛthivyantarīkṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra ityaparaścatasraḥ kalā dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantavānnāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:3025: tathāgniḥ sūryacadramā vidyuditi catasraḥ kalāḥ, sa jyotiṣmānnāma tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3026: prāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgiti catasraḥ kālāḥ, sa caturthaṃ āyatanavānnāma brahmaṇaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3030: na cāvivakṣitārthasya dhātusvarūpasya cetanopādānasādhanatvasaṃbhava ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3034: 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti sāmānyataḥ; sarvavit iti viśeṣataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3041: sāmudācaradvṛtti tāvanna bhavati sattvaṃ, guṇavaiṣamyaṃ sāmyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3044: apica caitanyapradhānavṛttivacano jānātirna cācetane vṛttimātre dṛṣṭacaraprayoga ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3046: kathaṃ tarhi yogināṃ sattvāśotkarṣahetukaṃ sarvajñatvamityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3048: sattvāṃśotkarṣo hi yogināṃ cetanyacakṣuṣmatāmupakaroti, nāndhasya pradhānasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3051: teṣāmapi hi prakṛṣṭasattvopādānaṃ puruṣaviśeṣasyaiva kleśakarmavipākāśayāparābhṛṣṭasya sarvajñatvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3062: kiṃ vāstavaṃ karmābhāvamabhipretya vaiṣamyamāha bhavān uta tadvivakṣābhāvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3063: tatra yadi tadvivakṣābhāvaṃ, tadā prakāśayatītyanena mā bhūtsāmyaṃ, prakāśata ityanena tvasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3065: atha ca prakāśasvabhāva pratyāsta svātantryaṃ savituriti pariharati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3074: yāsāṃ sati karmaṇyavivakṣite śrutīnāmupapattistāsāṃ sati karmaṇi vivakṣite sutarāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3077: yasya bhagavata īśvarasya prasādāt tasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasya nityaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatīti kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3089: na tasya kāryamāvaraṇādyapagamo vidyate, anāvṛttatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3096: na tu ātmani svabhāvasiddhaprakāśe sa ghaṭata ityata āha- #

GSP33vacbhamu:3111_1: sthūlatayātmatvena grāhyate śvetaketurarundhatīmivātīva sūkṣmāṃ darśayituṃ tatsaṃnihitāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:3116: api ca jagatkāraṇaṃ prakṛtya svapitītyasya niruktaṃ karvitī śrutiścetanameva jagatkāraṇaṃ brūte /
GSP33vacbhamu:3119: nahi mṛdātmā ghaṭa ātmīye 'pi pāthasi pralīyate 'pi tvātmabhūtāyāṃ mṛdyeva /

GSP33vacbhamu:3129: api tu teṣu sarvatra jagatkāraṇacetanyāvagatiḥ samāneti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3132: yathā hi sarveṣāṃ cakṣū rūpameva grāhayati, na punā rasādikaṃ kasyaciddarśayati kasyacidrūpam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3136: 'tadaikṣata ityatra īkṣaṇamātraṃ jagatkāraṇasya śrutaṃ na tu sarvaviṣayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3138: śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ tūpaniṣadi sarvajña īśvaro jagatkāraṇamiti sākṣāduktamiti viśeṣaḥ // 11 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3143: śastraṃ ca sarvajñe sarvaśaktau jagadutpattisthitipralayakāraṇaṃ brahmaṇyeva pramāṇaṃ na pradhānādāviti nyāyato vyutpāditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3144: na cāsti kaścidvedāntabhāgo yastadviparītamapi bodhayediti ca gatisāmānyāt ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3152: yadyapi tatvato nirastasamastopādhirūpaṃ brahma tathāpi na tena rūpeṇa śakyamupadeṣṭumityupahitena rūpeṇopadeṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3168: nanu yadyeka ātmā kūṭasthanityo niratiśayaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3171: yadyapi niratiśayakameva rūpamātmana eśvaryaṃ ca jñānaṃ cānandaśca,
GSP33vacbhamu:3172: tathāpyanādyātamaḥ samāvṛtāṃ teṣu teṣu prāṇabhṛdbhedeṣu kvacidasadiva,
GSP33vacbhamu:3179: tathottamaprakāśaḥ savitā dihmaṇḍalamokarūpeṇaiva prakāśenāpūrayannapi varṣāsu nikṛṣṭaprakāśa iva śaradi tu prakṛṣṭaprakāśa iva prathate, tathedamapīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3190: ' ānandamaya iti hi vikāre prācurye ca mayaṭastulyaṃ mukhyārthatvamiti vikārārthānnamayādipadaprāyapāṭhādānandamayapadamapi vikārārthameveti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3191: na ca prāṇamayādiṣu vikārārthatvāyogātsvārthiko mayaṅiti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3192: prāṇādyupādhyavacchinno hyātmā bhavati prāṇādivikārāḥ, ghaṭākāśamiva ghaṭavikārāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3195: priyādibhāgī śarīro jīvo na brahma yujyate //
GSP33vacbhamu:3196: ' na ca sarvāntaratayā brahmaivānandamayaṃ, na jīva iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3200: nahi devadatto balavānityukte sarvānsiṃhaśārdūlādīnapi prati halavānapratīyate 'pi tu samānajātīyanarāntaranapekṣya /
GSP33vacbhamu:3202: na ca niṣkalasya brahmaṇaḥ priyādyavayavayogaḥ, nāpi śarīratvaṃ yujyata iti saṃsāryevānandamayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3203: tasmādupahitamevātropāsyatvena vivakṣitaṃ, na tu brahmarūpaṃ jñeyatveneti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3204: api ca yadi prācuryārtho 'pi mayaṭ, tathāpi saṃsāryevānandamayaḥ, na tu brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:3205: ānandaprācurya hi tadviparītaduḥkhalavasaṃbhave bhavati na tu tadatyantāsaṃbhave /
GSP33vacbhamu:3206: na ca paramātmano manāgapi duḥkhalavasaṃbhavaḥ, ānandaikarasatvādityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3208: aśarīrasya punarapriyasaṃbandho manāgapi nāstīti prācuryārtho 'pi mayaṅ nopapadyayata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3213: tathāca tadhikāre paṭhitamabhyasyamānamānandapadaṃ tadbuddhimādhatta iti tasyaivānandamayasyābhyāsa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3214: jyotiṣṭomādhikāre 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta' iti jyotiḥpadamiva jyotiṣṭomābhyāsaḥ kālaviśeṣavidhiparaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3226: mantre hi punaḥ 'anyo 'ntara ātmā' iti parabrahmaṇyāntaratvaśravaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3227: tasyaiva ca 'anyo 'ntara ātmānandamayaḥ' iti brāhmaṇe pratyabhijñānāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3230: māntravarṇikameva paraṃ brahma brāhmaṇe 'pyānandamaya iti gīyata iti //15 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3239: rasaḥ sāro hyayamānandamaya ātmā 'rasaṃ hyevāyaṃ labdhvā'nandī bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3240: so 'yaṃ jīvātmano labdhṛbhāvaḥ, ānandamayasya ca labhyatā, nābheda upapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3241: tasmādānandamayasya jīvātmano bhede parabrahmatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3245: kathaṃ tarhi paramātmano vastuto 'bhinnena jīvātmanā paramātmā labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3250: jīvo hyavidyayā parabrahmaṇo bhinno darśitaḥ, na tu jīvādapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3252: na jīvasyāvidyayāpi svato bhedo darśita iti na labdhṛlabdhavyabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3255: yathā parameśvarādbhinno jīvātmā draṣṭā na bhavatyevaṃ jīvātmano 'pi draṣṭurna bhinnaḥ parameśvara iti jīvasyānirvācyatve parameśvaro 'pyanirvācyaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3258: rajataṃ hi rāmāropitaṃ na śuktito bhidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3259: na hi tadbhedenābhedena vā śakyaṃ nirvaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:3268: eṣa tāvadutsargo yat- brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭheti brahmaśabdātpratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3270: ' tatra kiṃ pucchapadasamabhivyāhārāt annamayādiṣu cāsyāvayavaparatvena prayogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3271: ihāpyavayavaparatvātpucchapadasya tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ brahmapadamapi svārthatyāgena kathañcidavayavaparaṃ vyākhyāyātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:3275: ānandapadābhyāsena ca jyotiḥ padeneva jyotiṣṭoma anandamayo lakṣyatāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3282: pucchapadaṃ hi vāladhau mukhyaṃ sadānandamayāvayave gauṇameveti mukhyaśabdārthalaṅghanamavayavaparatāyāmaṅikaraṇaparatāyāṃ ca tulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3287: api cānandamayapadasya brahmārthatve, brahma puccham iti na samañjasam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3296: tathā ca māntravarṇikasya brahmaṇā eva brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti svapradhānasyābhidhānāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3298: so 'kāmayeta' ityādyā api śrutayo brahmaviṣayā ityarthasaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3303: ānandamayaśabdena tadvākyasya brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā ityetadgataṃ brahmapadamupalakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3304: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ānandamaya ityādivākye yat brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti brahmapadaṃ tatsvapradhānameveti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3305: yattu brahmādhikaraṇameveti vaktavye brahma puccham ityāha śrutiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3312: yat satyaṃ jñānam' ityādinā mantravarṇena brahmoktaṃ tadevopāyabhūtena brāhmaṇena svapradhānyena gīyate- brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3317: atra 'itaścānandamayaḥ iti bhāṣyasya sthāne itaśca brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti paṭhitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3320: atrāpi itaścānandamayaḥ ityasya ca ānandamayādhikāre ityasya ca bhāṣyasya sthāne brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti brahmapucchādhikāre iti ca paṭhitavayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3325: ityanayorapi sūtrayorbhāṣye ānandamayasthāne brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti pāṭho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3328: vikārasyānandamayasya brahma pucchamavayavaścetkathaṃ sarvasyāsya vikārajātasya sānandamayasya brahma pucchaṃ kāraṇamucyeta idaṃ sarvamasṛjata /
GSP33vacbhamu:3330: nahyānandamayavikārāvayavo brahma vikāraḥ san sarvasya kāraṇamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3331: tasmādānandamayavikārāvayavo brahmeti tadavayavayogyānandamayo vikāra iha nopāsyatvena vivakṣitaḥsa kintu svapradhānamiha brahma pucchaṃ jñeyatveneti siddham // 1.9 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3334: pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe 'pāstasamastaviśeṣabrahmapratipattyarthamupāyatāmātreṇa pañca kośā upādhayaḥ sthitāḥ, natu vivakṣaitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3335: brahmaiva tu pradhānaṃ brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti jñeyatvenopakṣiptamiti nirṇītam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3338: tatra maryādādhārarūpāṇi saṃsāriṇi pare na tu /
GSP33vacbhamu:3343: ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ca ityaiśvaryādāśruteśca saṃsāryeva kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmako rūpādisaṃpanna ihopāsyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3349_0: rūpādimattvānyānupapattyā ca kāryakāraṇātmake jīve upāsyatvena vivakṣite yattāvadṛgādyātmakatayāsya
GSP33vacbhamu:3349_1: sarvātmakatvaṃ śrūyate tatkathañcidādityapuruṣasyaiva stuturiti ādityapuruṣa evopāsyo
GSP33vacbhamu:3350: anādhāratve ca nityatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ ca hetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3352: nityamapyasarvagataṃ ca yattasmādadharabhāvenāsthitaṃ tadeva tasyottarasyādhāra iti nānādhāraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3358: na cādityasya devatāyāḥ karmānadhikāre 'pi sarvapāpmavirahaḥ prāgbhavīyadharmarūpapāpmasaṃbhave sati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3359: na caiteṣāṃ prāgbhavīyo dharma evāsti na pāpmeti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3363: naca vinigamanāhetvabhāvaḥ, tatra tatra sarvapāpmavirahasya bhūyobhūyo brahmaṇyeva śravaṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3381: sa evāntarāditya ityantaḥ śrutisāmyena pratyabhijñāyamāno bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3401: tatra 'ākāśa iti hovāca' iti kiṃ mukhyakāśapādānurodhena 'asya lokasya kā gitaḥ' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:3402: 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni' iti 'jyāyā' itica 'parāyaṇam' iti ca kathañcidvyākhyāyatāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3406: ' 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ' iti praśnottare 'ākāśa iti hovāca' ityākāśasya gatitvena pratipādyatayā prādhānyāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3407: 'sarvāṇi ha vā' ityādīnāṃ tu tadviśeṣaṇatayā guṇatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3410: tena tadanuraktāyāṃ buddhau yadyadeva tadekavākyagatamupanipatati tattajjaghanyatayā upasaṃjātavirodhi tadānuguṇyenaiva vyavasthānamarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3411: naca kkacidākāśaśabdo bhaktyā brahmaṇi prayukta iti sarvatra tena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3412: nahi gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgapadamanupapattyā tīraparamiti yādāṃsi gaṅgāyāmityatrāpyanena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3417: loke cāsya nabhasi nirūḍhatvāt, tatpūrvakatvācca vaidikārthapratītervaiparītyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3418: tadānuguṇyena ca 'sarvāṇi ha vā' ityādīni bhāṣyakṛtā svayameva nītāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:3426: ' yadyapyākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ tathāpi yatpṛṣṭaṃ tadeva prativaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3429: 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ' iti praśno dṛśyamānanāmarūpaprapañcamātragativiṣaya iti tadanurodhādya eva sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ sa evākāśaśabdena prativaktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3430: naca bhūtākāśaḥ sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ, tasyāpi lokamadhyapātitvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3434: naca praśnena pūrvapakṣarūpeṇānavasthitārthenottaraṃ vyavasthitārthaṃ na śakyaṃ niyantumiti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3438: tathāhi-'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyakāśādeva samutpadyante' iti sarvaśabdaḥ kathañcidalpaviṣayo vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3440: na khalvapāmākāśa eva kāraṇamapi tu tejo 'pi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3441: evamannasyāpi nākāśameva kāraṇamapi tu pāvakapāthasī api /
GSP33vacbhamu:3455: tathāca tadarthaṃ sat ākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ bhavati, nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3462_0: tatra tatra brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya tatparyāyasya ca prayogaprācuryādatyantābhyāsenāsyāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:3463: tatraiva ca prathamāvagatānuguṇyenottaraṃ nīyate, yatra tadanyathā kartuṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3464: yatra tu na śakyaṃ tatrottarānuguṇyenaiva prathamaṃ nīyata ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3469: udgīthe-'yā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā' ityukramya śrūyate-'katamā sā devateti prāṇa iti hovāca' uṣastiśkrāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3471: prastāva iti sāmno bhaktiviśeṣastamanvāyattā anugatā prāṇo devatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3472: atra prāṇaśabdasya brahmaṇi vāyuvikāre ca darśanātsaṃśayaḥ-kimayaṃ brahmavacana uta vāyuvikāravacana iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3473: tatra ata eva brahmaliṅgādeva prāṇo 'pi brahmaiva na vāyuvikāra iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3478: ākāśasya vā vāṭvādibhūtakāraṇatvaṃ prati nāgamādṛte mānāntaraṃ prabhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3479: tatra paurvāparyaparyālocanayā yatrārthe samañjasa āgamaḥ sa evārthastasya gṛhyate, tyajyate cetaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3480_0: iha tu saṃveśanodgamane bhūtānāṃ prāṇaṃ pratyucyamāne kiṃ brahma pratyucyate āho
GSP33vacbhamu:3480_1: vāyuvikāraṃ pratīti viśaye 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti' ityādikāyāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:3480_3: mānāntarānugrahalabdhasāmarthyāyā balātsaṃveśanodgamane vāyuvikārasyaiva prāṇasya, na brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3481: api cātrodgīthapratihārayoḥ sāmabhaktyorbrahmaṇo 'nye ādityaścānnaṃ ca devate abhihite kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpe,
GSP33vacbhamu:3487: ' no khalu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvamapauruṣeyaṃ vacaḥ svaviṣayajñānotpāde vā tadvyavahāre vā mānāntaramapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:3488: tasyāpauruṣeyasya nirastasamastadoṣāśaṅkya svata eva niścāyakatvāt, niścāyakatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3490: tasmādasaṃvādino vā cakṣuṣa iva rūpe tvagindriyasaṃvādino vā tasyaiva dravye nādārḍhyaṃ vā dārḍhyaṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3493: pratītau vā tatrāpi prāṇo brahmaiva bhavenna vāyuvikāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3494: 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityatra vākye yathā prāṇaśabdo brahmavacanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3495: na cāsminvāyuvikāre sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamane mānāntareṇa dṛśyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:3500: indriyasaṃveśanodgamanaṃ tvavayutyānuvādenāpi ghaṭiṣyate, ekaṃ vṛṇīte dvau vṛṇīte itivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:3503: tathā copāsakasya prāṇaprāptiḥ karmasamṛddhirvā phalaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3511: idamāmananti-'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate niśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3512: yajjyotirato divo dyulokātparaṃ dīpyate prakāśate viśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu viśveṣāmupari /
GSP33vacbhamu:3513: asaṃkucadvṛttirayaṃ viśvaśabdo 'navayavatvena saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ brūta iti darśayitumāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3518: śrotragrāhyeṇa ca pihitakarṇena puṃsā ghoṣeṇa liṅgenānumīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3523: atra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaḥ teja uta brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3530: kokṣeyajyotiḥsārūpyaṃ ca cakṣuṣyo rūpavān śruto viśruto bhavatītyalpaphalatvaṃ ca svavākye śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3531: na jātu jvalanāparanāmā dīptirvinā tejo brahmaṇi saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3535: audarye tu tejasyadhyasya bāhyaṃ teja upāsanametat phalānurūpaṃ yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3537: etadupodbalāya ca nirastamapi maryādādhārabahutvamupanyastaṃ, iha tannirāsakāraṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3539: tasya sauryādeḥ sāvayavatvena tadekadeśamaryādāsaṃbhavāt tasya copāsyatvena vidhānāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3542: naca 'pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti brahmapratipādakaṃ vākyāntaraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3543: 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥśabdaṃ brahmaṇi vyavasthāpayatīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3544: nahi saṃnidhānamātradvākyāntareṇa vākyāntaragatā śrutiḥ śakyā mukhyārthāntryāvayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:3545: naca vākyāntare 'dhikaraṇatvena dyauḥ śrutā diva iti maryādāśrutau śakyā pratyabhijñātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:3546: apica vākyāntarasyāpi brahmārthatvaṃ prasādhyameva nādyāpi sidhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:3547: tatkathaṃ tena niyantuṃ brahmaparatayā 'yadataḥ paraḥ' iti vākyaṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3549: tejaḥkathanaprastāve tamaḥkathanaṃ pratipakṣopanyāsena pratipakṣāntare dṛḍhā pratītirbhavatītyetadartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:3566: 'ekaikāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ karavāṇi' iti tejaḥprabhṛtyupāsanāmātraviṣayā śrutirna saṃkocayituṃ yuktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3571: tathāpi yathā kārye jyotiṣyatiśayenopapadyate na tathātretyata uktam- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3577: brahmaṇyeva pradhānaṃ hi brahmacchando na tatra tu //
GSP33vacbhamu:3581: tatra vacanāni tvapūrvatvāditi sarvanāmnaḥ prasiddhārthatvaṃ balādapanīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3583: tadiha 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥ' iti yacchabdasāmarthyāt dyumaryādenāpi jyotiṣā prasiddhena bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3585: pūrvavākye ca dyusaṃbandhitayā tripādbrahma prasiddhamiti prasiddhyapekṣāyāṃ tadeva saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3586: naca pradhānasya prātipadikārthasya tattvena pratyabhijñāne tadviśeṣaṇasya vibhaktyarthasyānyatāmātreṇānyatā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3587: evaṃ ca tadvākyasthāni tejoliṅgānyasamañjasānīti brahmaṇyeva gamayitavyāni, gamitāni ca bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3589: athavā prakāśamātravacano jyotiḥśabdaḥ prakāśasya brahmeti brahmaṇi mukya iti jyotirbahmeti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:3592: prasiddhyapekṣāyāṃ pūrvavākyagataṃ prakṛtaṃ saṃnihitaṃ, aprasiddhaṃ tu kalpyaṃ na prakṛtam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3605: chandobhidhānānneti cet na tathā cetorpaṇanigadāttathāhi darśanam# /
GSP33vacbhamu:3606: pūrvavākyasya hi brahmārthatve siddhe syādetadevaṃ, natu tadbrahmārthaṃ, apitu gāyatryartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:3607: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca' iti gāyatrīṃ prakṛtyedaṃ śrūyate-'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3611: evaṃ 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' ityakṣarasaṃniveśamātrasya gāyatryā na sarvatvamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3614: tasmādgīyatrīdvārā brahmaṇa evopāsanā na gāyatryā iti pūrveṇaiva gatārthatvādanārambhaṇīyametat /
GSP33vacbhamu:3617: tathāhi-gāyatrīdvārā brahmopāsaneti kor'thaḥ, gāyatrīvikāropādhino brahmaṇa upāsaneti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3620: tasmādasya sarvātmatvādikaṃ stutyarthaṃ, tadvaraṃ gāyatryā evāstu stutiḥ kathācitpraṇāḍyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3621: 'vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca' ityādiśritibhyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3622: tathāca 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' ityupakramya gāyatryā eva hṛdayādibhirvyākhyāya ca 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī' ityupasaṃhāro gāyatryāmeva samañjaso bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3631: gāyatryākhyacchandodvāreṇa gāyatrīrūpavikārānugate brahmaṇi cetorpaṇaṃ cittasamādhānamanena brahmaṇavākyena nigadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3636: kintu yadetadbrahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvakāraṇaṃ satsvarūpeṇāśakyopadeśamiti tadvikāragāyatrīdvāreṇopalakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3637: gāyatryāḥ sarvacchandovyāptyā ca savanatrayavyāptyā ca dvijātidvitīyajanmajananīyatayā ca śrutervikāreṣu madhye prādhānyena dvāratvopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3639: nahi kuṇḍalenopalakṣitaṃ kaṇṭharūpaṃ kuṇḍalaviyoge 'pi paścātpratīyamānamapratīyamānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3641: tadevaṃ gāyatrīśabdasya mukhyārthatve gāyatryā brahmopalakṣyata ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3642: saṃprati ti gāyatriśabdaḥ saṃkhyāsāmānyādgauṇyā vṛttyā brahmaṇyeva vartata iti darśayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3644: tathāhi-ṣaḍakṣaraiḥ pādairyathā gāyatrī catuṣpadā, evaṃ brahmāpi catuṣpāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3650: tathā-'ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yamantaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:3663: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākprāṇā iti ṣaṭ prakārā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:3667: asyārthaḥ-hṛdayasyāsya khalu pañca suṣayaḥ pañca chidrāṇi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3668: tāni ca devaiḥ prāṇādibhī rakṣyamāṇāni svargaprāptidvārāṇīti devasuṣayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3669: tathāhi-hṛdayasya yatprāṅmukhaṃ chidraṃ tatstho yo vāyuḥ sa prāṇaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3673: 'ādityo ha vai bāhyaḥ prāṇaḥ' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3674: atha yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣo vyānaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3675: tatsaṃbaddhaṃ śrotra taccandramāḥ, 'śrotreṇa sṛṣṭā viśaścandramāśca' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3676: atha yo 'sya pratyaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatatstho vāyuviśeṣo 'pānaḥ sa ca vāksaṃbandhādvāk,
GSP33vacbhamu:3678: atha yo 'syodaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa udānaḥ, pādatalādārabhyordhvaṃ nayanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3681: tatsaṃbaddhāḥ pañca hārdasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣā na gāyatryāmakṣarasaṃniveśamātre saṃbhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:3687: yo hi śyeno vṛkṣāgre vastuto 'sti sa ca tataḥ paro 'pyastyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:3690: yadā tu maryādaiva mukhyatayā prādhānyena vivakṣitā tadā lakṣaṇayādhāratvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3703: na cāyamarthaḥ 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' ityatra vicāritaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3705: hitatamapuruṣārthasiddhiśca nikhilabhrūṇahatyādipāpāparāmarśaśca prajñātmatvaṃ cānandādiśca na mukhye prāṇe saṃbhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3706: tathā 'eṣa sādhu karma kārayati' 'eṣa lokādhipatiḥ' ityādyapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3708_0: vaktṛtvaṃ ca vākkaraṇavyāpāravattvaṃ yadyapi paramātmani svarūpeṇa na saṃbhavati
GSP33vacbhamu:3710: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi' iti vāgvadanasya brahma kāraṇamityāha-śarīradhāraṇamapi yadyapi mukhyaprāṇasyaiva tathāpi prāṇavyāpārasya paramātmāyattatvātparamātmana eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:3725_0: indrasya devatāyā ātmani pratibuddhasya caramadehasya vāmadevasyeva prarabdhavipākakarmāśayamātraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:3725_1: bhogena kṣapayato brahmaṇa eva sarvametatkalpata iti vigrahavadindrijīvaprāṇavāyuparityāgena
GSP33vacbhamu:3726_0: atrocyate-'yo vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vā prajñā sa prāṇaiḥ saha hyetavasmin śarīre
GSP33vacbhamu:3726_1: vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ' iti yasyaiva prāṇasya prajñātmana upāsyatvamuktaṃ tasyaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:3727: naca brahmaṇyabede dvicanaṃ, na sahabhāvaḥ na cotkramaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3730: saha pravṛttinivṛttyā bhaktyaikatvamanayorupacaritaṃ 'yo vai prāṇaḥ' ityādina /
GSP33vacbhamu:3740: tameva tvekaṃ vākyārthaṃ padārthāvagamamantareṇa na śaknuvanti kartumityantarā tadarthameva tamapyavagamayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:3743: tena yathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre caikavākyatvāya 'prajāpaturupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo na pṛthagvidhayaḥ kintvarthavādā iti nirṇītaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3744_0: tathehāmāmevi vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā' ityuktvānte 'sa prāṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:3748: ata evopalakṣyasya pratyagātmasvarūpasyābhedamupalakṣaṇaṃ bhedenopalakṣayati-'prāṇa eva prajñātmā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3764: prāṇāntarāṇīndriyāṇi, tāni hi mukhye prāṇe pratiṣṭhitāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:3773: pañca śabdādayaḥ, pañca pṛthivyādaya iti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3774: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhasya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3775: tadevaṃ svamatena vyākhyāya prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ matena vyācaṣṭe- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3777: pūrvaṃ prāṇasyaikamupāsanamaparaṃ jīvasyāparaṃ brahmaṇa ityupāsanātraividhyena vākyabhedaprasaṅgo dūṣaṇamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3778: iha tu brahmaṇa ekasyaivopāsātrayaviśiṣṭasya vidhānānna vākyabeda ityabhimānaḥ prācāṃ vṛttikṛtām /
GSP33vacbhamu:3782: iha tu siddharūpaṃ brahma na vidhiviṣayo bhavitumarhati, abhāvārthatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3784: vākyāntarebhyaśca brahmavagateḥ prāptatvāttadanūdyāprāptopāsanā bhāvārthaḥ vidheyastasya ca bedādvidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabedo 'tisphuṭa iti bāṣyakṛtā nodghāṭitaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3786: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3792: atha dvitīyaṃ pādamāripsuḥ pūrvoktamarthaṃ smārayati vakṣyamāṇopayogitayā- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3795: na caite sākṣātpūrvamupapāditā iti kathaṃ hetubhāvena na śakyā upadeṣṭumityata uktam- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3797: yadyapyete na pūrvaṃ kaṇṭhata uktāstathāpi brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvopapadānenādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenopakṣiptā ityupapannasteṣāmuttaratra hetubhāvenopanyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3801: tatra kaiva kathā manomayādīnāmarthāntaraṃ prasiddhānāṃ padānāṃ brahmagocaratvanirṇayaṃ pratītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3811: tasmiṃścāniti sthitikāle ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ jagat tasmātsarvaṃ khalvidaṃ jagadbrahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:3812: ataḥ kaḥ kasminrajyate kaśca kaṃ dveṣṭīti rāgadveṣarahitaḥ śāntaḥ sannupāsīta /
GSP33vacbhamu:3814: atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturasmiṃlloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīta manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīra ityādi# /
GSP33vacbhamu:3815: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimiha manomayatvādibhirdharmaiḥ śārīra ātmopāsyatvenopadiśyate āhosvidbrahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3819: 'kratum' ityādivākyena vihitāṃ kratubhāvanāmanūdya 'sarvam' ityādivākyaṃ śamaguṇe vidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3820: tathā ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyaṃ prathamapaṭhitamapyarthālocanayā parameva,
GSP33vacbhamu:3822: evaṃ ca saṃkalpavidhiḥ prathamo nirviṣayaḥ sannaparyavasyanviṣayāpekṣaḥ svayamanirvṛtto na vidhyantareṇopajīvituṃ śakyaḥ, anupapadākatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3824: manomayatvādi ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmano jīvātmana eva nirūḍhamiti jīvātmanopāsyenoparaktopāsanā na paścāt brahmaṇā saṃbaddhumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:3826: naca 'sarvaṃ khalvidam' iti vākyaṃ brahmaparamapi tu śamahetuvannigadārthavādaḥ śāntatāvidhiparaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3828: na cānyaparādapi brahmāpekṣitatayā svīkriyata iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3835: evaṃ karmakartṛvyapadeśaḥ saptamīpraṇamāntatā cābhede 'pi jīvātmani kathañcidbhedopacāreṇa rāhoḥ śira itivaddraṣṭavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3836: 'etadbrahma' iti ca jīvaviṣayaṃ, jīvasyāpi dehādibṛṃhaṇatvena brahmātvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3837: evaṃ satyasaṃkalpatvādayo 'pi paramātmavartino jīve 'pi saṃbhavanti, tadavyatirekāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3838: tasmājjīva evopāsyatvenātra vivakṣitaḥ, na paramātmeti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3843: ' bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prāṇaśarīra ca sarvanāmārthaṃ saṃprāpya tadabhidhānaṃ paryavasyet /
GSP33vacbhamu:3845: tadeva tu manovikāro vā manaḥpracuraṃ vā kimarthamityadyāpi na vijñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3846: tadyatraiṣa śabdaḥ samavetārtho bhavati sa samāsārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3847: na caiṣa jīva eva samavetātho na brahmaṇīti,
GSP33vacbhamu:3850: vikārāṇāṃ ca svakāraṇādabhedātteṣāṃ ca manomatayā brahmaṇastatkāraṇasya manomayatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3853: tatra prathamaṃ dvārasya buddhisthatvāttadevopāsyamastu, na punarjaghanyaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:3861: vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ-'samāropyasya rūpeṇa viṣayo rūpavānbhavetṣa viṣayasya tu rūpeṇa samāropyaṃ na rūpavat //
GSP33vacbhamu:3862: ' samāropitasya hi rūpeṇa bhujaṅgasya bhīṣaṇatvādinā rajjū rūpavatī,
GSP33vacbhamu:3865: bhujaṅgadaśāyāṃ tu na nāsti vāstavī rajjuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3869: tasmādbrahmaliṅgadarśanājjīve ca tadasaṃbhavādbrahmaivopāsyaṃ na jīva iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:3870: etadupalakṣaṇaṇāya ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyamupanyastamiti //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3883: yatparaṃ vedavākyaṃ tattenopāttaṃ vivakṣitam, atatpareṇa cānupāttamavivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:3888: śārīraguṇā iva manomayatvādayo brahmaṇītyata āha sūtrakāraḥ- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3895: yattadavocāma samāropyadharmāḥ samāropaviṣaye saṃbhavanti, natu viṣayadharmāḥ samāropya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3899: na tāvadbhedapratiṣedhādbhedavpadeśācca bhedābhedāvekatra tāttvikau bhavitumarhato virodhādityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3907: tādṛśāṃ ca jīvānāmavidyā, natu nirūpādhino brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3912: yo hi paratantraḥ so 'nyena bandhanāgāre praveśyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:3917: na caitāvatā īśvarasyānīśatā na hyupakaraṇādyapekṣitā kartuḥ svātantryaṃ vihanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3929: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate-yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odamaḥ# /
GSP33vacbhamu:3931: mṛtyuryasyopasetacanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra sa iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:3933: attṛtvaṃ ca bhoktṛtā vā saharntṛtā vā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3937: tadyadi bhoktṛtvamattṛtvaṃ tato muktasaṃśayaṃ jīvātmaiva pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3938: brahmakṣatrādi cāsya kāryakāraṇasaṃghāto bhogāyatanatayā vā sākṣādvā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3941: tatastrayāṇāmagnijīvaparamātmanāṃ praśnopanyāsopalabdheḥ saṃhartṛtvasyāviśeṣādbhavati saṃśayaḥ-kimattā agnirāho jīva utāho paramātmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3942: tatraudanasya bhogyatvena loke prasiddherbhoktṛtvameva prathamaṃ buddhau viparivartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:3945: 'na jāyate mriyate' iti ca tasyaiva stutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3949: yadi tu saṃhartṛtvamattṛtvaṃ tathāpyagnirattā, 'agnirannādaḥ' iti śrutiprasiddhibhyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:3952: tatra yadi jīvasya bhogāyatanatayā tatsādhanatayā ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātaḥ sthitaḥ, na tarhyedanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3953: nahyodano bhogāyatanaṃ, nāpi bhogasādhanaṃ, api tu bhogyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3954: naca bhogāyatanasya bhogasādhanasya vā bhogyatvaṃ mukhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3957: kasyacitkrūrasattvasya vyāghrādeḥ kaścidbhavet na tu sarvathā sarvajīvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:3963: 'brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca' iti ca śrutī saṃkocamarhataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3964: naca brahmakṣatre evātra vivakṣite, mṛtyūpasecanena prāṇabhṛnmātropasthāpanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3969: tathāca 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit' iti prakṛtasya na hānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3970: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ' iti ca durjñānatopapatsyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3983: autsargikasya mukhyatābalātpūrvasiddhāntapakṣāsaṃbhavena pakṣāntaraṃ kalpayiṣyata iti manvānaḥ saṃśayamākṣipati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3991: astu vā mukhya eva, tathāpi na doṣa ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3993: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi kartā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3994: ata eva cāhuḥ-'yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeva' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3995: evaṃ karaṇasyāpi svātantryavivakṣayā kathañcitkartṛtvaṃ, yathā kāṣṭhāni pacantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4004: apica 'sukṛtasya loke' iti sukṛtalokavyavasthānena karmagocarānatikrama uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4006: jīvo hi bhoktṛtayā buddhiśca bhogasādhanatayā dharmasya gocare sthitau,
GSP33vacbhamu:4010: tatrāpi prete vicikitsāpanuttaye buddherbhedena paralokī jīvo darśanīya iti buddhirucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4012: brahmaṇaiva sarūpeṇa na tu buddhyā virūpayā //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4018: gauḥ sadvitīyetyukte sajātīyenaiva gavāntareṇāvagamyate, na tu vijātīyenāśvādinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4019: tadiha cetano jīvaḥ sarūpeṇa cetanāntareṇaiva brahmaṇā sadvitīyaḥ pratīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:4021: tadevam 'ṛtaṃ pibantau' ityatra prathamamavagate brahmaṇi tadanurodhena caramaṃ guhāśrayatvaṃ śālagrāme hariritavadvyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4022: bahulaṃ hi guhāśrayatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutaya āhuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4026: evañca prathamāvagatabrahmānurodhena sukṛtalokavartitvamapi tasya lakṣaṇayā chatrinyāyena gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4027: chāyātapatvamapi jīvasyāvidyāśrayatayā brahmaṇaśca śuddhaprakaśasvabhāvasya tadanāśrayatayā mantavyam //11 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4029: imameva nyāyaṃ 'dvā suparṇā' ityatrāpyudāharaṇe kṛtvācintayā yojayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4031: atrāpi kiṃ buddhijīvau uta jīvaparamātmānāviti saṃśaṭya karaṇarūpāyā api buddheredhāṃsi pacantītivatkartṛtvopacārābuddhijīvāviha pūrvapakṣayitvā siddhāntayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4033: taddarśanāditi ca 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagnaḥ' ityatra mantre /
GSP33vacbhamu:4034: na khalu mukhye kartṛtve saṃbhavati karaṇe kartṛtvopacāro yukta iti kṛtvācintāmudghāṭayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4050: evaṃ hi pūrvapakṣamasya bhajeta, yadi hi kṣetratre saṃsāriṇi paryavasyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:4051: tasya tu brahmarūpatāyāṃ paryavasyanna pūrvapakṣamapi svīkarotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4056: sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi raja ādhvaṃsata iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:4070: apitu buddhisattvaṃ mukhādirupapariṇataṃ citicchāyāpattyopapannacaitanyamiva bhuṅkte natu tattvato jīvaḥ paramātmā bhuṅkte /
GSP33vacbhamu:4080: parokṣaṃ brahma na tathā pratibimbe tu yujyate //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4084: 'ṛtaṃ pibantau ityatra hi jīvaparamātmānau prathamamanagatāviti tadanurodhena guhāpraveśādayaḥ paścādavagatā vyākhyātāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4085: tadvidihāpi 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' iti pratyakṣābhidhānātprathamamavagate chāyāpuruṣe tadanurodhenāmṛtatvābhayatvādayaḥ stutyā kathañcidvyākhyeyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4092: kaṃ ca khaṃ cetyādi tu vākyamagnīnāṃ nācāryavākyaṃ niyantumarhi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4093: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatyantarābhiprāyaṃ, na tūktapariśiṣṭābhiprāyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4095: saṃbhavamātreṇa tu jīvadevate upanyaste, bādhakāntaropadarśanāya caiṣa dṛśyata ityasyātrābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4101: ' saṃnihitāśca puruṣātmādiśabdāste ca na yāvatsvārthamabhidadhati tāvatsarvanāmabhyāṃ nārthatuṣo 'bhidhīyata iti kutastadarthasyāparokṣatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4102: puruṣātmaśabdau ca sarvanāmanirapekṣau svarasato jīve vā paramātmani vā vartete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4103: naca tayoṣcakṣuṣi pratyakṣadarśanamiti nirapekṣapuruṣapadapratyāyitārthānurodhena ya eṣa iti dṛśṭata iti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4105: viduṣaḥ śāstrata upalabdireva dṛḍhatayā pratyakṣavaduparyate praśaṃsārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4106: api ca tadeva caramaṃ prathamānuguṇatayā nīyate yannetuṃ śakyam, alpaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:4109: tathā sati kiṃ nāma nāmṛtaṃ syāditi vyarthamamṛtapadam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4115: nanu sarvagatasyeśvarasya kasmādviśiṣeṇa cakṣureva sthānamupadiśyata iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4117: śrutiḥ-'tadyadyapyasminsārpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4127: sa eva puṇyaphalāni vāmāni nayati lokamiti vāmanīḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4130: taduktaṃ śrutyā-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti //13 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4136: sthānino hi sthānaṃ mahadvṛṣṭaṃ, yathā yādasāmabdhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4137: tatkathamatyalpaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ paramātmanaḥ paramamahata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4140: sthānānyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakarāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvagatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4142: viśeṣatastu brahmaṇastāni tānyupāsanāsthānānīti tairasya yukto vyapadeśaḥ //14 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4143: apica prakṛtānusārādapi brahmaivātra pratyetavyaṃ, natu pratibimbajīvadevatā ityāha sūtrakāraḥ #
GSP33vacbhamu:4145: evaṃ khalūpākhyāyate-upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacaryamuvāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:4150_1: śraddadhānāyāsmai dṛḍhabhaktaye sametya brahmavidyāsūcire-'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4154: kintu kaṃ ca khaṃ ca brahmetyetanna vijānāmi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4155: nahi viṣayendriyasaṃparkajaṃ sukhamanityaṃ lokasiddhaṃ khaṃ ca bhūtākāśamacetanaṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4156: athainamagnayaḥ pratyūcuḥ-'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4157: evaṃ saṃbhūyoktvā pratyekaṃ ca svaviṣayāṃ vidyāmūcuḥ-'pṛthivyagnirannamādityaḥ' ityādanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4159: eṣā somya te 'smidvidyā pratyekamuktā svaviṣayā vidyā,
GSP33vacbhamu:4160: ātmavidyā cāsmābhiḥ saṃbhūya pūrvamuktā prāṇo brahma kaṃ khaṃ brahmeti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4164: evaṃ vyavasthite 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam' ityetadvyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4171: laukikasya mukhasya sādhanapāracantryaṃ kṣayiṣṇutā cāmayastena saha vartata iti sāmayaṃ sukham /
GSP33vacbhamu:4175: sukhaśabdasamānādhikaraṇo hi khaṃśabdo bhūtākāśamarthaṃ parityajya brahmaṇi guṇogena vartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4176: tādṛśā ca khena sukhaṃ viśiṣyamāṇaṃ sāmayādvyāvṛttaṃ nirāmayaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4181: evaṃ khaṃpadasyāpi brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoḥ kaṅkhaṃpadayoste brahmaśirasī,
GSP33vacbhamu:4186: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi' ityācāryavākye 'pa tadevānuvartanīyamiti tu kuta ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4187: ācāryastu te gatiṃ vakteti ca gatimātrābhidhānamiti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:4188: yadyapyete bhinnavaktṛṇī vākye tathāpi pūrveṇa vaktnā ekavākyatāṃ gamite, gatimātrābhidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4196: brahmavida iva te somya mukhaṃ prasannaṃ bhāti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4198: upakosalastu hrīṇo bhītaśca ko nu māmanuśiṣyāt bhagavan proṣite tvayītyāpātato 'pajñāya nirbadhyamāno yathāvadagnīnāmanuśāsanamavocat /
GSP33vacbhamu:4199: tadupakṣutya cācāryaḥ suciraṃ kliṣṭa upakosale samupajātadaryārdrahṛdayaḥ pratyuvāca,
GSP33vacbhamu:4200: somya kila tubhyamagnayo na brahma sākalyenāvocan,
GSP33vacbhamu:4202: tadanubhavamāhātmyāt 'yathā puṣpakarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvida pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:4206: yaduktamagnibhiḥ prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti tatparipūraṇāya 'eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4207: etaduktaṃ bhavati-ācāryeṇa ye sukhaṃ brahmākṣisthānaṃ saṃyadvāmaṃ vāmanībhāmanītyevaṅguṇakaṃ prāṇasahitamupāsate te sarve 'pahatapāpmāno 'nyatkarma kurvantu mā vākārṣuḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4212: yeṣu māseṣūttarāṃ diśameti savitā te ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇaṃ taddevatāṃ pratipadyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:4219: sa tādṛśaḥ puruṣa etānsatyalokasthaṃ kāryaṃ brahma gamayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:4220: sa eṣa devapatho devairarcirādibhirnetṛbhirupalakṣita iti devapathaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4221: sa eva ca brahmaṇā gantavyenopalakṣita iti brahmapathaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4222: etena pathā pratipadyamānāḥ satyalokasthaṃ brahma imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ kiṃbhūtamāvartaṃ janmajarāmaraṇapaunaḥ punyamāvṛttistatkartāvarto mānavo lokastaṃ nāvartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:4223: tathāca smṛtiḥ-'brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare /
GSP33vacbhamu:4233: vijñānātmano hi na pradeśe upāsanānyatra dṛṣṭacarī, brahmaṇastu tatra śrutapūrvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4242: pravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ cetanasya śarīriṇaḥ svaśarīrendriyādau vā śarīreṇa vā vāsyādau dṛṣṭaṃ nāśarīrasya brahmaṇo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4246: pradhānasya vā pṛthivyādyabhimānavatyā devatāyā vāṇimādyaiśvaryayogino yogino vā jīvātmano vāntaryāmitā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4249: anātmatvācca 'eṣa ta ātmā' iti śruteranupapatterna pradhānasyāntaryāmitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4254: tathāpi tasya pratiniyataniyamanāt 'yaḥ sarvaṃllokānantaro yamayati yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyantaro yamayati' iti śrutivirodhādanupapatteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4255: yogī tu yadyapi lokabhūtaviśatayā sarvāṃllokānsarvāṇi ca bhūtāni niyantumarhati tatra tatrānekavidhadehendriyādinirmāṇena 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati' ityādiśrutibhyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4256: tathāpi 'jagadvyāpāravarjaṃ prakaraṇāt' iti vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vikāraviṣaye vidyāsiddhānāṃ vyāpārabhāvātso 'pi nāntaryāmī /
GSP33vacbhamu:4257: tasmātpāriśeṣyājjīva eva cetano dehendriyādimān dṛṣṭṛtvādisaṃpannaḥ svayamadṛśyādiḥ svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4260: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' iti cābhede 'pi kathañcidbhedopacārāt 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni' itivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:4261: 'yamātmā na veda' iti ca svātmani vṛttivirodhābhiprāyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4262: 'yasyātmā śarīram' ityādi ca sarvaṃ 'sve mahimni' itivadyojanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4263: yadi punarātmano 'pi niyantūranyo niyantā bhavet veditā vā tatastasyāpyanya ityanavasthā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4265: tadupārjitau hi dharmājharmau niyacchata ityanayā dvārā jīvo niyacchati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4270: ' śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tāvadatrabhavataḥ sarvajñasya sa4vaśakteḥ parameśvarasya jagadyonitvamavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4272: tathāca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tadavidyāśaktipariṇāmastasya śarīrendriyasthāne vartata iti yathāyathaṃ pṛthivyādidevatādikāryakaraṇaistāneva pṛthivyādidevatādīñchaknoti niyantum /
GSP33vacbhamu:4275: kintu yo jīvo niyantā lokasiddhaḥ sa paramātmaivopādhyavacchedakalpitabhedastathā vyākhyāyata ityasakṛdāveditaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4277: tathāca 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' ityādyā api śrutaya upapannārthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4284: 'yaḥ sarvāṃllokān' 'yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni' ityatra ya ityekavacanamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4286: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' ityādau cābhede 'pi bhedopacārakleśo na bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4321: yathorṇanābhilālāpariṇāmā lūtātantavastatsarūpāḥ, tathā vivartā api vartamānasarūpā eva na virūpāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4323: na jātu rajjvāṃ kuñjara iti viparyasyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4325: tatkasya hetoḥ, atyantavairūpyāt. tasmātpradhānameva jaḍaṃ jaḍasya jagato yoniriti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4327: 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' iti cākṣarātparātparasyākhyānaṃ, 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4329: ato yaḥ pradhānātparaḥ paramātmā sa sarvavit /
GSP33vacbhamu:4334: tatkhalu jaḍamanirvācyamanirvācyasya jaḍasya prapañcasyopādānaṃ yujyate, sārūpyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4340: sati bādhake 'syānāśrayaṇaṃ, iha tu bādhakaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4342: iha tvavidyāśaktereva jagadyonitvasaṃbhave na dvārādvāribhāvo yayukta iti pradhānamevātra vākye jagadyonirucyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4343: atha yoniśabdo nimittakāraṇaparastathāpi brahmaiva nimittaṃ na tu jīvātmeti vinigamanāyāṃ na heturastīti saṃśayena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4345: yaḥ sarvajña iti śrutyā sarvajñasya sa ucyate //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4352: yattu sārūpyābāvānna cidātmanaḥ pariṇāmaḥ prapañca iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4357: na khalu bāhyasārūpyanibandhana eva sarvo vibhrama iti niyamanimittamasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4366: na kevalaṃ liṅgādapi tu 'parā vidyā' iti samākhyānādapyetadeva pratipattavyamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4371: avacchinno hi jīvātmā bogyebhyo viṣayebyo vyatirikta iti tajjñānena na sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4378: rūpyante 'neneti rūpaṃ, yajño rūpamupādhiryeṣāṃ te yajñarūpāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4380: ṛtuyajanenopādhinā ṛtvikśabdaḥ pravṛtta iti yajñopādhaya ṛtvijaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4383: ta ete 'ṣṭādaśa yajñarūpāḥ, yeṣvṛtvigādiṣūktaṃ karma yajñaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4397: kimāgamikaṃ sāṃkhyābhimataṃ pradhānaṃ, tathāca bahusamañjasaṃ syādityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4406: saṃnidheśca prakaraṇaṃ balīya iti jāyamānaparityāgena viśvayonereva prakaraṇino rūpābhidhānamiti cet na,
GSP33vacbhamu:4408: na caitāvatā mūrdhādiśrutayaḥ prakaraṇavirodhātsvārthatyāgena sarvātmatāmātraparā iti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:4410: siddhe ca prakaraṇināsaṃbandhe jāyamānamadhyapātitvaṃ jāyamānagrahaṇe kāraṇamupanyastaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4411: tasmāddhiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān prāṇātmanā sarvabhūtāntaraḥ kāryo nirdiśyata iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4419: ātmetyukte jīvātmani pratyayo mā bhūdata uktaṃ kiṃ brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4420: te ca mīmāṃsamānā niścayamanadhigacchantaḥ kaikeyarājaṃ vaiśvanaravidyāvidamupaseduḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4426: prāṇo vāyuḥ pṛthagvartmātmā pṛthak vartma yasya vāyoḥ sa pṛthagvartmā sa evātmā svabhāve yasya sa pṛthagvartmātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4427: saṃdeho dehasya madhyabhāgaḥ sa ākāśo bahulaḥ sarvagatatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4430: yato 'dbhyo 'nnamannācca rayirdhanaṃ tasmādāpo rayiruktāstāsāṃ ca mūtrībhūtānāṃ bastiḥ sthānamiti bastireva rayirityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4447_0: nanu 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma' ityupakrame ātmabrahmaśabdayoḥ paramātmani rūḍhatvena
GSP33vacbhamu:4447_1: taduparaktāyāṃ buddhau vaiśvānarāgnyādayaḥ śabdāstadanurodhena paramātmanyeva kathañcinnetuṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:4448: yadyapi ca vājasaneyināṃ vaiśvānaravidyopakrame 'vaiśvānaraṃ ha vai bhagavān saṃprati veda taṃ no brūhi' ityatra nātmaśabdau staḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4449: tathāpi tatsamānārthaṃ chāndogyavākyaṃ tadupakramamiti tena niścitārthena tadavirodhena vājasaneyivākyārtho niścīyata /
GSP33vacbhamu:4454: naca sarvapāpmapradāha iti pāriśeṣyātparamātmaiva vaiśvānara iti niścite kutaḥ punarityamāśaṅkā- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4458: api cāntaḥpratiṣṭhatatvaṃ ca prādeśamātratvaṃ ca na sarvavyāpino 'parimāṇasya ca parabrahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4464: athavā agniśarīrāyā devatāyā aiśvaryayogāt dyumūrdhatvādaya upapadyanta iti śahkiturabhisaṃdhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4472: tadupādhyupadeśena vā manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bārūpa itivadupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4473_1: pratyayasyāśrayāntare jāṭharavaiśvānarāhvaye kṣepeṇa vā jāṭhavaiśvānaropādhini vā
GSP33vacbhamu:4473_2: brahmaṇyupāsye vaiśvānaradharmāṇāṃ brahmadharmāṇāṃ ca samāveśa upapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4480: ata eṣa yatpuruṣa iti puruṣamanūdya na vaiśvānaro vidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4482: evaṃ ca parameśvaradṛṣṭirhi jāṭhare vaiśvānara ihopadaiśyata iti bhāṣyaṃ virudhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:4484: 'sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ puruṣaṃ puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda' iti vaiśvānarasya hi puruṣatvavedanamatrānūdyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:4486: tasmāt 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaro yat' iti yadaḥ pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4487: puruṣa iti tu tatra puruṣadṛṣṭerupadeśa iti yuktam //24 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4490: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:4492: 'yo bhānunā pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemām' iti mantravarṇo 'pi na kevalauṣṇyaprakāśavibhavamātrasya bhūtāgneramamīdṛśaṃ mahimānamāhaga,
GSP33vacbhamu:4528: ata eva hi śrutiḥ-'anena jīvenātmanā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4532: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakamīmaṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4543: ' pārāvāramathyapātī hi setuḥ tābhyāmavacchidyamāno jalavidhārako loke dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4545: haḍinigāḍādiṣvapi prayogaprasaṅgāt. na cānavacchinnaṃ brahma setubhāvamanubhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4555: tathāca pāravatyamṛtavyatirikte setāvanuśriyamāṇe pradhānaṃ vā sāṃkhyapārikalpitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:4556: tat khalu svakāryopahitamaryādatayā puruṣaṃ yāvadagacchadbhavatīti pāravat,
GSP33vacbhamu:4568: atha tu sākṣācchutyuktaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanamādriyame, tato vāyurevāstu /
GSP33vacbhamu:4569: 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāya ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4570: yadi punarasya dyubhvādyāyatanasya sārvajñyaśruteratrāpi na parituṣyami,
GSP33vacbhamu:4571: bhavatu tato hiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sūtrātmā dyubhvādyāyatanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4572: tasya hi kāryatvena pāravattvaṃ cāmṛtātparabrahmaṇo bhedaścetyādi sarvamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4573: ayamapi 'vāyunā vai gotama sūtreṇa' iti śrutimupanyasyatā sūcitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4579: ' nahi mṛddārumayo mūrtaḥ pārāvāramadhyavartī pāthasāṃ vidhārako lokasiddhaḥ setuḥ pradhānaṃ vāvyākṛtaṃ vā vāyurvā jīvo vā sūtrātmā vābhyupeyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4581: so 'smākaṃ pāravattāvarjaṃ vidharaṇatvamātreṇa yogamātrādrūḍhiṃ parityajya pravartsyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4588: tathā cāmṛtasyeti ca seturiti ca brahmaṇi dyubhvādyāyatane upapatsyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:4589: atra ca svaśabdāditi tantroccaritatamātmaśabdāditi ca sadāyatanā iti sacchabdāditi ca brahmaśabdāditi ca sūcayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4592: āyatanāyatanavbhāvaḥ sarvaṃ brahmeti ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhepyupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4593: tathāca sa evātrāstvamṛtatvasya seturityāśaṅkya śrutivākyena sāvadhāraṇenottaramāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4604: nātra dyubhvādyāyatanasya setunocyate yena pāravattā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4609: naca prādhānyādeṣa iti sarvanāmnā dyubhvādyāyatanamātmaiva parāmṛśyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:4619: brahmaṇaśca muktopasṛpyatvaṃ 'yadā sarve pramucyante' ityādau śrutyantare prasiddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:4626: yathā 'carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti' iti carmārthamiti gamyate /
