GSP33vacbhamu:5452: aṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityā indraśca prajāpatiśceti trayastriṃśaddevāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5453: tatrāgniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca dyauśca candramāśca nakṣatrāṇi ceti vasavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5454: ete hi prāṇināṃ karmaphalāśrayeṇa kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpeṇa pariṇamanto jagadidaṃ sarvaṃ vāsayanti, tasmādvasavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5455: katame rudrā iti daśeme puruṣe prāṇāḥ buddhikarmendriyāṇi daśa, ekādaśaṃ ca mana iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5457: te hi prāyaṇakāla utkrāmantaḥ puruṣaṃ rodayantīti rudrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5458: katama ādityā iti dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsarasyāvayavāḥ punaḥ punaḥ paruvartamānāḥ prāṇabhṛtāmāyūṃṣu ca karmaphalopabhogaṃ cādāpayantītyādityāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5464: yajñaḥ prajāpitirita, yajñasādhanaṃ ca yajñarūpaṃ ca paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5465: eta eva trayastriṃśaddevāḥ ṣaṇṇāmagniṣṭathivīvāṭvantarikṣādityadivāṃ mahimāno na tato bhidyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:5467: te tu ṣaḍagniṃ pṛthivīṃ caikūkṛtyāntarikṣaṃ vāyuṃ caikīkṛtya divaṃ cādityaṃ caikīkṛtya trayo lokāstraya eva devā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5468: eta eva ca trayo 'nnaprāṇayorantarbhavanto 'nnaprāṇau dvau devau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5471: kathamayameka evādhyardhaḥ, yadasminsati sarvamidamadhyardhaṃ vṛddhiṃ prāpnoti tenādhyardha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5472: katama eka iti, sa evādhyardhaḥ prāṇa eko brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:5473: sarvadevātmatvena bṛhattvādbrahma tadeva tyadityācakṣate parokṣābhidhāyakena śabdena /
GSP33vacbhamu:5479: na khalu bahuṣu śrāddheṣveko brāhmaṇo yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5482: yathaikaṃ brāhmaṇamuddiśya yugapannamaskāraḥ kriyate bahubhistathā svasthānasthitāmekāṃ devatāmuddiśya bahubhiryajamānairnānādeśāvasthitairyugapaddhavistyajyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:5488: gotvādivatpūrvāvamarśābhāvādupādherapyekasyāpratīteḥ pācakādivadākāśaṣādiśabdavadvyaktivacanā eva vasvādiśabdāḥ tasyāśca nityatvāttayā saha saṃbandho nityo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:5489: vigrahādiyoge tu sāvayavatvena vasvādīnāmanityatvāttataḥ pūrvaṃ vasvādiśabdo na svārthena saṃbaddha āsīn,
GSP33vacbhamu:5491: tataścotpanne vasvādau vasvādiśabdasaṃbandhaḥ prādurbhavandevadattādiśabdasaṃbandhavatpuruṣabuddhiprabhava iti tatpūrvako vākyārthapratyayo 'pi puruṣabuddhyadhīnaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5492: puruṣabuddhiśca mānāntarādhīnajanmeti mānāntarāpekṣayā prāmāṇyaṃ vedasya vyāhanyeteti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5496: vasutvādijātivācakācchabdāttajjātīyāṃ vyaktiṃ cikīrṣitāṃ buddhivāsikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5498: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi na śabda upādānakāmaṃ vasvādīnāṃ brahmopādānatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:5509: etaduktaṃ bhavati-svayaṃbhuvo vedakartṛtve 'pi na kālidāsādivatsvatantratvamapi tu pūrvasṛṣṭyanusāreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:5519: tatra na tāvadvasvādīnāṃ vakārādayo varṇā vācakāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5522: api caite pratyekaṃ vā vākyārthamabhidadhīran militā vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5527: teṣāmekavaktṛprayujyamānānaṃ rūpato vyaktito vā pratikṣaṇamapavargiṇāṃ mithaḥ sāhityasaṃbhavābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5529: naca svarūpasāhityābhāve 'pi varṇānāmāgneyādīnāmiva saṃskāradvārakamasti sāhityamiti sāṃprataṃ, vikalpāsahatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5545: nahi yaiva bahnerdahanaśaktiḥ saiva tasya prakāśanaśaktiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5546: nāpi dahanaśakteḥ prakāśanaśaktiḥ.apica vyutkrameṇoccaritebhyo varṇebhyaḥ saivāsti smṛtibījaṃ vāsanetyarthapratyayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:5558: na sphoṭa iti tu na mṛṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5563: na cāyamasīti bādhake ekapadavākyānubhavaḥ śakyo mithyetivaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:5565: upādhiḥ khalvekadhīgrāhyatā vā syāt, ekārthadhīhetutā vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5567: tathā sati dhavasvadirapalāśā iti na jātu syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5572_1: sa sphoṭa iti taṃ ca dhvanayaḥ pratyekaṃ vyañjayanto 'pi na drāgitveva viśadayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5574_1: carame cetasi cakāsti viśadaṃ padavākyatattvamiti prāganutpannāyāstadanantaramarthadhiya
GSP33vacbhamu:5578: pratyekamavyaktāmarthadhiyamādhāsyanti prāñco varṇāḥ, caramastu tatsacivaḥ sphuṭatarāmiti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5581: arthadhiyastvapratyakṣāyā mānāntarajanmano vyakta evopajano na vā syānna punarasphuṭa iti na samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5582: tasmānnityaḥ sphoṭa eva vācako na varṇā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5584: varṇā eva tu na śabda iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:5597: tatra kkacidvyabhicāradarśanena tadutprekṣāyāmucyate vṛddheḥ svataḥprāmāṇ.vādibhiḥ-'utprekṣeta hi yo mohādajñātamapi bādhanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5601: na cedaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ gatvādijātiviṣayaṃ na gādivyaktiviṣayaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5602: tāsāṃ pratinaraṃ bhedopalambhādata eva śabdabedopalambhādvāktṛbheda unnīyate 'somaśarmādhīte na viṣṇuśarmā' iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5604: yathā kālakṣīṃ ca svastimatīṃ cekṣamāṇasya vyaktibhedaprathāyāṃ satyāmeva tadanugatamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ prathate,
GSP33vacbhamu:5605: tathā kiṃ gakārādiṣu bhedena prathamāneṣveva gatvamekaṃ tadanugataṃ cakāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5606_1: mahadiva dīrghamiva vāmanamiva tathāgavyaktirājānata ekāpi vyañjakabhedāttadharmānupātinīva
GSP33vacbhamu:5607: tatra havyaktibhedamaṅgīkṛtyāpi yo gatvasyaikasya paropadhānabhedakalpanāprayāsaḥ sa varaṃ gavyaktāvevāstu kimantargaḍunā gatvenābhyupetena /
GSP33vacbhamu:5611: tathā sati daśa gakarānudacārayaccaitra iti hi pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5613: na caiṣa jātyabhiprāyo 'bhyāso yathā śatakṛtvastittirīnupāyuṅkta devadatta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5614: atra hi sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi gakārādivyaktau lokasyoccāraṇābhyāsapratyayasya vinirvṛttiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5621: na codāttādayo vyañjakadharmāḥ, na varṇadharmā iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5626: mā bhūvan ghrāṇarasanaśrotrāṇāṃ gandharasaśabdagocarāṇāṃ tadvantaḥ pṛthivyudakākāśā gocarāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5627: evaṃ ca mā nāma bhūdvāyugocaraṃ śrotram, tadguṇāṃstūdāttādīn gocarayiṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5629_0: naca śabdasya pratyabijñānāvadhṛtaikatvasya svarūpata udāttādayo dharmāḥ parasparavirodhino
GSP33vacbhamu:5631: na tu bhāviko nānādharmasaṃsarga iti sthite 'bhyupetya parihāramāha bhāṣyakāraḥ- #
GSP33vacbhamu:5638: na cāyamanirdhāritaviśeṣavarṇatvasāmānyamātrapratyayo na tu varṇātiriktadabhivyañjakadhvanipratyaya iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5643_0: śabdavñjakaḥ śrāvaṇo 'bhyupeyaḥ ubhayathāpi cākṣu vyañjaneṣu ca tattaddhvanibhedopadhānenānunāsikatvādayo
GSP33vacbhamu:5643_1: 'vagamyamānāstaddharmā eva śabde pratīyante na tu svataḥ śabdasya dharmāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5644: tathā ca yeṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmāḥ parasparaviruddhā bhāsante bhavatu teṣāṃ dhvanīnāmanityatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5646: yeṣu tu varṇeṣu pratyabhijñānaṃ na teṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmā iti nānityāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5651: yadyeṣa parasyāgraho dharmiṇyagṛhyamāṇe taddharmā na śakyā grahītumiti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5654: tadanena prabandhena kṣaṇikatvena varṇānāmaśakyasaṃgatigrahatayā yadavācakatvamāpāditaṃ varṇānāṃ tadapākṛtam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5665: yadi gakārādivilakṣaṇamavabhāsayet, gakārādirūṣitaḥ pratyayo na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5669: evaṃ ca kalpitā evāsya bhāgā varṇā iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:5672: hantāsyāṃ nānā varṇāḥ prathanta iti nānātvāvabhāsa ekaikatvaṃ kasmānna bādhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5674: no khalu senāvanabuddhī gajapadātituragādīnāṃ campakāśokakiṃśukādīnāṃ ca bhedamapabādhamāne udīyete,
GSP33vacbhamu:5683: na caikasmṛtisamārohiṇāṃ kramākramaviparītakramaprayuktānāmabhedo varṇānāmiti yathākathañcitprayuktebhya etebhyor'thapratyayaprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5684: uktaṃ hi-'yāvanto yādṛśā ye ca padārthapratipādane /
GSP33vacbhamu:5687: nanu paṅktibuddhāvekasyāmakramāyāmapi vāstavī śālādīnāmasti paṅgiriti tathaiva prathā yuktā,
GSP33vacbhamu:5688: naca tatheha varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ cāsti vāstavaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5693: tathāhi-jārārājeti padayoḥ prathayantyoḥ smṛtidhiyostattve 'pi varṇānāṃ kramabhedātpadabhedaḥ sphuṭataraṃ cakāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5701: santvanityā eva varṇāstathāpi gatvādyavacchedenaiva saṃgatigraho 'vanādiśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatītyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:5706: nanu prācyāmeva mīmāṃsāyāṃ vedasya nityatvaṃ siddhaṃ tatkiṃ punaḥ sādhyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:5707: svatantrasya karturasmaraṇādeva hi sthite vedasya nityatva iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:5709: tasmānnityo vedaḥ jagadutpattihetutvāt, īśvaravaditi siddhameva nityatvamanena dṛḍhīkṛtam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5718: niranvayasya tu jagataḥ pravilaye 'tyantāsataścāpūrvasyotpāde 'bhidhānābhidheyāvatyantamucchinnāviti kimāśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5721: antaḥkaraṇādyupādhikalpitā hi te tadvicchede na sthātumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5722: naca brahmaṇastadvāsanā, tasya vidyātmanaḥ śuddhasvabhāvasya tadayogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5723: brahmaṇaśca sṛṣṭyādāvantaḥkaraṇāni tadavacchinnāścha jīvāḥ prādurbhavanto napūrvakarmāvidyāvāsanāvanto bhavitumarhanti, apūrvatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5728_0: yadyapi mahāpralayasamaye nāntaḥkaraṇādayaḥ samudācaradvṛttayaḥ santi tathāpi svakāraṇe
GSP33vacbhamu:5728_1: 'nirvācyāyāmavidyāyāṃ līnāḥ sūkṣmeṇa śaktirūpeṇa karmavikṣepakāvidyāvāsanābhiḥ mahāvatiṣṭhanta eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:5732: te cāvadhaiṃ prāpya parameśvarecchāpracoditā yathā kūrmadehe nilīnānyaṅgāni tato niḥsaranti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5733: yathā vā varṣāpāye prāptamṛdbhāvāni maṇḍūkaśarīrāṇi tadvāsanāvāsitatayā ghanaghanāghanāsārāvasekasuhitāni punarmaṇḍūkadehabhāvamanubhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5737: naca sargapralayapravāhasyānāditāmantareṇaitadupapadyata iti sargapralayābyupagaṃme 'pi saṃsārānāditā na virudhyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5742: bhavatvanāditā saṃsārasya, tathāpi mahāpralayāntarite kutaḥ smaraṇaṃ vedānāmityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:5745: tathāpi karmavikṣepasaṃskārasahitalayalakṣaṇā vidyāvaśeṣatāsāmyena svāpapralayāvasthayārabheda iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5749: prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣayośca vāsanocchedakāraṇayorabhāvena satyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ smaraṇopapatteḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhavedavyahārānucchedo yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5751: prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣau ca tatra saṃskāramātrocchedahetū sta iti kutaḥ suṣuptavatpūrvaprabodhavyavahāravaduttaprabodhavyavahāra iti codayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:5761: tatra kaiva kathā parameśvarānugraheṇa dharmajñānavairāgyaiśvaryātiśayasaṃpannānāṃ hiraṇyagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mahādhiyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:5762: yathāvā ā ca manuṣyebhya ā ca kṛmibhyo jñānādīnāmanubhūyate nikarṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5763: evamā manuṣyebhya eva ā ca bhagavato hiraṇyagarbhajjñānādīnāṃ prakarṣe 'pi saṃbhāvte /
GSP33vacbhamu:5777: yathāvastusvabhāvasāmarthyaṃ hi sargaḥ pravartate, natu svabhāvasāmarthyamanyathayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5778: nahi jātu sukhaṃ tattvena jihāsyate, duḥkhaṃ copāditsyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5781: tathā sati vastusāmarthyaniyamābhāvātsarvaṃ sarvasmādbhavediti pipāsurapi dahanamāhṛtya pipāsāmupaśamayet,
GSP33vacbhamu:5784: evaṃ ya eva vedā asminkalpe ta eva kalpāntare, ta eva caiṣāmarthā ta eva ca varṇāśramāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5797: kiṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyā svaviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ kiṃvā kāsucideva keṣāñcit /
GSP33vacbhamu:5801: asau vā ādityo devamadhvityatra hi manuṣyā ādityaṃ madhvadhyāsenopāsīran# /
GSP33vacbhamu:5802: upāsyopāsakabhāvo hi bhedādhiṣṭhāno na svātmanyādityasya devatāyāḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5807: ayamarthaḥ-'asau vā ādityo devamadhu' iti devānāṃ modahetutvānmadhviva madhu /
GSP33vacbhamu:5812_0: yathā hi bhramarāḥ puṣpebhya āhṛtya makarandaṃ svasthānamānayantyevamṛṅmantrabhramarāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:5814_1: āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ yajurvedamantrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5816_1: āhṛtyau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ sāmamantrastotrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5818: athāsyādityamadhuna udīcibhiratikṛṣṇābhī raśmināḍībhirathavedavihitebhyaḥ karmakusumebhya āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhavamāpannamatharvāṅgirasamantrabhramarāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5820: aśvamedhe vācaḥ stome ca pāriplavaṃ śaṃsanti iti śravaṇāditihāsapurāṇamantrāṇāmapyasti prayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5822: athāsya yā ādityamadhuna ūrdhvā raśmināḍyo gopyāstābhirupāsanabhramarāḥ praṇavakusumādāhṛtyādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5824: tā etā ādityavyapāśrayāḥ pañca rohitādayo raśmināḍya ṛgādisaṃbaddhāḥ krameṇopadiśyeti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5825: etadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvopalabhya yathāsvaṃ samastaijha karaṇairyaśastejahandriyasākalyavīryānnādyānyamṛtaṃ tadupalabhyāditye tṛpyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5826: tena khalvamṛtena devānāṃ vasvādīnāṃ modanaṃ vidadhadādityo madhu /
GSP33vacbhamu:5831: ākāśasya hi sarvagatatvaṃ rūpādihīnatve ca brahmaṇā sārūpyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5832: tasya caitasyākāśasya brahmaṇaścatvāraḥ pādā agnyādayaḥ 'agniḥ pādaḥ' ityādinā darśitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5833: yathā hi goḥ pādā na gavā viyujyatanta, evamagnyādayo 'pi nākāśena sarvagatenetyākāśasya pādāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5834: tadevamākāśasya catuṣpado brahmadṛṣṭiṃ vidhāya svarūpeṇa vāyuṃ saṃvargaguṇakamupāsyaṃ vidhātuṃ mahīkaroti-vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5839: yadyucyeta nāviśeṣaṇa sarveṣāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyāsvadhikāraḥ, kintu yathāsaṃbhavamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5848: tatra 'jagṛbhmāte dakṣiṇamindrahasatam' iti ca, 'kāśirindra it' iti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:5851: indro vṛtrāṇi jighrate' iti vigrahavattvaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādā abhivadanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5852: tathā havirbhojanaṃ devatāyā darśayanti 'addhīndra piba caprasthitasya' ityādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5853: yatheśanam-'indro diva indra īśe pṛthivyā indro apāmindra itparvatānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:5854: indro vṛdhāmindra inmedhirāṇāmindraḥ kṣeme yoge havya indraḥ' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5856: tathā varivasitāraṃ prati devatāyāḥ prasādaṃ prasannāyāśca phaladānāṃ darśayati-'āhutibhireva devān hutādaḥ prīṇāti tasmai prītā iṣamūrjaṃ ca yacchanti' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5860: laukikā api devatāvigrahādipañcakaṃ smaranti coparacaranti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:5861: tathāhi-yamaṃ daṇḍahastamālikhanti, ruṇaṃ pāśahastam, indraṃ vajrahastam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5864: tathāsyāḥ prasādaṃ ca prasannāyāśca phaladānamāhuḥ-prasanno 'sya paśupatiḥ putro 'sya jātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5873: na cetihāsādi mūlaṃ bhavitumarhati, tasyāpi pauriṣeyatvena pratyakṣādyapekṣaṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5878: vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāpadyamānā arthavādā vidhiviṣayaprāśastyalakṣaṇāparā na svārthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5879: 'yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ' iti hi śābdanyāyavidaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5883: yatra tu na pramāṇāntaramasti, yathā vigrahādipañcake, sor'thaḥ śabdādevāvagantavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5886: na caikaṃ vākyamubhayaparaṃ bhavatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:5889_1: kathamupayujyantāṃ teṣa teṣu karmasvityapekṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭe prakāre saṃbhavati nādṛṣṭakalpanocitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5890: dṛṣṭaśca prakāraḥ prayogasamavetārthasmāraṇaṃ, smṛtvā cānutiṣṭhanti khalvanuṣṭhātāraḥ padārthān /
GSP33vacbhamu:5891: autsargikī cārthaparatā padānamityapekṣitaprayogasamavetārthasmaraṇatātparyāṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ nānadhigate vigrahādāvapi tātparyaṃ yujyata iti na tebhyo 'pi tatsiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5909: nahi śvitrinirṇejanaparaṃ śveto dhāvatīti vākyamitaḥ sārameyagamanaṃ gamayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5913: nahyudakāharaṇārthinā ghaṭadarśanāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣurghaṭapaṭau vā paṭaṃ vā kevalaṃ nopalabhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5916: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-loke viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanāya padāni prayuktāni tadantareṇa na svārthamātrasmāraṇe paryavasyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5917: nahi svārthasmāraṇamātrāya loke padānāṃ prayogo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5919: na caitānyasmāritasvārthāni sākṣādvākyārthaṃ pratyāyayitumīśate iti svārthasmāraṇaṃ vākyārthamitathe 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ kalpitaḥ padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:5920: naca yadarthaṃ yattattena vinā paryavasyatīti na svārthamātrabhidhāne paryavasānaṃ padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:5929_0: yatra tu vākyasyaikasya vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhastatra lokānusārato bhūtārthavyutpattau
GSP33vacbhamu:5930: yathā 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta' ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:5931: iha hi yadi na svādhyāyādhyāyanavidhiḥ svādhyāyaśabdavācyaṃ vedarāśiṃ puruṣārthatāmaneṣyattato bhūtārthamātraparyavasitā nārthavādā vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāgamiṣyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5932: tasmāt svādhyāyavidhivaśātkaimarthyākāṅkṣāyāṃ vṛttāntadigocarāḥ santastatpratyāyanadvāreṇa vidheyaprāśastyaṃ lakṣayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:5936: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārthasaṃbaddhabheva tīraṃ lakṣayati na tu samudratīraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5940: ata eva yatra pramāṇāntaraviruddhārtā arthavādā dṛśyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:5945: tasmādyatra sor'thorthavādānāṃ pramāṇāntaraviruddhastatra guṇavādena prāśastyalakṣaṇeti lakṣitalakṣaṇā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5946: yatra tu pramāṇāntarasaṃvādastatra pramāṇāntarādivārthavādādapi sor'thaḥ prasidhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:5949: pramātā hyavyutpannaḥ prathamaṃ yathā pratyakṣādibhyor'thamavagacchati na tathāmnāyataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5956: atrocyate-lokānusārato dvividho hi viṣayaḥ śabdānām, dvārataśca tātparyataśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:5957: yathaikasminvākye padānāṃ padārthā dvārato vākyārthaśca tātparyato viṣayaḥ evaṃ vākyadvayaikavākyatāyāmapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5962: yathā viṣaṃ bhakṣayeti vākyaṃ mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti vākyāntarārthaparaṃ sat /
GSP33vacbhamu:5963: yatra tu tātparyaṃ tatra mānāntaravirodhe pauruṣeyapramāṇameva bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5968: tatra dvārato 'pi viṣayaḥ pratīyamāno na śakyastyaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:5969: naca guṇavādena netuṃ, ko hi mukhye saṃbhavati gauṇamātrayodatiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5970: tathā satyanadhigataṃ vigrahādi pratipādayam vākyaṃ bhidyeteti cet addhā /
GSP33vacbhamu:5975: naca yasya yatra na tātparyaṃ tasya tatrāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5977: sati viśiṣṭaparaṃ vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇeṣvapramāṇamiti viśiṣṭaparamapi na syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:5981: tasmādviśiṣṭapratyayaparebhyo 'pi viśeṣaṇāni pratīyamānāni tasyaiva vākyasya viṣayatvenānicchatāpyabhyupeyāni yathā,
GSP33vacbhamu:5982: tadyānyaparebhyo 'pyarthavādavākyebhyo devatāvigrahādayaḥ pratīyamānā asati pramāṇāntaravirodhe na yuktāstyaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:5987: tātparyaikye 'pi yadi vākyabhedaḥ, kathaṃ tarhyarthaikatvādekaṃ vākyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:5990: sa tu padārthāntaraviśiṣṭaḥ padārtha ekaḥ kkacid dvārabhūtaḥ kkacid dvārītyetāvān viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5991: nanvevaṃ sati odanaṃ bhuktvā grāmaṃ gacchatītyatrāpi vākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5992: anyo hi saṃsargaḥ odanaṃ bhuktveti, anyastu grāmaṃ gacchatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5995: bhuktveti hi samānakartṛkatā pūrvakālatā ca pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:5997: tasmādyāvati padābhyāṃ viśiṣṭārthapratyayaparyavasānāt pañcaṣaṭpadavati vākye ekasminnānātvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6001: tasmādvidhivākyādarthavādavākyamanyaditi vākyayoreva svasvavākyārthapratyayāvasitavyāpārayoḥ paścātkutaścidapekṣāyāṃ parasparānvaya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:6004: devatāmuddiśya haviravamṛśya ca tadviṣayasvatvatyāga iti yāgaśarīram /
GSP33vacbhamu:6006: naca rūparahitā cetasi śakyata ālekhitumiti yāgavidhinaiva tadrūpāpekṣimā yādṛśamanyaparebhyo 'pi mantrārthavādebhyastadrūpamavagataṃ tadabhyupeyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6009: yathā hi 'vrātyo vrātyastomena yajate' iti vrātyasvarūpāpekṣāyāṃ yasya pitā pitāmaho vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti vidhināpekṣitaṃ sadarthavādato 'vagamyamānaṃ vidhipramāṇakam,
GSP33vacbhamu:6012: devatāyāḥ samāropeṇāpi ca rūpajñānamupapadyata iti samāropitameva rūpaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādairucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6015: tasya tu rūpasyāsati bādhake 'nubhāvarūḍhaṃ tathābhāvaṃ parityajyānyathātvamananubhūyamānamasāṃprataṃ kalpiyatum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6024: api tu itihāsapurāṇalokasmaraṇebhyo mantrārthavādamūlebhyo vā pratyakṣādamūlebhyo vetyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6028: tadevaṃ mantrārthavādādisiddhe devatāvigrahādau gurvādipūjāvaddevatāpūjātmako yāmo devatāprasādādidvāreṇa saphalo 'vakalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6030: na caivaṃ yajñakarmaṇo devatāṃ prati guṇabhāvāddevatātaḥ phalotpāde yāgabhāvanāyāḥ śrutaṃ phalavattvaṃ yāgasya ca tāṃ prati tatphalāṃśaṃ vā prati śrutaṃ karaṇatvaṃ hātavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6034: tasmātkarmaṇo 'pūrvāvāntaravyāpārasya vā devatāprasādāvāntaravyāpārasya vā phalavattvāt pradhānatvamubhayasminnapi pakṣe samānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6035: natu devatāyā vigrahādimatyāḥ prādhānyamiti na dharmamīmāṃsāyāḥ sūtram-'api vā śabdapūrvatvādyajñakarma pradhānaṃ guṇatve devatāśrutiḥ' iti virudhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6044: nirmṛṣṭanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅge śāśvatika ānande kasya nāma cetanasyārthitā nāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6047: dvividhaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ nijaṃ cāgantukaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:6055: naca tathā brahmavidyāyāmalaukikamasti sādhanaṃ yacchūdrasya na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6059: tadadhyayanaṃ puruṣārthe vā niyamyet, yathā dhanārjane pratigrahādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:6062: nahi 'svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ' iti kañcit kratuṃ prakṛtya paṭhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6066: nahi yathā juhvādi avyabhicaritakratusaṃbaddhamevaṃ svādhyāya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6075: na cādhyayanaṃ vā svādhyāyo vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā prāgvidheḥ puruṣecchādhīnapravṛttiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6080: tathā cādhyayanavidheraniyāmakatvācchūdrasyādhyayanena vā pustakādipāṭhena vā sāmarthyamastīti so 'pi brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6081: mā bhūdvādhyayanābhāvātsarvatra brahmavidyāyāmadhikāraḥ, saṃvargavidyāyāṃ tu bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6082: 'aha hāretvā śūdra' iti śūdraṃ saṃbodhya tasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6085: tasmādyathānadhīyānasyeṣṭau niṣādasthapateradhikāro vacanasāmarthyādevaṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śūdrasyādhikāro bhaviṣyatīti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6092: suvarṇaṃ bhāryamitivadārthavādikaṃ vā phalaṃ kalpayitvā viniyogabhaṅgena svādhyāyenādhīyītetyevamarthaḥ kalpatāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6094: na dṛṣṭadvāreṇa paramparayāpyanyato 'pekṣitapratilambhe ca yathāśrutiviniyogopapattau ca saṃbhavantyāṃ śrutiviniyogabhaṅgenādhyayanādevāśrutādṛṣṭaphalakalpanocitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6098: natu suvarṇadhāraṇādau dṛṣṭadvāreṇa kiñcit paramparayāpyastyapekṣitaṃ puruṣasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:6100_1: iti sthāpitaṃ tadā yasyādhyayanaṃ tasyaiva karmabrahmāvabodho 'bhyudayaniḥśreyasaprayojano nānyasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:6102_1: śūdrāṇāṃ na phalāya kalpata iti śāstrīyasāmarthyābhāvānna śūdro brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyata iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:6118: sa cānyataḥ siddhamarthamavadyotayati na tu prāpayatītyadhvaramīmāṃsakāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6119: asmākaṃ tu anyaparādapi vākyādasati bādhake pramāṇāntareṇārtho 'vagamyamāno vidhinā cāpekṣitaḥ svīkriyata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:6122: vidhyuddeśagatatve tvayaṃ nyāyo 'podyate vacanabalanniṣādasthapativanna tveṣa vidhyuddeśagata ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6124: apica kimarthavādabalādvidyāmātre 'dhikāraḥ śūdrasya kalpate saṃvargavidyāyāṃ vā na tāvadvidyāmātra ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6127: astu tarhi saṃvargavidyāyāmeva śūdrasyādhikāra ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6129: tatkimetacchūdrapadaṃ pramattagītaṃ, na caityadyuktaṃ, tulyaṃ hi sāṃpradāyikamityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6131: evaṃ kilātropākhyāyate-jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇo bahudāyī śraddhādeyo bahupākyaḥ priyātithirbabhūva /
GSP33vacbhamu:6132: sa ca teṣu teṣu grāmanagaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vividhānāmannapānānāṃ pūrṇānatithibhya āvasathān karayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6134: athāsya rājño dānaśauṇḍasya guṇagārimasotaṣitāḥ santo devarṣayo haṃsarūpamāsthāya tadanugrahāya tasya nidāghasamaye doṣā harmyatalasthasyopari mālāmābadhyājagmuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6135: teṣāmagresaraṃ haṃsaṃ saṃbodhya pṛṣṭhataḥ patannekatamo haṃsaḥ sādbhutamabhyuvāda /
GSP33vacbhamu:6136: bho bho bhallākṣa jānaśruterasya pautrāyaṇasya dyuniśaṃ dyuloka āyataṃ jyotistinmā prasāṅkṣīrmaitattvā dhākṣīditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:6142: yasmādayaṃ varākastasmātkamenaṃ kiṃbhūtametaṃ santaṃ prāṇimātraṃ jānaśrutimāttha /
GSP33vacbhamu:6144_0: tasya hi bhagavataḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtasya raikkasya brahmavido dharme trailokyodaravartiprāṇabhṛnmātradharmo
GSP33vacbhamu:6145_1: jānaśrutiḥ kitava ivākṣaparājitaḥ paunaḥpunyena niḥśvasannudvelaṃ kathaṃ kathamapi
GSP33vacbhamu:6146: tato niśāvasānapiśunamanibhṛtavandāruvṛndaprārabdhastutisahasrasaṃvalitaṃ maṅgalatūryanirdhoṣamākarṇya talpatalastha eva rājā ekapade yantānaramāhūyādideśa,
GSP33vacbhamu:6148: raikkāhvayaṃ brahmavidamekaratiṃ sayugvānamativivikteṣu teṣu teṣu vepinanaganikuñjanadīpulinādipradeśeṣvanviṣya prayatnato 'smabhyamācakṣveti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6149: sa ca tatra tatrānviṣyan kkacidativivekte dese śakaṭasyādhastāt pāmānaṃ kaṇḍūyamānaṃ brāhmaṇāyanamadrākṣīt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6150: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā raikko 'yaṃ bhaviteti pratibhāvānupaviśya savinayamaprākṣīt,
GSP33vacbhamu:6153: tasya ca raikkabhāvānumatiṃ ca taistairiṅgitairgārhasthyecchāṃ dhanāyāṃ connīya yantā rājñe nivedayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6154: rājā tu taṃ niśamya gavāṃ ṣaṭśatāni niṣkaṃ ca hāraṃ cāśvatarīrathaṃ cādāya satvaraṃ raikkaṃ praticakrame /
GSP33vacbhamu:6160: tamevamuktavantaṃ prati sāṭopaṃ ca saspṛhaṃ covāca raikkaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6161: aha hāretvā śūdra, tavaiva saha gobhirastviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6163: hāreṇa yuktā itvā gantrī ratho hāretvā sa gobhiḥ saha tavaivāstu,
GSP33vacbhamu:6164: kimetanmātreṇa mama dhanenākalpavartino gārhasthyasya nirvāhānupayogineti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6165: āharetveti tu pāṭhonarthakatayā ca gobhiḥ sahetyatra pratisaṃbandhyanupādānena cācāryairdūṣitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6166: tadasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ śakyaḥ śūdraśabdena jānaśrutī rājanyo 'pyavayavavyutpattyā vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6167: sa hi raikkaḥ parokṣajñatāṃ cikhyāpayiṣurātmano jānaśruteḥ śūdreti śucaṃ sūcayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6168: kathaṃ punaḥ śūdraśabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6176: tasmāttadādravaṇāditi tacchabdena śugvā jānaśrutirvā raikko vā parāmṛśyata ityuktam //34 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6180: itaśca na jātiśūdro jānaśrutiḥ yatkāraṇaṃ#prakaraṇanirūpeṇa kriyamāṇe kṣatriyatvamasya jānaśruteravagamyate caijñarathena liṅgāditi vyācakṣāṇaḥ prakaraṇaṃ nirūpayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6182: caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā niścitakṣātriyatvena samānāyāṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ samabhivyāhārālliṅgātsaṃdigdhakṣatriyabāvo jānaśrutiḥ kṣatriyo niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6183: 'atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyamabhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe' iti prasiddhayājakatvena kāpeyenābhiprayāriṇo yogaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6191: etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayanniti#chandogānāṃ dvirātre śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6193: eṣa cābhipratāri citrarathādanyaḥ sanneva kāpeyānāṃ rājyo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6194: yadi caitrarathiḥ syāt samānānvayānāṃ hi prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6199: kṣattṛpreṣaṇe cārthasaṃbhave ca tādṛśasya vadānyapraṣṭhasyaiśvaryaṃ prāyeṇa kṣatriyasya dṛṣṭaṃ yudhiṣṭhirādivaditi //35 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6203: na kevalamupanītādhyayanavidhiparāmarśena na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ kintu teṣu teṣu vidyopadeśeṣūpanayanasaṃskāraparāmarśāt śūdrasya tadabhāvābhidhānādbrahmavidyāyāmanadhikāra iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6208: tacca dvijātīnāmiti dvijātaya eva niṣiddhopanayanā adhikriyante na śūdra iti //36 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6212: satyakāmo ha vai jābālaḥ pramītapitṛkaḥ svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāṃ prapaccha,
GSP33vacbhamu:6213: ahamācāryakule brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyāmī, tadbravītu bhavatī kiṅgotro 'hamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6218: sa hovāc, nāvijñātagotra upanīyata iti kiṅgotro 'sīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6219: athovāca satyakāmo nāhaṃ veda svaṃ gotraṃ, svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāmapṛcchaṃ, sāpi na vedeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6222: tenāsminna śūdratvasaṃbhāvanāstīti tvāṃ dvijātijanmānamupaneṣya ityupanetamanuśāsituṃ ca jābālaṃ gautamaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6234: prāṇavajraśrutihalādvākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca bhaṅktvā vāyuḥ pañcavṛttirādhyātmiko bāhyaścātra pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6237: vāyureva hi vāhyo dhūmajyotiḥsalilasaṃvalitaḥ parjanyabhāvena pariṇato vidyutstanayitnuvṛṣṭyaśanibhāvena vivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6238: yadyapi ca sarvaṃ jagaditi savāyukaṃ pratīyate tathāpi sarvaśabda āpekṣiko 'pi na svābhidheyaṃ jahāti kintu saṃkucadvṛttirbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6241: amṛtaśabdo 'pi maraṇābhāvavacano na sārvakālikaṃ tadabhāvaṃ brūte, jyotirjīvitayāpi tadupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6246: savāyukasya jagataḥ kampanāt, paramātmaiva śabdātpramita iti maṇḍūkaplutyānuṣajjate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6247: brahmaṇonahi bibhdetajjagatkṛtnnaṃ svavyāpāre niyamena pravartate na tu maryādāmativartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6256: yatkhalu pṛṣṭaṃ tadeva pradhānaṃ prativaktavyamiti tasya prakaraṇam /

GSP33vacbhamu:6304: iha tvapakṛṣṭasyārcirādimārgopadeśe phalasyopāyamārgapratipādake 'tiviśade 'eṣa saṃprasādaḥ' iti vākyasyāviśadaikadeśamātrapratipādakasya niṣprayojanatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6305: naca dvadaśāhīnasyetivadyathoktātmadhyānasādhanānuṣṭhānaṃ stotumeṣa saṃprasāda iti vacamarcirādimārgamanuvadatīti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:6312: iha tu svārthasaṃsargatātparye noktadoṣaprasaṅga iti paurvāparyālocanayā prakaraṇānurodhādrūḍhimapi pūrvakālatāmapi parityajya prakaraṇānuguṇyena jyotiḥ paraṃ brahma pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6315: naca kramamuktyabhiprāyaṃ svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vacanam /

GSP33vacbhamu:6322: tasmānna jyotirādityamupasaṃpadya saṃprasādasya jīvasya svena rūpeṇa pāramārthikena brahmaṇābhiniṣpattirāñjasīti śruteratrāpi kleśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6323: apica paraṃ jyotiḥ sa uttamapuruṣa itihaivopariṣṭādviśeṣaṇāttejaso vyāvartya puruṣaviṣayatvenāvasthāpanājjyotiḥpadasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:6324: parameva brahma jyotiḥ na tu teja iti siddham //40 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6330: nāmarūpe antarā brahmeti ca nākāśasya nāmarūpayornirvahiturantarālatvamāha,
GSP33vacbhamu:6334: na tu nirvoḍaiva brahma, antarālaṃ vā nirvāḍhṛ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6339: bhūtākāśaṃ ca vikāratvena nāmarūpāntaḥpāti sat kathamātmānamudvahet /
GSP33vacbhamu:6340: nahi suśikṣito 'pi vijñānī svena skandhenātmānaṃ voḍhumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6341: naca nāmarūpaśrutiraviśeṣataḥ pravṛttā bhūtākāśavarjaṃ nāmarūpāntare saṃkocayituṃ sati saṃbhave yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6342_0: naca nirvāhakatvaṃ niraṅkuśamavagataṃ brahmaliṅgaṃ kathañcitkleśena paratantre netumucitam
GSP33vacbhamu:6342_1: 'anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi' iti ca sraṣṭṛtvamatisphuṭaṃ brahmaliṅgamatra pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6343: brahmarūpatayā ca jīvasya vyākartṛtve brahmaṇa eva vyākartṛtvamuktam /

GSP33vacbhamu:6354: tameva ca 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' ityādiśrutisaṃdarbha ādimadhyāvasāneṣvāmṛśatīti tadanuvādaparo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6357: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kaścidatra nityaśuddhabuddhamuktatvabhāvaḥ pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6358: yattu suṣuptyutkrāntyoḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta iti bhedaṃ manyase,
GSP33vacbhamu:6360: tena suṣuptyutkrāntyavasthāyāṃ viśeṣaviṣayābhāvātsaṃpiṇḍitaprajñeva prājñenātmanā svabhāvenā pariṣvakto na kiñcidvedetyabhede 'pi bhedavadupacāreṇa yojanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6362: patyādayaśca śabdāḥ saṃsāriṇyeva kāryakaraṇasaṃghātātmakasya jagato jīvakarmārjitatayā tadbhogyatayā ca yojanīyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6363: tasmātsaṃsāryevānūdyate na tu paramātmā pratipadyata iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6369: tatpratipādakā hi śataśa āgamāḥ 'īkṣaternāśabdam' 'gatisāmānyāt' ityādibiḥ sūtrasaṃdarbhairupapāditāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6371: naca prājñasya paramātmano jīvādbhedena saṃkīrtanaṃ sati saṃbhave rāhoḥ śira itivadaupacārikaṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6372: naca prājñaśabdaḥ prajñāprakarṣaśālini nirūḍhavṛttiḥ kathañcidajñaviṣayo vyākhyātumucitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6375: tasmātsuṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena jīvātprājñasya paramātmano vyapadeśāt 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ' ityādinā jīvātmānaṃ lokasiddhamanūdya tasya paramātmabhāvo 'nanadhigataḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6377: anadhigatārthāvabodhanaparaṃ hi śābdaṃ pramāṇaṃ, na tvanuvādamātraniṣṭhaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6379: evaṃ ca mahattvaṃ cājatvaṃ ca sarvagatasya nityasyātmanaḥ saṃbhavānnāpekṣikaṃ kalpayiṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6389: vaśaḥ sāmarthyaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ prabhavatyayam, vyūhāvasthānasamartha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6390: ata eva sarvasyeśānaḥ, sāmarthyena hyayamuktena sarvasyeṣṭe, tadicchānuvidhānājjagataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6393: kiñca sa evaṃbhūto hyadyantarjyotiḥ puruṣo vijñānamayo na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānutkṛṣṭo bhavatītyevamādyāḥ śrutayo 'saṃsāriṇaṃ paramātmānameva pratipādayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6394: tasmājjīvātmānaṃ mānāntarasiddhamanūdya tasya brahmabhāvapratipādanaparo 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ' ityādivākyasaṃdarbha iti siddham //43 //

GSP33vacbhamu:6411: naca 'mahataḥ paramavyaktam' ityādīnāṃ pradhāne samanvaye 'pi vyabhāciraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6412: nahyete pradhānakāraṇatvaṃ jagata āhuḥ, apitu pradhānasadbhāvamātram /

GSP33vacbhamu:6484: yathā hi samāropitaṃ pratibimbaṃ bimbānna vastuto bhidyate tathā na paramātmano vijñānātmā vastuto bhidyata iti paramātmaiva rathavānihopāttastena rathamātraṃ parisiṣṭamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6485: atha rathādirūpakakalpanāyāḥ śarīrādiṣu kiṃ prayojanamityata āha #

GSP33vacbhamu:6521: tadvināśe vā samastasaṃsārocchedaḥ tanmūlavidyāśakteḥ samucchedādityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6530: tena yasyaiva jīvasya vidyotpannā tasyaivāvidyāpanīyate na jīvāntarasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:6534: pradhānasyaikatvena taducchede sarvocchedo 'nucchede vā na kasyacidityanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ. pradhānabhede 'pi caitadavivekakhyātilakṣaṇāvidyāsadasattvanibandhanau bandhamokṣau,
GSP33vacbhamu:6537: na cāvidyopādhibhedādhīno jīvabhedo jīvabhedādhīnaścāvidyopādhibheda iti parasparāśrayādubhayāsiddhiriti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6542: nahyacetanaṃ caitanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ kāryāya paryāptamiti svakāryaṃ kartuṃ parameśvaraṃ nimittatayopādānatayā vāśrayate,

GSP33vacbhamu:6551: jīvānāṃ svarūpaṃ vāstavaṃ brahma, tadbodharahitāḥ śerata iti laya uktaḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:6580: natu ṣāṭkauśikasya sthūlasyaṣa etaddhi dṛṣṭabībhatsatayā sukaraṃ vairāgyaviṣayatvena śodhayitumityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6584: viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamavagamayituṃ paraṃ paramatra pratipādyatvena prastutaṃ na tu vairāgyāya śodhanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6593: sāṃkhyaiḥ khalu pradhānādvivekena puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasāya jñātuṃ vā vibhūtyai vā pradhānaṃ jñeyatvenopakṣipyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6594: na ceha jānīyāditi copāsīteti vā vidhivibhaktiśrutirasti, api tvavyaktapadamātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:6603: varapradānopakramā hi mṛtyunaciketaḥ saṃvādavākyapravṛttirāmāpteḥ kaṭhavallīnāṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6604: mṛtyuḥ kila na ciketase kupitena pitrā prahitāya tuṣṭastrīnvarān pradadau /
GSP33vacbhamu:6605: naciketāstu pathamena vareṇa pituḥ saumanasyaṃ vavre, dvitīyenāgnividyām, tṛtīyenātmavidyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:6607: nanu tatra varapradāne pradhānagocare staḥ praśnapartivacane /
GSP33vacbhamu:6610: 'hantaḥ ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam' ityanena vyavahitaṃ jīvaviṣayaṃ 'yathā tu maraṇaṃ prāpyātmā bhavati gautama' ityādiprativacanamiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6612: kiṃ vānyo jīvasya 'yeyaṃ prete' manuṣya iti praśāntaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6617: varapradānānantarbhāve praśnasya tadvat pradhānākhyānamapyanantarbhūtaṃ varapradāne 'stu 'mahataḥ paramavyakta'mityākṣepaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6623: vāstavaśca jīvaparamātmanorabhedastatra tatra śrutyupanyāsena bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6625_0: 'yeyaṃ prete' iti hi naciketasaḥ praśnamupaśrutya tattatkāmaviṣayamalobhaṃ cāsya
GSP33vacbhamu:6625_1: pratītya mṛtyuḥ 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye' ityādinā naciketasaṃ praśasya
GSP33vacbhamu:6630: apica yadviṣayaṃ praśnamupaśrutya mṛtyunaiṣa praśaṃsito naciketāḥ yadi tameva bhūyaḥ pṛcchettaduttare cāvadadhyāt tataḥ praśaṃsā dṛṣṭārthā syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:6640: puruṣārthakriyākṣamaṃ sattasya bhāvaḥ sattā tanmātraṃ mahattattvamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6641: yā yā puruṣārthakriyā śabdādyupabhogalakṣaṇā ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātilakṣaṇā ca sā sarvā mahati buddhau samāpyata iti mahattattvaṃ sattāmātramucyata iti //7 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6645: ajāśabdo yadyapi chāgāyāṃ rūḍhastathāpyadhyātmavidyādhikārānna tatra kartitumarhati /

GSP33vacbhamu:6648: tathāhi-yādṛśaṃ pradhānaṃ sāṃkhyaiḥ smaryate tādṛśamevāsminnanyūnānatiriktaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6649: sā hi pradhānalakṣaṇā prakṛtirna jāyata ityajā ca ekā ca lohitaśuklakṛṣṇā ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:6650: yadyapi lohitatvādayo varṇā na rajaḥprabhṛtiṣu santi, tathāpi lohitaṃ kusumbhādi rañjayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:6652: evaṃ prasannaṃ pāthaḥ śuklaṃ, sattvamapi prasannamiti śuklam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6656: kāryasārūpeṇa vā kāraṇe kalpanīyaṃ, tadasmākamapi tulyam /

GSP33vacbhamu:6662: avayavāḥ pradhānasmaikasya sattvarajastamāṃsi teṣāṃ dharmā lohitatvādayastairiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6666: tathāhi-maitradāreṣu narmadāyāṃ maitrasya sukhaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ, taṃ prati sattvasya samudbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6677: viṣayā hi śabdādayaḥ prakṛtivikārastraiguṇyena sukhaduḥkhamohātmāna indriyamano 'haṅkārapraṇālikayā buddhisattvamupasaṃkrāmanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6678: tena tadbuddhisattvaṃ pradhānavikāraḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ śabdādirūpeṇa pariṇamate /

GSP33vacbhamu:6691_0: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-na tāvat 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogamajo

GSP33vacbhamu:7068: yadapi ca dvāsaptatisahasrahitābhidhānāḍīsaṃcāreṇa suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ purītadavasthānamuktaṃ tadapyantaḥkaraṇasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:7071: tatra mandadhiyāṃ nedaṃ prāṇanirākaraṇāyeti buddhirmā bhūdityāśayavānāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7083_1: maitraiṭyā bhāryāyāḥ kātyāyanyā sahārthasaṃvibhāgakaraṇa ukte maitreyī yājñavalkyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7084: yannu ma iyaṃ bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthvī vittena pūrṇā syātkimahaṃ tanāmṛtā syāmuta neti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7086: yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syādamṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti vittena /
GSP33vacbhamu:7087: evaṃ vittenāmṛtatvāśā bhavedyadi vittasādhyāni karmāṇyamṛtatve upayujyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:7089: jñānasādhyatvādamṛtatvasya karmaṇāṃ ca jñānavirodhināṃ tatsahabhāvitvānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7090: sā hovāca maitreyī yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tenaṃ kuryāṃ yadeva bhagavān veda tadeva me brūhi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7092_1: patijāyādiṣu vairāgyamutpādayituṃ yājñavalkyo 'na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya' ityādivākyasaṃdarbhamuvāca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7093: ātmaipādhikaṃ hi priyatvameṣāṃ na tu sākṣāt priyāṇyetāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:7094: tasmādetebhyaḥ patijāyādibhyo viramya yatra sākṣātprema sa eva #
GSP33vacbhamu:7095: ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ# /
GSP33vacbhamu:7097: vā are darśanena śravaṇādisādhanenedaṃ jagatsarvaṃ viditaṃ bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7098: yato nāmarūpātmakasya jagatastattvaṃ pāramārthikaṃ rūpamātmaiva bhujaṅgasyeva samāropitasya tattvaṃ rajjuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7099: tasmādātmani vidite sarvamidaṃ jagattattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7100: rajjvāmiva viditāyāṃ samāropitasya bhujaṅgasya tattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7101: yatastasmādātmaiva draṣṭavyo na tu tadatiriktaṃ jagat svarūpeṇa draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7103: yato 'brahma taṃ parādāt' brāhmaṇajātirbrahmaṇo 'hamityevamabhimāna iti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:7107: ātmaiva jagatastattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ kiñcittaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7109: yat khalu yadgrahaṃ vinā na śakyate grahītuṃ tattato na vyatiricyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7110: yathā rajataṃ śuktikāyāḥ, bhujaṅgo vā rajjoḥ, dundubhyādiśabdasāmānyādvā tattacchabdabhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7111: na gṛhyante ca cidrūpagrahaṇaṃ vinā sthitikāle nāmarūpāṇi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7116_1: 'pi tu nāmarūpotpatteḥ prāgapi cidrūpāvasthānāt tadupādānatvācca nāmarūpaprapañcasya tadanatirekaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7117_0: rajjūpādānasyeva bhujaṅgasya rajjoranatireka ityetadvṛṣṭāntena sādhayati bhagavatī
GSP33vacbhamu:7117_1: śrutiḥ-'sa yathārdraidho 'grerabhyāhitasya pṛthagdhūnā viniścarantyevaṃ vā are 'sya
GSP33vacbhamu:7117_2: mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ' ityādinā caturvidho mantra uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7124: yadā ca nāmadheyasyeyaṃ gatistadā tatpūrvakasya rūpadheyasya kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7125: na kevalaṃ tadupādānatvāttato na vyatiricyate nāmarūpaprapañcaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7127: yathā sāmudramevāmbhaḥ pṛthivītejaḥ saṃparkāt kāṭhinyamupagataṃ saindhavaṃ khilyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7128: sa hi svākāre samudre kṣipto 'mbha eva bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7129: evaṃ cidambhodhau līnaṃ jagacchideva bhavati na tu tato 'tiricyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7142: etebhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya sāmyenotthāya /
GSP33vacbhamu:7143: kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya hyavacchedādduḥ khitvaśokitvādayastadavacchinne cidātmani tadviparīte 'pi pratīyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:7146_2: tānyeva bhūtāni naśyantyani tadupādhiścidātmanaḥ khilyabhāvo vinaśyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7148: na pretya saṃjñāstīti saṃjñāmātraniṣedhādātmā nāstīti manyamānā sā maitreyī hovāca,
GSP33vacbhamu:7149: atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanmohitavān na pretya saṃjñāstīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7150: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ svābhiprāyaṃ, dvaite hi rūpādiviśeṣasaṃjñānibandhano duḥkhitvādyabhimānaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7151: ānandajñānaikarasabrahmādvayānubhave tu tat kena kaṃ paśyet, brahma vā kena vijānīyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7153: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na saṃjñāmātraṃ mayā vyāsedhi, kintu viśeṣasaṃjñeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7157: dvaitanindayā cādvaitaguṇakīrtanādbrahmaiva maitreyībrahmaṇe pratipādyaṃ na jīvātmeti nāsti pūrvapakṣa ityanārabhyamevedamadhikaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7160: nāpijñānakartṛtvamakartuḥ sākṣācca mahato bhūtasya vijñānātmabhāvena samuttānābhidhānaṃ vijñānātmana eva draṣṭavyatvamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:7161: anyathā brahmaṇo draṣṭavyatvapare 'smin brāhmaṇo tasya vijñānātmatvena samutthānābhidhānamanupayuktaṃ syāttasya tu draṣṭavyamupayujyata ityupakramamātraṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7166: tadevaṃ paurvāparyālocanayā maitreyībrāhmaṇasya brahmadarśanaparatve sthite bhoktrā jīvātmanopakramamācāryadeśīyamatena tāvatsamādhatte sūtrakāraḥ- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7168: yathā hi vahnervikārā vyuccaranto visphuliṅgā na vahneratyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:7172: tathā jīvātmano 'pi brahmavikāra na brahmaṇo 'tyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:7174: nāpyatyantaṃ na bhidyante, parasparaṃ vyāvṛttyabhāvaprasaṅgāt, sarvajñaṃ pratyupadeśavaiyarthyācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7176: tatra tadvijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāsiddhaye vijñānātmaparamātmanorabhedamupādāya paramātmani darśayitavye vijñānātmanopakrama ityāśmaradhya ācāryo mene //20 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7180: jīvo hi paramātmano 'tyantaṃ bhinna eva san dehendriyamanobuddhyupadhānasaṃparkātsarvadā kaluṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7183: yathāhuḥ pāñcarātrikāḥ-'āmukterbheda eva syājjīvasya ca parasya ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7189: saṃprati svābhāvikameva jīvasya nāmarūpaprapañcāśrayatvalakṣaṇaṃ kāluṣyaṃ pārthivānāmaṇūnāmiva śyāmatvaṃ kevalaṃ pākeneva /
GSP33vacbhamu:7200: ākāśa iva ghaṭamaṇikādikalpitāvacchedo ghaṭākāśo maṇikākāśo na tu paramākāśādanyastadvikāro vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7205: atha vikāraḥ paramātmano jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavatyākāśādivadityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7207: nahi yathā tejaḥprabhṛtīnāmātmavikāratvaṃ śrūyate evaṃ jīvasyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7211: tathāca kathañcidbhedo 'pīti tamāsthāya kāryakāraṇabhāva iti matatrayamuktvā kāśakṛtsnīyamataṃ sādhutvena nirdhārayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7217: rājaputrasyeva va mlecchakule vardhamānasyātmani samāropito mlecchabhāvo rājaputro 'sīti āptopadeśena /
GSP33vacbhamu:7218: na tu mṛdvikāraḥ śarāvādiḥ śataśo 'pi mṛnmṛditi cintyamānastajjanmanā mṛdbhāvasākṣātkāreṇa śakyo nivartayituṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7223: api ca jīvasyātmavikāratve tasya jñānadhyānādisādhanānuṣṭhānāt svaprakṛtāvapyaye sati nāmṛtatvasyāśāstītyapuruṣārthatvamamṛtatvaprāpiśrutivirodhaśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7226: nanu yadi jīvo na vikāraḥ kintu brahmaiva kathaṃ tarhi tasminnāmarūpāśrayatvaśrutiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7229: yataḥ pratipādayiṣitārānusāraścāmṛtatvaprāptiśca vikārapakṣe na saṃbhavataḥ, ataśceti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7234: aikāntike hyādvaite ātmano 'nyakarmakaraṇe 'kena kaṃ paśyet' iti ātmanaśca karmatvaṃ 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti śakyaṃ niṣeddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:7236: na kevalaṃ kāśakṛtsnīyadarśanāśrayaṇena bhūtapūrvagatyā vijñātṛtvamapi tu śrutipaurvāparyaparyālocanayāpyevamevetyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7238: kasmāt punaḥ kāśakṛtsnasya matamāsthīyate netareṣāmācāryāṇāmityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7240: kāśakṛtsnīyasya matasya śrutiprabandhopanyāsena punaḥ śrutimattvaṃ smṛtimattvaṃ copasaṃhāropakramamāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7248: apica yadi jīvaparamātmanorbhedābhedāvāsthīyeyātāṃ tatastayormitho virodhātsamuccayābhāvādekasya balīyastve nātmani nirapavādaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:7251: tataḥ saṃśaye sati na suniścitārthamātmani jñānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7252: suniścitārthaṃ ca jñānaṃ mokṣopāyaḥ śrūyate-'vedāntavijñānasuniścitārthāḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7257: kathaṃ tarhi vyapadeśabuddhibhedau kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti kathañca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya bhagavataḥ saṃsāritā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7264: na tāvadbhedadābhedāvekātra bhāvikau bhavitumarhata iti viprapañcitaṃ prathame pāde /
GSP33vacbhamu:7265: dvaitadarśananindayā caikāntikādvaitapratipādanaparāḥ paurvāparyālocanayā sarve vedāntaḥ pratīyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:7266: tatra yathā bimbādavadatāttāttvike pratibimbānāmabhede 'pi nīlamaṇikṛpāṇakācādyupadhānabhedātkālpaniko jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedau vartayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7267: idaṃ bimbamavadātamimāni ca pratibimbāni nīlotpalāśaśayāmalāni vṛttadīrghādibhedabhāñji bahūnīti,
GSP33vacbhamu:7268_1: jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedāvayaṃ ca paramātmā śuddhavijñānānandasvabhāva ime
GSP33vacbhamu:7269: avidyopadhānaṃ ca yadyapi vidyāsvabhāve paramātmani na sākṣādasti tathāpi tatpratibimbakalpajīvadvāreṇa parasminnucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7270: na caivamanyonyāśrayo jīvavibhāgāśrayāvidyā, avidyāśrayaśca jīvavibhāga iti, bījāṅkuravadanāditvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7273: kathaṃ cātmānaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ vividhavedanābhājaṃ kuryādityādyanuyogo niravakāśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7278: hanta jīvaḥ sphuṭa iti brahmāpi tathā syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7279: tathā ca 'nihitaṃ guhāyām' iti nopapadyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7281: yathāhi bimbasya maṇikṛpāṇādayo guhā evaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi pratijīvaṃ bhinnā avidyā guhā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7282: yathā pratibimbeṣu bhāsamāneṣu bimbaṃ tadabhinnamapi guhyamevaṃ jīveṣu bhāsamāneṣu tadabhinnamapi brahma guhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7287: brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanā bhagaśo vā pariṇāmābhyupagame tasya kāryatvādanityatvācca tadaśrito mokṣo 'pi tathā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7290: evaṃ ye nadīsamudranidarśanenāmukterbhedaṃ muktasya cābhedaṃ jīvasyāsthiṣata teṣāmapi nyāyenāsaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7294: kiṃ pāthaḥ paramāṇava utaiṣāṃ saṃsthānabheda āhosvittadārabdho 'vayavī /
GSP33vacbhamu:7295: tatra saṃsthānabhedasya vāvayavino vā samudraniveśe vināśāt kasya samudreṇaikatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7296: nadīpāthaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ tu samudrapāthaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrvavasthitebhyo bheda eva nābhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7298: ye tu kāśakṛtsnīyameva matamāsthāya jīvaṃ paramātmanoṃ'śamācakhyusteṣāṃ kathaṃ 'niṣphalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntam' iti na śrutivirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7299: niṣphalamiti sāvayavatvaṃ vyāsedhi na tu sāṃśatvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:7300: aṃśaśca jīvaḥ paramātmano nabhasa iva karṇanemimaṇḍalāvacchinnaṃ nabhaḥ śabdaśravaṇayogyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7301: vāyoriva ca śarīrāvacchinnaḥ pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇa iti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7304: hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7306: hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7307: naca karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ tasyāṃśaḥ, tasya tato bhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7311: nabhodharmatve hi tadanavayavaṃ sarvatrābhinnamiti tatsaṃyogaḥ sarvatra pratheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:7315: vyāpyaivāsti kevalaṃ pratisaṃbandhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā na sarvatra nirūpyata iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:7317: tatsaṃyuktaṃ tu nabhaḥ śravaṇayogyaṃ sarvatrāstīti sarvatra śravaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7318: naca bhedābhedayoranyatareṇāṃśaḥ śakyo nirvaktum na cobhābhyāṃ, viruddhayorekatrāsamavāyādityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7319: tasmādanirvacanīyānādyavidyāparikalpita evāṃśo nabhaso na bhāvika iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7322: na jātu rajjvāmajñāyamāna urago bhayakampādikāryāya paryāpta iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7329: api ca bhāvikāṃśavādināṃ mate bhāvikāṃśasya jñānenocchettumaśakyatvānna jñānadhyānasādhano mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7331: evaṃ jīvo brahmaṇoṃ'śa iti kāśakṛtsnīyaṃ matamiti siddham //22 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7336: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi samanvaye darśite samāptaṃ samanvayalakṣaṇamiti kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthamidamārabhyata iti śaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ saṃgatiṃ darśayannavaśeṣamāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7338: atra ca lakṣaṇasya saṃgatimuktvā lakṣaṇenāsyādhikaraṇasya saṃgatiruktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7339: etaduktaṃ bhavati-satyaṃ jagatkāraṇe brahmaṇi vedāntānāmuktaḥ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7340: tatra kāraṇabhāvasyobhayathā darśanājjagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ nimittatvenaiva, utopādānatvenāpi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7341: tatra yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastata upādānakāraṇānusāraṇe sāṃkhyasmṛtisiddhaṃ pradhānamabhyupeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7342: tathā ca 'janmādyasya yataḥ' iti brahmalakṣaṇamasādhu, ativyāpteḥ pradhāne 'pi gatatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7344: yadi tūttaraḥ pakṣastato nātivyāptirnāpyavyāptiriti sādhu lakṣaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7350: āgamasya kāraṇamātre paryavasānādanumānasya tadviśeṣaniyamamāgamo na pratikṣipatyapi tvanumanyata evetyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7352: brahmopādānatvasya prasaktasya pratiṣedhe 'nyatrāprasaṅgātsāṃkhyasmṛtiprasiddhamānumānikaṃ pradhānaṃ śiṣyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7356: yathā somaśarmaṇaikena jñātena sarve kaṭhā jñātā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7359: na kevalaṃ brahma nimittakāraṇaṃ, kutaḥ, pratijñādṛṣṭāntayoranuparodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7365: ' tadihāpi pratijñādṛṣṭāntau mukhyārthāveva yuktau na tu 'yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ' itivadguṇakalpanayā netavyau,
GSP33vacbhamu:7368: nimittakāraṇaṃ tu kāryādatyantabhinnamiti na tajjñāne kāryajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7372: nahi tadānīṃ brahmaṇi jñāte sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7374: yata iti ca pañcamī na kāraṇamātre smaryate api tu prakṛtau, 'janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7379: etayā khalu svātantryalakṣaṇena kartṛtvena nimittatvaṃ darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7406: kathaṃ ca tadbrahmaṇo rūpaṃ yadi tasya brahmopādānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7411: etaduktaṃ bhavati-īśvaro jagato nimittakāraṇameva īkṣāpūrvajagatkartṛtvāt, kumbhakartukulālavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:7415: hanta tarhi yādṛśamīśvaramāgamo gamayati tādṛśo 'bhyupagatavyaḥ sa ca nimittakāraṇaṃ copādānakāraṇaṃ ceśvaramavagamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7417: iyaṃ copādānapariṇāmādibhāṣā na vikārābhiprāyeṇāpi tu tathā sarpasyopādānaṃ rajjurevaṃ brahma jagadupādānaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7418: na khalu nityasya niṣphalasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanaikadeśena vā pariṇāmaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7420: naca mṛdaḥ śaravādayo bhidyante, na cābhinnāḥ, na vā bhinnābhinnāḥ kintvanirvacanīyā eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:7422: tasmādadvaitopakramādupasaṃhārācca sarva eva vedāntā aikāntikādvaitaparāḥ santaḥ sākṣādeva kkacidadvaitamāhuḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7425: etāvatāpi tāvadbhedo niṣiddho bhavati, na tūpādānatvābhidhānamātreṇa vikāragraha āstheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7429: mā bhūtpradhānaṃ jagadupādānaṃ tathāpi na brahmopādānatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7431: teṣāmapi hi kiñcidupodbalakamasti vaidikaṃ liṅgamityāśaṅkāmapanetumāha sūtrakāraḥ- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7434: 'pratijñālakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyamāṇe padasamanvayaḥ vaidikaḥ sa ca tatraiva nānyatretyatra sādhitam //28 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7435: ' iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmacchārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7444: vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayoḥ samanvayavirodhaparihāralakṣaṇayoḥ saṃgatipradarśanāya sukhagrahaṇasya caitanyoḥ saṃkṣepatastātparyārthamāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7451: tadevākhyā yasyāḥ sā smṛtistantrākhyā paramarṣiṇā kapilenādividuṣā praṇītā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7453: na khalvamūṣāṃ smṛtīnāṃ manvādismṛtivadanyo 'vakāśaḥ śakyo vaditumṛte mokṣasādhanaprakāśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7458: prasādhitaṃ khalu dharmamīmāṃsāyāṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam' ityatra,
GSP33vacbhamu:7459: yathā śrutiviruddhānāṃ smṛtīnāṃ durbalatayānapekṣaṇīyatvaṃ tasmānna durbalānurodhena balīyasīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ yuktamupavarṇanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:7460: api tu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvāḥ śrutayo durbalāḥ smṛtīrbādhanta eveti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7470: api ca tarko 'pi kapilādismṛtiranumanyate, tasmādapyetadeva prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7475: tāsāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ brahmopādānatvapratipādanaparāṇāṃ tatra tatra darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7476: tasmādavigānācchraita evārtha āvastheyo na tu smārto vigānāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7477: tatkimidānīṃ parasparavigānātsarvā eva smṛtayo 'vaheyā ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7487: kintu viniścatavedaprāmāṇyānāṃ teṣāṃ tadanuṣṭhānavatāṃ prāci bhave 'smiñjanmani siddhiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7491: apramāṇena ca na vedārtho 'tiśaṅkituṃ yuktaḥ pramāṇasiddhatvāttasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:7492: tadevaṃ vedavirodhe siddhavacanamapramāṇamuktvā siddhānāmapi parasparavirodhe tadvacanādanāścāsa iti pūrvoktaṃ smārayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7500: na tāvatsiddhānāṃ parasparaviruddhāni vacāṃsi pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7504: tasmācchutisāmānyamātreṇa bhramaḥ sāṃkhyapraṇetā kapilaḥ śrauta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7511: na kevalaṃ manoḥ smṛtiḥ smṛtyantarasaṃvādinī, śrutisaṃvādinyapītyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7516: bhavatu vedaviruddhaṃ kāpilaṃ vacastathāpi dvayorapi puruṣabuddhiprabhavatayā ko vinigamanāyāṃ heturyato vedavirodhi kāpilaṃ vaco nādaraṇīyamityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7518: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-satyaṃ śāstrayonirīśvarastathāpyasya na śāstrakriyāyāmasti svātantryaṃ kapilādīnāmiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:7519: sa hi bhagavān yādṛśaṃ pūrvasmin sarge cakāra śāstraṃ tadanusāreṇāsminnapi sarge praṇītavān /
GSP33vacbhamu:7520: evaṃ pūrvatarānusāreṇa pūrvasmin pūrvatāmanusāreṇa ca pūrvatara ityanādirayaṃ śāstreśvarayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7521: tatreśvarasya na śāstrārthajñānapūrvā śāstrakriyā yenāsya kapilādivatsvātantryaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7522: śāstrārthajñānaṃ cāsya svayamāvirbhavadapi na śāstrakāraṇatāmupaiti, dvayorapyaparyāyeṇāvirbhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7523: śāstraṃ ca svatobodhakatayā puruṣasvātantryābhāvena nirastamastadoṣāśaṅkaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ sākṣādeva svārthe pramāṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7526_1: siddhapramāṇabhāvayānepakṣayaiva śrutyā svārtho viniścāyita iti śīghratarapravṛttayā
GSP33vacbhamu:7529: ahaṅkāraprakṛtikatvena tanmātrāṇyapyaprasiddhāni smartuṃ na śakyanta ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7535: sāṃkhyasmṛtermahadādiṣviva pradhāne 'pi prāmāṇyaṃ neti niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7536: sāṃkhyasmṛterbādhe 'pi taduktayuktīnāṃ kathaṃ bādha cārṣajñānamatra mūlamupapadyata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7537: tasmānna kāpilasmṛteḥ pradhānopādānatvaṃ jagata iti siddham //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7541: nānena yogaśāstrasya hairaṇyagarbhapātañjalādeḥ sarvathā prāmāṇyaṃ nirākriyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:7547: tacca kiñcinnimittīkṛtya vyutpādyamiti pradhānaṃ savikāraṃ nimittīkṛtaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7550: anyaparādapi cānyanimittaṃ tatpratīyamānamabhyupeyeta, yadi na mānāntareṇa virudhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7553: ata eva yogaśāstraṃ vyutpādayitāha sma bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ-'guṇānāṃ paramaṃ rūpaṃ na dṛṣṭipathamṛcchati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7556: yogaṃ vyutpipādayiṣatā nimittamātreṇeha guṇā uktāḥ, na tu bhāvataḥ, teṣāmatāttvikatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7566: yogaśāstrāttu pradhānādisattā vijñāpayiṣyate bahulaṃ hi yogaśāstrāṇāṃ vedena saha saṃvādo dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7571: naca tadapramāṇaṃ pradhānādau, pramāṇaṃ ca yamādāviti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7573: yathāhuḥ-'prasaraṃ na labhante hi yāvatkkacana markaṭāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7576: seyaṃ labdhaprasarā pradhānādau yogāpramāṇatāpiśācī sarvatraiva durvārā bhavedityasyāḥ prasaraṃ niṣedhatā pradhānādyabhyupeyamiti nāśabdaṃ pradhānamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7583: tasmānna pradhānādiparaṃ tat, kintu tannimittīkṛtya yogavyutpādanaparamityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7589: tā api kasmānna nirākriyanta ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7591: tāsu khalu bahulaṃ vedārthavisaṃvādinīṣu śiṣṭānādṛtāsu kaiścideva tu puruṣāpasadaiḥ paśuprāyairmlecchādibiḥ parigṛhītāsu vedamūlatvāśaṅkaiva nāstīti na nirākṛtāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7592: tadviparītāstu sāṃkhyayogasmṛtaya iti tāḥ pradhānādiparatayā vyudasyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7599: sāṃkhyā samyagbuddhirvaidikī tayā vartanta iti sāṃkhyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7603: anye 'pi yamaniyamādayo bāhyā āntarāśca dhāraṇādayo yogopāyā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7620: nanvastu virodhaḥ, tathāpi tarkādare ko heturityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7622_0: sāvakāśā vahvayo 'pi śrutayo 'navakāśaikaśrutivirodhe tadanuguṇatayā yathā nīyante
GSP33vacbhamu:7623: api ca brahmasākṣātkāro virodhitayānādimavidyāṃ nivartayan dṛṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa mokṣasādhanamiṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7624: tatra brahmasākṣātkārasya mokṣasādhanatayā pradhānasyānumānaṃ dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇādṛṣṭaviṣayaṃ viṣayato 'ntaraṅgaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7628: api ca śrutyāpi brahmaṇi tarka ādṛta ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7630: so 'yaṃ brahmaṇo jagadupādānatvākṣepaḥ punastarkeṇa prastūyate-'prakṛtyā ca śrutyāpi vikārāṇāmavasthitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7631: jagadbrahmasarūpaṃ ca neti no tasya vikriyā //
GSP33vacbhamu:7634: ' tathāhi-eka eva strīkāyaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatayā patyuśca sapartnānāṃ ca caitrasya ca straiṇasya tāmavindato 'paryāyaṃ sukhaduḥkhaviṣādānādhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:7636: tasmātsukhaduḥkhamohātmatayā ca svarganarakādyuccāvacaprapañcatayā ca jagadaśuddhamacetanaṃ ca,
GSP33vacbhamu:7637: brahma tu cetanaṃ viśuddhaṃ ca, niratiśayatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7638: tasmātpradhānasyāśuddhasyācetanasya vikāro jaganna tu brahmaṇa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7658: śabdārthāt khalu cetanaprakṛtitvāccaitanyaṃ pṛthivyādīnāmavagamyamānamupodvalitaṃ mānāntareṇa sākṣācchūyamāṇamapyacaitanyamanyathayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7664: na pṛthivyādīnāṃ caitanyamāthameva, kintu bhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ sākṣādevārtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7669: naitāḥ śrutayaḥ sākṣānmṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāhuḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7671: tenaitacchutibalena na mṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāśaṅkanīyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7676_0: bhoktṛṇāmupakāryatvādbhūtendriyāṇāṃ copakāratvāt sāmye ca tadanupapatteḥ sarvajanaprasiddheśca
GSP33vacbhamu:7676_1: 'vijñānaṃ cābhavat' iti śruteśca viśeṣaścetanācetanalakṣaṇaḥ prāguktaḥ sa nopapadyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:7682: api ca bhūyasyaḥ śrutayaḥ 'agnirvāg bhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśadvāyuḥ prāṇo bhūtvā nāsike prāviśadādityaścakṣurbhūtvākṣiṇī prāviśat' ityādaya indriyaviśeṣagatā devatā darśayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7685: api ca prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe prāṇānāmasmadādiśarīrāṇāmiva kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitānāṃ vyavahāraṃ darśayan prāṇānāṃ kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhānena caitanyaṃ draḍhayatītyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7688: yadyapi prathame 'dhyāye māktatvena varṇitaṃ tathāpi mukhyatayāpi kathañcinnetuṃ śakyamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7705: yathā hi kāryatvāviśeṣa'pi 'ārogyakāmaḥ pathyamaśrīyāt' 'svarakāmaḥ sikatāṃ bhakṣayet' ityādīnāṃ mānāntarāpekṣatā,
GSP33vacbhamu:7715: tarko hi pramāṇaviṣayavivecakatayā taditikartavyatābhūtastadāśrayo 'sati pramāṇe 'nugrāhyasyāśrayasyābhāvācchuṣkatayā nādriyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7722: mato hi bhāvyamāno bhāvanāyā viṣayatayānubhūto bhavatīti mananamanubhavāṅgam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7727: api ca cetanakāraṇavādibhiḥ kāraṇasālakṣaṇye 'pi kāryasya kathañciccaitanyāvirbhāvānāvirbhāvābhyāṃ vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ cābhavaditi jagatkāraṇe yojayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7730: cetanasya jagatkāraṇasya suṣuptādyavyavasthāsviva sato 'pi caitanyasthānāvirbhāvatayā śakyameva kathañcidavijñānātmatvaṃ yojayitumityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7745: tathā cedaṃ jagatkāryaṃ sattve 'pi cidātmanaḥ kāraṇasya prāgutpatternāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:7756: api tu kāraṇarūpeṇa śakyaṃ sattvena nirvaktumiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7757: evaṃ ca kāraṇasattaiva kāryasya sattā na tato 'nyeti kathaṃ tadutpatteḥ prāk sati kāraṇe bhavatyasat /
GSP33vacbhamu:7758: svarūpeṇa tūtpatteḥ prāgutpannasya dhvastasya vā sadasattvābhyāmanirvācyasya na sato 'sato votpattiriti nirviṣayaḥ satkāryavādapratiṣedha ityarthaḥ //7 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7764_0: yathā hi yūṣādiṣu hiṅgisaindhavādīnāmavibhāgalakṣaṇo layaḥ svagatarasādibhiryūṣaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:7764_1: rūṣayatyevaṃ brahmaṇi viśuddhyādidharmiṇi jagalliyamānamavibhāgaṃ gacchadbrahma svadharmeṇa rūṣayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7765: na cānyathā layo lokasidda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7768: nahi samudrasya phenormibudbudādipariṇāmo vā rajjvāṃ sarpadhārādivibhrame vā niyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7780: tatra ca taddharmārūṣaṇe santi sahasraṃ dṛṣṭāntāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7781: tava tu kāraṇe kāryasya laye kāryadharmarūṣaṇe na dṛṣṭāntalavo 'pyastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7782: syādetat yadi kāryasyāvibhāgaḥ kāraṇe, kathaṃ kāryadharmārūṣaṇaṃ kāraṇasyetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7784: yathā rajatasyāropitasya pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ śukti4na ca śuktī rajatameva midamapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7785: api ca sthityutpattipralayakāleṣu triṣvapi kāryasya kāraṇādabhedamabhidadhatī śrutiranatiśaṅkanīyā sarvaireva vedavādibhiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7786: tatra sthityutpattyoryaḥ parihāraḥ sa pralaye 'pi samānaḥ kāryasyāvidyāsamāropitatvaṃ nāma,
GSP33vacbhamu:7801: tattvajñānena ca saśaktino mithyājñānasya samūlaghātaṃ nihatatvāditi //9 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7806_1: nāsmatpakṣa iti yadyapyupariṣṭātpratipādayiṣyāmastathāpi guḍajihvikayā samānatvāpādanamidānīmiti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7812: kevalāgamagamyer'the svatantratarkāviṣaye na sāṃkhyādivat sādharmyadharmyamātreṇa tarkaḥ pravartanīyo yena pradhānādisiddhirbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7826: api ca yena tarkeṇa tarkāṇāmapratiṣṭhāmāha sa eva tarkaḥ pratiṣṭhito 'bhyupeyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7832: sati caiṣa pūrvapakṣaviṣaye tarke pratiṣṭhārahite pravartate, tadabhāve vicārapravṛtteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7836: na vayamanyatra tarkapramāṇayāmaḥ, kintu jagatkāraṇasattve svābhāvikapratibandhavanna liṅgamasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7840: bhūtārthagocarasya hi samyagjñānasya vyavasthitavastugocaratayā vyavasthānaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7842: vaidikaṃ cedaṃ cetanajagadupādānaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ vedotthatarketikartavyatākaṃ vedajanitaṃ vyavasthitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7843: vedānapekṣeṇa tu tarkeṇa jagatkāraṇabhedamavasthāpayatāṃ tārkikāṇāmanyonyaṃ vipratipattestattvanirdhāraṇakāraṇābhāvācca na tatastattvavyavastheti na tataḥ samyagjñānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7848: na kāryaṃ kāraṇādabhinnamabhede kāraṇarūpavat kāryatvānupapatteḥ, karotyarthānupapatteśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7850: na cāsya kāraṇātmatve kiñcidabhūtamasti, yadarthamayaṃ puruṣo yateta /
GSP33vacbhamu:7852: tasyā api kāraṇātmatvena sattvāt, asattve vābhivyaṅgyasyāpi tadvatprasaṅgena kāraṇātmatvavyāghātāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7853: nahi tadeva tadānīmevāsti nāsti ceti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7854: kiṃ cedaṃ maṇimantrauṣadhamindrajālaṃ kāryeṇa śikṣitaṃ yadidamajātāniruddhātiśayamavyavadhānamavidūrasthānaṃ ca tasyaiva tadavasthendriyasya puṃsaḥ kadācitpratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ ca,
GSP33vacbhamu:7859: athāpi syāt kāryāntarāṇi piṇḍakapālaśarkarācūrṇakaṇaprabhṛtāni kumbhaṃ vyavadadhate,
GSP33vacbhamu:7862: tasya kāryajātasya kāraṇātmanaḥ sadātanatvena sarvadā vyavadhānena kumbhasyātyantānupalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7873: tasmādyatredamalpatāramyaṃ viśrāmyati yato na kṣodīyaḥ saṃbhavati tajjagato mūlakāraṇaṃ paramāṇuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7878: tena vaiśeṣikādyabhimatasya tarkasya śuṣkatvenāvyavasthiceḥ sūtramidaṃ sāṃkhyadūṣaṇamatidiśati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7879: yatra kathañcidvedānusāriṇī manvādibhiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ parigṛhītasya sāṃkhyata4kasyaiṣā gatistatra paramāṇvādivādasyātyantavedabāhyasya manvādyupekṣitasya ca kaiva katheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7882: sṛṣṭyādayo hi vyutpādyāste na kiñcitsadasadvā pūrvapakṣanyāyotprekṣitamapyudāhṛtya vyutpādyanta iti kenacidaṃśenetyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7892: pravṛttā hi śrutiranapekṣatayā svataḥpramāṇatvena na pramāṇāntaramapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7911: yadikāraṇāt paramārthabhūtādananyatvamākāśādeḥ prapañcasya kāryasya kutastarhi na vaiśeṣikādyuktadoprapañcāvatāra ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7913: na khalvananyatvamityabhedaṃ brūmaḥ, kintu bhedaṃ vyasedhāmaḥ, tataśca nābhedāśrayadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7914: kintvabhedaṃ vyāsedhadbhirvaiśeṣikādibhirasmāsu sāhāyakamevācaritaṃ bhavati. bhedaniṣedhahetuṃ vyācaṣṭe-ārambhaṇaśabdastāvaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7915: evaṃ hi brahmavijñānena sarvaṃ jagattattvato jñāyeta yadi brahmaiva tattvaṃ jagato bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7916: yathā rajjvāṃ jñātāyāṃ bhujaṅgatattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7922: mṛdi jñātāyāṃ kathaṃ mṛmnayaṃ ghaṭādi jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7925: na cānyasminvijñāte 'nyadvijñātaṃ bhavatītyata āha śrutiḥ-'vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7926: vācayā kevalamārabhyate vikārajātaṃ, na tu tattvato 'sti, yato nāmadheyamātrametat /
GSP33vacbhamu:7927: yathā puruṣasya caitanyamiti rāhoḥ śira iti vikalpamātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:7931: tena mṛdi jñātāyāṃ yeṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva tattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7936: ye hi dṛṣṭanaṣṭasvarūpā na te vastusanto yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikodakādayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7940: kintu sarvadā sarvatra sarvathāstyeva, na nāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7941: na caivaṃ vikārajātaṃ, tasya kadācit kathañcit kutracidavasthānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7942: nahi rūpaṃ kadācit kkacit kathañcidvā gandho bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7945: tattarhi vikārajātaṃ daṇḍāyamānaṃ sadātanamiti na vikāraḥ kasyacit /
GSP33vacbhamu:7955: athāsyāsattvaṃ nāma kiñcinna jāyate kintu sa eva na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7956: yathāhuḥ-'na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7957: athaiṣa prasajyapratiṣedho nirucyatāṃ, kiṃ tatsvabhāvo bhāva uta bhāvasvabhāvaḥ sa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7958: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvānāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā tucchatayā jagacchūnyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:7961: kalpanāmātranimittatve 'pi niṣedhasya bhāvanityatāpattistadavasthaiva tasmādbhinnamasti kāraṇādvikārajātaṃ na vastu sat /
GSP33vacbhamu:7963: tadanena pramāṇena siddhamanṛtatvaṃ vikārajātasya kāraṇasya nirvācyatayā sattvaṃ 'mṛttiketyeva satyam' ityādinā prabandhena dṛṣṭāntatayānuvadati śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7964: 'yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ' iti cākṣapādasūtraṃ pramāṇasiddho dṛṣṭānta ityetatparaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7970: anekābhiḥ śaktibhiryāḥ pravṛttayo nānākāryasṛṣṭayastadyuktaṃ brahmaikaṃ nānā ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7973: yadi punarekatvameva vastusadbhavet tato nānātvābhāvādvaidikaḥ karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ samasta evocchidyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:7975: evaṃ cānekātmakatve brahmaṇo mṛdādidṛṣṭāntā anurūpā bhaviṣyantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7979: mṛdātmanaikatvaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvamiti vadataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ parasparaṃ kimabhedo 'bhimataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7982: tatrābheda aikāntike mṛdātmaneti ca ghaṭaśarāvādyātmaneti collekhadvayaṃ niyamaśca nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7988: nahi dharmiṇoḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃkare taddharmāvekatvanānātve na saṃkīryete iti saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7990: evaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvaṃ yāvadbhavati tāvanmṛdātmanā nānātvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7991: so 'yaṃ niyamaḥ kāryakāraṇayoraikāntikaṃ bhedamupakalpayati, anirvacanīyatāṃ vā kāryasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:7997: na brahmaṇo jīvabhāvaḥ kālpanikaḥ, kintu bhāvikaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7998: aṃśo hi saḥ, tasya karmasāhitena jñānena brahmabhāva ādhīyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8001: yaduktaṃ nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti, tatrāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8003: yāvadabādhaṃ hi sarvo 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ svapnadaśāyāmiva tadupadarśitapadārthajātavyavahāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8004: sa ca yathā jāgradanasthāyāṃ bādhakānnivartate evaṃ tattvamasyādivākyaparibhāvanābhyāsaparipākabhuvā śārīrasya brahmātmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇa bādhakena nivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8006: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttat kena kaṃ paśyet' ityādinā mithyājñānādhīno vyavahāraḥ kriyākārakādilakṣaṇaḥ samyagjñānenāpanīyata itri na brūte,
GSP33vacbhamu:8014: api tu na bhujaṅgo rajjuriyamitivat sadātanaṃ tamabhivadati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8018: nahi jātu kāṣṭhasya daṇḍakamaṇḍalukuṇḍalaśālinaḥ kuṇḍalitvajñānaṃ daṇḍavattāṃ kamaṇḍalumattāṃ bādhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8027: ekatvaikāntābhyupagame tu teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhedaviṣayāṇāṃ bādhitatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8031: na kevalaṃ vidhiniṣedhākṣepeṇāsya mokṣaśāstrasyākṣepaḥ svarūpeṇāsyāpi bhedāpekṣatvādityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8040: nahi pratyakṣādibhirarthaṃ paricchidya pravartamāno vyavahāre visaṃbādyate sāṃsārikaḥ kaścit /
GSP33vacbhamu:8053: 'kathaṃ cānṛtena mokṣaśāstreṇa' iti yaduktaṃ tadanubhāṣya dūṣayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8060: yatkhalu satyaṃ na tadutpadyata iti kutastasyāsatyādutpādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8062: sāṃvyavahārikaṃ tu satyatvaṃ vṛttirūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasyeva śravaṇādīnāmapyabhinnam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8063: tasmādabhyupetya vṛttisvarūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasya paramārthasatyatāṃ vyabhicārodbhāvanamiti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8064: yadyapi sāṃvvahārikasya satyādeva bhayātsatyaṃ maraṇamutpadyate tathāpi bhayaheturahistajjñānaṃ vāsatyaṃ tato bhayaṃ satyaṃ jāyata ityasatyātsatyasyotpattiruktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8065: yadyapi cāhijñānamapi svarūpeṇa sattathāpi na tajjñānatvena bhayaheturapi tvanirvācyāhirūṣitatvena /
GSP33vacbhamu:8069: yataḥ samāropitadhūmabhāvāyā dhūmamahiṣyā vahnijñānaṃ satyaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8070: nahi cakṣuṣo rūpajñānaṃ satyamupajāyata iti rasādijñānenāpi tataḥ satyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8071: yato niyamo hi sa tādṛśaḥ satyānāṃ yataḥ kutaścit kiñcideva jāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8075: na cobhayatra dīrghasamāropaṃ prati kaścidasti bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8079: yathā sāṃsāriko jāgradbhujaṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyate tataśca na daṃśavedanāmāpnoti,
GSP33vacbhamu:8080: pipāsuḥ salilamālokya pātuṃ pravartate tatastadāsādya pāyaṃpāyamāpyāyitaḥ sukhamanubhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8088: laukiko hi suptotthito 'vagamyaṃ bādhitaṃ manyate na tadavagatiṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8089: tena yadyapi parikṣakā anirvācyarūṣitāmavagatimanirvācyāṃ niścinvanti tathāpi laukikābhiprāyeṇaitaduktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8092_2: svapne pratibuddho mānuṣīmātmanastanuṃ paśyati tadobhayadehānugatamātmānaṃ pratisaṃdadhāno
GSP33vacbhamu:8102: nahi saṃketayitāraḥ saṃketayantīdṛśena rekhābhedenāyaṃ varṇaḥ pratyetavyo 'pi tvīdṛśo rekhābhedo 'kāra īdṛśaśca kakāra iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8105: nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti, tatrāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8107: yadi khalvekatvāvagatinibandhanaḥ kaścidasti vyavahāraḥ, tadavagateḥ sarvettaratvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8116: antyā cediyamavagatirniṣprayojanā tarhi tathā ca prekṣāvadbhirupādīyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:8120: nahīyamutpannā satī paścādavidyāṃ nivartayati yena nāntyā syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:8122: avidyānivṛttiśca na tatkāryatayā phalamapi tviṣṭatayā, iṣṭalakṣaṇatvātphalasyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8135: satyaṃ ca tadavisaṃvādāt, anṛtaṃ ca vicārāsahatayānirvācyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8137: anekatvajñānasya ca pratiyogigrahāpekṣayā durbalatvena bādhyatvaṃ vadan prakṛtamupasaṃharati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8148: sākṣātkūṭasthanityatvapratipādikāstu santi sahasraśaḥ śrutaya iti na pariṇāmadharmatā brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8149: atha kūṭasthasyāpi pariṇāmaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8153: yathaikabāṇāśraye gatinivṛtti evamekasminbrahmaṇi pariṇāmaśca tadabhāvaśca kauṭasthyaṃ bhaviṣyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8158: naca dharmiṇo vyatiricyate dharmo yena tadupajanāpāye 'pi dharmī kīṭasthaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8160: vāṇādayastu pariṇāminaḥ sthityā gatyā ca pariṇāmanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8161: api ca svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyāpāditārthavattvasya vedarāśerekenāpi varṇenānarthakena na bhavitavyaṃ kiṃ punariyatā jagato brahmayonitvapratipādakena vākyasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:8162: tatra phalavadbrahmadarśanasamāmnānasaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ jagadyonitvaṃ samāmnāyamānaṃ tadarthaṃ sattadupāyatayāvatiṣṭhate nārthāntarārthamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8165: tadananyatvamityasya sūtrasya pratijñāvirodhaṃ śrutivirodhaṃ ca codayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8170: nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te eva bījaṃ tasya vyākaraṇaṃ kāryaprapañcastadapekṣatvādaiśvaryasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:8171: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na tāttvikamaiśvaryaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ kintvavidyopādhikamiti tadāśrayaṃ pratijñāsūtraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8177: kāraṇasya bhāvaḥ sattā copalambhaśca tasmin kāryasyopalabdherbhāvācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:8181: tathā ca prabhārūpānuviruddhabodhyena cākṣuṣeṇa na vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8198: paṭa iti pratyakṣabuddhyā tantava evātānavitānāvasthā ālambyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:8202: arthakriyāyāṃ ca pratyekamasamarthā apyanārabhyaivārthāntaraṃ kiñcinmilitāḥ kurvanto dṛśyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:8205: naca samavāyādbhinnayorapi bhedānavasāyaḥ anavasāya iti sāṃpratama, anyonyāśrayatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8206: bhede hi siddhe samavāyaḥ samavāyācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8209: anayā ca diśā mūlakāraṇaṃ brahmaiva paramārthasat,
GSP33vacbhamu:8218: nahi tailaṃ sikatātmanā sikatāyāmasti yathā ghaṭo 'sti mṛdi mṛdātmanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8221: tena yathā sikatāyāstailaṃ na jāyata evamātmano 'pi jaganna jāyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:8226: yathā hi ghaṭaḥ sarvadā sarvatra ghaṭa eva nā jātvasau kkacitpaṭo bhavatyevaṃ sadapi sarvatra sarvadā sadeva na tu kkacitkadācidasadbhavitumarhatītyupapāditamadhastāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8232: tataścābhinnasattānanyatvādete api mitho na bhidyete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8238: abhedagrahasya ca nirapekṣatayā tadanupapatterekaikāśrayatvācca bhedasyaikābhāve tadanupapatterabhedagrahopādānaiva bhedakalpaneti sarvabhavadātam //16 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8248: atiśayo hi dharmo nāsatyatiśayavati kārye bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8249: nanu na kāryasyātiśayo niyamaheturapi tu kāraṇasya śaktibhedaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8250: sa cāsatyapi kārye kāraṇasya sattvātsannevetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8257: anabhyupagamyamāne ca#samavāyasya samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbandhe vicchedaprasaṅgo 'vayavāvayavidravyaguṇādīnāṃ mithaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8262: sattvaṃ tu svabhāvata eva saditi na sattvāntarayogamapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8263: tathā samavāyaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbaddhuṃ na saṃbandhāntarayogamapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8267: naca saṃyogasya kāryatvāt kāryasya ca samavāyikāraṇādhīnajanmatvāt asamavāye ca tadanupapatteḥ samavāyakalpanā saṃyoga iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8270: saṃbandhyadhīnanirūpaṇaḥ samavāyo yathā saṃbandhidvayabhede na bhidyate tannāśe ca na naśyatyapi tu nitya eka evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8273: tathā sati yathaikasmānnimittakāraṇādeva jāyata evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi nimittakāraṇādeva janiṣyata iti samānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8282: atha samastāvayavavyāsaṅgyapi katipayāvayavasthāno grahīṣyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8285: bahutvasaṃkhyā hi svarūpeṇaiva vyāsajya saṃkhyeyeṣu vartate ityekamasaṃkhyeyāgrahaṇe 'pi na gṛhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8287: avayavī tu na svarūpeṇāvayavānvyāpnotiṃ, api tvavayavaśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8288: tena yathā sūtramavayavaiḥ kusumāni vyāpnuvanna samastakusumagrahaṇamapekṣate katipayakusumasthānasyāpi tasyopalabdheḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8295: yadyapi gotvasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā anirvācyā na paramārthasantastathā ca kkāsya pratyekaparisamāptiriti,
GSP33vacbhamu:8300: yadyucyeta ghaṭaśabdastadavayaveṣu vyāpārāviṣṭatayā pūrvāparībhāvamāpanneṣu ghaṭopajanābhimukheṣu tādarthyanimittādupacārātprayujyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8301: teṣāṃ ca siddhatvena kartṛtvamastītyupapadyate ghaṭo bhavatīti prayoga ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8303: utpādanā hi siddhānāṃ kapālakulālādīnāṃ vyāpāro notpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8307: tatra kapāsakulālādīnāṃ siddhānāmutpādanādhiṣṭhānānāṃ notpattyadhiṣṭhānatvamastīti pāriśeṣyādghaṭa eva sādhya utpatteradhiṣṭhānameṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8309: evañca ghaṭo bhavatītila ghaṭavyāpārasya dhātūpāttatvāttatrāsya kartṛtvamupapadyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8310: taṇḍulānāmiva satāṃ viklittau viklidyanti taṇḍulā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8320: api ca prāgutpatterasattvaṃ kāryasteti kāryābhāvasya bhāvena maryādākaraṇanupapannamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8323: atyantābhāvasya bandhyāsutasya mā bhūnmaryādanupākhyo hi saḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8324: ghaṭaprāgabhāvasya tu bhaviṣyatā ghaṭenopākhyeyasyāsti maryādetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8326: uktametadadhastādyathā na jātu ghaṭaḥ paṭo bhavatyevamasadapi sanna bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8330: prāk prasiddhamapi kāryaṃ kadācitkāraṇena yojayituṃ vyāpāror'thavānmavedityata āha-tadananyatvācceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8336: evaṃ vastutaḥ kāryatattvaṃ na kāraṇādbhidyate kāraṇasvarūpameva hi tat,
GSP33vacbhamu:8337: anirvācyaṃ tu kāryarūpaṃ bhinnamivābhinnamiva cāvabhāsata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8355: iti ca sūtre nigadavyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyāte //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8361: yadyapi śārīrātparamātmano bhedamāhuḥ śrutayastathāpyabhedamapi darśayanti śrutayo bahvayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8362: naca bhedābhedāvekatra samavetau virodhāt, naca bhedastāttvika ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8376: satyamayaṃ paramātmana sarvajñatvādyathā jīvān vastuta ātmano 'bhinnān paśyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8377: paśyatyevaṃ na bhāvata eṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāsaṅgostyavidyāvaśāttveṣāṃ tadvadabhimāna iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8378: tathā ca teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāyāmapyahamudāsīna iti na teṣāṃ bandhanāgāraniveśe 'pyastikṣatiḥ kācinmameti na hitākaraṇādidoṣāpattiriti rāddhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8384: yadi brahmaviṣarto jagat, hanta sarvasyaiva jīvavacaitanyaprasaṅga ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8390: brahma khalvekamadvitīyatayā parānapekṣaṃ krameṇotpadyamānasya jagato vivadhavicitrarūpasyopādānamupeyate tadanupapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8397: ekaikaṃ mṛdādi kārakaṃ teṣāṃ tu sāmagryaṃ sādhanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:8401: idaṃ tāvadbhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām-kiṃ tāttvikamasya rūpamapekṣyemucyate utānādināmarūpabījasahitaṃ kālpanikaṃ sārvajñyaṃ sarvaśaktitvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8402: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe kiṃ nāma tato 'dvitīyādasahāyādupajāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8404: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8407: te 'pi hi bāhyacetanādikāraṇānapekṣā eva kālaparivaśena svata eva pariṇāmāntaramāsādayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8409: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ ti maheśvaram' iti kāryakrameṇa utparipāko 'pi kramavānunneyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8414: yadi tu cetanatve satīti viśeṣamānna kṣīrādibhirvyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8423: nanu na brahmaṇastattvataḥ pariṇāmo yena kārtsnyabhāgavikalpenākṣipyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8424: avidyākalpitena tu nāmarūpalakṣaṇena rūpabhedena vyākṛtāvyākṛtātmanā tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyena pariṇāmādivyavahārāspadatvaṃ brahma pratipadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8426: nahi candramasi taimirikasya dvitvakalpanā candramaso dvitvamāvahati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8432: śrutestu śabdāmūlatvāt#'ātmani caivaṃ' 'vicitrāśca hi' iti sūtrābhyāṃ vivartadṛḍhīkaraṇenaikāntikādvayalakṣaṇaḥ śrutyarthaḥ pariśodhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8446: svapnadṛgātmā hi manasaiva svarūpānupamardena rathādīn sṛjati //28 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8454: yadyapi samudāyaḥ sāvayavastathāpi pratyekaṃ sattvādayo niravayavāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8455: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sattvamātraṃ pariṇamate na rajastamasī iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8465: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sa eva tadānīṃ tatra vartate na vartate ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8466: tathā coparyadhaḥpārśvasthāḥ ṣaḍapi paramāṇavaḥ samānadeśā iti prathimānupapatteraṇumātraḥ piṇḍaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8472: paramārthatastu bhāvikaṃ pariṇāmaṃ vā karyakāraṇabhāvaṃ vecchatāmeṣa durvāro doṣo na punarasmākaṃ māyāvādināmityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8480: kulālādibhyastāvadbāhyakaraṇāpekṣebhyo devādīnāṃ bāhyanapekṣāṇāmāntarakaraṇāpekṣasṛṣṭhīnāṃ pramāṇena dṛṣṭo yathā viśeṣo nāpahnotuṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8482: evaṃ sarvaśakteḥ parasyā devatāyā āntarakaraṇānapekṣāyā jagatsarjanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na sāmānyato dṛṣṭamātreṇāpahnavamarhatīti //31 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8488: prekṣāvataśca pravṛttiḥ svaparahitāhitaprāptiparihāraprayojanā satī nāprayojanālpāyāsāpi saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8495: tasmāt prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā tadabhāve 'nupapannā brahmopādānatāṃ jagataḥ pratikṣipatīti prāptam //32 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8499: bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8504: anyathā 'na kurvīta vṛthā ceṣṭām' iti dharmasūtrakṛtāṃ pratiṣedho nirviṣayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8506: api cādṛṣṭahetukotpattikī śvāsapraśvāsalakṣaṇā prekṣāvatāṃ kriyā prayojanānusaṃdhānamantareṇa dṛṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8511_1: līlāmātrātsatyapyanuniṣpādini prayojane naiva taduddeśena pravṛttirevaṃ brahmaṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:8512: dṛṣṭaṃ ca yadalpabalavīryabuddhināmaśakyamatiduṣkaraṃ vā tadanyeṣāmanalpabalavīryabuddhīnāṃ suśakamīṣatkaraṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8515: na cāyaṃ na pītaḥ saṃkṣipya culukena helayeva kalaśayoninā mahāmuninā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8516: na cādyāpi na dṛśyante līlāmātravinirmitāni mahāprāsādapramadavanāni śrīmannṛganarendrāṇāmanyeṣāṃ manasāpi duṣkarāṇi nareśvarāṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8517: tasmādupapannaṃ yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvādvā līlayā vā jagatsarjanaṃ bhagavato maheśvarasyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8518: api ca neyaṃ pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiryenānuyujyeta prayojanam, api tvanādyavidyānibandhanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8519: avidyā ca svabhāvata eva kāryonmukhī na prayojanamapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8522: sā ca caitanyacchuritā jagadutpādaheturutu cetano jagadyonirākhyāyata ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8524: api ca na brahma jagatkāraṇamapi tattayā vivakṣantyāgamā api tu jagati brahmātmabhāvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8525: tathā ca sṛṣṭeravivakṣāyāṃ tadāśrayo doṣo nirviṣaya evetyāśayenāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8532: nahi sabhyaḥ sabhāyāṃ niyukto yuktavādinaṃ yuktavādyasīti cāyuktavādinamayuktavādyasīti bruvāṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:8533: sabhāpatirvā yuktavādinamanugṛhṇannayuktavādinaṃ ca nigṛhṇannanukto dviṣṭo vā bhavatyapi tu madhyastha iti vītarāgadveṣa iti cākhyāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8534: tadvadīśvaraḥ puṇyakarmāṇamanugṛhṇannapuṇyakarmāṇaṃ ca nigṛhṇanmadhyastha eva nāmadhyasthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8538: ata eva na nairghṛṇyamapi saṃharataḥ samastān prāṇabhṛtaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8539: sa hi prāṇabhṛtkarmāśayānāṃ vṛttinirodhasamayaḥ, tamitalaṅghayannayamayuktakārī syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8542_0: na ca 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate eṣa evāsādhu karma
GSP33vacbhamu:8542_1: kārayati taṃ yamadho niniṣate' iti śruterīśvara eṣa dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ sādhvasādhunī
GSP33vacbhamu:8542_2: karmaṇī kārayitvā svargaṃ narakaṃ vā lokaṃ nayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8545: yasmāt karma kārayitveśvaraḥ prāṇinaḥ sukhaduḥkhinaḥ sṛjati iti śruteravagamyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8547: naca vaiṣamyamātramatra brūmo na tvīśvarakāraṇatvaṃ vyāsedhāma iti vaktavyam /
