GSP33vacbhamu:8549: tasmādīśvarasya savāsanakleśāparāmarśamabhivadantīnāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāmanugrahāyonninīṣate 'dho ninīṣata ityetadapi tajjātīyapūrvakarmābhyāsavaśātprāṇina ityevaṃ neyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8555: tathā ca māyākārasyevāṅgasākalyavaikalyabedena vicitrān prāṇino darśayato na vaiṣamyadoṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8557: evamasyāpi bhagavato vividhavicitraprapañcamanirvācyaṃ viśvaṃ darśayataḥ saṃharataśca svabhāvādvā līlayā vā na kaściddoṣaḥ //34 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8565: akṛte karmaṇi puṇye pāpe vā tatphalaṃ bhoktāramadhyāgacchet,
GSP33vacbhamu:8573: sa ca rāgādibiḥ sahitaḥ svakāryairna śarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhabhogāyatanamantareṇa saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8576: naca pūrvaśarīramantareṇa mohādiriti pūrvapūrvaśarīrāpekṣo mohādirevaṃ pūrvapūrvamohādyapekṣaṃ pūrvapūrvaśarīramityanāditaivātra bhagavatī cittamanākulayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8579_0: rāgādveṣamohā rāgādayasta eva hi puruṣaṃ sāsāraduḥkhamanubhāvya kleśayantīti kleśāsteṣāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:8579_1: vāsanāḥ karmaparvṛttyanuguṇāstābhirākṣiptāni pravarttitāni karmāṇi tadapekṣā layalakṣaṇā avidyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8584_0: tadevamanāditve siddhe 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' iti prāk sṛṣṭeravibhāgāvadhāramaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:8590: dṛśyate sarvasya cetanādhiṣṭhitasyaiva loke pravṛttiriti lokānusāro darśitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8597: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrikabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8599: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyāyogakāraṇadādismṛtibhiḥ sāṃkhyādiprayuktatarkaiśca vedāntasamanvayavirodhaparihārākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ#
GSP33vacbhamu:8604: iha hi pāde khatantrā vedanirapekṣāḥ pradhānādisiddhiviṣayāḥ sāṃkhyādiyuktayo nirākariṣyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:8606: nahīdaṃ śāstramucchṛṅkhalatarkaśāstravatpravṛttamapi tu vedāntavākyāni brahmaparāṇīti pūrvapakṣottarapakṣābhyāṃ viniścetum /
GSP33vacbhamu:8609: nahi vedāntavākyāni nirṇetavyānīti nirṇīyante, kintu mokṣamāṇānāṃ tattvajñānotpādanāya /
GSP33vacbhamu:8612: na caitadeva cetanopādānamacetanopādānaṃ ceti samuccetuṃ śakyaṃ, virodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8613: na ca vyavasthite vastuni vikalpo yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8614: na cāgamabādhitaviṣayatayānumānameva nodīyata iti sāṃpratam. sarvajñapraṇītatayā sāṃkhyādyāgamasya vedāgamatulyatvāt tadbhāṣitasyānumānasya pratikṛtisiṃhatulyatayābādhyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8615: tasmāttadvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvayo vedāntānāṃ sidhyatīti na tatastattvajñānaṃ seddhumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8616: naca tattvajñānādṛte mokṣa iti svatantrāṇāmapyanumānānāmābhāsīkaraṇamiha śāstresaṃgatameveti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8617: yadyevaṃ tataḥ parakīyānumānanirāsa eva kasmātprathamaṃ na kṛta ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8625: naca parapakṣadūṣaṇamantareṇa tattvanirṇayaḥ śakyaḥ kartumiti tatvanirṇayāya vītarāgeṇāpi parapakṣo dūṣyate na tu parapakṣatayeti na vītarāgakathātvavyāhatirityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8629: yāni hi yena rūpeṇā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyātsamanvīyante tāni tatkaraṇāni dṛṣṭāni,
GSP33vacbhamu:8630: yathā dhaṭādayo rucakādayaścā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyānmṛtsuvarṇānvitāstatkaraṇāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8631: tathā cedaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ ca bhāvajātaṃ suḥkhaduḥkhamohātmanānvitamupalabhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8635: yā ca mehātmatā tattama iti traiguṇyakāraṇasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8637: yathā maitradāreṣu padmāvatyāṃ maitrasya sukhaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ,taṃprati satvaguṇasamudbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8638: tatsapatnīnāṃ ca duḥkhaṃ,tatkasya hetoḥ, tāḥ pratyasyā rajoguṇasamudbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8639: caitrasya tu straiṇasya tāmavindato moho viṣādaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8644: tacca triguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ pradhīyate kriyate 'nena jagaditi,
GSP33vacbhamu:8646: tacca mṛtsuvarṇavadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣasya bhogāpavargalakṣaṇamarthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvata eva pravartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8647: na tu kenacitpravartyate. tathā hyāhuḥ--- 'puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam' iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:8653: yadi tāvadacetanaṃ pradhānamanadhiṣṭhitatvena mṛtsuvarṇādau dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi vyāpterupalabdherviruddhatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8655: tasmāt kṛtakatvamiva nityatvasādhanayā prayuktaṃ sādhyaviruddhena vyāptaṃ viruddham,
GSP33vacbhamu:8656: evaṃ samanvayādi cetanānadhiṣṭhitatve sādhya iti racanānupapatteriti darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8665: sa ca svabhāvapratibandhaḥ śaṅkitasamāropitopādhinirāse sati niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8667: tau cānvayavyatirekau na tathopādānācaitanye yathopādānācaitanye yathā cetanaprayuktatve 'tiparisphuṭau /
GSP33vacbhamu:8669: evamapi cetanaprayuktatvaṃ nābhyupeyeta yadi pramāṇāntaravirodho bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:8674: āntarāḥ khalvamī suḥkhaduḥkhamohaviṣādā bāhyebhyaścandanādibhyo 'tivicchinnapratyayapravedanīyebhyo vyatiriktā adhyakṣamīkṣyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:8675: yadi punareta eva suḥkhaduḥkhādisvabhāvā bhaveyustataḥsvarūpatvādhemante 'pi candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8679: evaṃ kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasya sukha iti manuṣyādīnāmapi prāṇabhṛtāṃ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8681: tasmādasukhādisvabhāvā api candanakuṅkumādayo jātikālāvasthādyapekṣayā sukhaduḥkhādihetavo na tu svayaṃ sukhādisvabhāvā iti ramaṇīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8682: tasmātsukhādirūpasamanvayo bhāvānāmasiddha iti nānena tadrūpaṃ kāraṇamavyaktamunnīyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8691: saṃsargapūrvakatve hi saṃsargasyaikasminnadvaye 'saṃbhavānnānātvaikārthasamavetasya nānākaraṇāni saṃsṛṣṭāni kalpanīyāni,
GSP33vacbhamu:8695: yadi tāvatparimitatvamiyattā, sā nabhaso 'pi nāstītyavyāpako hetuḥ parimāṇāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:8696: atha na yojanādimitatvaṃ parimāṇamiyattāṃ nabhaso brūmaḥ kintvavyāpitām,
GSP33vacbhamu:8698: nahi kāryaṃ kāraṇavyāpi, kintu kāraṇaṃ kāryavyāpīti parimitaṃ nabhastanmātrādyavyāpitvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8701: nahi yathā taiḥ kāryajātamāviṣṭamevaṃ tāni parasparaṃ viśanti,mithaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8703: nahi citiśaṅktiḥ kūṭasthanityā taiḥ saṃsṛjyate, tataśca tadavyāpakā guṇā iti parimitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8704: evaṃ citiśaktirapi guṇairasaṃsṛṣṭeti sāpi parimitetyanaikāntikatvaṃ parimitatvasya hetoriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8708: na kevalaṃ racanābhedā na cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa bhavantyapi tu sāmyāvasthāyāḥ pracyutirvaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8709: tathā ca yadudbhūtaṃ balīyastadaṅgyabhibhūtaṃ ca tadanuguṇatayā sthitamaṅgam,
GSP33vacbhamu:8710: evaṃ hi guṇapradhānabhāve satyasya mahadādau kārye kā pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8712: na hi cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa mṛtpiṇḍe pradhāne 'ṅgabhāvena cakradaṇḍasalilasūtirādayo 'vatiṣṭhante /
GSP33vacbhamu:8713: tasmātpravṛtterapi cetanādhiṣṭhānasiddhiriti 'śaktitaḥ pravṛtteśca' ityayamapi hetuḥ sāṃkhyīyo viruddha evetyuktaṃ vakroktyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8716: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-- tvayā kilaupaniṣadenāsmadhetūn dūṣayitvā kevalasya cetanasyaivānyanirapekṣasya jagadupādānatvaṃ nimittatvaṃ ca samarthanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8719: aupaniṣadastu cetanahetukāṃ tāvadeṣa sāṃkhyaḥ pravṛttimabhyupagacchatu paścāt svapakṣamata eva samādhāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8725: acetanāśrayaiva sarvā pravṛttirdṛśyate na tu cetanāśrayā kācidapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:8731: na tāvaccetanaḥ pravṛtyāśrayatayā tatprayojakatayā vā pratyakṣamīkṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8734: sadbhāvamātraṃ tu tatra cetanasya gamyate rathādivailakṣaṇyājjīvaddehasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:8736: mā bhūdākāśa utpattimatāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇamasti hi sarvatreti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8737: tadanena dehātirikte satyapi cetane tasya na pravṛttiṃ prati nimittabhāvo 'stītyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8738: yataścāsya na pravṛttihetubhāvo 'sti ata eva pratyakṣe dehe sati pravṛttidarśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamiti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8739: tathā ca na cidātmanimittā pravṛttiriti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:8740: tasmānna racanāyāḥ pravṛttervā cidātmakāraṇatvasiddhirjagata iti aupaniṣadaḥ pariharati-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8742: na tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamasiddhaḥ śārīro vā paramātmā vāsmābhiridānīṃ sādhanīyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8744: tatra mṛtaśarīre vā rathādau vānadhiṣṭhite cetanena pravṛtteradarśanāt tadviparyaye ca pravṛttidarśanādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cetanahetukatvaṃ pravṛtterniścīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8750: dehaḥ svayaṃ cetanaḥ karacaraṇādimān svavyāpāreṇa pravartayatīti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8751: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kūṭasthanityaścetano vyāpārarahito jñānaikasvabhāvaḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt pravartako yukta iti codayati-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8757: sāṃkhyānāṃ hi svadeśasthā rūpādaya indriyaṃ vikurvate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8758: tena tadindrayamarthaṃ prāptamarthākāreṇa pariṇamata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8761: yeṣāmacetanaṃ cetanaṃ cāsti teṣāmetadyujyate vaktuṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ pravartata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8764: teṣāṃ pravartyābhāve kaṃ prati pravartakatvaṃ cetanasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8767: kāraṇabhūtayā layalakṣaṇayāvidyayā prāksargopacitena ca vikṣepasaṃskāreṇa yat pratyupasthāpitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ tadeva māyā,
GSP33vacbhamu:8769: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- neyaṃ sṛṣṭirvastusatī yenādvaitino vastusato dvitīyasyābhāvādanuyujyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8770: kālpanikyāṃ tu sṛṣṭāvasti kālpanikaṃ dvitīyaṃ sahāyaṃ māyāmayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8778: yathā payombunoścetanānadhiṣṭhitayoḥ svata eva pravṛttirevaṃ pradhānasyāpīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8785: na ca sapakṣeṇa vyabhicāra iti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8790: iha tu sarvasya cetanāpekṣā pravṛttiḥ pratipādyata iti kuto na virodha ityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8792: sthūladarśilokābhiprāyānurodhena taduktaṃ na tu paramārthata ityarthaḥ //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8795: yadyapi sāṃkhyānāmapi vicitrakarmavāsanāvāsitaṃ pradhānaṃ sāmyāvasthāyāmapi tathāpi na karmavāsanāḥ sargasyeśate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8796: kintu pradhānameva svakārye pravartamānamadharmapratibaddhaṃ sanna sukhamayīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartumutsahata iti dharmeṇādharmapratibandho 'panīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8799: yathāhuḥ-- 'nimittamaprayojakaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ varaṇabhedastu tataḥ kṣetrikavat' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8800: tataśca pratibandakāpanayasādhane dharmādharmavāsane api saṃnihite ityāgantorapekṣaṇīyasyābhāvāt sadaiva sāmyena pariṇameta vaiṣamyeṇa vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:8802: īśvarasya tu mahāmāyasya cetanasya līlayā vā yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvavaicitryādvā karmaparipākāpekṣasya pravṛttinivṛttī upapadyete eveti //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8805: dhenūpayuktaṃ hi tṛṇapallavādi yathā svabhāvata eva cetanānapekṣaṃ kṣīrabhāvena pariṇamate na tu tatra dhenūcaitanyamapekṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8807: evaṃ pradhānamapi svabhāvata eva pariṇaṃsyate kṛtamatra cetaneneti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8808: dhenūpayuktasya tṛṇādeḥ kṣīrabhāve kiṃ nimittāntaramātraṃ niṣidhyate, uta cetanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8809: na tāvannimittāntaraṃ, dhenudehasthasyaudaryasya vahnyādibhedasya nimittāntarasya saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8810: buddhipūrvakārī tu tatrāpīśvara eva sarvajñaḥ saṃbhavatīti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8821: na kevalaṃ tāttviko bhogo 'nādheyātiśayasya kūṭasthanityasya puruṣasya na saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8823: yena hi prayojanena pradhānaṃ pravartitaṃ tadanena kartavyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8828: citeḥ sadā viśuddhatvānnaitasyāṃ jātu karmānubhavavāsanāḥ santi /
GSP33vacbhamu:8830: tathā ca pradhānapravṛtteḥ prāk citirmuktaiveti nāpavargārthamapi tatpravṛttiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8838: bhogasya ca sakṛcchabdādyupalabghimātrādeva samāptatvānna tadarthaṃ punaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartetetyayatnasādhyo mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8841: atha puruṣārthāya pravṛttaṃ kimarthaṃ sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiṃ karoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8843: hantāyāṃ sakṛcchabdādyupabhogena kṛtaprayojanasya pradhānasya nivṛttimātrādeva sidhyatīti kṛtaṃ sattvānyatākhyātipratīkṣaṇena /
GSP33vacbhamu:8845: tasmādubhayārthamapi na pradhānasya pravṛttirupapadyata iti siddhor'thābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8853: sā ca sarjanīyamantareṇānarthikā syāditi yatpradhānena śabdādi sṛjyate tadeva dṛkśakterdṛśyaṃ bhavatīti tadubhayārthavatvāya sarjanamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8856: yathā hi pradhānasya sargaśaktirekaṃ puruṣaṃ prati caritārthāpi puruṣāntaraṃ prati pravartate 'nucchedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8857: evaṃ dṛkśaktirapi taṃ puruṣaṃ pratyarthavattvāyānucchedātsarvadā pravartetetyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8858: sakṛddṛśyadarśanena vā caritārthatve na bhūyaḥ pravarteteti sarveṣāmekapade nirmokṣaḥ prasajyeteti sahasā saṃsāraḥ samucchidyeteti //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8863: puruṣa eva dṛkśaktisampannaḥ paṅguriva pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ pradhānamandhamiva pravartayiṣyatīti śaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8873: yadi pradhānāvasthā kūṭasthanityā, tato na tasyāḥ prācyutiranityatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8874: yathāhuḥ-- 'nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8883: yatsāmyāvasthayā suciraṃ paryaṇamatkathaṃ tadevāsati vilakṣaṇapratyayopanipāte vaiṣamyamupaiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8884: anapekṣasya svato vāpi vaiṣamye na kadācitsāmyaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ //8 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8888: aṅgitvānupapattilakṣaṇo doṣastāvanna bhavadbhiḥ śakyaḥ parihartumiti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8907: nahi tapirastiriva kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ, kintu paciriva karmasthabhāvakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8909: tathā ca tapyena karmaṇā tāpakasamavetakriyāphalaśālinā tāpakādanyeva bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8911: anyatve tu tapyasya tāpakāccaitrasamavetagamanakriyāphalabhājo gamyasyeva nagarasya tapyatvopapatti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8915: nahi svabhāvādbhāvo viyojituṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8916: jaladheśca vīcitaraṅgaphenādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ santa āvirbhāvatirobhāvadharmāṇo na tu tairjaladhiḥ kadācidapi mucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8924: tadevamaupaniṣadaṃ matamasamañjasamuktvā sāṃkhyaḥ svapakṣe tapyatāpakayorbhede mokṣamupapādayati-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8938: tathāpi yathā jayaḥ parājayo vā yogheṣu vartamānaḥ prādhānyātsvāminyapadiśyate ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8950: tāpo hi sāṃvyavahārika eva na pāramārthika atyasakṛdāveditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8952: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvanyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātāmi#tyasmadabhyupagama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8953: sāṃkhyo 'pi hi bhedāśrayaṃ tapyatāpakabhāvaṃ bruvāṇo na puruṣasya tapikarmatāmākhyātumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8955: kevalamanena sattvaṃ tapyam ,abhyupeyaṃ tāpakaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8956: darśitaviṣayattvāttu buddhisatve tapye tadavibhāgāpatyā puruṣo 'pyanutapyata iva na tu tapyate 'pariṇāmitvādityuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8963: sahādarśanena nimittena vartata iti sanimittaḥ saṃyogastadapekṣatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:8969: tasya ca buddhisatvasya tāmasaviparyāsādātmanaḥ puruṣādbhedamapaśyataḥ puruṣastapyata ityabhimānaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8971: tasya tu buddhisatvasya sāttvikyā vivekakhyātyā tāmasīyamavivekakhyātirnivartanīyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8973: tathā vicchinnāpi chinnabadarīva punastamasodbhūtena sattvamabhibhūya vivekakhyātimapodya śataśikharāvidyāvirbhāvyeteti bateyamapavargakathā tapasvino dattajalāñjaliḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8979: atha tasmin pratibimbe malinādarśopadhānānmalinatā padaṃ labhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8980: tathā cātmano malinaṃ mukhaṃ paśyan devadattastapyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8981: yadā tūpādhyapanayādbimbameva kalpanāvaśāt pratibimbaṃ taccāvadātamiti tattvamavagacchati tadāsya tāpaḥ praśāmyati naca malinaṃ me mukhamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8982: evamavidyopadhānakalpitāvacchedo jīvaḥ paramātmapratibimbakalpaḥ kalpitaireva śabdādibhiḥ saṃparkāttapyate natu tattvataḥ paramātmano 'sti tāpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8984: na cāsya punaḥ saṃsārabhayamasti taddhetoravāstavatvena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8989: yathaiva pradhānakāraṇavādo brahmakāraṇavādavirodhyevaṃ paramāṇukāraṇavādo 'pyataḥ so 'pi nirākartavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8990: 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ' ityasya prapañca ārabhyate-- tatra vaiśeṣikā brahmakāraṇatvaṃ dūṣayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9000: tasya tu sāvayavatve 'bhyupagamyamāne 'nantāvayavatvena sumerurājasarṣapayoḥ samānaparimāṇatvaprasaṅga ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9002: tato 'sau paramāṇvantareṇa saṃyujyadvyaṇukamārabhate. bahavastu paramāṇavaḥ saṃyuktā na sahasā sthūlamārabhante,
GSP33vacbhamu:9005: yadi hi ghaṭopagṛhītāḥ paramāṇavo ghaṭamārabheran na ghaṭe pravibhajyamāne kapālaśarkarādyupalabhyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:9008: tathā sati mudgaraprahārāt ghaṭavināśe na kiñcidupalabhyeta, teṣāmanārabdhatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9010: tasmānna bahūnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ dravyaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇatvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9014: tadapi hi dvyaṇukameva bhavenna tu mahat /
GSP33vacbhamu:9020: tathā ca puruṣopabhogātiśayābhāvādadṛṣṭanimittatvācca viśvanirmāṇasya bhogārtatvāttatkāraṇena ca dvyaṇukena tanniṣpatteḥ kṛtaṃ dvyaṇukāśrayeṇa dvyaṇukāntareṇetyārambhavaiyarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9021: ārambhārthavattvāya bahubhireva dvyaṇukaistryaṇukaṃ caturaṇukaṃ vā dravyaṃ mahaddīrghamārabdhavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9024: tryaṇukādibhirārabdhaṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ kāraṇabahutvādvā kāraṇamahatvādvā kāraṇapracayabhedādvā mahadbhavatīti prakriyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9025: tadetayaiva prakriyayā kāraṇasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyameva gumāntaramārabhanta iti dūṣaṇamadūṣaṇīkriyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9028: yathā mahad dravyaṃ tryaṇukādi hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9029: na tu mahattvaguṇopajanane dvyaṇukagataṃ mahattvamapekṣate,tasya hṛsvatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9030: yathā vā tadeva tryaṇukādi dīrdhaṃ hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9033: yathā dvyaṇukamaṇu hṛsvaparimāṇaṃ parimaṇḍalāt paramāṇoraparimaṇḍalaṃ jāyata evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jaganniṣpadyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9041: yadāhi dve dve dvyaṇuke#iti paṭhitavye pramādādekaṃ dvepadaṃ na paṭhitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9043: itarathā hi dvyaṇukameva tadapi syānna tu mahadityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9044: athavā dve iti dvitve , yathā 'hyekayordvivacanaikavacane' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9047: tadevaṃ yojanīyam-- dvyaṇukādhikaraṇe ye dvitve te yadā caturaṇukamārabhete saṃkhyeyānāṃ caturṇāṃ dvyaṇukānāmārambhakatvāttattadgate dvitvasaṃkhye api ārambhike ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9048: evaṃ vyavasthitāyāṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyāyāṃ taddūṣaṇasya vyabhicāra uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9051: nāṇu jāyate no hṛsvaṃ jāyate iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9056: kāraṇagatā guṇā na kārye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhanta ityetāvataiveṣṭasiddhau na tadhetvanusāreṇa khedanīyaṃ mana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9057: api ca satparimāṇāntaramākrāmati notpatteśca prāk parimāṇāntaraṃ saditi kathamākrāmet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9078: paramāṇūnāmādyasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇābhyupagame 'nabhyupagame vā na karmātastadabhāvastasya dvyaṇukādikrameṇa sargasyābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9082: athavā saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthamubhayathāpi na karmātaḥ sargahetoḥ saṃyogasyābhāvāt pralayahetorvibhāgasyābhāvāttadabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9097: gurutvadravatve ca paramāṇugate sadātane iti karmasātatyaprasaṅgaḥ. dvitīyaṃ vyākhyānamāśaṅkāpūrvamāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9107: yadyapi paramāṇukṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogaḥ paramāṇukarmajastathāpi tatpravāhasya sātatyamiti bhāvaḥ. sarvātmanā cedupacayābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9108: ekadeśena hi saṃyoge yāvaṇvorekadeśau nirantarau tābhyāmanye ekadeśāḥ saṃyogenāvyāptā iti prathamopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9109: sarvātmanā tu nairantarye paramāṇāvekasmin paramāṇvāntarāṇyapi saṃmāntīti na prathamā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9115: nahyasti saṃbhavo niravayava ekastadaiva tenaiva saṃyuktaścāsaṃyuktaśceti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9125: nanvabhighātanodanādayaḥ pralayārambhasamaye kasmādvibhāgārambhakakarmahetavo na saṃbhavantyata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9132: yadyapi śarīrādipralayārambhe 'sti duḥkhabhogastathāpyasau pṛthivyādipralaye nāstītyabhipretyedamuditamiti mantavyam //12 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9137: na tāvat svatantraḥ samavāyo 'tyantaṃ bhinnaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ samavāyinau ghaṭayitumarhatyatiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9140: athāsau saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandhe na saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate saṃbandhisaṃbandhanaparamārthatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9142: na ca tasmin sati samabanghināvasaṃbanghinau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9143: tasmāt svabhāvādeva samavāyaḥ samavāyinorna saṃbandhāntareṇeti nānavastheti codayati-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9150: naca tasmin sati saṃyogināvasaṃyoginau bhavata iti tulyacarcaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9156: yadyasamavāye 'syāguṇatvaṃ bhavati kāmaṃ bhavatu na naḥ kācitkṣatiḥ,tadidamuktam-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9159: tacca vināpi samavāyaṃ svarūpataḥ saṃyogasyopapadyata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:9160: naca kāryatvātsamavāyyasamavāyikāraṇāpekṣitayā saṃyogaḥ samavāyīti yuktamca ajasaṃyogasyātathātvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9161: api ca samavāyasyāpi saṃbandhyadhīnasadbhāvasya saṃbandhinaścaikasya dvayorvā vināśitvena vināśitvātkāryatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9162: nahyasti saṃbhavo guṇo vā guṇaguṇinau vāvayavo vāvayavāvayavinau vā na sto 'pyasti ca tayoḥ saṃbandha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9164: tathā ca yathaiṣa nimittakāraṇamātrādhīnotpāda evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9165: atha samavāyo 'pi samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇe apekṣate tathāpi saivānavastheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9171: tasmātsaṃyogaḥ saṃyoginoḥ samavāyena saṃbaddha iti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9180: yat kila bhūtabhautikānāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ tadrūpādimān paramāṇurnitya iti bhavadbhirabhyupeyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9184: tadanena prasaṅgena jagatkāraṇaprasiddhaye pravṛttaṃ sādhanaṃ rūpādimannityaparamāṇusiddheḥ pracyāvya brahmagocaratāṃ nīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9197: tenānityamiti laukikena niṣedhenānyatra nityatvasadbhāvaḥ kalpanīyaḥ, te cānye paramāṇava iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9200: vyapadeśasya ca pratītipūrvakasya tadabhāve nirmūlasyāpi darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9204: yadi satāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ paridṛśyamānasthūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇāgrahaṇamavidyā tayā nityatvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9207: athādravyatve satīti viśeṣyeta#tathā sati na dvyaṇuke vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9214: api cādravyatve sati sattvādityata eveṣṭārthasiddheravidyeti vyartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:9223: yadi hi saṃyogasacivāni bahūni dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabheranniti prakriyā sidhyet sidhyet dravyadvayameva(?)
GSP33vacbhamu:9226: na tāvat tantvādhārastadvyatiriktaḥ paṭo nāmāsti yaḥ saṃyogasacivaistantubhirārabhyetetyuktamadhastāt. ṣaṭpadārthasya dūṣayannagre vakṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9229: tathāhi-- mṛdvā suvarṇaṃ vā sarveṣu ghaṭarucakādiṣvanugataṃ sāmānyamanubhūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9230: na caite ghaṭarucakādayo mṛtsuvarṇābhyāṃ vyatiricyanta ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9232: tasmānmṛtsuvarṇe eva tena tenīkāreṇa pariṇamamāne ghaṭa iti ca rucaka iti ca kapālaśarkarākaṇamiti ca śakalakaṇikācūrṇamiti ca vyākhyāyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:9234: na tu ghaṭādayo vā kapālādiṣu kapālādayo vā ghaṭādiṣu ca rucakādayo vā śakalādiṣu śakalādayo vā rucakādiṣu pratyabhijñāyante yatra kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9235: na ca vinaśyantameva ghaṭakṣaṇaṃ pratītya kapālakṣaṇo 'nupādāna evotpadyate tatkimupādānapratyabhijñāneneti vaktavyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9238: evaṃ vyavasthite yathā suvarṇadravyaṃ kāṭhinyāvasthāmapahāya dravāvasthayā parigaṇitaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9239: na ca tatrāvayavavibhāgaḥ sannapi dravatve kāraṇaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9242: api tu yadā yadā nirūpyante tadā tadā tadākāratayaiva prathante na tu prathāyāmeṣāmasti svātantryaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9243: tasmānnātiricyante dravyādapi tu dravyameva sāmānyarūpaṃ tathā tathā prathata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9248: na tadadhīnotpādatāṃ tadadhīnatvamācakṣmahe kintu tadākāratāṃ, tathā ca na vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9251: yatra hi dvāvākāriṇau vibhinnābhyāmākārābhyāmavagamyate tau saṃbaddhāsaṃbaddhau vā vaiyadhikaraṇyena pratibhāsete,
GSP33vacbhamu:9252: yatheha kuṇḍe dadhi yathā vā gauraśva iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9261: yadi tu saṃyoginoḥ kāryayoḥ saṃbandhibhyāmanyadeśatve yutasiddhistato 'nyāyutasiddhiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9263: tathā cākāśaparamāṇvoḥ paramāṇvośca saṃyuktayoryutasiddhiḥ siddhā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9274: evaṃ lakṣaṇe 'pi hi samavāye guṇaguṇinorabhyupagamyamāne saṃbaddhe iti pratyayaḥ syānna tādātmyapratyayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9276: sa cedāsthito 'pi na pratyayamimamupapādayet kṛtaṃ tatkalpanayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9278: tadgocaratve hi paṭe śukla ityevamākaraḥ syānna tu paṭaḥ śukla iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9281: nahyagnirmāṇavaka ityupacaritāgnibhāvo māṇavakaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dahanātmanā prathate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9283: guṇādisadbhāve tadbhede ca pratyakṣānubhavādanyasya pramāṇasyābhāvāttasya ca bhrāntatve sarvābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9295: saṃbandhidvayādhīnasadbhāvo hi saṃbandho nāsatyekasminnapi saṃbandhini bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9296: naca samavāyo nityaḥ svatantra iti coktamadhastāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9298: evaṃ hi sati samavāyasya nityatvābhyupagamāt kāraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9299: utpattau ca samavāyasya saiva kāryasyāstu kiṃ samavāyena /
GSP33vacbhamu:9304: kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyate itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt# /
GSP33vacbhamu:9314: naca tantupaṭayoḥ saṃbandhastathā, utpannamātrasyaiva paṭasya tantusaṃbandhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9317: saṃyogajo 'pi hi saṃyogo bhavadbhirabhyupeyate na kriyāja evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9321: api ca saṃbandhirūpātirikte saṃbandhe siddhe tadavāntarabhedāya lakṣaṇabhedo 'nuśrīyeta sa eva tu saṃbandhyatirikto 'siddhaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9322: uktaṃ hi parastādatiriktaḥ saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandho 'saṃbaddho na saṃbandhinau ghaṭayitumiṣṭe /
GSP33vacbhamu:9326: tasmāt kāryasya kāraṇādanatirekān kiṃ kena saṃbaddhaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9327: saṃyogasya ca saṃyogibhyāmanatirekāt kastayoḥ saṃyoga ityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9338: parāpekṣayā tu pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9358: saṃśleṣaḥ saṃgraho yata ekasaṃbandhyākarṣe saṃbandhyantarākarṣo bhavati tasyānupapattiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9362: nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpanīyaḥ samavāya iti cet# /
GSP33vacbhamu:9373: tathā ca paramāṇavaḥ, tasmātsāvayavā anityāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9379: kiṃ sūkṣmatvāt paramāṇavo na vinaśyantyatha niravayavatayā tatra pūrvasmin kalpe idamuktam-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9388: api tu saṃyuktā eva santaḥ paraṃ prathanena nudyamānā adhikadeśavyāpakā bhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9389: evamagnisaṃyogena suvarṇadravyāvayavāḥ saṃyuktā eva santo dravībhāvamāpadyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:9393: evamantareṇāpyavayavasaṃyogavināśaṃ paramāṇavo vinaṅkṣyantyanye cotpatsyanta iti sarvamavadātam //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9399: te hi paramāṇvākāśādikkālātmamanasāṃ ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcinnityatvamabhyupetya śeṣāṇāṃ niranvayavināśamupayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9401: tena tadupanyāso vaināśikatvasāmyena sarvavaināśikān smārayatīti tadanantaraṃ vaināśikamatanirākaraṇamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9408: vādivaicitryāt khalu , kecitsarvāstitvameva rāddhāntaṃ pratipadyante kecijjhānamātrāstitvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9410: atha tvatrabhavatāṃ sarvajñānāṃ tattvapratipattibhedo na saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9416: ye tu prakṛṣṭamatayastebhyaḥ sākṣādeva śūnyatātattvaṃ pratipādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9425: pṛthivī kharasvabhāvā, āpaḥ snehasvabhāvāḥ, agniruṣṇasvabhāvaḥ, vāyurīraṇasvabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9429: rūpyante ebhiriti rūpyanta iti ca vyutpatyā saviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi rūpaskandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9430: yadyapi rūpyamāṇāḥ pṛthivyādayo bāhyāstathāpi kāyasthatvādvā indriyasaṃbandhādvā bhavantyādhyātmikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9432: vedanāskandho yā priyāpriyānubhayaviṣayasparśe suḥkhaduḥkhatadrahitaviśeṣāvasthā cittasya jāyate sa vedanāskandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9434: yathā ḍitthaḥ kuṇḍalī gauro brāhmaṇo gacchatītyevañjātīyakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9435: saṃskāraskandho rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ,upakleśāśca madamānādayaḥ, dharmādharmau ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9440: rūpavijñānādiskandhahetuke ca samudāya ādhyātmike 'bhipreyamāṇe tadaprāptistasya samudāyasyāyuktatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9444: cetano hi kulālādiḥ sarvaṃ mṛddaṇḍādyupasaṃhṛtya samudāyātmakaṃ ghaṭamāracayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9445: nahyasati mṛddaṇḍādivyāpārīṇi viduṣi kulāle svayamacetanā mṛddaṇḍādayo vyāpṛtya jātu ghaṭamāracayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9446: na cāsati kuvinde tantuvemādayaḥ paṭaṃ vayante /
GSP33vacbhamu:9448_2: cetanānadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo vyāvartamānā cetanādhiṣṭhitatva avāvatiṣṭhata iti
GSP33vacbhamu:9451: taddhīndriyādiviṣayasparśe satyabhijvalat tatkāraṇacakraṃ yathāyathā kāryāya paryāptaṃ tathātathā prakāśayadacetanāni kāraṇānyadhiṣṭhāya kāryamabhinirvartayatīti, tatrāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9464: yadyucyeta asamavahitānyeva kāraṇāni kāryaṃ kariṣyanti parasparānapekṣāṇi,
GSP33vacbhamu:9470: yat khalvekaṃ yadi sthiramāsthīyeta tato nāmāntareṇātmaiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:9478: tena vyāpāravatā vyāpārātpūrvaṃ vyāpārasamaye ca bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9486: ayamarthaḥ-- saṃkṣepato hi pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇamuktaṃ buddhena 'idaṃ pratyayaphalam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9489: atha punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataśca pratyayopanibandhataśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:9491: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ-- yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuro 'ṅkurātpatraṃ patrātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnālo nālādgarbho garbhācchūkaḥ śūkātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9492: asati bīje 'ṅkuro na bhavati, yāvadasati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9493: sati tu bīje 'ṅkuro bhavati, yāvat puṣpe sati phalamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9494: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9495: . aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahaṃ bījena nirvartita iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9496: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ phalaṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9498: tasmādasatyapi caitanye bījādīnāmasatyapi cānyasminnadhiṣṭhātari kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamo dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9502: hetuṃ hetuṃ pratyayante hetvantarāṇīti,teṣāmayamānānāṃ bhāvaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9505: tatra ca pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karoti yato 'ṅkuraḥ kaṭhino bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9511: tadeteṣāmavikalānāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāye bīje rohityaṅkuro jāyate nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9512: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ bījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9515: tathādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:9516: tatrāsya hetūpanibandho yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇādaya udapatsyanta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9518: saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayamavidyayā nirvartitā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9519: evaṃ yāvajjātyā api naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ jarāmaraṇādyabhinirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9520: jarāmaraṇādīnāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirnirvartitā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9521: atha ca satsvavidyādiṣu svayamacetaneṣu cetanāntarānadhiṣṭhiteṣvapi saṃskārādīnāmutpattiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9531: yastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati pañcavijñānakāryasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9533: yadā hyādhyātmikāḥ pṛthivyādidhātavo bhavantyavikalāstadā sarveṣāṃ samavāyādbhavati kāyasyotpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9534: tatra pṛthivyādidhātūnāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ kāyasya kāṭhinyādi nirvartayāma iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9535: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamebhiḥ pratyayairabhinirvartita iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9538: tatraiteṣveva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣu yaikasaṃjñā, piṇḍasaṃjñā, nityasaṃjñā, suḥkhasaṃjñā,
GSP33vacbhamu:9547: sparśaḥ,#sparśādvedanā sukhādikā, vedanāyāṃ satyāṃ kartavyametatsukhaṃ punarmayetyadhyavasānan #
GSP33vacbhamu:9562: tadutthaṃ pralapanaṃ hā mātaḥ,hā tāta, hā ca me putrakalatrādīti #
GSP33vacbhamu:9570: janmādihetukā avidyādayo 'vidyādihetukāśca janmādayo ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamānāḥ santīti tadetairavidyādibhi #
GSP33vacbhamu:9575: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-- yat khalu hetūpanibandhaṃ kāryaṃ tadanyānapekṣaṃ hetumātrādhīnotpādatvādutpadyatāṃ nāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:9584: na caikasmādeva kāraṇātkāryasiddheḥ kimanyaiḥ kāraṇairiti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9586: na caiko 'pitatkāraṇasamarthaṃ ityanya udāsata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9587: nahi te prekṣāvanto yenaisamālocayeyurasmāsu samartha eko 'pi kārye iti kṛtaṃ naḥ saṃnidhineti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9589: tāṃśca sarvananapekṣān pratītya kāryamapi na netpattumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9590: naca svamahimnā sarve kāryamutpādayanto 'pi nānākāryāṇāmīsate tatraiva teṣāṃ sāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9591: na ca kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ, sāmagryā ekatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9595_0: hantānena krameṇa tataḥ pūrve tataḥ pūrve sarva evānapekṣāstattatsvakāryopajanana
GSP33vacbhamu:9595_2: bījakṣaṇo janayitavyaḥ so 'napekṣa eva bījakṣaṇaḥ svakāryopajanane evaṃ sarva eva
GSP33vacbhamu:9595_3: tadantarānantapavartino bījakṣaṇa anapekṣā iti kusūlanihitabīja eva syāt kṛtī kṛṣīvalaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:9596: yena hi bījakṣaṇena svakṣaṇaparamparayāṅkuro janayitavyastasyānapekṣāsau kṣaṇaparamparā kusūla evāṅkuraṃ kariṣyatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9597: tasmātparasparāpekṣā evāntyā vā madhyā vā pūrve vā kṣaṇāḥ kāryopajanana iti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9609: tatra na tāvat kāraṇamanyathānupapadyamānaṃ kāryamutpādayati, kintu svasāmarthyena /
GSP33vacbhamu:9612: .tacca sthirapakṣe 'pi satyapi ca bhoktaryaghiṣṭhātāraṃ cetanamantareṇa na saṃbhavati kimaṅga,
GSP33vacbhamu:9614: bhokturbhogenāpi kadācidākṣipyeta saṃghātaḥ,sa tu bhoktāpi nāstīti dūrotsāritatvaṃ darśayati-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9616: api ca bahava upakāryopakārakabhāvena sthitāḥ kāryaṃ janayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9623: yadā hi pratyayopanibandhaḥ pratītyasamutpādo bhavettadā cetano 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣetāpi,
GSP33vacbhamu:9626: hetuḥ svabhāvata eva kāryasaṃghātaṃ kariṣyati kevala iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9627: astu tāvadyathā kevalādhetoḥ kāryaṃ nopajāyata iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9632: asthirā api hi bhāvāḥ sadā saṃhatā evodayante vyante ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:9634: tathā ca kṛtamatra saṃhantrā cetaneneti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9639: sa khalu saṃghātasaṃtativarti dharmādharmāhvayaḥ saṃskārasaṃtāno yathāyathaṃ sukhaduḥkhe janayannāgantukaṃ kañcanānāsādya svata eva janayet,āsādya vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9643: tasmādanenāgatantukānapekṣasya saṃdhātasaṃtānasyaiva sadṛśajanane visadṛśajanane vā svabhāva āstheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9647: aprāptabhogo hi bhogamāptukāmastatsādhane pravartata iti pratyātmasiddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:9648: seyaṃ pravṛttirbhogādanyasmin sthire bhoktari bhogatatsādhanasamayavyāpini kalpyate nāsthire /
GSP33vacbhamu:9650: nahi bhogo bhogāya kalpate nāpyanyo bhogāyānyasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:9672: kāraṇasya hi kāryotpādāt prākkālasattār'thavatī na kāryakālā,
GSP33vacbhamu:9673: tadā kāryasya siddhatvena tatsidydharthāyāḥ sattāyā anupayogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9676: bhūtvā vyāpṛtya bhāvāḥ prayeṇa hi kāryaṃ kurvanto loke dṛśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:9677: tathā ca sthiratvam, itarathā tu lokavirodha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9680: yathāhuḥ-- 'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate 'iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9681: bhavatyevaṃ vyāpāravattā tathāpi kṣaṇikasya na kāraṇatvamityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9684: yadi ca na kāryasamaye kāraṇaṃ sat kathaṃ teṣāṃ tadātmanānubhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9685: naca kāraṇasādṛśyaṃ kāryasya na tu tādātmyamiti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9687: anugame vā tadeva kāraṇaṃ, tathā ca tasya kāryatādātmyamiti siddhimakṣaṇikatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9688: sarvathā vailakṣaṇye tu hetuphalabhāvastantughaṭādāvapi prāptaṃ ityatiprasaṅga ityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9690: naca tadbhāvabhāvo niyāmakaḥ, tasyaikasmin kṣaṇe 'śakyagrahatvāt, sāmānyasya cākāraṇatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9692: api ca cotpādanirodhayorvikalpatraye 'pi vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga ityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9706: evaṃ sukhādīnāmapi caittānāṃ cittābhinnahetujānāṃ catvāryotānyeva kāraṇāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:9707: seyaṃ pratijñā caturvidhān hetūn pratītya cittacaittā utpadyanta ityabhāvakāraṇatva uparudhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9713: bhāvapratīpā saṃkhyā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā , tayā nirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9718: hetuphalabhāvena hi vyavasthitāḥ saṃtānina evodayavyayadharmāṇaḥ saṃtānāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9721: sa kiṃ phalaṃ kiñcidārabhate na vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9724: anārambhe tu bhavedantyaḥ saḥ, kintu syādasan, arthakriyākāritāyāḥ sattālakṣaṇasya virahāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9725: tadasatve tajjanakamapyasajjanakatvenāsadityanena krameṇāsantaḥ sarva eva saṃtānina iti tatsaṃtāno nitarāmasanniti kasya pratisaṃkhyayā nirodha- /
GSP33vacbhamu:9730: kathañcitsārūpye vā visabhāge 'pyantataḥ sattayā tadastīti na saṃtānocchedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9734: atra tāvadutpannamātrāpravṛttasya bhāvasya na pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9738: yato niranvayo vināśo na saṃbhavatyato nirūpākhyo 'pi na saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9746: tasya ca sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvānna vināśa ityavasthāvato 'vināśānnāvasthānāṃ niranvayo vināśa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9751: yenāsya na niranvayo nāśaḥ syādityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9753: atrāpi tattoyaṃ tejasā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalamambudatvāya nīyata ityanumeyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9755: śakyaṃ tatra vaktum'udambindau ca sindhau ca toyabhāvona bhidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9768: tathāhi-- jātimattvena sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyebhyo vibhaktasya śabdasyāsparśatve sati bāhyaikendriyagrāhyatvena gandhādivadguṇatvamanumitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9772: tasmādguṇo bhūtvā gandhādivadasādhāraṇendriyagrāhyo yadravyamanumāpayati tadākāśaṃ pañcamaṃ bhūtaṃ vastviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9782_1: smṛtirupapatsyata iti manyamāno na parituṣyati taṃ prati pratyabhijñāsamājñātapratyakṣavirodhamāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9789: naca sādṛśyanibandhanaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ, pūrvāparakṣaṇadarśina ekasyābhāve tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9794: na tu tattvataḥ pūrvāparau kṣaṇau tayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ vā gṛhṇāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9799: nānāpadārthasaṃbhinnavākyārthābhāsastāvadayaṃ vikalpaḥ prathate tatraite nānāpadārthā na prathanta iti bruvāṇaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ bādheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9800: na caikasya jñānasya nānākāratvaṃ saṃbhavati, ekatvavirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9802: tathāsati pratyākāraṃ jñānānāṃ samāptesteṣāṃ ca parasparavārtājñānābhāvānnānetyeva na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9805: yadyucyeta astytasmin vikalpe tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti padadvayaprayogo na tviha tattedantāspadau padārthau tayośca sādṛśyamiti vivakṣitam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9810: na caitatsarvamasati vikalpānāṃ bāhyālambanatve 'sati ca lokaprasiddhapadārthakatve bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9811: jñānākāratve hi vikalpapratibhāsināṃ nityatvānityatvādīnāmekārthaviṣayatvābhāvāt jñānānāṃ ca dharmiṇāṃ bhedānna virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9813: na cālaukikārthenānityaśabdenātmani vibhutvaṃ vivakṣitvānityaśabdaṃ prayuñjāno laukikārthaṃ nityaśabdamātmani prayuñjānena vipratipadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9814: tasmādanena svapakṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhāpayiṣatā parapakṣasādhanaṃ ca nirācikīrṣatā vikalpānāṃ lokasiddhapadārthakatā bāhyalambanatā ca vaktavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9815: yadyucyeta dvividho hi vikalpānāṃ viṣayo grāhyaścādhyavaseyaśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:9817: tathāca pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahalakṣaṇā vipratipattiḥ prasiddhapadārthakatvaṃ copapadyata ityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9822: athānyā socyatāṃ, nanūktā taireva svapratibhāse 'narther'thādhyavasāyena pravṛttiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9827: nahi jātu sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9829: api ca tathāsati yukta iti pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9832: yadi gṛhyamāṇe tadā kiṃ vikalpenāho tatsamayajenāvikalpakena /
GSP33vacbhamu:9837: na ca tatsamayabhāvinā nirvikalpakena gṛhyamāṇe bāhye vikalpenāgṛhīte tatra vikalpaḥ svākāramāropayitumarhati. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9838: na hi rajatajñānāpratibhāsini purovartini vastuni rajatajñānena śakyaṃ rajatamāropayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:9839: agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye svākāra ityeva syānna bāhya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9841: api cāyaṃ vikalpaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ santaṃ vikalpaṃ kiṃ vastusantaṃ svākāraṃ gṛhītvā paścādbāhyamāropayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9843: na tāvat kṣaṇikatayā kramavirahiṇo jñānasya kramavartinī grahaṇāropaṇe kalpete /
GSP33vacbhamu:9847: bāhyaṃ cāropyamāṇamaviśadaṃ sattato 'nyadeva syānna tu svākāraḥ samāropitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9848: na ca bhedāgrahamātreṇa samāropābhidhānaṃ, vaiśadyāvaiśadyarūpatayā bhedagrahasyoktatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9850: hanta tarhi trailokyata evānena na bhedo gṛhīta iti yatra kvacana pravartetāviśeṣāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9853: api ca sādṛśyanibandhanaḥ saṃvyavahārastenedaṃ sadṛśamityevamākārabuddhinibandhano bhavenna tu tadevedamityākārabuddhinibandhana ityāha-- na #
GSP33vacbhamu:9855: nanu jvālādiṣu sādṛśyādasatyāmapi sādṛśyabuddhau tadbhāvāvagamananibandhanaḥ saṃvyahāro dṛśyate yathā tatheheti bhaviṣyatīti pūrvāparitoṣeṇāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9857: tathāhi -- vividhajanasaṃkīrṇagopureṇa puraṃ niviśamānaṃ narāntarebhya ātmanirdhāraṇāyāsādhāraṇaṃ cihnaṃ vidadhatamupahasanti pāśupataṃ pṛthagjanā iti //25 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9874: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-- kūṭastho hi kāryajananasvabhāvo vā syādatatsvabhāvo vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9875: sa cetkāryajananasvabhāvastato yāvadanena kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ tāvatsahasaiva kuryāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9878: yadyucye samartho 'pi kramavatsahakārisacivaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇi karotīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9885: bhede tūpakārasya tasmin sati kāryasya bhāvādasati cābhāvātsatyapi kūṭasthe kāryānutpādādanvayavyatirekābhyāmupakāra eva kāryakārī na bhāva iti nārthakriyākārī bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9886: taduktam- varṣātapābhyāṃ kiṃ vyomnaścarmaṇyasti tayoḥ phalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9889: tathā cākiñcitkarādapi cet kūṭasthātkāryaṃ jāyeta, sarvaṃ sarvasmājjāyeteti sūktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9900: viśeṣaṇayoge vā so 'pi bhāvaḥ syānna nirūpākhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9903: api ca yadyenānanvitaṃ na tattasya vikāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9911: sthiro 'pi bhāvaḥ kramavatsahakārisamavadhānāt krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9913: sa cāsya sahakāribhirādhīyamānā upakāro na bhinno nāpyabhinnaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9916: na caitāvatā sthirasyākāraṇatvaṃ, tadupādānatvātkāryasya, rajjūpādānatvamiva bhujaṅgasyetyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9917: tathā ca śrutiḥ- mṛttiketyeva satyam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9918: apica ye 'pi sarvato vilakṣaṇāni svalakṣaṇāni vastusantyāsthiṣata,
GSP33vacbhamu:9921: nahi bījādbījāntarasya vā kramelakasya vātyantavailakṣaṇye kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9922: naca bījāṅguratve sāmānye paramārthasatī, yenaitayorbhāvikaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9926: prapañcastu brahmatatvasamīkṣānyāyakaṇikayoḥ kṛta iti neha pratamyate vistarabhayāt //26. //
GSP33vacbhamu:9936: atha pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitiriti hi catusṛṣu vidhāsu tatvaparisamāptirāsāmānyatamābhāve 'pi tattvasyāvyavasthānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9937: tasmādanena vijñānaskandhamātraṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā catasro vidhā eṣitavyāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9939: nahyasti saṃbhavo vijñānamātraṃ catasro vidhāścetyata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9942: tathāpi buddhyārūḍhena buddhiparikalpitenānyastha evaiṣa pramāṇaprameyaphalavyavahāraḥ pramātṛvyavahāraścetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9945: na hi brahmavādino nīlādyākārāṃ vittimabhyupagacchanti, kintvanirvacanīyaṃ nīlāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9946: tathāhi- svarūpaṃ vijñānasyāsatyākārayuktaṃ prameyaṃ prameyaprakāśanaṃ pramāṇaphalaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9948: bāhyavādinorapi vaibhāṣikasautrāntikayoḥ kālpanika eva pramāṇaphalavyavahāro 'bhimata ityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9953: nahi khadiragocare paraśau palāśe dvaidhībhāvo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9957: na ca jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇamanaṃśamaṃśābhyāṃ vastusabhdyāṃ yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9964: tathā cāhuḥ-- 'nahi vittisattaiva tadvedanā yuktā, tasyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9970: sa hi vijñānālambanatvābhimato bāhyor'thaḥ paramāṇustāvanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9976: kimayaṃ pratibhāsasya jñānasya dharma uta pratibhāsanakāler'thasya dharmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9977: yadi pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ, advā, tathāsati hi svāṃśālambanameva vijñānamabhyupetaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9980: tathā hi-- rūpaparimāṇava eva nirantaramutpannā ekavijñānopārohiṇaḥ sthaulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9986: pratibhāsadaśāpannānāṃ tu teṣāṃ bhaviṣyati bahutvādivatsāṃvṛtaṃ sthaulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9990: sāṃvṛtaṃ grahaṇaṃ nānyatra ca vastugraho bhramaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9994_0: gandharasasparśaparamāṇvantaritā hi te rūpaparamāṇavo na nirantarāḥ tasmādārātsāntareṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:9994_1: vṛkṣeṣvekadhanavanapratyayavadeṣa sthūlapratyayaḥ paramāṇuṣu sāntareṣu bhrānta eveti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9995: tasmāt kalpanāpoḍhatve 'pi bhrāntatvāddhaṭādipratyayasya pītaśaṅkhādijñānavanna pratyakṣatā paramāṇugocaratvābhyupagame /
GSP33vacbhamu:10005: apratibhāsamānasadbhāve ca pramāṇābhāvānna bāhyālambanāḥ pratyayā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10007: nahi yathendriyamarthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayatyevaṃ vijñānamaparaṃ vijñānaṃ janayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10011: nahyasti saṃbhavo 'pratyutpanno dharmī dharmāścāsya pratyutpannā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10013: taccānākāraṃ sadājānato bhedābhāvāt kathamarthabhedaṃ vyavasthāpayediti tadbhedavyavasthāpanāyākārabhedo 'syaiṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10014: taduktam-- 'na hi vittisattaiva tadvedanā yuktā, tasyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10020: yadyena saha niyatasahopalambhanaṃ tattato na bhidyate, yathaikasmāccandramaso dvitīyaścandramāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10022: niṣedhyo hi bhedaḥ sahopalambhāniyamena vyāpto yathā bhinnāvaśvinau nāvaśyaṃ sahopavabhyete kadācidabhrāpidhāne 'nyatarasyaikasyopalabdheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10023: so 'yamiha bhedavyāpakāniyamavirūddho niyama upalabhyamānastadvyāpyaṃ bhedaṃ nivartayatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10028: yo yaḥ pratyayaḥ sa sarvo bāhyānāvambanaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10030: tathā caiṣa vivādādhyāsitaḥ pratyaya iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10031: bāhyānālambanatā hi pratyayatvamātrānubandhinī vṛkṣateva śiṃśapātvamātrānubandhinīti tanmātrānubandhini nirālambanatve sādhye bhavati pratyayatvaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10035: sa hi mene ye yasmin satyapi kādācitkāste sarve tadatiriktahetusāpekṣāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10037: tathā ca vivādādhyāsitāḥ satyapyālayavijñānasaṃtāne ṣaḍapi pravṛttipratyayā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10041: tasyāśca svakāryopajanaṃ pratyābhimukhyaṃ paripākastasya ca pratyayaḥ svasaṃtānavartī pūrvakṣaṇaḥ saṃtānāntarāpekṣānabhyupagamāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:10045: nanvevamekasyaiva nīlajñānopajanasāmarthyaṃ tatprabodhasāmarthyaṃ ceti kṣaṇāntarasyaitanna syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10046: satve vā kathaṃ kṣaṇabhedātsāmarthyabheda ityālayasaṃtānavartinaḥ sarve samarthā iti samarthahetusadbhāve kāryakṣepānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10047: svasaṃtānamātrādhīnatve niṣedhyasya kādācitkatvasya viruddhaṃ sadātanatvaṃ tasyopalabdhyā kādācitkatvaṃ nivartamānaṃ hetvantarāpekṣatve vyavatiṣṭhata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10048: naca jñānasaṃtānāntaranibandhanatvaṃ sarveṣāmiṣyate pravṛttivijñānānāṃ vijñānavādibhirapi tu kasyacideva vicchinnagamanavacanapratibhāsasya pravṛttivijñānasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:10049: api ca sattvāntarasaṃtānanimittatve tasyāpi sadā saṃnidhānānna kādācitkatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10050: na hi sattvāntarasaṃtānasya deśataḥ kālato vā viprakarṣasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10052: tasmādasati bāhyer'the pratyayavaicitryānupapatterastyānumāniko bāhyārtha iti sautrāntikāḥ pratipedire, tānnirākaroti-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10055: tathāhi-- bāhyanimittakatve 'pi kathaṃ kadācit nīlasaṃvedanaṃ kadācit pītasaṃvedanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10057: atha pītasaṃnidhāne 'pi kimiti nīlajñānaṃ na bhavati, pītajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10061: evaṃ tarhi kṣaṇānāmapi svakāraṇabhedanibandhaḥ śaktibhedo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10062: saṃtānino hi kṣaṇāḥ kāryabhedahetavaste ca pratikāryaṃ bhidyante ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10063: na ca saṃtāno nāma kaścideka utpādakaḥ kṣaṇānāṃ yadabhedāt kṣaṇā na bhidyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:10064: nanūktaṃ na kṣaṇabhedābhedābhyāṃ śaktibhedābhedau, bhinnānāmapi kṣaṇānāmekasāmarthyopalabdheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10065: anyathaika eva kṣaṇe nīlajñānajananasāmarthyaṃ iti na bhūyo nīlajñānāni jāyeran. tatsamarthasyātītatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:10067: tasmāt kṣaṇabhede 'pi na sāmarthyabhedaḥ, saṃtānabhede tu sāmarthyaṃ bhidyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10070: hanta tarhi nīlasaṃtānānāmapi mitho bhinnānāṃ naikamasti nīlākārādhānasāmarthyamiti saṃnidhāne 'pi nīlasaṃtānāntarasya na nīlajñānamupajāyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10071: tasmātsaṃtānāntarāṇāmiva kṣaṇāntarāṇāmapi svakāraṇabhedādhīnopajanānāṃ keṣāñcideva sāmarthyabhedaḥ keṣāñcinneti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10072: tathā caikālayajñānasaṃtānapatiteṣu kasyacideva jñānakṣaṇasya sa tādṛśaḥ sāmarthyātiśayo vāsanāparanāmā svapratyayāsāditaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10073: yato nīlākāraṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ jāyate na pītākāram /
GSP33vacbhamu:10074: kasyacittu sa tādṛśo yataḥ pītākāraṃ jñānaṃ na nīlākāramiti vāsanāvaicitryādeva svapratyayāsāditājjñānavaicitryasiddherna tadatiriktārthasadbhāve kiñcanāsti pramāṇamiti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10089: nahi sphuṭatare sarvajanīna upalambhe sati tadabhāvaḥ śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10094: upalabdhigrāhiṇā hi sākṣiṇopalabdhirgṛhyamāṇā bāhyaviṣayatvenaiva gṛhyate nopalabdhimātramityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10103: idamatrākūtam-- ghaṭapaṭādayo hi sthūlā bhāsante na tu paramasūkṣmāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10104_2: nānātvaṃ prasajyamānaṃ jñānākāratve 'pi na śakyaṃ śakreṇāpi vārayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10107: na ca tāvat paramāṇvābhāsamekajñānam, ekasya nānātmatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10111: na ca tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī samastajñānākārasaṃkalanātmaka ekaḥ sthūlavikalpo vijṛmbhata iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10113: yathāha dharmakīrtiḥ- 'tasmānnārthe na ca jñāne sthūlābhāsastadātmanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10123: yaśca sahopalambhaniyama uktaḥ śo 'pi vkalpaṃ na sahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10124: yadi jñānārthayoḥ sāhityenopalambhastato viruddho heturnābhedaṃ sādhayitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10128: api ca kimekatvenopalambha āho eka upālambho jñānārthayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10132: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayo 'rupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityavagantavyam# /
GSP33vacbhamu:10133: yathā hi sarvaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prabhārūpānuviddhaṃ buddhibodhyaṃ niyamena manujairupalabhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:10137: api ca yatraikavijñānagocarau ghaṭapaṭau tatrārthabhedaṃ vijñānabhedaṃ cādyavasyanti pratipattāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10142: api ca svarūpamātraparyavasitaṃ jñānaṃ jñānāntaravārtānabhijñamiti yayorbhedaste dve na gṛhīte iti bhedo 'pi tadgato na gṛhīta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10144: evaṃ svamasādhāraṇamanyato vyāvṛtaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya tadapi yadvyāvartate yataśca vyāvartate tadanekajñānasādhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10155: evaṃ mokṣapratijñā ca yo mucyate yataśca mucyate yena mucyate tadanekajñānasādhyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10156: evaṃ vipratipannaṃ pratipādayituṃ pratijñeti yatpratipādayati yena pratipādayati yaśca tadanekajñānasādhyetyasatyekasminnanekārthajñānapratisaṃghātari nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10159: api ca bhedāśrayaḥ karmaphalabhāvo nābhinne jñāne bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10160: no khalu chidā chidyate kintu dāru /
GSP33vacbhamu:10162: tadihāpi na jñānaṃ svāṃśena jñeyamātmani vṛttivirodhādapi tu tadatiriktor'thaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10169: ayamarthaḥ-- svarūpādatiriktamarthaṃ cedvijñānaṃ gṛhṇāti tatastadapratyakṣaṃ sannarthaṃ pratyakṣayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10170: na hi cakṣuriva tannilīnamarthe kañcanātiśayamādhatte, yenārthamapratyakṣaṃ satpratyakṣayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10173: taccet jñānāntareṇa pratīyeta tadapratītaṃ nārthaviṣayaṃ jñānamaparokṣayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10174: evaṃ tattadityanavasthā tasmādanavasthāyā bibhyatā varaṃ svātmani vṛttirāsthitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10182: apitu tasminnindriyārthasaṃnikarṣādantaḥ karaṇavikārabheda utpannamātra eva prabhāturarthaścopalambhaśca pratyakṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10186: nahyasti saṃbhavo 'nubhava utpannaśca,na ca pramātuḥ pratyakṣo bhavati, yathā nīlādiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10187: tasmādyathā chettā chidayā chedyaṃ vṛkṣādi vyāpnoti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10191: yathā vā paktā pākyaṃ pākena vyāpnoti nanu pākaṃ pākāntareṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:10192: nāpi pāka eva paktā kintu svata eva devadettādiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10193: evaṃ pramātā prameyaṃ nīlādi pramayā vyāpnoti na tu pramāṃ pramāntareṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:10195: kintu svata eva pramāyāḥ pramātā vyāpakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10196: na ca pramātari kūṭasthanityacaitanye pramāpekṣāsaṃbhavo yataḥ pramātuḥ pramāyāḥ pramātrantarāpekṣāyāmanavasthā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10197: tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṃ 'vijñānagrahaṇamātra eva vijñānasākṣiṇaḥ pramātuḥ kūṭasthanityacaitanyasya grahaṇakāṅkṣānutpādāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10203: grāhyatvaṃ ca jñānasya na grāhakakriyājanitaphalaśālitayā yathā bāhyārthasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:10204: phale phalāntarānupapatteḥ. yathāhuḥ-- 'na saṃvidaryate phalatvāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10206: grāhyo 'pyarthaḥ pramātāraṃ prati satyāṃ saṃvidi prakaṭaḥ saṃvidapi prakaṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10208: syādetatṣa yatprakāśate tadanyena prakāśyate yathā jñānārthau tathā ca sākṣiti nāsti pratyayasākṣiṇorvaiṣamyamityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10210: tathāhi-- asya sākṣiṇaḥ sadāsaṃdigdhāviparītasya nityasākṣātkāratānāgantukaprakāśatve ghaṭate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10211: tathāhi-- pramātā saṃdihāno 'pyasaṃdigdho viparyasyannapyaviparītaḥ parokṣamarthamutprekṣamāṇo 'pyaparokṣaḥ smarannapyanubhavikaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:10216: ca pradīpavadvijñānamavabhāsakāntaranirapekṣaṃ svayameva prathata iti bruvatāpramāṇagamyaṃ vijñānamanavagantṛkamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10222: na phalasya kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ vāstīti pradīpavatkartrantarameṣitavyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10226: nanu sākṣisthāne 'stvasmadabhimatameva vijñānaṃ tathā ca nāmnyeva vipratipattirnārthā iti śaṅkate-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10231: bhavanti hi vijñānasyotpādādayo dharmā abhyupetāstathā cāsya phalatayā nāvagantṛtvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10240: jāgratpratyayasya tu bādhyatve svapnapratyayasyāsau na bādhako bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10242: tathā ca na svapnapratyayo mithyeti sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt svapnavaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:10243: tasmādbādhābādhābhyāṃ vaidharmyānna svapnapratyayadṛṣṭāntena jāgratpratyayasya śakyaṃ nirālambanatvamadhyavasātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10253: sāpi ca nidrādoṣādviparītāvartamānamapi pitrādi vartamānatayā bhāsayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10256: api ca svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe jāgratpratyayānāṃ yathārthatvamanubhavasiddhaṃ nānumānenānyathayituṃ śakyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:10274: yadi sākāraṃ vijñānaṃ saṃbhavati bāhyaścārthaḥ sthūlasūkṣmavikalpenāsaṃbhavī hantaivamarthajñāne sattena tāvadvicāraṃ na sahete /
GSP33vacbhamu:10284: - śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nādaraḥ kriyate# /
GSP33vacbhamu:10286: taiḥ khalu satsaditi gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtamaviparītaṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10288: sadasatośca vicārāsahatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddhaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10290: yadyucyeta tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pramāṇānāmanena vicāreṇa vyudasyate na sāṃvyavahārikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10293: pramāṇāni hi svagocare pravartamānāni tattvamidamityeva pravartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:10295: na punaḥ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ naḥ prāmāṇyaṃ na tu tāttvikamityeva pravartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:10297: yathā śuktikeyaṃ na rajataṃ marīcayo na toyamekaścandro na candradvayamityādi,
GSP33vacbhamu:10298: tadvadihāpi samastapramāṇagocaraviparītatattvāntaravyavasthāpanenātāttvikatvameṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakena darśanīyaṃ na tvavyavasthāpitatattvāntareṇa pramāṇāni śakyāni bādhitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10299: vicārāsahatvaṃ vastūnāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayadbādhakamatāttvikatvaṃ pramāṇānāṃ darśayatīti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:10301: kiṃ tadvastu paramārthataḥ sadādīnāmanyatamat kevalaṃ vicāraṃ na sahate,
GSP33vacbhamu:10303: tatra paramārthataḥ sadādīnīmanyatamadvicāraṃ na sahata iti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:10306: atha nistattvaṃ cet kathamanyatamattattvamavyavasthāpya śakyamevaṃ vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10309: so 'pi ca vicāraṃ na sahata ityuktaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10311: āropaśca tattvādhiṣṭhāno dṛṣṭo yathā śuktikādiṣu rajatādeḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10312: na cet kiñcidasti tattvaṃ kasya kasminnāropaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10314: tacca tattvaṃ vyavasthāpyātāttvikatvena sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakenopapadyata iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ //31 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10323: evaṃ kṣaṇikatvamabhyupetya 'utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā'iti nityatāmupaitītyādi bahūnnetavyamiti //32 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10339: pudgalāstikāyāḥ ṣoḍhā- pṛthivyādīni catvāri bhūtāni sthāraṃ jaṅgamaṃ cti dharmāstikāyaḥ pravṛttyanumeyo 'dharmāstikāyāḥ sthityanumeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10346: tatra mithyā pravṛttirāsravaḥ. samyakpravṛttī tu saṃvaranirjarau /
GSP33vacbhamu:10348: indriyadvārā hi pauruṣaṃ jyotirviṣayān spṛśadrūpādijñānarūpeṇa pariṇamata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10354: sā hyāsravasrotaso dvāraṃ saṃvṛṇotāti saṃvara ucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10356: sa hi niḥśeṣaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogena jarayatīti nirjaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10364: āhartadarśanābhyāsānna mokṣa iti jñānaṃ darśanāvaraṇīyaṃ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:10365: bahuṣu vipratiṣiddheṣu tīrthakarairupadarśiteṣu mokṣamārgeṣu viśeṣānavadhāraṇaṃ mohanīyaṃ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:10378: anye tūrdhvagamanaśīlo hi jīvo dharmādharmāstikāyena baddhastaddhimokṣādyadūrdhvaṃ gacchetyeva sa mokṣa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10393: yadi punarayamanekāntadyotakaḥ syācchabdo na bhavet syādastītivākye syātpadamanarthakaṃ syāt tadidamuktam-- 'arthayogitvāt'iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10394: anaikāntadyotakatve tu syādasti kathañcidastīti syātpadātkathañcidartho 'stītyanenānuktaḥ pratīyata iti nānarthakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10397: 'kiṃvṛtte pratyaye khalvayaṃ cinnipātavidhinā sarvathaikāntatyāgāt saptasvekānteṣu yo bhaṅgastatra yo nayastadapekṣaḥ san heyopādeyabhedāya syādvādaḥ kalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10398_0: tathāhi-- yadi vastvastyevetyevaikāntatastat sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanāstyeveti
GSP33vacbhamu:10398_1: na tadīpsājihāsābhyāṃ kvacit kadācit kathañcit kaścit pravarteta nivarteta vā prāptāprāpaṇīyatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:10400: anaikāntapakṣe tu kvacit kadācit kasyacit kathañcit sattve hānopādāne prekṣāvatāṃ kalpete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10407: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- satyaṃ yadasti vastutastatsarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanā nirvacanīyena rūpaṇāstyeva na nāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10415: laukikānāmabādhena tu tadvyavasthāyāṃ dehātmābhimānasyāpyabādhena tāttvikatve sati lokāyatamatāpātena nāstikatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10416: paṇḍitarūpāṇāṃ tu dehātmābhimānasya vicārato bādhanaṃ prapañcasyāpyanaikāntasya tulyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10417: api ca sadasattvayoḥ parasparaviruddhatvena samuccayābhāve vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10419_0: tasmāt sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānavat saptatvapañcatvanirdhāraṇasya phalasya nirdhārayituśca
GSP33vacbhamu:10419_1: pramātustatkaraṇasya pramāṇasya ca tatprameyasya ca saptatvapañcatvasya sadasattvasaṃśaye
GSP33vacbhamu:10428: ye hi paricchinnāste sarve 'nityā yathā ghaṭādayastathā cātmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10433: manuṣyakāyaparimāṇo hi jīvo na hastikāyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vyāptumarhatyalpatvādityātmanaḥ kṛtsnaśarīrāvyāpitvādakārtsnyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:10435: tathā ca hastiśīraraṃ parityajya yadā puttikāśarīro bhavati tadā na tatra kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyetetyakārsnyamātmanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10440: yathā hi pradīpo ghaṭamahāharmyodaravartī saṃkocavikāśavānevaṃ jīvo 'pi puttikāhastidehayorityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10456: kiṃ cātmano nityatvābhyupagame āgacchatāmapagacchatāṃ cāvayavānāmiyattānirūpeṇena cātmajñānābhāvānnāpavarga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10460: kiṃ caite jīvāvayavāḥ pratyekaṃ vā cetayeran samūho vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10461: teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ caitanye bahūnāṃ cetanānāmekābhiprāyatvaniyamābhāvāt kadācidviruddhadikkriyatvena śarīramunmathyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10462: samūhacaitanye tu hastiśarīrasya puttikāśarīratve dvitrāvayavaśeṣo jīvo na cetayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10466: pūrvasūtraprasañjitāyāṃ jīvānityatāyāṃ bauddhavatsaṃtānanityatāmāśaṅkyedaṃ sūtram-- 'na ca paryāyādapyavirodho vikārādibhyaḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:10467: na ca paryāyāt parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi saṃtānābhyupagamenātmano nityatvādavirodho bandhamokṣayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10475: evaṃ hi mokṣāvasthābhāvi jīvaparimāṇaṃ nityaṃ bhavet,yadyabhūtvā na bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10484: ekaśarīraparimāṇatā na dīpyā, kintvekaparimāṇatāmātramaṇurmahān veti vivekaḥ //36 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10494: sa ca nānākleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ pradhānapuruṣābhyāmanyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10502: paśava ātmānasteṣāṃ pāśo bandhanaṃ taddhimokṣo duḥkhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10503: eṣa teṣāmabhisaṃdhiḥ-- cetanasya khalvadhiṣṭhātuḥ kumbhakārādeḥ kumbhādikārye nimittakāraṇatvavirodhāditi prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10515: tena śrutasiddyarthamadṛṣṭāni dṛṣṭaviparītasvabhāvāni subahūnyapi kalpamānāni na lohagandhitāmāvahanti pramāṇavattvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10516: yastu tatra kathañciddṛṣṭānusāraḥ kriyate sa suhṛdbhāvamātreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:10517: āgamānapekṣitamanumānaṃ tu dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇa pravartamānaṃ dṛṣṭavivaryaye tuṣādapi bibhetitarāmiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10524: ayamarthaḥ-- yadīśvaraḥ karuṇāparādhīno vītarāgastataḥ praṇinaḥ kapūye karmaṇi na pravartayet,
GSP33vacbhamu:10527: na hīśvarādhīnā janāḥ svātantryeṇa kapūyaṃ karma kartumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10528: tadanadhiṣṭhitaṃ vā kapūyaṃ karma phalaṃ prasotumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10529: tasmātsvatantro 'pīsvaraḥ karmabhiḥ pravartyata iti dṛṣṭaviparītaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10534: pūrvakarmaṇeśvaraḥ saṃpratitane karmaṇi pravrartyate teneśvareṇa saṃpratitanaṃ karma svakārye pravartyeta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10540: tathehāpi dvāvapi pravartyāviti kaḥ kaṃ pravartayedityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10543: asmākaṃ tu nāyaṃ samaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10545: na ca kāruṇyaṃ doṣa ityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10547: kāruṇye hi satyasya duḥkhaṃ bhavati tena tatprahāṇāya pravartata iti kāruṇikā api svārthaprayuktā eva pravartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10548: nanu svārthaprayukta eva pravartatāmevamapi ko doṣa ityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10556: aprāptipūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogo na sarvagatānāṃ saṃbhavatyaprāpterabhāvānniravayavatvācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10559: tasmādavyāpyavṛttitāyāḥ saṃyogasya vyāpikāyā nivṛttestadvyāpyasya saṃyogasya vinivṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10575: āgamo hi pravṛttiṃ prati na dṛṣṭāntamapekṣata ityadṛṣṭapūrve tadviruddhe ca pravartituṃ samarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10581: asmākaṃ tvīśvarāgamayoranāditvādīśvarayonitve 'pyāgamasya na virodha iti bhāvaḥ //38 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10589: anudbhūtarūpamityarthaḥ. rūpādihīnakaraṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ hi puruṣasya svabhogādāveva dṛṣṭaṃ nānyatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:10591: tasmādrūpādihīnaṃ karaṇaṃ vyāpārayata īsvarasya bhogādiprasaktiḥ tathā cānīśvaratvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10599: api ca sarvatrānumānaṃ pramāṇayataḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarāṇāmapi saṃkhyābedavattvamantavattvaṃ ca dravyatvāt saṃkhyānyatve sati prameyatvādvānumātavyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10601: asmākaṃ tvāgamagamyer'the tadbādhitaviṣayatayā nānumānaṃ prabhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10603: svarūpaparimāṇamapi#yasya yādṛśamaṇu mahat paramamahaddīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10605: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpaḥ# /
GSP33vacbhamu:10607: yasya tvanta eva nāsti tasya tadagrahaṇaṃ nāsarvajñatāmāvahati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10624: yadyapyanekaśilpaparyavadātaḥ paraśuṃ kṛtvā tena palāśaṃ chinatti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10625: yadyapi ca prayatnenendriyārthātmamanaḥ saṃnikarṣalakṣaṇaṃ jñānakaraṇamupādāyātmārthaṃ vijānāti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10626: tathāpi saṃkarṣaṇo 'karaṇaḥ kathaṃ pradyumnākhyaṃ manaḥ karaṇaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10641: mā bhūdabyupagamena doṣaḥ, prakārāntareṇa tvayameva doṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10645: na tāvadete parasparaṃ bhinnā īśvarāḥ parasparavyāhatecchā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10648: saṃbhūya ceśanāyāṃ pariśuddho na kaściddīśvaraḥ syāt, siddhāntahāniśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10656: guṇibhyaḥ khalvātmabhyo jñānādīn guṇān bhedenoktvā punarabhedaṃ brūte-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10658: ādigrahaṇena pradyumnāniruddhayormano 'haṅkāralakṣaṇatayātmano bhedamabhidhāyātmana evaita iti tadviruddhābhedābhidhānamaparaṃ saṃgṛhītam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10660: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10662: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥpādaḥ#
GSP33vacbhamu:10676: iha hi pūrvapakṣe śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhaḥ pratipādyate, siddhānte tvavirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10678: tasyābhisaṃdhiḥ-yadyapi taittirīyake viyadutpattiśrutirasti tathāpi tasyāḥ pramāṇāntaravirodhādbahuśrutivirodhācca gauṇatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10679: tathāca viyato nityatvāttejaḥpramukha eva sargaḥ, tathāca na virodhaḥ śrutīnāmiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10683: athāsti tataḥ śrutivirodha iti tatparihārāya prayatnāntaramāstheyamityarthaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10687: taittirīye hi sargaprakaraṇe kevalasyākāśasyaiva prathamaḥ sargaḥ śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10688: chāndogye ca kevalasya tejasaḥ prathamaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10690: śrutasiddhyarthaṃ khalvaśrutaṃ kalpyate na tu tadvidhātāya,
GSP33vacbhamu:10696: na khalviha sarge kṣīrāddadhi jāyate sargāntare ti dadhnaḥ kṣīramiti bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10697: tasmātsargaśrutayaḥ parasparavirodhinyo nāsminnarthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhantīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10704: samavāṭyasamavāyinimittakāraṇebhyo hi kāryasyotpattirniyatā tadabhāve na bhavitumarhati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāve /
GSP33vacbhamu:10706: apica ya utpadyante teṣāṃ prāgutpatteranubhavārthakriye nopalabhyte utpannasya ca dṛśyete,
GSP33vacbhamu:10708: na cākāśasya tādṛśo viśeṣa utpādānutpādayorasti, tasmānnotpadyata ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10744_0: api cāvyatiriktadeśakālamākāśaṃ brahmaṇā ca brahmakāryaiśca tadabhinnasvabhāvairataḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10744_1: kṣīrakumbhaprakṣiptakatipayapayobinduvadbrahmaṇi tatkārye ca vijñāte nabho viditaṃ bhavatītyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10749: brahmavivartātmatayājagatastadvikārasya vastuto brahmaṇābhede brahmaṇi jñāte jñānamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10751: tasmādākāśamapi tadvivartatayā tadvikāraḥ sattajjñānena jñātaṃ bhavati nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10752: avikāratve tu tatastattvāntaraṃ na brahmaṇi vidite viditaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10754: nahi kṣīrasya pūrṇakumbhe kṣīre gṛhyamāṇe satsvapi pāthobinduṣu pāthastattvaṃ prati jñātatvamasti vijñāne /
GSP33vacbhamu:10755: tasmānna te kṣīre vidite viditā iti pratijñādṛṣṭāntapracayānuparodhāya viyata utpattirakāmenābhyupeyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10767: nanvasahāyaṃ tejaḥ prathamamavagamyamānaṃ sasahāyatvena virudhyata ityuktamata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10770: sa ca śrutyantareṇa virodhinā bādhyate, jaghanyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10772: naca śrutena tadavādabādhane śrutasya tejaḥsargasyānupapattiḥ, tadidamuktam-'tejojanipradhānā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10780: nacāsminnartha ekasya vākyasya vyāpāro 'pi tu bhinnānāṃ vākyānāmityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10786: na caiṣa sṛṣṭiparo 'pi tu śamapara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10795: apica bhrāntimūlaṃ caitadvacanam 'ekamevādvitīyam' iti toye kṣīrabuddhivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:10803: nahi māṇavake siṃhatvamupacarya na siṃhādanyo 'sti manāgapi māṇavaka iti vadanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10804: tasmādbrahmatvamaikāntikaṃ jagato vivakṣitaṃ śrutyā na tvaupacārikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10805: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya ūvati natvaspatvamapi prāgevaupacārikamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10808: niḥśeṣavacanaḥ svarasataḥ sarvaśabdo nāsati śrutyantaravirodhe ekadeśavaviṣayo yujyata ityarthaḥ //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10810: ākāśasyotpattau pramāṇāntaravirodhamuktamanubhāṣya tasya pramāṇāntarasya pramāṇāntaravirodhenāpramāṇabhūtasya na gauṇatvāpādanasāmarthyamata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10818: śūnyavādaśca nirākṛtaḥ svayameva śrutyopanyasya 'kathamasataḥ sajjāyeta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10822: etaduktaṃ bhavati-sopādānaṃ cetkāryaṃ tata ātmaivopānatvena śruterupādānāntarakalpanānupapatteriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10834: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10839: pramāpramāṇaprameyāṇāṃ vartamānātītānāgatatve 'pi pramātuḥ sadā vartamānatvenānubhavādapracyutasvabhāvasya nāgantukaṃ sattvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10845: nanu jīvataḥ pramāturmā bhūdanyathābhāvo mṛtasya tu bhaviṣyatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10849: yasya tu na tadasyātmano na tasya tatkalpanaṃ yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:10853: tadanena prabandhena pratyanumānenākāśānutpattyanumānaṃ tūṣayitvānaikāntikatvenāpi dūṣayati-yattūkaṃ samānajātīyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10857: yatra hi kṣīraṃ dadhibhāvena pariṇamate tatra nāvayavānāmanekeṣāmupādanatvamabhyupagantavyaṃ kintūpāttameva kṣīramekamupādeyadadhibhāvena pariṇamate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10863: yadyabhyāse bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvaṃ dūrata evopacaritatvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10877: bhūyasīḥ śrutīrapekṣya dve api śrutī śabdamātramukte //8 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10881: nanu 'na cāsya kaścijjanitā' ityātmanaḥ sato 'kāraṇatvaśruteḥ kathamutpattyāśaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10882: naca vacanamadṛṣṭvā pūrvaḥ pakṣa iti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:10887: na cātmanaḥ kāraṇavattve 'navasthā lohagandhitāmāvahatyanāditvāt kāryakāraṇaparamparāyā iti bhāvaḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:11404: api ceyamupādānaśrutiḥ karaṇavyāpāroparamamātraparā na svātantryaparā kartṛvibhaktistu bhāktī /
GSP33vacbhamu:11410: viklidyanti taṇḍulā jvalanti kāṣṭhāni sthālīti hi svavyāpāre sarveṣāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11412: tatkiṃ buddhyādīnāṃ kartṛtvameva na karaṇatvamityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11414: nanvevaṃ sati tasyāmevātmanaḥ svābhāvikaṃ kartṛtvamastvityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11418: nahi nitye svabhāve cāsti bhāvasya vyāpārityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11425: nahi śarīrādi yasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gamyaṃ tasyāmeva gantṛ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11426: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi buddhirupalabdhī bhavet, tatastasyā upalabdhṛtvamātmanyadhyavasyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:11429: yadā caupalabdhau buddherakartṛtvaṃ tadā yaduktaṃ buddherupalabdhṛtve karaṇāntaraṃ kalpanīyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11430: tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvāda iti tanna bhavatītyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11437: kintu caitanyameva viṣayāvacchinnaṃ vṛttiriti copalabdhiriti cākhyāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11438: tasya tu tattadviṣayāvacchede vṛttau buddhyadīnāṃ karaṇatvamātmanaśca tadupadhānenāhaṅkārapūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ yujyata iti //40 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11442: yadetajjīvānāmaupādhikaṃ kartṛtvaṃ tatpravartanālakṣaṇeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu neśvaramaparaṃ pravartakaṃ kalpayitumarhati, ati prasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11443: naceśvaro dveṣapakṣapātarahito jīvān sādhvasādhuni karmaṇi pravartayitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:11445: sa hi svatantraḥ kāruṇiko dharma eva jantūn pravartayennādharme /
GSP33vacbhamu:11446: tataśca tatpreritā jantavaḥ sarve dhārmikā eveti sukhina eva syurna duḥkhunaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11447: svatantrāstu rāgādiprayuktāḥ pravartamānā dharmādharmaparcayavanto vaicitryamanubhavantīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11448: evañca vidhiniṣedhayorarthavattvamitarathā tu sarvathā jīvā avastatantrā itīśvareṇaiva pravartyanta iti kṛtaṃ vidhiniṣedhābyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:11450: tasmāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati' ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ samastavidhiniṣedhaśrutivirodhāllokavirodhāccaiśvaryapraśaṃsāparatayā neyā iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11451: 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati' ityādayastāvcachutayaḥ sarvavyāpāreṣu jantūnāmīśvaratantratāmāhuḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11453: naca śrutisiddhasya kalpanīyatā, yena pravartakeṣu rāgādiṣu satsu tatkalpanā virudhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:11454: na ceśvaratantratve dharma eva jantūnāṃ pravṛtteḥ sukhitvameva na vaicitryamiti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11455: yadyapyayamīśvaro vītarāgastathāpi pūrvapūrvajantukarmāpekṣaya jantūn dha4mādharmayoḥ pravartayan na dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ viṣamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11459: nahīśvaraḥ prabalatarapavana iva jantūn pravartayatyapi tu taccaitanyamanurudhyamāno rāgādyupahāramukhena /
GSP33vacbhamu:11461: tadanenābhisaṃdhinoktam-parāyatte 'pi hi kartṛtvaṃ karotyeva jīva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11462: tasmādvidhiniṣedhaśāstravirodhāllokasya sthūladarśitvāt 'eṣa hyeva sādhu ka4ma kārayati' ityādiśruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11465: ' iti smṛteśceśvaratantrāmāmeva jantūnāṃ kartṛtvaṃ, na tu svatantrāmāmiti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:11466: īśvara eva vidhiniṣedhayosthāne niyujyeta yadvidhiniṣedhayoḥ phalaṃ tadīśvareṇa tatpratipāditadharmādharmanirapekṣeṇa kṛtamiti vidhiniṣedhayorānarthakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11482: na ca 'brahmadāśā brahmakitavāḥ' ityādyāśca śrutayo dāśā brahma kitavā brahmetyādipratipādanaparā jīvānāṃ brahmaṇo bhede 'vakalpyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:11483: na caitābhirbhedābedapratipādanaparābhiḥ śrutibiḥ sākṣādaṃśatvapratipādakācca mantravarṇāt 'pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni' ityādeḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11485: niratiśayopādhisaṃpadā ca vibhūtiyogeneśvaraḥ svāṃśānāmapi nikṛṣṭopādhīnāmīṣṭa iti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11487: apica jīvānāṃ brahmāṃśatve tadgatā vedanā brahmaṇo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11489: tataśca brahmabhūyaṅgatasya samastajīvagatavedanānubhavaprasaṅga iti varaṃ saṃsāra eva mukteḥṣa tatra hi svagatavedanāmātrāmanubhavānna bhūri duḥkhamanubhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11490: muktastu sarvajīvavedanābhāgiti prayatnena muktiranarthabahulatayā parihartavyā syāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11492: naca brahmaiva sadasantastu jīvā iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11495: advaitaśrutayastu jātideśakālābedanimittopacārāditi prāpte 'bhidhīyate-anadhigatārthāvabodhanāni pramāṇāni viśeṣataḥ śabdaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11498: yena ca vākyamupakramyate madhye ca parāmṛśyate ante copasaṃhriyate tatraiva tasya tātparyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11501: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati nālpatvamapi prāgevopacaritatvamityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11502: tasmadvaite bāvike sthite jīvabhāvastasya brahmaṇo 'nādyanirvacanīyāvidyapadhānabhedādekasyaiva bimbasya darpaṇādyupādhibhedātpratibimbabhedāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11505: yataḥ pratibimbānāmiva śyāmatāvadātatādirjīvānāmeva nānāvedanābhisaṃbandho brahmaṇastu bimbasyeva na tadabhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11506: yathāca darpaṇāpanaye tatpratibimbaṃ bimbabhāve 'vatiṣṭhate na kṛpāṇe pratibimbatamapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11507: evamavidyopadhānavigame jīve brahmabāveti siddhaṃ jīvo brahmāṃśa iva tattantratayā na tvaṃśa iti tātparyārthāḥ //43 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11516: tadyathā-buddhikarmendriyāṇi bāhyāni daśa buddhimanasī vṛttibhedamātreṇa bhinne apyekīkṛtyaikamantaḥ karamaṃ śarīraṃ pca viṣayā iti saptadaśako rāśiḥ //47 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11524: nahi kūṭasthanityasyātmanoparimāmino 'sti dehena saṃyogaḥ samavāyo vānyo vā kaścit saṃbandhaḥ sakaladharmātigatvādityabhisaṃdhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11527: ayamarthaḥ-satyaṃ nāsti kaścidātmano dehādibhiḥ pāramārthikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11528: kintu buddhyādijanitātmaviṣayā viparītā vṛttiḥ 'ahameva dehādisaṃghātaḥ' ityevaṃrūpā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11530: so 'yaṃ sāṃvṛttastādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho na pāramārthika ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11548: samastabuddhyādivyatirekavedinastu karmabhoktṛtvābhimānarahitasya nādhikāraḥ karmaṇi tathāca na yatheṣṭaceṣṭā,
GSP33vacbhamu:11553: yeṣāṃ tu sāṃkhyānāṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ vā sukhaduḥkhavyavasthāṃ pāramārthikīmicchatāṃ bahava ātmānaḥ sarvagatāsteṣāmevaiṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11554: tatra praśnapūrvakaṃ sāṃkhyān prati vyatikramaṃ tāvadāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11556: yādṛśastādṛśo guṇaṃsaṃbandhaḥ sarvān puruṣān pratyaviśiṣṭa iti tatkṛte sukhaduḥkhe sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭe /
GSP33vacbhamu:11561: ayamarthaḥ-na pradhānaṃ svavibhūtīkhyāpanāya pravartate, kintu puruṣārtham /
GSP33vacbhamu:11562: yaṃ ca puruṣaṃ pratyanena bhogāpavargau puruṣārthau sādhitau taṃ prati samāptādhikāratayā nivartate puruṣāntaraṃ tu pratyasamāpyādhikāraṃ pravartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11563: evaṃ na muktasaṃsārivyavasthopapatteḥ sukhaduḥkhavyavasthāpi bhaviṣyatīti nirākaroti #
GSP33vacbhamu:11565: sarveṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ vibhutvāt pradhānasya ca sādhāraṇyadamuṃ puruṣaṃ pratyanenārthaḥ sādhita ityetadeva nāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11568: bhavatu sāṃkhyānāmavyavasthā, pradhānasamavāyādadṛṣṭasyasa, pradhānasya ca sādhāraṇyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11569: kāṇādādīnāṃ tvātmasamavāpyadṛṣṭaṃ pratyātmamasādhāraṇaṃ tatkṛtaśca manasā sahātmanaḥ svasvāmibhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho 'nādiradṛṣṭabhedānāmanāditvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:11572: nahi tasya manasa ātmānatarairyaḥ saṃyogaḥ sa eva svāmināpi,
GSP33vacbhamu:11579: bhede hi tatkalpanā tataśca bheda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11581: bhāṣyakṛtā tu prauḍhavāditayā kāṇādān pratyapyadṛṣṭāniyamādityādīni sūtrāṇi yojitāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:11589: iti śrīnācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11599: śabdaikapramāṇasamadhigamyā hi mahābhūtotpattistasyā yatra śabdo nivartate tatra tatpramāṇabhāvena tadabhāvaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11604: rāddhāntastu syādetadevaṃ yadi sargādau prāṇasadbhāvaśrutirananyathāsiddhā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11607: tatrādhikāripuruṣaḥ prajāpatirapranaṣṭa eva trailokyamātraṃ pralīnamatastadīyān prāṇānapekṣya sā śrutirupapannārthā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11629: ayamarthaḥ-yatrāpi tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ sṛṣṭau prāṇasṛṣṭirnokteti brūṣe, tatrāpyukteti brūmahe /
GSP33vacbhamu:11630: tathāhi-yasmin prakaraṇena tejobannapūrvakatvaṃ vākprāṇamanasāmāmnāyate 'annamayaṃ hi' ityādinā,
GSP33vacbhamu:11648: eṣāṃ tu viṣayā atigrahāstvaṣṭāveva 'prāṇo vai grahaḥ so 'pānenātigraheṇa gṛhīto 'pānena hi gandhān jighrati' ityādinā saṃdarbheṇoktāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11655: dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve ghrāṇe ekā vāgiti sapta /

GSP33vacbhamu:11662: tadyathā-buddhīndriyāṇi ghrāṇādīni pañca karmendriyāṇyapi hastādīni pañca ātmaikādaśa,
GSP33vacbhamu:11678: ye sapta śīrṣaṇyāḥ śrotrādayaste prāṇā ityukte itareṣāmaśīrṣaṇyānāṃ hastādīnāmaprāṇatvaṃ gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11679: yathā dakṣiṇenākṣṇā paśyatītyukte vāmena na paśyatīti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11680_0: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi śrutivipratiṣedo yadyapi ca pūrvasaṃkhyāsu na parāsāṃ saṃkhyānāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11692: naca siddhe vastuni anuṣṭhāna iva vikalpaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11701: nahi jātu mūkādayaḥ satsvapi viharaṇādyavagatasadbhāveṣu pādādiṣu buddhīndriyeṣu vā vacanādimanto bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11706: ekameva tvantaḥkaraṇaṃ mananānmana iti cābhimānādahaṅkāra iti cādhyavasāyādbuddhiriti cākhyāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11709: tadevamekādaśānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ vyavasthānādekādaśa prāṇā iti śrutirāñjasī /
GSP33vacbhamu:11711: tatrāvayutyanuvādena saptāṣṭanavadaśasaṃkhyāśrutayo yathaikaṃ vṛṇīte dvau iti trīn vṛṇīta ityetadānuguṇyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11712: dvādaśatrayodaśasaṃkhyāśrutī tu kathañcidvṛttibhedena bhedaṃ vivakṣitvopāsanādiparatayā netavye /
GSP33vacbhamu:11714: apica śīrṣaṇyānāṃ prāṇānāṃ yatsaptatvābidhānaṃ tadapi caturṣvevavyavasthāpanīyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:11716: na khalu dve cakṣuṣī, rūpolabdhilakṣaṇasya kāryasyābedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11717: pihitaikacakṣuṣastu na tādṛśī rūpopalabdhidharbhavati yādṛśī samagracakṣuṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11728: tasmātsarvaśabdasya prakṛtāpekṣatvātsaptaiva prāṇā utkrāmanti na pāṇyādaya iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11739: tasmācchutyantarebhyaḥ smṛteśca sarvaśabdārthāsaṃkocācca sarveṣāmutkrameṇa sthite 'sminnaivaṃ yaduktaṃ saptaiveti,
GSP33vacbhamu:11745: vṛttisteṣāṃ śarīradeśatayā prādeśikī tannibandhanā ca gatyāgatiśrutiriti manyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:11746_0: tānpratyāha-aṇavaśca prāṇā anudbhūtarūpaspartā cāṇutvaṃ duradhigamatvānna tu paramāṇutvaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:11748: sarvagatatve 'pi dehāvacchinnānāmeva karaṇatvaṃ tena na vyavahitaviprakṛṣṭavastūpalambhaprasaṅga iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:11749: hanta prāptāprāptāvivekena śarīrāvacchinnānāmeva teṣāṃ karaṇatvamindriyatvamiti na vyāpināmindriyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11750: tathāca nāmamātre visaṃvādo nārthe 'smābhistadindriyamucyate bhavadbhistu vṛttiriti siddhamaṇavaḥ prāṇā iti /

GSP33vacbhamu:11757_1: ca vyāpārānupapatte prāṇasadbhāvājjyeṣṭhatvaśruteśca na brahmavikāraḥ prāṇa iti manvānasya
GSP33vacbhamu:11759: kintu sṛṣṭikāraṇamānīt jīvati sma āsīditi yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:11767: atra hi 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ' iti śrutervāyureva prāṇa iti pratibāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11768: athavā 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā' iti vāyorbhedena prāṇasya śravaṇādetadvirodhādvaraṃ tantrāntarīyameva prāṇasya svarūpamastu,
GSP33vacbhamu:11769: śrutī ca viruddhārthe kathañcinneṣyete iti sāmānyakaraṇavṛttireva prāṇo 'stu /
GSP33vacbhamu:11770: na cātrāpi karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthakprāṇasyānukramaṇaśrutivirodho vṛttivṛttimatorbhedāditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11772: sa hi militānāṃ vendriyāṇāṃ vṛttirbhavet pratyekaṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11776: na ca tvagekasādhyaṃ, tathā sati sāmānyavṛttitvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11777: apica yatsaṃbhūya kārakāṇi niṣpādayanti tatpradhānavyāpārānuguṇāvāntaravyāpāreṇaiva yathā vayasāṃ prātisviko vyāpāraḥ pañjaracālanānuguṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11778: na cendriyāṇāṃ prāṇe pradhānavyāpāre janayitavye 'sti tādṛśaḥ kaścidavāntaravyāpārastadanuguṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11779: ye ca rūpādipratyayā na te tadanuguṇāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11780: tasmānnendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyavṛttiḥ prāṇastathā ca vṛttivṛttimatoḥ kathañcidbhedavivakṣayā na pṛthagupadeśo gamayitavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11783: kintu vāyubheda evādhyātmāmāpannaḥ pañcavyūhaḥ prāṇa iti //9 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11786: yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvaṃ prati guṇabhūtatvājjīvasya ca śreṣṭhatvājjīvaḥ svatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi prādhānyāt śreṣṭhatvācca svatantraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11787: naca dvayoḥ svatantrayorekasmin śarīre ekavākyatvamupapadyata ityaparyāyaṃ viruddhānekadikkriyatayā deha unmathyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:11790_0: yadyapi cakṣurādyapekṣayā śreṣṭhatvaṃ prādhānyaṃ ca prāṇasya tathāpi saṃhatatvādacetanatvādbhautikatvāccakṣurādibiḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11790_1: sahaśiṣṭatvāccaca puruṣārthatvāt puruṣaṃ prati pāratantryaṃ śayanāsanādivadbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11791: tathāca yathā mantrītareṣu naiyogikeṣu pradhānamapi rājānamapekṣyāsvatantra evaṃ prāṇo 'pi cakṣurādiṣu pradhānamapi jīve 'svatantra iti //10 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11793: syādetaccakṣurādibiḥ saha śāsanena karaṇaṃ cet prāṇaḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:11808: yadyapi mithyājñāne 'pyasti vastuśūnyatā tathāpi na tasya vyavahārahetutāsti /

GSP33vacbhamu:11819: yathā vibhuna ākāśasya kuṭakarakādyavacchedātkuṭādisāmyamiti prāpta āha- #
