GSP33vacbhamu:12188: anye tu sakalakarmakṣaye parāvṛttiśaṅkā nirbījeti manyamānā anyathādhikaraṇaṃ varṇayāñcakrurityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12191: tatredamiha vicāryate-kiṃ dattaphalānāmiṣṭāpūrtakarmaṇāmavaśeṣādihāvartante uta tānyupabhogena nirāvaśeṣaṃ kṣapayitvānupabhuktakarmaśādihāvartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12192: tatreṣṭādīnāṃ bhogena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvānniranuśayā evānupabhuktakarmavaśādāvartanta iti prāpta ucyate-sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12194: yathā bhāṇḍasthe madhuni sarpiṣi vā kṣālite 'pi bhāṇḍalepakaṃ taccheṣaṃ madhu vā sarpirvā na kṣālayituṃ śakyamiti dṛṣṭamevaṃ tadanusārādetadapi pratipattavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12196_0: yathā sevako hāstikāśvīyapadātivrātaparivṛto mahārājaṃ sevamānaḥ kālavaśācchatrapādukāvaśeṣo
GSP33vacbhamu:12196_1: na sevitumarhatīti dṛṣṭaṃ tanmūlā ca laukikī smṛtiriti dṛṣṭasmṛtibhyāṃ sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12209: iha janmani hi paryāyeṇa sukhaduḥkhe bhujyamāne dṛśyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:12214: na cābhivyaktaṃ ca karma phalaṃ na datta iti ca saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12216_2: phalopabhogena prakṣayānnāsti teṣāṃ karmāśya iti na te saṃsareyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12224: anena niranuśayā evāvarohantīti pūrvapakṣabījaṃ nigūḍhamuddhāṭya nirasyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12232: 'ācārahīnaṃ na punaranti vedāḥ' iti hi smṛtyā vedapadena vedārthamupalakṣayantyā vedārthānuṣṭhānaśeṣatvamācārasyoktaṃ na tu svatantra ācāraḥ phalasya sādhanaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12246: 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti' iti kauṣītakināṃ samāmnānāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:12248: tathāhi-dyusomavṛṣṭyannaretaḥpariṇāmakrameṇa tā evāpo yoṣidagnau hutāḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantītyaviśeṣeṇa śrutam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12252: 'jāyasva mriyasveti tṛtīyaṃ sthānam' iti ca sthānatvamātreṇāvagamātpathitvenāpratīteścandralokādavatīrṇānāmapi ca tatsthānatvasaṃbhavādasaṃpūreṇa prativacanopapatteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12253: ananyamārgatayā ca tadbhogavirahiṇāmapi grāmaṃ gacchan vṛkṣamūlānyupasarpatītivatsaṃyamanādiṣu yamavaśyatāyai candralokagamanopapatteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12255_1: na mārgatvaṃ tathāpi vettha yathāsau mārgo na saṃpūryate ityasya prativacanāvasare
GSP33vacbhamu:12256: yadi punastenaiva mārgeṇāgatya janmamaraṇaprabandhavat sthānamadhyāsīta naitattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12257: nahīṣṭādikāriṇaścandramaṇḍalādavaruhya ramaṇīyaṃ ninditāṃ vā yoniṃ pratipadyamānāstṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:12262: tato 'vagacchāmaḥ saṃyamanaṃ sapta ca yātanābhūmīryamavaśatayā pratipadyamānā aniṣṭādikāriṇo na candramaṇḍalādavarohantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12263: tasmāt 'ye vai ke ca' itīṣṭādikāriviṣayaṃ na sarvaviṣayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12293: yadyapi yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyumityato na tādātmyaṃ sphuṭamavagamyate tathāpi vāyurbhūtvetyādeḥ sphuṭataraṃ tādātmyāvagamādyathetamākāśamityetadapi tādātmya evāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12295: manuṣyaśarīrasya nandikeśvarasya devadeharūpapariṇāmasmaraṇāddevadehasya ca nahuṣasya tiryaktvasmaraṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12297: gauṇyāṃ ca vṛttau lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ prayukto guṇe lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12300: samāno bhāvo rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te sabhāvāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyamiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:12306: yadi tu devājagaśarīre samasamaye syātāṃ na devaśarīramajagaraśarīraṃ śilpiśatenāpi kriyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12307: nahi dadhipayasī samasamaye parasparātmanī śakye saṃpādayituṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12311: nanvākāśabhāvena saṃyogamātraṃ lakṣyatāṃ kiṃ sādṛśyenetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12316: 'durniṣprapataram' iti duḥkhena niḥsaraṇaṃ brūte na tu vilambeneti manyate pūrvapakṣī /
GSP33vacbhamu:12317: vinā sthūlaśarīraṃ na sūkṣmaśarīre duḥkhabhāgīti durniṣprapataraṃ vilambaṃ lakṣayatīti rāddhāntaḥ //23 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12321: ākāśasārūpyaṃ vāyudhūmādisaṃparko 'nuśayināmukta ihedānīṃ vrīhiyavā oṣādhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyanta iti śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12322: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimanuśayināṃ bhogādhiṣṭhānaṃ vrīhiyavādayaḥ sthāvarā bhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:12324: tatra manuṣyo jāyate devo jāyata ityādau prayoge janeḥ śarīraparigrahe prasiddhatvādatrāpi vrīhyādiśarīraparigraha eva janirmukhyārtha iti vrīhyādiśarīrā evānuśayina iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12325: naca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivat karmaviśeṣāsaṃkīrtanāmāttadabhāve vrīhyādīnāṃ śarīrabhāvābhāvātkṣetrajñānantarādhiṣṭhitānāmeva yatsaṃparkamātramiti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12329: sāmānyaśāstrasya hiṃsāmānyadvāreṇa viśeṣopasarpaṇaṃ vilambeneti sākṣādviśeṣaspṛśaḥ śāstracchīghratarapravṛttāddurbalatvāditi sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12330: nahi balavadityeva durbalaṃ bādhate kintu sati virodhe /
GSP33vacbhamu:12332: 'agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhet ' iti hi kratuprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ kratvarthatāmasya gamayati na tvapanayati niṣedhāpāditāmasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutām /
GSP33vacbhamu:12333: tenāstu niṣedhādasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutā vidheścha kratvarthatā ko virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12335: na kratostatra vaiguṇyaṃ yathā coditasiddhitaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12336_1: yadi ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivadvrīhyādiṣvanuśayavatāṃ kamaviśeṣaḥ kīrtyeta na caitadasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12339: naca tadgataiyaiḥ paśuhiṃsāyā 'na hiṃsyāt' iti niṣedātkratvarthāyā api duḥkhaphalavatsaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12341: tathāhi-na hiṃsyāditi niṣedhasya niṣedhyādhīnanirūpaṇatayā yadarthaṃ niṣedhyaṃ tadartha eva niṣedho vijñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12342: na caitat 'nānṛtaṃ vadet' 'na tau paśau karoti' itivatkasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ yenānṛtatavadanavadasya niṣedhasya kratvarthate niṣedho 'pi kratvarthaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12343: paśau niṣiddhayorājyabhāgayoḥ kratvarthatvena niṣedhasyāpi kratvarthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12347: kevalaṃ tasya rāgataḥ prāptatvāttadanuvādena nañarthaṃ vidhirupasaṃkrāmati,
GSP33vacbhamu:12348: tena puruṣārtho niṣedhya iti tadadhīnanirūpaṇo niṣedho 'pi puruṣārtho bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12349: tathā cāyamarthaḥ saṃpadyate-yatpuruṣārthaṃ hananaṃ tanna kuryāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:12350: kratvarthasyāpi na niṣedhe hiṃsāyāḥ kratūpakārakatvamapi kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12351: naca dṛṣṭe puruṣokārakatve pratyarthini sati tatkalpanāspadam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12352: naca svātantryapāratantrye sati saṃyogapṛthaktve svādiratādivadekatra saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12353: tasmātpuruṣārthapratiṣedho na kratvarthamapyāskandatīti śuddhasukhaphalatvameveṣṭādīnāṃ na sthāvaśarīropabhogyaduḥkhaphalatvamapīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12359: vrīhyādibhāvamāpannāḥ khalvanuśayinaḥ puruṣairupabhuktā retaḥ sigbhāvamanubhavantī śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12361_0: vrīhyādidehatve hi vrīhyādiṣu lūneṣvavahantinā phalīkṛteṣu ca vrīhyādidehavināśādanuśayinaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12361_1: pravaseyuriti kathamanuśayināṃ retaḥsigbhāvaḥ saṃsargamātre tu saṃsargiṣu vrīhyādiṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:12361_2: naṣṭeṣvapi na saṃsargiṇo 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuriti retaḥsigbhāva upapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12368: sadyo jāto hi bālo na retaḥ sigbhavatyapi tu cirajātaḥ prauḍhayauvanaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12371: tatkimidānīṃ sarvatraivānuśayināṃ saṃsargamātraṃ tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇā ityādiṣu tathābhāva āpadyeteti netyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12374: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīkamīmāṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:12375: iti tṛtīyādhyāyasya gatyāgaticintayā vairāgyanirūpaṇākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ #
GSP33vacbhamu:12380: idānīṃ tu tasyaiva jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvasiddhyartha prapañcayate- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12381: kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:12382: yadyapi brahmaṇo 'nyasyānirvācyatayā jāgratsvapnāvasthāgatayorubhayorapi sargayormāyamayatvaṃ tathāpi yathā jāgratsṛṣṭirbrahmātmabhāvasākṣātkārātprāganuvartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12384: evaṃ kiṃ svapnasṛṣṭirāhosvit pratidinameva nivartata iti vimarśārthaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:12391: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-iha hi sarvāṇyeva mithyājñānānyudāharaṇaṃ teṣāṃ satyatvaṃ pratijñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12395: atathātvasya tvapratīyamānasya tathābhāvaprameyavirodhena kalpanāspadatvāt bādhakapratyayādatathātvamiti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12401: yathāhi kṣīraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kālāntare dadhi bhavati, evaṃ rajataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kālāntare śuktirbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12403: yadyasya tīvrātapaklāntisahitaṃ cakṣuḥ sa tasya rajatarūpatāṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12404: yasya tu kevalamālokamātropakṛtaṃ, sa tasyaiva śuktirūpatāṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12405: evamutpalamapi nīlalohitaṃ divā saurībhirbhābhirabhivyaktaṃ nīlatayā gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12407: evamasatyāṃ nidrāyāṃ sato 'pi rathādīnna gṛhṇāti nidrāṇastu gṛhṇātīti sāmagrībhedādvā kālabhedādvā virodhābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12413: imamarthaṃ śrutirapi darśayati-'atha rathān rathayogān pathaḥ sṛjate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12414: naca 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na canthāno bhavanti' iti virodhādupacaritārthāṃ sṛjata iti śrutirvyākhyeyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12415: sṛjata iti hi śruterbahuśrutisaṃvādātpramāṇāntarasaṃvādācca balīyastvena tadanuguṇatayā na tatra rathā ityasyā bhāktatvena vyākhyānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12416: jāgradavasthādarśanayogyā na santi na tu rathā na santīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12423: tadyathā svapne śuklāmbaradharaḥ śuklamālyānulepano brāhmaṇāyanaḥ priyavrataṃ pratyāha-priyavrata,
GSP33vacbhamu:12425: sa ca jāgrattathātmano mānamanubhūya svapnapratyayaṃ satyamabhimanyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12433: na tāvat kṣīrasyeva dadhi rajatasya pariṇāmaḥ śuktiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12434: nahi jātvīśvaragṛhe cirasthitānyapi rajatabhājanāni śuktibhāvamanubhavanti dṛśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:12435: na cetarasya rajatānubhavasamaye 'nyo 'nākulendriyo na tasya śuktibhāvamanubhavati pratyeti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:12438: pāramārthike hāsya toyabhāve tatsādhyāmudānyopaśamalakṣaṇārthakriyāṃ kuryānmarīcisādhyāmapi rūpaprakāśalakṣaṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:12441: tadarthakriyākāritvavyāptaṃ toyatvaṃ mātrayāpi tāmakurvattoyameva na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12442: apica toyapratyayasamīcīnatvāyāsya dvaividhyamabhyupeyate taccābhyupagame 'pi na seddhumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12443: tathāhi-asamarthavidhāpāti toyametaditi manvāno na tṛṣṇayāpi marīcitoyamabhidhāvet yathā marīcīnanubhavan /
GSP33vacbhamu:12445: kimaparāddhaṃ marīciṣu toyaviparyāsena sarvajanīnena yattamatilaṅghya viparyāsāntaraṃ kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12447: tatrāpi rajatajñānaṃ pūrvamutpannaṃ bādhyamuttaraṃ tu bādhakaṃ śuktijñānaṃ prāptipūrvakatvātpratiṣedhasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:12448: rajatajñānātprākprāpakābhāvena śukteraprāptāyāḥ pratiṣedhasaṃbhavātpūrvajñānaprāptaṃ tu rajataṃ śuktijñānamapabadhitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12452: naca vartamānarajatāvabhāsi jñānaṃ bhaviṣyattāmasyāgocarayanna bhaviṣyatā svasamayavartinīṃ śuktiṃ gocarayatā pratyayena bādhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:12454: mā nāmāsya jñāsītpratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyattāṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvi tvanumānamupakārabhāvahetumivāsati vināśapratyayopanipāte sthemānamākalayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12456: tathāca rajatagocaraṃ pratyakṣaṃ vastutaḥ sthirameva rajataṃ gocarayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12457: tathāca bhaviṣyacchuktikājñānakālaṃ, rajataṃ vyāpnuyāditi virodhācchuktijñānena bādhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12463: yadi cirasthāyitvaṃ yogyatā na sā pratyakṣagocaraḥ śakteratīndriyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12468: tasmādatyantābhyāsavaśena pratyakṣānantaraṃ śīgratarotpannavinaśyadavasthānumānasahitapratyakṣābhiprāyemeva cirasthāyīti gṛhyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12474: yattu satyaṃ svapnadarśanamuktaṃ tatrāpyākhyātrā brāhmaṇāyanenākhyāte saṃvādābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12476: tādṛśasyaiva bahulaṃ visaṃvādadarśadarśitaśca visaṃvādo bhāṣyakṛtā kātsnryenānabhivyaktiṃ vivṛṇvatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12479: rajanīsamaye 'pi hi bhāratādvarṣāntare ketumālādau vāsaro bhavatīti bhārate varṣa ityuktam //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12489: prājñavyāpāratvena pāramārthikatvānumānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa bādhakapratyayena virudhyamānaṃ nātmānaṃ labhata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12501: iha hi nāḍīpuritatparamātmāno jīvasya suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ sthānatvena śrūyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:12505: yadā nāḍyo vā purītadvā suṣuptasthānaṃ tadā viparītagrahaṇanivṛttāvapi na jīvasya paramātmabhāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12506: avidyānivṛttāvapi jīvasya paramātmabhāvāya kāraṇāntaramapekṣitavyaṃ tacca karmaiva na tu tattajñānaṃ viparītajñānanivṛttimātreṇa tasyopayogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:12510: ata tu paramātmaiva nāḍīpurītasmṛtidvārā suṣuptisthānaṃ tato viparītajñānanivṛtterasti mātrayā paramātmabhāva upayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12511: tayā hi tāvadeṣa jīvastadavasthāno bhavati kevalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12512: tattvajñānābhāvena samūlakāṣamavidyāyā akāṣājjāgratsvapnalakṣaṇaṃ jīvasya vyutthānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12514: kiṃ tāvaprāptaṃ, nāḍīpurītatparamātmasu sthāneṣu suṣuptasya jīvasya nilayaṃ prati vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12515: yathā bahuṣu prāsādeṣveko narendraḥ kadācitkkacinnilīyate kadācitkkacidevameko jīvaḥ kadācinnāḍīṣu kadācitpurītati kadācidbrahmaṇīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12516: yathā nirapekṣā vrīhiyavāḥ kratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśaprakṛtitayā śrutā ekārthā vikalpyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:12517: evaṃ saptamīśrutyā vāyatanaśrutyā vekanilayanārthāḥ parasparānapekṣā nāḍyadayo 'pi vikalpamarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12518: yatrāpi nāḍībhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śeta iti nāḍība3hmaṇorādhārayoḥ samuccayaśravaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12519: prāṇaśabdaṃ ca brahma 'athāsmin prāṇe brahmaṇi sa jīva ekadhā bhavati' nnirapekṣayoravedhāratvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12522: evaṃ tābhireva saṃcaramāṇasya kadācidbrahmaivādhāra iti siddhamādhāratve nāḍīpurītatparamātmanāmanapekṣatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12524: prāpte 'bhidhīyate-jīvaḥ samuccayenaivaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpena /
GSP33vacbhamu:12527: vikalpa āśritastatra gatiranyā na vidyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12528: prakṛtakratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśadravyaprakṛtitayā hi parasparānapekṣau vrīhiyavau vihitauśakrutaścaitau pratyekaṃ puroḍāśamabhinirvartayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:12529: tatra yadi miśrābhyāṃ puroḍāśo 'bhinirvartyeta parasparānapekṣavrīhiyavavidhātṛṇī ubhe api śāstre bādhyeyātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:12531: sa hi yathā vihitānyaṅgānyabhisamīkṣya pravartamāno naitānyanyathayitaṃ śakroti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12533: na cāṅgānurodhena pradhānābhyāso 'gosave ubhe kuryāt' itivadyuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12535: na cāṅgabhūtaindravāyavādigrahānurodhena yathā pradhānasya somayāgasyāvṛttirevamatrāpīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12538: 'somamabhiplāvayati' iti ca vākyāntarānulocanayā rasadvāreṇa yāgasādhanībhūtasyendravāyvādyuddeśena prādeśamātreṣūrdhvapātreṣu grahaṇāni pṛthakprakalpanāni saṃskārā vidhīyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:12543: naca yāvanmātramekamūrdhvapātraṃ vyāpnoti tāvanmātraṃ gṛhītvā pariśaṣṭaṃ tyajyeteti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12545: evaṃ taddṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavedyadi tatsarvaṃ yāga upayujyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:12547_0: tasmātsakalasya somarasasya yāgaśeṣatvena saṃskārārhatvādekaikena ca grahamena sakalasya
GSP33vacbhamu:12548: ata eva samuccayadarśanaṃ 'daśautānadhvaryuḥ prātaḥ savane grahan gṛhṇāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12552: teṣāṃ ca samuccaye sati yāvadyaduddeśena gṛhītaṃ tāvattasyai devatāyai tyaktavyamityarthādyāgasyāvṛttyā bhavativyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12553: yadi punaḥ pṛthakkṛtānyapyekīkṛtya kāñcana devatāmuddiśya tyajeran,
GSP33vacbhamu:12568: nanu yadi brahmaiva nilayanasthānaṃ tāvanmātramucyatāṃ kṛtaṃ nāḍyupanyāsenetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12574: pittenābhivyāptakaraṇo na bāhyānviṣayānvedeti taddvārā sukhaduḥkhābhāvena tatkāraṇapāṣmāsparśena nāḍīstutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12575: yadā tu tejo brahma tadā sugamam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12580: tathāhi-nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhīnāṃ karaṇānāmāśrayo jīvastu brāhmāvyatirekātsvamahipratiṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12582: vikalpa tu vyatirekaṃ brahmaṇa ādhāratvamucyate jīvaṃ prati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12583: tathāca suṣuptāvasthāyāmupādhīnāmasamudācārājjīvasya brahmātmatvameva brahmādhāratvaṃ na tu nāḍīpurītādhāratvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12584: tadupādhikaraṇamātrādhāratayā tu suṣuptadaśārambhāya jīvasya nāḍīpurītadādhāratvamityatulyārthatayā na vikalpa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12586: autsagikaṃ brahmasvarūpatvaṃ jīvasyāsati jāgratsvapnadaśārūpe 'pavāde suṣuptavasthāyāṃ nānyathayituṃ śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12587: apica ye 'pi sthānavikalpamāsthiṣacata tairapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamalakṣaṇā suṣuptyavasthāṅgīkartavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12588: na ceyamātmatādātmyaṃ vinā nāḍyādiṣu paramātmavyatirikteṣu sthāneṣūpapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12589: tatra hi sthito 'yaṃ jīva ātmavyatirekābhimānī sannavaśyaṃ viśeṣajñānavān bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12590: tathāhi śrutiḥ-'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānye 'nyatpaśyet' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12592: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūtatkena kaṃ paśyedvijānīyāt' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12602: aupādhike tu paricchede yatropādhisaṃnihitastanmātraṃ na jānīyānna tu sarvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12607: naca suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ jīvasya svarūpeṇa nāḍyādisthānatvapratipādena kiñcitprayojanaṃ brahmabhūyapratipādena tvasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12608: tasmānna samapradhānabhāvena samuccayo nāpi vikalpa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12617: sa vānyo veti īśvaro veti saṃbhavamātreṇopanyāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12620: yadvi dvyahādinirvartanīyamekasya puṃsaścoditaṃ karma tasya pūrvedyuranuṣṭhitasyāsti smṛtiriti vakyavye 'nuḥ pratyabhijñānasūcanārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12625: jīvaḥ pratinyāyaṃ saṃprasāde suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ buddhāntāyādravati āgacchati pratiyoni /
GSP33vacbhamu:12626: yohi vyāghrayoniḥ suṣupto buddhāntamāgacchan sa vyāghra eva bhavati na jātyantaram /
GSP33vacbhamu:12628: na iha vyāghro vā siṃho veti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12630: yo hi jīvaḥ suptaḥ sa śarīrāntaraṃ uttiṣṭhati śarīrāntaragatastu suptajīvasaṃbandhini śarīra uttiṣṭhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:12633: apica na jīvo nāma kaścitparasmādanya iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:12637: evamanādyanirvacanīyāvidyopadhānabhedopādhikalpito jīvo na vastutaḥ paramātmano bhidyate tadupādyudbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ codbhūta ivābhibhūta iva pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12638: tataśca suṣuptādāvapi abhibhūta iva jāgradavasthādiṣudbhūta iva /
GSP33vacbhamu:12639: tasya cāvidyātadvāsanopādheranāditayā kāryakāraṇabhāvena pravahataḥ suvivecatayā tadupahito jīvaḥ suviveca iti //9 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12646: tadyathā kaścitsuptotthitaḥ prāha sukhamahamasvāpsaṃ laghūni me gātrāṇi prasannaṃ me mana iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:12647: kaścitpunarduḥkhasamasvāpsaṃ gurūṇi me gātrāṇi bhramatyanavasthitaṃ me mana iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12651: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-yadyapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamena mohasuṣuptayoḥ sāmyaṃ tathāpi naikyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12653: bāhyendriyavyāpārabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tu bhede tayoḥ suṣuptamohayorapi prayojanabhedātkāraṇabhedāllakṣaṇabhedācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12656: yadyapi satyapi mohe na maraṇaṃ tathāpyasati mohe na maraṇamiti maraṇārtho mohaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12658: tasmāt suṣuptamohāvasthayorbrahmaṇā saṃpattāvapi suṣupte yādṛśī saṃpattirna tādṛśī moha ityardhasaṃpattiruktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12667_1: tathāpi prapañcaliṅgānāṃ bahvīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ darśanādbhavati punarvicikitsā atastannivāraṇāyārambhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12674: tasmādubhayaliṅgakaśāstraprāmāṇyādubhayarūpatā brahmaṇaḥ pāramārthikīti prāpta ucyate-na sthānata upādhito 'pi parasya brahmaṇa ubhayacihnatvasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12676: pāramārthikatve hyupādhijanitasya rūpasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12710: kiṃ sāllakṣaṇaṃ ca prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ ca brahma kiṃ sallakṣaṇameva brahmeti prakāśalakṣaṇameveti tatra pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12718: yathā sarvagandhatvādayo 'pi tu prakāśarūpameva saditi nobhayarūpatvaṃ brahmaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12721: bhede na sthānato 'pīti nirākṛtamiti nādhikaraṇāntaraṃ prayojayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12724: sarveṣāṃ ca sādhāraṇe pravilayārthatve sati 'arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt' iti vinigamanakāraṇavacanamanavakāśaṃ syāt# /
GSP33vacbhamu:12725: evaṃ hi tasyāvakāśaḥ syādyāda kāścidupāsanāparatayā rūpamācakṣīran kāścinnīrūpabrahmapratipādanaparā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12726: sarvāsāṃ tu pravilayārthatvena nīrūpabrahmapratipādanārthatve ukto vinigamanaheturna syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12732: vāstavasya vā prapañcasya pravilayaḥ sarpiṣa ivāgnisaṃyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12734: na tāvadvāstavaḥ sarvasādhāraṇaḥ pṛthivyādiprapañcaḥ puruṣamātreṇa śakyaḥ samucchettum /
GSP33vacbhamu:12735: apica prahlādaśukādibhiḥ puruṣadhaureyaiḥ samūlamunmūlitaḥ prapañca iti śūnyaṃ jagadbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12738: samāropitarūpastu prapañco brahmatattvajñāpanaparaireva vākyairbrahmatattvamavabodhayadbhiḥ śakyaḥ samucchettumiti kṛtamatra vidhinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12739: nahi vidhiśatenāpi vinā tattvāvabodhanaṃ pravartasvātmajñāna iti vā kuru prapañcapravilayaṃ veti pravartitaḥ śaknoti prapañcapravilayaṃ kartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:12740: na cāsyātmajñānavidhiṃ vinā vedāntārthabrahmatattvāvabodho na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12741: maulikasya svādhyāyādhyayanavirodhereva vivakṣitārthatayā sakalasya vedarāśeḥ phalavadarthāvabodhanaparatāmāpādayato vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12745: tasmāt 'jartilayavāgvā juhuyāt' itivadvidhisarūpā ete 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavya' ityādayo na tu vidhaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12747: draṣṭavyādiśabdā api tattvābhimudhīkaraṇapradhānā na tattvāvabodhavidhipradhānā iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:12748: apica brahmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcamuktaṃ na tatra niyojyaḥ kaścitsaṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12749: jīvo hi niyojyo bhavet, sa cetprapañcapakṣe vartate ko niyojyastasyocchinnatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12763: kiñcānyanniyoganiṣṭhatayaiva ca paryavasyatyāmnāye yadabhyupagataṃ#bhavadbhiḥ śāstraparyālocanayāniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ jīvasyeti tadetacchāstrāvirodhādapramāṇakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12764: athaitacchāstramaniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ ca jīvasya pratipādayati jīvaṃ ca niyuktaṃ tato dvyarthaṃ ca viruddhārtha ca syādityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12767: nahi tadvākyaṃ tasya niyojyatāmāhāpi tu laukikapramāṇasiddhāṃ niyojyatāmāśritya darśapūrṇamāsau vidhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:12768: idaṃ tu niyojyatāmapanayati ca niyuṅkte ceti durghaṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12771: paurvāparyālocanayā vedāntānāṃ tattvaniṣṭhatā śrutā na śrutā niyoganiṣṭhatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12772: apica niyoganiṣṭhatve vākyasya darśapaurṇāmāsakarmaṇa ivāpūrvāvāntaravyāpārādātmajñānakarmaṇo 'pyapūrvāvāntaravyāpārādeva svargādiphalavanmokṣasyānandarūpaphalasya siddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12780: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato vravīti ca bhūyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12782: dve eva brahmaṇo rūpe brahmaṇaḥ paramārthato 'rūpasyādhyāropite dve eva rūpe tābhyāṃ hi tadrūpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12786: atra pṛthivyaptejāṃsi trīṇi bhūtāni brahmaṇo rūpaṃ mūrtaṃ mūrcchitāvayavamitaretarānupraviṣṭāvayavaṃ kaṭhinamiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:12792: tasyaitasya brahmarūpasya tejo 'bannasya caturviśeṣaṇasyaiṣa rasaḥ sāro ya eṣa savitā sapati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12797: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa gatasmin savitṛmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12798: karaṇātmako hiraṇyagarbhaprāṇāhvayastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ sāro nityaparokṣatā ca sāmyamityadhidaivatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12799_1: mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yaccakṣuḥ sato hyoṣa rasa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12800_1: yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇekṣan puruṣastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12801: liṅgasya hi karaṇātmakasya hiraṇyagarbhasya dakṣiṇamakṣyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śruteradhigatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12802: tadevaṃ brahmaṇa aupādhikayormūrtāmūrtayorādhyātmikādhidaivikayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vibhāgo vyākhyātaḥ sattyacchabdavācyayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12803: athedānīṃ tasya karaṇātmanaḥ puruṣasya liṅgasya rūpaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12805: tadevaṃ niravaśeṣaṃ savāsanaṃ satyarūpamuktvā yattatsatyasya satyamuktaṃ brahma tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12806: yataḥ satyasya rūpaṃ niḥśeṣamuktamato 'vaśiṣṭaṃ satyasya yatsatyaṃ tasyānantaraṃ taduktihetukaṃ svarūpaṃ vakyavyamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12811: atraivamarthenetinā yatsaṃnihitaṃ parāmṛṣṭaṃ tanniṣidhyate nañā saṃnihitaṃ ca mūrtāmūrtaṃ savāsanaṃ rūpadvayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12813: tatredaṃ vicāryate-kiṃ rūpadvayaṃ savāsanaṃ brahma ca sarvameva ca pratiṣidhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:12814: uta brahmaivātha savāsanaṃ rūpadvayaṃ brahma tu pariśiṣyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12815: yadyapi teṣu teṣu vedāntapradeśeṣu brahmasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ tadasadbhāvajñānaṃ ca ninditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12816: 'astītyevopalabdhavyaḥ' iti cāsya sattvamavadhāritaṃ tathāpi sadbodharūpaṃ tadbrahma savāsanamūrtāmūrtarūpasādhāraṇatayā ca sāmānyaṃ tasya caite viśeṣā mūrtāmūrtādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12820: ata eva nahyetasmāditi netyanyatparamastīti niṣedhāt paraṃ nāstīti sarvaniṣedhameva tattvamāha śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12825: yathāhuḥ-'yena yasyābhisaṃbandho dūrasthasyāpi tena saḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12829: katarasyāstu niṣedha iti viśaye prapañcapratiṣedhe samastapratyakṣādivyākopaprasaṅgāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:12830: brahmapratiṣedho tvavyākopādbrahmaiva pratiṣedhena saṃbadhyate yogyatvānna prapañcastadvaiparītyāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:12834: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-upādhayo hyamī pṛthivyādayo 'vidyākalpitā na tu śoṇakarkādaya iva viśeṣā aśvatvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:12843: apariśiṣyamāṇe cānyasminya itaraḥ pratiṣeddhumārabhyate tasya pratiṣedbhumaśakyatvāttasyaiva paramārthatvāpatteḥ pratiṣādhānupapattiḥ# /
GSP33vacbhamu:12849: tathāca yastasya śabdaḥ prāpakaḥ sa tatpara iti sa brahmaṇi pramāṇamiti kathamasya niṣedho 'pi pramāṇavān /
GSP33vacbhamu:12850: naca paryudāsādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena vikalpaḥ vastuni siddhasvabhāve tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12857: upakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraparyālocanayā hi vedāntānāṃ sarveṣāmeva brahmaparatvamupapāditaṃ prathame 'dhyāye /
GSP33vacbhamu:12858: na cāsatyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ dūratasthena pratiṣedhenaiṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12859: yacca vāṅmanasātītatayā brahmaṇastatpratiṣedhasya na pramāṇāntaravirodha iti tatrāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12863: idānīṃ tu niṣprayojanamityuktaṃ 'prakṣālanāddhi paṅkasya' iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12864: tasmādvedāntavācā manasi saṃnidhānādbrahmaṇo vāṅmanasātītatvaṃ nāñjasamapi tu pratipādanaprakriyopakrama eṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12865: yathā gavādayo viṣayāḥ sākṣācchṛṅgagrāhikayā pratipādyante pratiyante ca naivaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:12867: nanu prakṛtapratiṣedhe brahmaṇo 'pi kasmānna pratiṣejha ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12869: pradhānaṃ prakṛtaṃ prapañcasya pradhānaṃ na brahma tasya ṣaṣṭhyantatayā prapañcāvacchekatvenāpradhānatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12870: tato 'nyadbravītīti neti netīti pratiṣedhādanyadbhūyo bravītīti tannirvacanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12871: nahyetasmādityasya yadā nahyetasmāditi neti netyādiṣṭādbrahmaṇo 'nyatparamastīti vyākhyānaṃ tadā prapañcapratiṣedhādanyadbrahmaiva bravītīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12872: yadā tu nahyetasmāditi sarvanāmnā pratiṣedho brahmaṇa ādeśaḥ parāmṛśyate tadāpi prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ na pratipattavyamapi tu tena pratiṣedhena bhāvarūpaṃ brahmopalakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12876: atha brahmaṇo nāmadheyaṃ nāma satyasya satyamiti tadvyācaṣṭe śrutiḥ-'prāṇā vai satyam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12878: tat khalu satyamitarāpekṣayā tasyāpi paraṃ satyaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:12879: tadevaṃ yataḥ pratiṣedhasya parastadbravīti tasmānna prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ brahmāpi tu bhāvarūpamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12880: tadevaṃ pūrvasmin vyākhyāne nirvacanaṃ bravītīti vyākhyātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12893: kuṇḍalādirūpeṇa tu bheda ityuktaṃ tena viṣayabhedādbhedābhedayoravirodha ityekaviṣayatvena vā sarvadopalabdheravirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12894: viruddhamiti hi naḥ kka saṃpratyayo na yatpramāṇenopalabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12895: āgamataśca pramāṇādekagocarāvapi bhedābhedau pratīyamānau na virodhamāvahataḥ savitṛprakāśayoriva pratyakṣātpramāṇādbhedābhedāviti //27 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12903: sa evaṃ bruvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyo jāyate, kimahitvakuṇḍalatve vastuno bhinne utābhinne iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12904: yadi bhinne, ahitvakuṇḍalatve bhinne iti vaktavyaṃ na tu vastunastābhyāṃ bhedābhedau /
GSP33vacbhamu:12907: atha vastuno na bhidyete ahitvakuṇḍalatve tathā sati ko bhedābhedayorviṣayabhedastayorvastuno 'nanyatvenābhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12908: na caikaviṣayatve 'pi sadānubhūyamānatvādbhedābhedayoravirodha svarūpaviruddhayorapyavirodhe kka nāma virodho vyavatiṣṭheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:12911: prapañcitaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra iti neha prapañcitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12916: yathāha śrutiḥ-'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12929: tadyathā prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā avayavā iva kalāḥ sa prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12930: etadupāsanāyāṃ prakāśavān mukhyo bhavatīti prakāśavān pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12931: athāparāḥ pṛthivyantarikṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra iti catasraḥ kalā eṣa dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantatavānnāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:12933: athāgniḥ sūryaścandramā vidyuditi catasraḥ kalāḥ sa jyotiṣmānnāma pādastṛtīyastadupāsanājjyotiṣmān bhavatīti jyotiṣmān pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12934: atha ghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgiti catasraḥ kalāścaturthaḥ pāda āyatanavānnāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:12935: ete ghrāṇādayo hi gandhādiviṣayā mana āyatanamāśritya bhogasādhanaṃ bhavantītyāyatanavānnāma pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12947: yathā hi tantavaḥ paṭaṃ vidhārayanti tadupādānatvādevaṃ brahmāpi jagadvidhārayati tadupapādakatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12956: manaso brahmapratīkasya samāropitabrahmabhāvasya vāgghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotramiti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12957: mano hi vaktavyaghrātavyadraṣṭavyaśrotavyān gocarān vāgādibhiḥ saṃcaratīti saṃcaraṇasādhāraṇatayā manasaḥ pādastadidamadhyātman /
GSP33vacbhamu:12958: ākāśasya brahmapratīkasyāgnirvāyurādityo diśa iti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12959: te hi vyāpino nabhasa udara iva goḥ pādā vilagnā upalakṣyanta iti pādastadidamadhidaivatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12960: tadanena pādavaditi vaidikaṃ nidarśanaṃ vyākhyāya laukikaṃ cedaṃ nidarśanamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12969: yathā saudhajālamārganiveśinyaḥ savitṛbhāso jālamārgopādhibedādbhinnā bhāsante tadvigame tu gabhastimaṇḍalenaikībhavantyatastena saṃbadhyanta evamihāpīti //34 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12972: ekībhāvaḥ kasmādiha saṃbandhaḥ kathañcidvyākhyāyate na mukhya evetyetatsūtreṇa pariharati- #

GSP33vacbhamu:12976: tathā bhedo 'pi trividho vānyādṛśaḥ svābhāvika ityarthaḥ //35 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12984: brahmādvaitasiddhāvapi na sarvagatatvaṃ sarvavyāpitā sarvasya brahmaṇā svarūpeṇa rūpavattvaṃ sidhyatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12985: anena setvādinirākaraṇena#parahetunirākaraṇenānyapratiṣedhasamāśrayaṇena ca svasādhanopanyāsena ca sarvagatatvamapyātmanaḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12986: advaita siddhe sarvo 'yamanirvacanīyaḥ prapañcāvabhāso brahmādhiṣṭhāna iti sarvasya brahmasaṃbandhādbrahma sarvagatamiti siddham //37 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12991: nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ kuta īśvaratvaṃ kutaśca phalahetutvamapītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13004: atha karmaṇa eva phalaṃ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13009: upāttamapi phalaṃ bhoktumayogyatvādvā karmāntarapratibandhādvā na bhujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13012: nahi svarga ātmānaṃ labhatāmityadhikāriṇaḥ kāmayante kintu bhogyo 'smākaṃ #
GSP33vacbhamu:13014: tena yādṛśamebhiḥ kāmyate tādṛśasya phalatvamiti bhogyameva satphalamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13015: naca tādṛśaṃ karmānantaramiti kathaṃ phalaṃ, tadapi svarūpeṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:13016: apica svarganarakau tīvratame sukhaduḥkhe iti tadviṣayeṇānubhavena bhogāparanāmnāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13017: tasmādanubhavayogye ananubhūyamāne śaśaśṛṅgavanna sta iti niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13019: athocyeta mā bhūtkarmānantaraṃ phalotpādaḥ karmākāryādapūrvātphalamutpatsyata iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:13022: yadyadacetanaṃ tattatsarvaṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitaṃ pravartata iti pratyakṣagamābhyāmavadhāritam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13037: nanu 'svargakāmo yajeta' ityādayaḥ śrutayaḥ phalaṃ prati na sādhanatayā yāgaṃ vidadhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13038_0: tathāhi-yadi yāgādaya eva kriyā na tadatiriktā bhāvanā tathāpi na eva svapadebhyaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13038_1: pūrvāparībhūtāḥ sādhyasvabhāvā avagamyanta iti na sādhyāntaramapekṣanta iti na svargeṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:13039_0: athāpi taditarekiṇī bhavānāsti tathāpyasau bhāṣyapekṣāpi svapadopāttaṃ pūrvāgataṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13039_1: na bhāvyaṃ dhātvarthamapahāya na bhinnapadopāttaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ ca svargādi bhāṣyatayā svīkartumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13041: na kevalaṃ śabdato vastutaśca puruṣaprayatnasya bhāvanāyāḥ sākṣāddhātvartha eva sādhyo na tu svargādistasya tadavyāpyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13042: svargādestu nāmapadābhidheyatayā siddharūpasyākhyātavācyaṃ sādhyaṃ dhātvarthe prati 'bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyate' iti nyāyātsādhanatayā guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13043: tathāca pāramarṣe sūtram-'dravyāṇāṃ karmasaṃyoge guṇatvenābhisaṃbandhaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13045_0: samīhitasya ca svargāderasādhyatvānna yāgādayaḥ puruṣasyopakurvanyanupakāriṇāṃ caiṣāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13045_1: na puruṣa īṣṭe anīśānaśca na teṣu saṃbhavatyadhikārītyadhikārābhāvapratipāditānarthakyaparihārāya
GSP33vacbhamu:13047: tatrādhikārasyoktena krameṇa nirākaraṇādasato 'pi pratīyamānasya vicārāsahasyopāyatāmātreṇāvasthānādanena vākyena dehātmabhāvapravīlayastatpareṇa kriyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13049_0: niṣedhavākyāni ca sākṣādeva pravṛttiniṣedhena vidhivākyāni cānyāyi 'sāṃgrahaṇyā yajeta
GSP33vacbhamu:13049_1: grāmakāmaḥ' ityādīnā na sāṃgrahaṇyādipravṛttipāraṇyapi tūpāyāntaropadeśena saṃvādidṛṣṭopāyapratiṣedhārthāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:13050: yathā viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣava māsya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13053: tanniṣedhena tu brahmaṇi praṇidhānamādadhacchāstraṃ śāstra bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13055: kathaṃ tarhi vidhiḥ kimatra kathaṃ pravartanāmātratvādvidhestasya cādhikāramantareṇāpyupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13056: nahi yo yaḥ pravartayati sa sarvo 'dhikṛtamapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13058: tatra ca vidhiśruterviṣayabhāvopagamādyāgaḥ svargasyotpādaka iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13065: na tvajñādiriva niyoktṛprayojanastatrābhiprāyasya pravartakatvāt, tasya cāpauruṣeye 'saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13067: tathāca 'svargakāmo yajeta' ityādiṣu svargakāmādeḥ samīhitopāyā gamyante yāgādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13072: na caite sākṣādbhāvanābhāvyā api kartrapekṣitasādhanatāvidhyupahitamaryādā bhāvanoddeśyā bhavitumarhanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:13082: phalasya sākṣādbhāvanāvyāpyatvavirahiṇo 'pi taduddeśyatayā sarvatra vyāpitayā vyavasthānātsvargasādhane yāgādau svargakāmāderadhikāra iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:13083: na cāprāptārthaviṣayāḥ sāṃgrahaṇyādiyāgavidhayaḥ parisaṃkhyāyakā niyāmakā vā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13084: na cādhikārābhāve dehātmapravilayo vādhikāribhedapravilayo vā śakya upapādayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:13086: svarasataḥ pratīyamāner'the vākyasya tādarthye saṃbhavati na saṃpātāyātaparatvamucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13095: etaduktaṃ bhavati-karmaṇo hi phalaṃ prati yatsādhanatvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13097: naca vyāpāravati satyeva vyāpāro nāsatīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13099: asatyapi ca tailapānakarmaṇi tena puṣṭau kartavyāyāmantarā tailapariṇāmabhedānāṃ tadavāntaravyāpāratvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13100: tasmātkarmakāryamapūrve karmaṇā phale kartavye tadavāntaravyāpāra iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13110: nahi jātu mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍādayaḥ kumbhakārādyanadhiṣṭhitāḥ kumbhādyārambhāya vibhavavanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13113: tasmādacetanaṃ karma vāpūrve vā na cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ svakārye pravartitumutsahate naca caitanyamātraṃ karmasvarūpasāmānyaviniyogādiviśeṣavijñānaśūnyamupayujyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:13115_1: cetanādhiṣṭhānādacetanānāṃ kāryārambhakatvamiti tathā caitanyaṃ devatāyā asati bādhake
GSP33vacbhamu:13115_2: śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇaprasiddhaṃ na śakyaṃ pratiṣedhdhumityapi spaṣṭaṃ niraṭaṅki devatādhikaraṇe /
GSP33vacbhamu:13117: tadiha kevalaṃ karma vāpūrvaṃ vā cetanānadhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ phalaṃ prasūta iti dṛṣṭaviruddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:13118: yathā vinaṣṭaṃ karma na phalaṃ prasūta iti kalpyate dṛṣṭavirodhādevamihāpīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13119: tathā devapūjācmako yāgo devatāṃ naprasādayan phalaṃ prasūta ityapi dṛṣṭaviruddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:13125: naca śubhāśubhakāriṇāṃ tadanurūpaṃ phalaṃ prasuvānā devatā dveṣapakṣapātavatīti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13126: nahi rājā sādhukāriṇamanugṛhṇannigṛhṇan vā pāpakāriṇaṃ bhavati dviṣṭo rakto vā tadvadalaukiko 'pīśvaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13127: yathā ca paramāpūrve kartavye utpattyapūrvāṇāmaṅgāpūrvāṇāṃ copayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13130: tasmāddṛṣṭāvirodhena devatārādhanāt phalaṃ na tvapūrvātkarmaṇo vā kevalādvirodhato hetuvyapadeśaśca śrautaḥ smārtaśca vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13131: ye punarantaryimivyāpārāyā phalotpādanāyā nityatvaṃ sarvasādhāraṇatvamiti manyamānā bhāṣyakārīyamadhikaraṇaṃ dūṣavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13141: sāvayavasya hyavayavānāṃ bhedāttadavayavaviśiṣṭabrahmagocarāṇi vijñānāni gocarabhedādbhidyerannityavayavā brahmaṇo nirākṛtāḥ pūrvāparādītyanena /
GSP33vacbhamu:13142: naca nānāsvabhāvaṃ brahma yataḥ svabhāvabhedādbhinnāni jñānānītyuktam- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13146: yathā somaśarmaiko 'pyācāryo māyulapitā putro bhrātā bhartā jāmātā dvijottama ityanekarūpa ityata uktam- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13148: ekasmin gocare saṃbhavanti bahūni vijñānāni na tvanekākāraṇītyuktam- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13153: tattadguṇopādhānabrahmaviṣayā upāsanāḥ prāṇādiviṣayāśca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭakamuktiphalā viṣayabhedādbhidyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13163: jyotiṣṭomasya prakrāntatvādyajeteti tadanuvādājjyotiriti prātipadikamātraṃ paṭhitvā etenetyanukṛṣya karmasāmānādhikaraṇyena karmanāmavyavasthāpanāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13165: jyotiḥśabdasya 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā' iti ca jyotiṣṭome yogadarśanāt nāmaikadeśena ca nāmopalakṣaṇasya lokasiddhatvādbhīmasenopalakṣaṇabhīmapadavat,
GSP33vacbhamu:13169: prakṛtasyaiva jyotiṣṭomasya sahasradakṣiṇālakṣaṇaguṇavidhānārthamayamanuvādo na tu karmāntaramiti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13170: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavetpūrvasmin guṇavidhiryadi tadeva prakaraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13173: na jātu dehi devadattāya gāmatha devāya vājinamiti devaśabdāddevadattaṃ vājibhājamavasyanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13174: tathā copariṣṭāt 'yajeta' iti śrūyamāṇamasaṃbaddhārthapadavyavāyāttatkarmabuddhimanādadhat tatra guṇavidhānamātrāsamarthaṃ karmāntarameva vidhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:13175: na caikatrānupapattyā lakṣaṇayā jyotiḥśabdo jyotiṣṭome pravṛtta ityasatyāmanupapattau lākṣaṇiko yuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13176: nahi gāṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gāṅgāpadaṃ lākṣaṇikamiti mīno gāṅgāyāmityatrāpi lākṣaṇikaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13177: bhede 'pi ca prathamaṃ saṃjñāntareṇollikhite yajiśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ karmanāmadheyatāmātratāmāvahati natu saṃjñāntaropajanitāṃ bhedadhiyamapanetumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13180: bhavatu saṃjñāntarātkarmabhedaḥ prastute tu kimāyātamityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13182: yathaiva kāṭhakādisamākhyā granthe prayujyanta evaṃ jñāne 'pi laukikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13183: na cāsti viśeṣo yato granthe mukhyāvijñāne gauṇī bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13186_0: tathāca yadā jyotiṣṭomasaṃnidhau śrūyamāṇaṃ samākhyāntaraṃ tatpratikamapi karmaṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:13186_1: bhedakaṃ tadā kaiva kathā śākhāntarīye viprakṛṣṭatame 'tatpratīkabhūtasamākhyāntarābhidheye jñāta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13187: tathā rūpabhedo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādakaḥ prasiddho yathā 'vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājinam' ityevamādiṣu /
GSP33vacbhamu:13188: idamāmnayate-'tapte payasi dadhyānayati sā vaiśvadevyāmikṣā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13191: atredaṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ pūrvāsminneva karmaṇi vājinaṃ guṇo vidhīyate uta karmāntaraṃ dravyadevatāntaraviśiṣṭamapūrvaṃ vidhīyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13193: dravyadevatāntaraviśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhau vidhigauravaprasaṅgāt karmāntarāpūrvāntarakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgācca na karmāntaravidhānamapi tu pūrvasminneva karmaṇi vājinadravyavidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13194: na cotpattiśiṣṭamikṣāguṇāvarodhāttatra vājinamalabdhāvakāśaṃ karmāntaraṃ gocarayatīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13195: ubhayorapi vākyayoḥ samasamayapravṛtterāmikṣāvājinayorutpattau samaṃ śiṣyamāṇatvena nāmikṣāyāḥ śiṣṭatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13197: na ca vaiśvadevītyatra śrauta āmikṣāsaṃbandho viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ yena vājinasaṃbandhādvākyagamyādbalavānbhavedubhayorapi padāntarāpekṣapratītitayā vākyagamyatvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13199: astu vā śrautatvaṃ tathāpi vājibhya iti padaṃ vājamannamāmikṣā tadeṣāmastīti vyutpattyā tatsaṃbandhino viśvāndevānupalakṣayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13201: yena ca śabdena codanā tenaivoddeśe devatātvaṃ na śabdāntareṇānyathārthaikatvena sūryādityapadayoḥ sūryādityacarvorekadaivatyaprasaṅgāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13202: tathāpi vājinnitīneḥ sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca sarvanāmārthatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13203: viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ ca viśvadevāpadena saṃnidhāpanāttatpadapuraḥsarā evaite vājipadenopasthāpyā na tu sūryādityapadavatsvatantrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13204: tathāca tadupalakṣaṇārthaṃ vājipadaṃ viśvadevopahitāmeva devatāmupalakṣayatīti na śabdāntarāddevatābhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13205_0: tataścāmikṣāsaṃbandhopajīvanena viśvebhyo vājinaṃ vidhīyamānaṃ nāmikṣayā bādhyate
GSP33vacbhamu:13205_1: kintu tayā saha samuccīyata iti na karmāntaramapi tu vākyābhyāṃ dravyayuktamekaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13205_2: karma vidhīyata iti prāpta ucyate-syādetadevaṃ yadi vaiśvadevīti taddhitaśrutyāmikṣā nocyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:13206: taddhitasya tvasyeti sarvanāmārthe smaraṇāt saṃnihitasya ca viśeṣyasya sarvanāmārthatvāttatraiva taddhitasyāpi vṛttirnatu viśveṣu deveṣaṣu /
GSP33vacbhamu:13208: nanvevaṃ sati kasmādvaiśvadevīśabdamātrādeva nāmikṣāṃ pratīmaḥ kimiti cāmikṣāpadamapekṣāmahe /
GSP33vacbhamu:13211: idaṃ tu saṃnihitaviśeṣābhidhāyi tatsaṃnidhimapekṣamāṇaṃ saṃnidhāpakamāmikṣāpadamapekṣata iti kuta āmikṣāpadānapekṣa āmikṣāpratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13213: ataśca satyāmapi padāntarāpekṣāyāṃ yatpadaṃ padāntarāpekṣamabhidhatte tatpramāṇabhūtaprathamabhāvipadāvagamyatvācchrautaṃ balīyaśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:13214_2: sasaṃbandhi pūrvasmādbhinatti vājipadaṃ kathañcidyaugikaṃ sāpekṣāvṛtti viśvadevaśabdāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13217: prāmāṇike ca vidhikalpanāgaurave abhyupetavye eva pramāṇasya tattvaviṣayatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13218: tasmādyatheha pūrvakarmāsaṃbhavino guṇātkarmabheda evamihāpi pañcāgnividyāyāḥ ṣaḍagnividyā bhinnā,
GSP33vacbhamu:13226: naca tānyeva karmāṇi bhūmibhojanādijanitamupakāramākāṅkṣanti nākāṅkṣanti ceti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13236_1: ca dhātubhedamantareṇa bhedānupapatteḥ 'samidho yajati' iti prathamabhāvinā vākyena
GSP33vacbhamu:13243: tena prāthamyābhāvāt prāptamityeva nāstīti kasya ko 'nuvādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13245: guṇaśravaṇe hi guṇaviśiṣṭakarmavidhāne vidhigauravabhiyā guṇamātravidhānalāghavāya karmānuvādapekṣāyāṃ viparivṛtterupakāraḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:13856: yadi vākyaṃ balīyaḥ kṛtsnau mantra ubhayatra,
GSP33vacbhamu:13857: suśevaṃ kalpyāmītyetadapekṣo hi tasminsīdetyādiḥ pūrveṇaikavākyatāmupaiti yatkalpayāmi tasmintsīdeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13858: atha liṅgaṃ balīyastataḥ kalpyāmyantaḥ sadanakaraṇe tatprakāśane hi tatsamartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:13861: liṅgādvākyaṃ balīya ityubhayatra kṛtsnasya viniyoga iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13862: iha hi yattatpadasamabhivyāhāreṇa vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvādekavākyatāyāṃ siddhāyāṃ tadanurodhena paścāttadabhidhānasāmārthyaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13863: yathā devasyatvetimantre 'gnye nirvapāmīti padayoḥ samavetārthatvena tadekavākyatayā padāntarāṇāṃ tatparatvena tatra sāmarthyakalpanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13864: tadevaṃ pratītaikavākyatānirvāhāya tadanuguṇatayā sāmarthyaṃ kḷptaṃ sanna tadvyāpādayitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:13865: api tu viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ mantraḥ prayoktavya iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13866_1: tu avadhṛtasāmarthyānāṃ padānāṃ praśliṣṭapāṭhitānāṃ sāmarthyavaśena prayojanaikatvenekavākyatvāvadhāraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13867: yavanti padāni pradhānamekamarthamavagamayituṃ samarthāni vibhāge sākāṅkṣāṇi tānyekaṃ vākyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13870: tayośca sadanakaraṇaṃ kalpayāmyanto mantraḥ samarthaḥ prakāśayituṃ puroḍāśāsādanaṃ ca tasminsīdetyādiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13871: tataśca yāvadekavākyatāvaśena sāmarthyamanumīyate tāvatpratītaṃ sāmarthyamekaikasya bhāgasyaikaikasminnarthe viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ kalpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13872_0: tathāca śrutyaivaikaikasya bhāgasyaikatra viniyoge sati prakaraṇapāṭhopapattau na
GSP33vacbhamu:13872_1: vākyakalpitaṃ liṅgaṃ viniyojikāṃ śrutimaparāṃ kalpayitumarhatītyekavākyatābuddhirutpannāpyābhāsībhavati liṅgena bādhanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13873: yatra tu virodhakaṃ liṅgaṃ nāsti tatra samavetārthaikadvitripadaikavākyatā padāntarāṇāmapi sāmarthyaṃ kalpayatīti bhavati vākyasya viniyojakatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13877: atra ca padānāṃ parasparāpekṣāvaśātkasmiṃścidviśiṣṭa ekasminnarthe paryavasitānāṃ vākyatvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13878: labdhavākyabhāvanāṃ ca punaḥ kāryāntarāpekṣāvaśena vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13879: kartavyāyāḥ khalu phalabhāvanāyā labdhadhātvarthakaraṇāyā itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyā vacanaṃ prakaraṇamācakṣate vṛddhāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13882: tadetasmin svapadagaṇena kiyatyapyarthe paryavasite karaṇopakāralakṣaṇakāryāntarāpekṣāyāṃ 'samidho yajati' ityādivākyāntarasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13883: samidādibhāvanā hi svavidhyupahitāḥ puruṣe hitaṃ bhāvyapekṣamāṇā viśvajitryāyena vānuṣaṅgato vārthavādato vā phalāntarāpratilambhena darśapūrṇamāsabhāvanāṃ nirvārayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13884: tasmāttadakāṅkṣāyāmupanipatitānyetāni vākyāni svakāryāpekṣāṇi tadapekṣitakaraṇopakāralakṣaṇaṃ kāryamasādya nirvaṇvanti ca nirvārayanti ca pradhānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13888: taśca na mitha ekavākyatāṃ gantumarhantīti liṅgena paurṇamāsīyāgādindrāgnīśabda utkraṣṭavyaḥ amāvāsyāyāṃ ca samavetārtatvātprayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13889: athedānīṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ yadindrāgnipadaikavākyatayā pratīyate 'avivṛdhethāṃ maho jyāyo 'kātām' iti tannotākraṣṭavyamutendrāgniśabdābhyāṃ sahotkraṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13890: tatra yadi prakaraṇaṃ balīyastato 'panītadevatāko 'pi śeṣaḥ prayoktavyo 'tha vākyaṃ tato tatra devatāśabdastatraiva prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13895: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi viniyojyasvarūpasāmarthyamanapekṣya prakaramaṃ viniyojayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13896: api tu viniyogāya tadapekṣaye 'nyathā pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrasya dvadaśopasattāyāśca notkarṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13897: tadrūpālocanāyāṃ ca tadyadeva śīghraṃ pratīyate tattadvalavadviprakṛṣṭaṃ tu durbalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13898: tatra yadi tadrūpaṃ śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vānyatra viniyuktaṃ tataḥ prakaramaṃ bhaṅktvotkṛṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:13900: atha svasya śīghrapravṛttaṃ śrutyādi nāsti tataḥ prakaramaṃ viniyojakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13906_0: yāvaditaratra vākyena sāmarthyaṃ tāvaditaratra sāmarthyena śrutistāvadiha śrutyā
GSP33vacbhamu:13906_1: viniyogastāvatā ca vicchinnāyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrutyanumāne vihate prakaraṇenāntarā kalpitaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13913: gāmānaya prasādaṃ paśyeti gāmityasya kriyāmātrāpekṣiṇaḥ paśyetyanenāpi saṃbandhasaṃbhavādvinigamanābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13917: ayameti putro rājñaḥ puruṣo 'pasāryatāmityatra rājña ityasya putrapuruṣapadasaṃnidhānāviśeṣānmā bhūdavinigamanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13919_0: atra putraśabdasya saṃbandhivacanatayā samutthitākāṅkṣasyāntike yadupanipatitaṃ saṃbandhyantarākāṅkṣaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13919_1: padaṃ tasya tenaivākāṅkṣāparipūrteḥ puruṣapadena puruṣarūpamātrābhidhāyinā svatantreṇaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:13922: tathā cākāṅkṣitamapi na yāvatsaṃnidhāpyate tāvanna saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13923_0: tathā saṃnihitamapi yāvannākāṅkṣyate na tāvatsaṃbadhyata iti dvayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ prati
GSP33vacbhamu:13924: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-rājasūyake kathaṃbhāvāpekṣā hi pavitrādārabhya kṣatrasya dhṛtiṃ yāvadanuvartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13926: anirjñātaphalaṃ karma tasya prakaraṇāṅgatā ' iti nyāyādrājasūyāṅgatā śaunaḥśopopākhyānādīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:13927: abhiṣecanīyasya tu svavākyopāttapadārthanirākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhipāṭhenākāṅkṣotthāpanīyā yāvattāvatsiddhākāṅkṣeṇa rājasūyenaikavākyatā kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13928_0: yāvaccābhiṣecanīyaikavākyatayā liṅgaṃ kalpyate tāvatkḷptaliṅgaṃ viniyokrīṃ śrutiṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13928_1: kalpyati yāvadvākyakalpitena liṅgena śrutiritaratra kalpte tāvatkḷptayā śrutyā viniyoge
GSP33vacbhamu:13931: tasmātprakaraṇavirodhe kramasya bādha eva naca vikalpo durbalatvāditi siddham //
GSP33vacbhamu:13932: kramasamākhyayorvirodhodāharaṇam-pauroḍāśika iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sānnāṭyakrame ca śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya karmaṇa iti śundhanārtho mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13933: tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ samākhyānasya balīyastvātpuroḍāśapātrāṇāṃ śundhena viniyoktavyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13936: samākhyānāṃ balīya iti pauroḍāśikaśabdena hi puroḍāśasaṃbandhīnītyucyante tānyadhikṛtya pravṛttaṃ kāṇḍaṃ pauroḍāśikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13937_0: tataśca yāvatkrameṇa prakaraṇādyanumānaparamparayā saṃbandhaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ yāvatsamākhyayā
GSP33vacbhamu:13937_1: śrutyaiva sākṣādeva sa pratipādita iti arthaviprakarṣeṇa kramātsamākhyaiva balīyasīti
GSP33vacbhamu:13937_2: puroḍāśapātraśundhena mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ na sānnāṭyapātraśundhana iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13939: tathāhi-samākhyā na tāvatsaṃbandhasya vācikā kintu pauroḍāśaviśiṣṭaṃ kāṇḍamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:13940: tadviśiṣṭatvānyathānupapattyā tava saṃbandhaḥ kāṇḍasyānumīyate na tu sākṣānmantrabedasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:13942: na cāsau saṃbandho 'pi śrutyaiva śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13947_1: viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ sānnāṭyakramaḥ sānnāṭyaṃ prati prakaraṇādyanumānadvāreṇa viniyogaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13949: tathāhi-samākhyā saṃbandhanibandhanā sati tatsidhyarthaṃ saṃnidhimupakalpayati yāvattādvaidikena pratyakṣadṛṣṭena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13950: yāvacca kḷptena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate tāvaditaratra kḷptayākāṅkṣayaikavākyatā tāvaditaratraikavākyatayā kḷptayopakārasāmarthyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13952_0: yāvadatra liṅgena viniyojikā śrutistāvaditaratra kḷptayā śrutyā viniyoga iti tāvataiva
GSP33vacbhamu:13952_1: prakaraṇapāṭhopapatteḥ sarvaṃ samākhyānakalpitaṃ vicchinnamūlatvāttūyamānaśasyamiva nirbījaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13957: tatrāpi ca 'bādhikaiva śrutirnityaṃ samākhyā bādhyate sadā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13960: tadvayaṃ vistarādbibhyato 'pi prathamatantrānabhijñānukampayā nidhrā vistare patitāḥ sma ityuparamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13961: tasmādyathānujñāpanānujñayoḥ prajñātakramayorupahūta upahūyasvetyevaṃ mantravāmnātau deśasāmānyāttathaivāṅgatayā prāpnutaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13962: upahūta iti liṅgato 'nujñāmantro nānujñāpane upahūyasveti ca liṅgato 'nujñāpano ca mantro nānujñāyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:13963: tadiha liṅgena kramaṃ bādhitvā viparītaṃ śeṣatvamāpādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13964: yāvaddhi sthānena prakaraṇamutpādyaikavākyatvaṃ kalpyate tāvalliṅgena śrutiṃ kalpayitvā sādhito viniyoga iti akalpitaliṅgaśruteḥ kramasya bādhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13965: tadvidihāpi viniyoge pratyekāntaritena liṅgena caturantaritasya vidyākramasya bādha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13966: yadyapi prathamatantra evāyamartha upapāditastathāpi virodhe tadupapādanamiha tvavirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13969: athaiva pratītivirodho naca vastuvirodhaḥ sa vidyāyāṃ viniyoge 'pi tulyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13975: upapādite tu śrutyādibiḥ prakaraṇapāṭhe kṣīṇatvādarthāpatteḥ kramo na svocitāṃ pramāmutpādayitumarhati pramityābhāvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:13976_1: saṃyogapṛthaktvena viniyuktamapi viniyojayantī na śakyā śrutyantareṇa niroddhuṃ svapramāmiti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13980: tulyabalatayā bṛhaspatisamasya tulyatāśaṅkāpākaraṇadvāreṇa samuccayo na tu pṛthaguktitayā parasparāpekṣatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:13986: yatra hānopāyane śrūyete tatrāvivādaḥ saṃnipāte yatrāpyupāyanamātraśravaṇaṃ tatrāpi nāntarīyakatayā hānamākṣiptamityasti saṃnipātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13987: yatra tu hānamātraṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ śrutaṃ na śrūyate upāyanaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13997: nanu yathopāyanaṃ śrutaṃ hānamupasthāpayatyevaṃ hānamapi upāyanamityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13999: grahaṇaṃ hi na svāmino 'pagamamantareṇa bhavatīti grahaṇādapagamasiddhiravaśyaṃbhāvinī /
GSP33vacbhamu:14000: apagamastvasatyapyanyena grahaṇe dṛṣṭo yathā prāyaścittenāpagatirenasa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14004: ayamasyārthaḥ-karmāntare vihitaṃ hi na karmāntara upasaṃhriyate pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14005: yatpunarna vidhīyate kintu stutyarthaṃ siddhatayā saṃkīrtyate tadasati bādhake devatādhikaraṇanyāyena śabdataḥ pratīyamānaṃ parityaktumaśakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14006: tathāca vidhūtayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayornirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmaśvaromādivatkiṃ bhavatvityākāṅkṣāyāṃ na tāvatprāyaścitteneva tadvilayasaṃbhavastathā satyaśvaromarāhudṛṣṭāntānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14010: tasmādarthavādasyāpekṣāyāṃ śabdasaṃnidhikṛto 'pi viśeṣa upāyanaṃ buddhau saṃnidhāpayituṃ śakrotyapekṣāṃ pūrayitumiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14018: yadyapyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyasya phalaṃ prayacchataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14019: yathā putrasya śrāddhakarma pitustṛptiṃ yathā ca piturvaiśvānarīyeṣṭiḥ putrasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:14021: tathāpyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte sākṣādanyasminna saṃbhavata ityāśayena śaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14028: prayojanaṃ copāsake sauhārdamācaritavyaṃ na svasauhārdamiti chanda evācchanda ācchādanādācchabdo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14040: 'api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyāṭyatvādvikalpasya vidhīnāmekadeśaḥ syāt' ityetadeva sūtramarthadvāreṇa paṭhati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:14041: api tu vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ#syātsa cānyāṭya iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14042: evaṃ kila śrūyate-'eṣa vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryajñe yajñe 'nvāyatta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14046: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ vidhipratiṣedhayorvikalpa uta paryudāso 'nuyājavarjiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14048: dṛṣṭaṃ hi tādātvikīmasya sundaratāṃ gamayati nāyatau doṣavattāṃ niṣedhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14050: niṣedhaśāstraṃ tu tādātvikaṃ saundaryamabādhamānameva pravṛttyunmukhaṃ naraṃ nivārayadāyatyāmasya duḥkhaphalatvamavagamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14052: tato gārataḥ pravṛttamapyāyatyāṃ duḥkhato vibhyataṃ puruṣaṃ śaknoti nivārayitumiti balīyayān śāstrīyaḥ pratiṣedho gārataḥ pravṛtteriti na tayā vikalpamarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14057_0: naca vācyaṃ yāvadyajatiṣu yeyajāmahakaraṇaṃ yāvadyajatisāmānyadvāreṇānuyājaṃ yajativiśeṣamupasarpati
GSP33vacbhamu:14057_1: tāvadanuyājagatena niṣedhena tanniṣiddhamiti śīghrapravṛtteḥ sāmānyaśāstradviśeṣaniṣedho balavāniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14058: yato bhavatvevaṃvidhiṣu brāhmaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14059: tatra takradhaprāptyai tadvidhimapekṣate pravartitumiha tu prāptapūrvakatvāpratiṣedhasya yeyajāmahasya cānyato 'prāptestanniṣedhena niṣedhaprāptyai tadvidhirapekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14060: naca sāpekṣatayā niṣedhādvidhireva balīyānityatulyaśiṣṭatayā na vikalpaḥ kintu niṣedhasyaiva bādhanamiti sāṃprataṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14066: na cātra tathā yeyajāmahābhāvaḥ, yajatiṣu yeyajāmahavidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14072: tenādoṣaduṣṭo 'pi vikalpa āsthīyate pakṣe 'pi prāmāṇyānmā bhūtpramatagītateti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14074: evaṃ hi tadā nañaḥ saṃbandho 'nanuyājeṣu yajatiṣvanuyājavartiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14083: yathā hi sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoramūrtayoḥ kalpanaṃ nāñjasaṃ sūrtyanuvidhāyitvātkampasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:14085: tasmādyatra vidhūnanamātraṃ śrutaṃ tatra kampanena varaṃ svakāryarambhāccālanamātrameva lakṣyatāṃ na tu tato 'pagatyānyatra saṃcāraḥ kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14086: tasmātsvakāryārambhāccālanaṃ vidhūnanamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-yatra tāvadupāyanaśrutistatrāvaśyaṃ tyāgo vidhūnanaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14087: kkacidapi codvidhūnanaṃ tyāge vartate tathā satyanyatrāpi tatraiva vartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14088: evaṃ hi na varteta yadi vidhūnanamiha mukhyaṃ labhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:14103: śrutyarthau ca pāṭhakramādbalīyāṃsau, 'agnihotraṃ juhoti yavāgūṃ pacati' ityatra yathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14107: taditi hi sarvanāma tasmādarthe sannihitaparāmarśakaṃ tasya hetubhāvamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:14113: nahi tatra jīvanniti vā jīvata iti vā śrutam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14115: evañca na paryaṅkavidyātastatprakṣaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14116: rāddhāntastu vidyāsāmarthyavidhūtakalmaṣasya jñānavata uttareṇa pathā gacchato brahmaprāptirna cāprakṣīṇakalmaṣasyottaramārgagamanaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14120: vidyaiva tādṛśī kalmaṣaṃ kṣapayati kṣapitakalmaṣaṃ cottaramārgaṃ prāpayatīti kathamardhapathe kalmaṣayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14122: nanu na pāṭhakramamātramatra, taditi sarvanāmaśrutyā saṃnihitaparāmarśādityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14128: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūyeti hi svatantrasya puruṣasya vyāpāraṃ brūte,
GSP33vacbhamu:14135: nanu yathā paretasyottareṇa pathā brahmaprāptirbhavatīti vidyāphalamevaṃ tasyaivārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtahānirapi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkāpadāni tebhya uttaramidaṃ sūtram /
GSP33vacbhamu:14140: sukṛtaduṣkṛtaprakṣayastu satyapi naraśarīre saṃbhavatīti samarthasya hetoryamaniyamādisahitāyā vidyāyāḥ karyakṣayāyogādyukto jīvata eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣaya iti siddham /

GSP33vacbhamu:14909: iha tu satyapi puruṣārthatve kasmānnaikaprayogavacanagrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti pūrvoktamarthamākṣipan pratyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14910: yadyapi hi kāmyā etā upāsanāstathāpi na svatantrā bhavitumarhanti /

GSP33vacbhamu:14914: evaṃ cāśrayatantratvādāśritānāṃ prayogavacanenāśrayāṇāṃ samuccayaniyamenāśritānāmapi samuccayaniyamo yukta itarathā tadāśritatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14915: sa ca prayogavacana upāsanāḥ samuccitanvaṃstattatphalakāmanānāmavaśyaṃbhāvamākṣipati tadabhāve tāsāṃ samuccayaniyamābhāvāditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14920: nahi kāmā vidhīyate yena samuccīyerannapi tūddiśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:14924: nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāt satyapi tadāśrayāṇāṃ nityatve idameva cāśrayatantratvamāśritānāṃ yadāśraye satyeva vṛttirnāsatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14925: na tu tatra vṛttireva nāvṛttiriti tadidamuktam-āśrayatantrāṇyapi hīti //61 //

GSP33vacbhamu:14968: na tvetatprakṛtodgīthavidyāviṣayaṃ yadeva vidyayeti sarvanāmavadhāraṇābhyāṃ vyāpteradhigamat /

GSP33vacbhamu:14971: tacca yadyapyāpneyādiyagaṣaṭkavatsamapradhānatvenāpi bhavati tathāpyuktayā yuktyā vidyāyāḥ karma pratyaṅgabhāvenaiva netavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14972: vedārthajñānavataḥ karmavidhānādupaniṣado 'pi vedārtha iti tajjñānamapi karmāṅgamiti //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:14990: yadi śarīrādyatiriktaḥ kartā bhoktātmetyetanmatra upaniṣadaḥ paryavasitāḥ syustataḥ syādevaṃ, na tvetadasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14993: tathā caupaniṣadātmajñānasya kratvanuṣṭhānavirodhinaḥ kratusaṃbandha eva nāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14996: ata eva priyādisūcitena saṃsāriṇātmanopakramasya tasyaivātmano 'dhikopadidikṣāyāṃ paramātmanātyantābheda upadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14997: yathā samāropitasya bhujagasya rajjurūpādatyantābhedaḥ pratipādyate yo 'yaṃ sarpaḥ sā rajjuriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15006: yatha sarve brāhmaṇā bhojyantāmiti nimintritāpekṣayā teṣāmeva prakṛtatvāt //10 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15019_1: tanmātravata evādhikāraḥ karmasu nopaniṣadadhyanavataḥ tadadhyayanasya karmasvanupayogāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:15020: adhyayanamātravata eveti mātragrahaṇenārthajñānaṃ vā vyavacchinnamiti manvāno bhrāntaścodayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15033: apica vidyāphalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ darśayantī śrutiḥ kālāntarabhāviphalakarmāṅgatvaṃ vidyāyā nirākarotītyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15052: nindati hi pratyakṣā śrutirāśramāntaraṃ 'vīrahā vā eṣa devānām' ityādikā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15053: pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe ca smṛtyācārayoraprāmāṇyamuktaṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15062: na kevalamanyaparatayā parāmarśasyāśramāntaraṃ na labhyate api tvāśramāntaranindādvāreṇāpavādādapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15070: nahi tapa eva dvitīya ityatrāśramāntarābhidhāyī kaścidasti śabda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15071: nanvetameva pravrājina iti vacanādāśramāntaraṃ setsyatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15084: tatra skandhaśabdo yadyāśramaparo na syāditi tu samūhavacanastato dharmāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ prātisvikotpattīnāṃ kimapekṣya tritvamaṅkhyā suvyavasthāpyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:15086: tatra yajñādiliṅgo gṛhāśrama eko dharmaskandho brahmacārīti dvitīyastapa iti ca,
GSP33vacbhamu:15089: tasmādanyaparādapi parāmarthādaśramāntarāṇi pratīyamānāni devatādhikaraṇanyāyena na śakyante 'pākartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:15090: naca pratyakṣaśrutivirodho vīrahā vetyādeḥ pratipannagārhasthyaṃ pramādādajñānādvāgnimudvāsayituṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15091_0: evañca avirodhe siddhavatparāmarśādaśramāntarāṇāṃ śāstrāntarasiddhiṃ vā kalpayiṣyāmo
GSP33vacbhamu:15091_1: yathopavītavidhipare vākye 'upavyayate devalakṣmameva tatkurute' ityatra nivītaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:15091_2: manuṣyāṇāṃ prācīnāvītaṃ pitṛṇāmiti śāstrāntarasiddhayornivītaprācīnāvītayoḥ parāmarśa iti //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15098: aparāmarśe ca stuterasaṃbhavena kiṃparatayā ekavākyatāstvitī tāṃ bhaṅktvā dhāraṇavadvaramapūrvatvādvidhirevāstu /
GSP33vacbhamu:15099: yathā 'adhastātsamidhaṃ dhārayannanudravedupari hi devebhyo dhārayati' ityatra satyāmapyadhodhāraṇenaikavākyatāpratītau vidhīyata evoparidhāraṇamapūrvatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15114: yadi tāvadbrahmasaṃstha iti padaṃ pratyastamityāvayavārthaṃ parivrājake 'śvakarṇādipadavadrūḍhaṃ tadāśramaprāptimātreṇaivāmṛtībhāva iti na tadbhāvāyā brahmajñānamapekṣeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:15119: evañca caturṣvāśrameṣu yasyaiva brahmaṇi niṣṭhatvamāśramiṇaḥ sa brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvametīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15120: tatra tāvadbrahmacārigṛhasthau svaśabdābhihitau tapaḥpadena ca tapaḥpradhānatayā bhikṣuvānaprasthāvupasthāpitau /
GSP33vacbhamu:15123: yadi tāvatkarmayogaḥ karmitā sā bhikṣorapi kāyavāṅmanobhirasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15124: atha ye na brahmārpaṇena karma kurvanti kintu kāmārthitayā te karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15125: tathā sati gṛhasthādayo 'pi brahmārpaṇena karma kurvāṇā na karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15126: tasmādbrahmaṇi tātparyaṃ brahmaniṣṭhatā na tu karmatyāgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15128: tapasā ca dvayorāśramayorekīkaraṇena traya iti tritvamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15129: evañca trayo 'pyāśramā abrahmasaṃsthāḥ santaḥ puṇyalokabhājo bhavanti yaḥ punareteṣu brahmasaṃsthaḥ so 'mṛtatvabhāgiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15131: yathā devadattayajñadattau mandaprajñāvabhūtāṃ saṃprati tayoryajñādattastu śāstrābhyāsātpaṭuprajño vartate iti tathehāpi ya evābrahmasaṃsthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15133: tathāca brahmasaṃstha iti yaugikaṃ padaṃ prakṛtaviṣayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15134: yathā āgnepyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhata ityatra viniyuktāpi prakṛtaivāgneyī gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15136: yadi hyatrāgnotyupadiśyeta tato yathā pratītā tathoddiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15138: iha tu āgnīdhropasthāne sā vidheyatvena viniyujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15144: tathehāpi prakṛtā evāśramā buddhiviparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante nānuktaḥ parivrāḍeveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15149: yatsaṃkhyākāśca ye prasiddhāste tatsaṃkhyākā eva kīrtyante iti cocitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15151: aśādhāraṇenaikaikena lakṣaṇenaikeka āśramo vaktumupakrānta iti tathaiva samāpanamucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15153: naca tapo nāma nāsādhāraṇaṃ vānaprasthānāmityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15155: na khalu parākādibhiḥ kāyakleśapradhāno yathā vānaprasthastathā bhikṣuḥ satyapyaṣṭagrāsādiniyame /
GSP33vacbhamu:15156: naca śaucasantoṣaśamādayastapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānāṃ tapaḥprasiddherasiddheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15157: ata eva vṛddhāstapaso bhedena śaucādīnācakṣate-'śaucasantoṣatapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni niyamāḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15161: traya eta iti kiṃ bhikṣurapi parāmṛśyate kintvā bhikṣuvarjaṃ traya eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:15162: na tāvantraya iti bhikṣusaṃgrahe tadvarjanamete traya ityatra vartuṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15163: eva iti prakṛtānāṃ sākalyena parāmarśādbhikṣusaṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇyalokatvamabrahmasaṃsthātvābhāvādbhikṣoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15164: tena tasya brahmasaṃsthasya sadā puṇyalokatvamamṛtatvaṃ ceti virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15174: satyaṃ yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛtasaṃbhave na tadatipattyāprakṛte vartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15175: asati tu saṃbhave mā bhūtpramādapāṭha ityaprakṛte vartayitavyaḥ, darśitaścātrāsaṃbhavo 'dhastāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:15176: eṣa hi brahmasaṃsthatālakṣaṇo dharmo bhikṣorasādhāraṇa āśramāntarāṇi tatsaṃsthānyatatsaṃsthāni ca bhikṣustatsaṃstha ityeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:15177: tatsaṃsthatā hi svābhāvaṃ vyavacchindantī virodhādyastatsaṃstha eva tatrāñjasī nānyatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:15183: sarvasaṅgaparityāgo hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kuta ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15187: tāni vā etānyavarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa evātyarecayaditi# /
GSP33vacbhamu:15189: tathā cedṛśaṃ nyāsalakṣaṇaṃ brahmasaṃsthatvaṃ bhikṣorevāsādhāraṇaṃ netareṣāmāśramiṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:15190: brahmajñānasya śabdajanitasya yaḥ paripākaḥ sākṣātkāro 'pavargasādhanaṃ tadaṅgatayā parivrājyaṃ vihitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15195_1: sa eṣa rasānāṃ rasatama ityādinā padasaṃdarbheṇaikavākyabhāvamupagataḥ stūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15205: tenaikavākyatānupapatteḥ saṃnihitasya tūpāsanāvidheḥ kiṃ viṣayasamarpaṇenopayujyatāmuta stutyeti viśaye viṣayasamarpaṇena yathārthavattvaṃ naivaṃ stutyā bahiraṅgatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15216: sāmānyoktau tadviśeṣāḥ pacedityādayo 'pi gamyanta iti tatra kuryādityākṣiptakartṛkā bhāvanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15219: evaṃ daṇḍī bhaveddaṇḍinā bhavitavyaṃ daṇḍinā bhūyetetyekadhātvarthaviṣayā vidhyupahitā bhāvanā udāhāryāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15221: yathā kulālavyāpārādghaṭo bhavati bījādaṅkuro bhavatīti prayuñjate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15229: yadyapi upaniṣadākhyānāni vidyāsaṃnidhau śrutāni tathāpi 'sarvāṇyākhyānāni pāriplave' iti sarvaśrutyā niḥśeṣārthatayā durbalasya saṃnidherbādhitatvātpariplavārthānyevākhyānāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:15230_0: naca sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāditi viniyoge 'pi dāśatayīnāṃ prātisvikaviniyogāttatra
GSP33vacbhamu:15230_1: tatra karmaṇi yathā viniyogo na virudhyate tathehāpi satyapi pāriplave viniyege saṃnidhānādvidyāṅgatvamapi
GSP33vacbhamu:15231: dāśatayīṣu prātisvikānāṃ viniyogānāṃ samudāyaviniyogasya ca tulyabalatvādiha tu saṃnidhānāt śruterbalīyastvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15233: kintu pāriplavamācakṣītetyupakramya yānyāmnātāni manurvaivasvato rājetyādīni teṣāmeva tatra viniyogaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:15238: yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatra nimintrātāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabdaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15239: tathā copaniṣadākhyānānāṃ vidyāsaṃnidhirapratidvandīṃ vidyaikavākyatāṃ so 'rodīdityādīnāmiva vidhyekavākyatvaṃ gamayatīti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:15240: pratipattisaukaryāccetyupākhyānena hi bālā apyavadhīyante yathā tantropākhyāyikayeti //23 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15246: vidyāyāḥ kratvarthatve sati tathā kratūpakaraṇāya svakāryāya kraturapekṣitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15248: yadā tu puruṣārthā tadā nānayā kraturapekṣitaḥ svakārye nirapekṣāyā eva tasyāḥ sāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15257: yathā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣyante āśramakarmāṇi evamutpattāvapi nāpekṣyeranniti śaṅkā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15267: caturthī sākṣātkāravatī vṛttirūpā nāntarīyakaṃ hi tasyāḥ kaivalyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15268: tatrādye tāvatpratipatti viditapadatadarthasya viditavākyagatigocaranyāyasya ca puṃsa upapadyete eveti na tatra karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15269: te eva ca cintāmayīṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratipattiṃ prasuvāte iti na tatrāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15270: sā cādaranairantaryadīrghakālasevitā sākṣātkāravatīmādhatta eva pratipattiṃ caturthīmiti na tatrāpyasti karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15271: tannāntarīyakaṃ ca kaivalyamiti na tasyāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15272: tadevaṃ pramāṇataśca prameyata utpattau ca kārye ca na jñānasya karmāpekṣeti bījaṃ śaṅkāyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:15273: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-utpattau jñānasya karmāpekṣā vidyate vividiṣotpādadvārā 'vividiṣanti yajñena' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15275: yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti parṇamayatāvidhirapūrvatvānna tvayaṃ vartamānāpadeśaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:15281: sa hi tattvato 'nityāśuciduḥ-khānātmani saṃsāre sati nityaśucimukhātmalakṣaṇena vibhrameṇa malinayati cittasattvamadharmanibandhanatvādvibhramāṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:15282: ataḥ pāpmanaḥ prakṣaye pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya tāttvikīmanityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhaṃ viniścineti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15285: tato hānopāyaṃ prayeṣate paryeṣamāṇaścātmatattvajñānamasyopāya iti śāstradācāryavacanāccopaśrutya tajjijñāsata iti vividiṣopahāramukhenātmajñānotpattāvasti karmāṇamupayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15286: vividiṣuḥ khalu yukta ekāgratayā śravaṇamanane kartumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15289: yena bhāvanāyāṃ vā bhāvanākārye vā sākṣātkāre karmaṇāmupayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15293: dṛṣṭārtheṣu tu karmasu pratiṣiddhavarjamanadhikāre 'pyasaktasya svārasikī pravṛttirupapadyata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:15295: ataśca 'bhrāntyā cellaukikaṃ karma vaidikaṃ ca tathāstu te' iti pralāpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15297: upapāditaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra ite neha punaḥ pratyāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15298: tasmādvividiṣotpādadvārāśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyotpattāvupayogo na vidyākārya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:15305: eṣa kila vicāraviṣayaḥ-sarvāṇi khalu vāgādīnyavajitya prāṇo mukhya uvācaitāni kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tāni hocuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15306: yadidaṃ loke 'nnamā ca śvabhya ā ca śakunibhyaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ yadannaṃ tattavānnamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15307: tadanena saṃdarbheṇa prāṇasya sarvamannamityanucintanaṃ vidhāyāha śrutiḥ-'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15309: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimetatsarvānnābhyanujñānaṃ śamādivadetadvidyāṅgatayā vidhīyata uta stutyarthaṃ saṃkīrtyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15310: tatra yadyapi bhavatīti vartamānāpadeśānna vidhiḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15311: tathāpi yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti vartamānāpadeśādapi palāśamayītvavidhipratipattiḥ pañcamalakārāpattyā tathehāpi pravṛttiviśeṣakaratālābhe vidhipratipattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15312: stutau hi arthavādamātraṃ na tathārthavadyathā vidhau /
GSP33vacbhamu:15313: bhakṣyābhakṣyaśāstraṃ ca sāmānyataḥ pravṛttamanena viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15314: gamyāgamyavivekaśāstramiva sāmānyataḥ pravṛttaṃ vāmadevavidyāṅgabhūtasamastantryaparihāraśāstreṇa viśeṣaviṣayeṇeti prāpta ucyate-aśakteḥ kalpanīyatvācchāstrāntaravirodhataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15316: na tāvatkauleyakamaryādamannaṃ manuṣyajātinā yugapatparyāyeṇa vā śakyamattum /
GSP33vacbhamu:15318: na cātra liṅ iva sphuṭatarā vidhipratipattirasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15321: naca satyāṃ gatau sāmānyataḥ pravṛttasya śāstrasya viṣayasaṃkoco yuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15324: prāṇātyasya iti cāvadhāraṇaparaṃ prāṇātyaya eva sarvānnatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15325: tatropākhyānācca sphuṭataravidhismṛteśca surāvarjaṃ vidvāṃsamavidvāṃsaṃ prati vidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15335_0: kāmo ma udakapānamiti svātantryaṃ me udakapāne nadīkūpataḍāgaprāpādiṣu yathākāmaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:15335_1: prāpnomīti nocchiṣṭodakābhāve prāṇātyaya iti tatrocchiṣṭabhakṣaṇadoṣa iti maṭacīhateṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:15351: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-siddhe hi syādvirodho 'yaṃ na tu sādhye kathañcana /
GSP33vacbhamu:15354: na tu sādhyarūpaṃ yathā ṣoḍaśina ekasya grahaṇāgrahaṇe /
GSP33vacbhamu:15358: vidyāṅgatayā ca vidyāyāḥ kādācitkatayānavaśyaṃ bhāve 'pi 'kāmyo vā naimittiko vā vikṛtya niviśate' iti nyāyādanityādhikāreṇa niviśamānamapi na nityamanityayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:15359: tenāpi tasmiddheriti saṃyogapṛthaktvānna nityānityasaṃyogavirodha ekasya kāryasyeti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:15360: sahākiratvaṃ ca karmaṇāṃ na kārye vidyāyāḥ kiṃ tūtpattau /
GSP33vacbhamu:15363: yathā 'sahaiva daśābhiḥ pūtrairbhāraṃ vahati gardabhī' iti sātsveva daśaputreṣu saiva bhārasya vāhiketi /
GSP33vacbhamu:15369: catasṛṇāmapi ca pratipattīnāṃ brahmaṇi vidhānānupapatterityuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
GSP33vacbhamu:15370: draṣṭavyo nididhyāsitavya iti ca vidhisarūpaṃ ni vidhirityapyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15373: naca svaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sādhyaṃ nityatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15380_0: yathā māsamagnihotraṃ juhvatīti prakaraṇāntarātkarmabheda evamihāpi 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena
GSP33vacbhamu:15380_2: sati karmāntaramiti prāpta ucyate-satyapi prakaraṇāntare tadeva karma,
GSP33vacbhamu:15381: śruteḥ smṛteśca saṃyogabhedaḥ paraṃ yathā 'agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ' 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt' iti tadevāgnihotramubhayasaṃyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15383: kintu ajñātajñāpanasvaraso vidhiḥ prakaraṇaikye sphuṭatarapratyabhijñābalena svarasaṃ jahyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15385: iha tu siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuñjāno na juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15389: kāle hi karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla ityutsargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15390: iha tu vividiṣāyāṃ vidhiśrutiḥ na yajñādau /
GSP33vacbhamu:15398: yadi vidyāsahakārīṇyāśramakarmāṇi hanta bho vidhurādīnāmanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidyāyām,
GSP33vacbhamu:15408: yadyapi ceha janmani tatheha janmanyāśramakarmotpāditavividiṣa eva vidyāyāmadhikṛto netara ityanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidhuraprabhṛtīnāmityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15420: daivātpunaḥ patnyādiviyogātaḥ satyanāśramitve bhavedadhikāro vidyāyāmiti śrutismṛtisaṃdarbheṇa vividiṣanti yajñenetyādinā jyāyastvāvagateḥ śrutiliṅgātsmṛtiliṅgāccvāgamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15421: tenaiti puṇyakṛditi śrutiliṅgam, anāśramī na tiṣṭhetetyādi ca smṛtiliṅgam //39 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15438: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmīti naiṣṭhikaṃ prati prāyaścittābhāvasmaraṇānnairṛtagardabhālambhaḥ prāyaścittamupakurvāṇakaṃ prati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15439: tasmācchinnaśirasa iva puṃsaḥ pratikriyābhāva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15440: sūtrayojanā tu-na cādhikārikamadhikāralakṣaṇe prathamakāṇḍe nirṇītam 'avakīrṇipaśuśca tadvadādhānasyāprāptakālatvāt' ityanena yatprāyaścittaṃ tanna naiṣṭhike bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15446: tasyāmapi ca sākṣātprāyaścittaṃ na kartavyamiti prāyaścittaniṣedho na gamyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:15448: tathā ca smṛtirniṣedhārtheti anumāya tadarthā śrutiranumātavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15452: sūtrārthastu-upapūrvamapi pātakaṃ naiṣṭhikasyāvakīrṇitvaṃ na mahāpātakamapirevakārārthe ata eke prāyaścittabhāvamicchantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15454: śāstrasthā yā vā prasiddhiḥ sā grāhyā śāstramūlatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15458: yadi naiṣṭhikādīnāmasti prāyaścittaṃ tatkimetaiḥ kṛtanirṇejanaiḥ saṃvyavahartavyamuta neti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15459: tatra doṣakṛtatvādasaṃvyavahārasya prāyaścittena tannibarhaṇādanibarhaṇe vā tatkaraṇavaiyarthyātsaṃvyavahāryā eveti prāpta ucyati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15461: niṣiddhakarmānuṣṭhānajanyameno lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhimāpādayati dvaidham lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhirapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇaiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15462: kasyācittu paralokāśuddhimātramapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇairihalokāśuddhistvenasāpāditā na śakyāpanetum /
GSP33vacbhamu:15465: tathā ca 'prāyaścittairapaityeno yadajñānakṛtaṃ bhavet' kāmataḥ kṛtamapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:15466: bālaghrādistu kṛtanirṇejano 'pi vacanādavyavahārya iha loke jāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15472_0: prathame kāṇḍe śeṣalakṣaṇe tathākāma ityatrartviksaṃbandhe karmaṇaḥ siddhe kiṃ kāmo
GSP33vacbhamu:15472_1: yājamāna utārtvijya iti saṃśapyārtvijye 'pi karmaṇi yājamāna eva kāmo guṇaphaleṣviti
GSP33vacbhamu:15472_2: nirṇītamihi tvevañjātīyakāni cāṅgasaṃbaddhāni upāsanāni kiṃ yājamānanyevotārtvijyānīti
GSP33vacbhamu:15473_2: vacane yajamānasya phalavadupāsanaṃ tasya phalaśruteḥ taṃ ha bako dālabhyo vidāñcakāretyāderupāsanasya
GSP33vacbhamu:15479: na cartvikkartṛka upāsane yajamānagāmitā phalasyāsaṃbhavinī tena hi sa parikrīyastadgāmine phalāya ghaṭate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15485: labdhvā bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15486: yatra hi vidhivibhaktiḥ śrūyate sa vidheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15487: bālyena tiṣṭhāsedityatra ca sā śrūyate na śrūyate tu maune /
GSP33vacbhamu:15490: tasmādbrāhnaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidyeti pāṇḍityavidhānādeva maunasiddheḥ pāṇḍityameva maunamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15491: athavā bhikṣuvacano 'yaṃ muniśabdastatra darśanāt 'gārhasthyamācāryakulaṃ maunaṃ vānaprastham' ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:15493: tasmādbālyamevātra vidhīyate maunaṃ tu prāptaṃ praśaṃsārthamanūdyata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15495: api tu jñānamātraṃ pāṇḍityaṃ jñānātiśayasaṃpattistu maunaṃ tatprasiddheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15497: tasmādapūrvatvānmaunasya bālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15498: evaṃ ca nirvedanīyatvamapi vidhāna āñjasaṃ syādityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15514: api tu vidyodayāyābhyāse pravṛtto na punarutpannavidyātiśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15517: ata eva samidādirvidhyantaḥ sa hi vidhiḥ pradhānavidheḥ paścāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:15524: chāndogye bahulāyāsādhyakarmabahulatvādgārhasthyasya cāśramāntaradharmāṇāṃ ca keṣāñcidahiṃsādīnāṃ samavāyāttenopasaṃhāro na punastena samāpanādityarthaḥ //48 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15526: evaṃ tadāśramadvayopanyāsena kkacitkadāciditarābhāvaśaṅkā mandabuddheḥ syāditi tadapākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15528: vṛttirvānaprasthānāmanekavidhairevaṃ brahmācāriṇo 'pīti vṛttibhedo 'nuṣṭhātāro vā puruṣā bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:15534: evaṃ ca śāstrāntarābādhenāpyupapattau na śāstrāntarabādhanamanyāpyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti //50 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15540: kiṃ śravaṇādibhirihaiva vā janmani vidyā sādhyate utāniyama iha vāmutra veti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15541: yadyapi karmāṇi yajñādinyaniyataphalāni teṣāṃ ca vidyotpadasādhanatvena vidyotpādasyāniyamaḥ pratibhāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15542: tathāca garbhasthasya vāmadevasyātmapratibodhaśravaṇāt 'anekajanmasaṃsiddhastato yati parāṃ gatim' iti ca smaraṇādāmuṣmikatvamapyavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15546: naca pramāṇeṣu pravartamānāḥ pramātāra aihikamapi cirabhāvinaṃ pramotpādaṃ kāmayante kintu tādātvikameva prāgeva tu pāralaukikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15547: nahi kumbhalādidṛkṣuścakṣuṣī samunmīlayati kālāntarīyāya kumbhadarśanāya kintu tādātvikāya /
GSP33vacbhamu:15549: śrutismṛtī ca pāralaukikaṃ vidyotpādaṃ stutyā brātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15551_0: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-yata evātra vidyotpāde śravaṇādibhiḥ kartavye yajñādīnāṃ sattvāśuddhidvāreṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:15551_1: vā vighnopaśamadvārā vopayogo 'ta eva teṣāṃ yajñādīnāṃ karmāntarapratibandhāpratibandhābhyāmaniyataphalatvena
GSP33vacbhamu:15552: tathāca teṣāṃ yajñādyapekṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ cāniyataphalatvena śravaṇādīnāmapyaniyataphalatvaṃ yuktamevaṃ śrutismṛtipratibandho na stutimātratvena vyākhyeyo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15553: puruṣāśca vidyārthinaḥ sādhanasāmarthyānusāreṇa tadanurūpameva kāmayiṣyante tadidamuktam-abhisaṃdherniraṅkaśatvāditi //51 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15558: tathā ca yathā sādhanotkarṣanikarṣābhyāṃ tatphalasya vidyāyā utkarṣāvevaṃ vidyāphalasyāpi mukterutkarṣanikarṣau saṃbhāvyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:15559: naca muktāvaihikāmuṣmikatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣa upapadyate brahmopāsanāparipākalabdhajanmani vidyāyāṃ jīvato mukteravaśyaṃbhāvaniyamātsatyapyārabdhavipākakarmāprakṣaye /
GSP33vacbhamu:15561_1: mukterapi vidyāphalatvādrūpataścotkarṣanikarṣau syātāmiti prāpata ucyate-na muktestatra
GSP33vacbhamu:15563: naca muktirbrahmaṇo nityasvarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇā nityā satī sādhyā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15567: naca cirācirotpādānutpādāvantareṇa vidyāyāmapi rūpato bhedaḥ kaścidupalakṣyate tasyā apyekarūpatvena śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15569: na cātra vidyātvaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15571: tasmāttasyā muktyavasthāyā aikarūpyāvadhṛtermuktilakṣaṇasya phalasyāviśeṣo yukta iti //52 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15572: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:15576: nābhyarthyā iha santaḥ svayaṃ pravṛttā na cetare śakyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15578: śaṅke saṃprati nirviśaṅkamadhunā svarājyasaukhyaṃ vahannendraḥ sāndratapaḥsthiteṣu kathamapyudvegamabhyeṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15584_1: codyamānānyadṛṣṭārthānīti yāvadvidhānamanuṣṭheyāni na tu tato 'dhikamāvartanīyāni pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15585: yatra punaḥ sakṛdupadeśa upāsītetyādiṣu tatra sakṛdeva prayogaḥ prayājādivaditi prāpta ucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15588: na caitānyanāvṛttāni satkāradīrghakālanairantaryeṇa sākṣātkāravate tādṛśānubhavāya kalpante /
GSP33vacbhamu:15590: na khalu pittopahṛtendriyasya guḍe tiktatāsākṣātkāro 'ntareṇamādhuryasākṣātkāraṃ sahasreṇāpyupapattibhirnivartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15591: atadvato narāntaravacāṃsivopapattisahasrāṇi vā parāmṛśato 'pi thūtkṛtya guḍatyāgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15597: tathāca nityasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo nitya eveti kṛtamatra pratyayāvṛtyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15604: virodhe vā tasya nityatvānnāvidyodīyeta kuta eva tu tena sahānuvarteta /
GSP33vacbhamu:15609: na khalu jyotiṣṭomavākyārthapratyayaḥ śataśo 'pyāvartamānaḥ sākṣātkārapramāṇaṃ svaviṣaye janayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15617: vākyaṃ cedyuktyapekṣaṃ sākṣātkārāya prabhavatitathā sati kṛtamāvṛtyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15621: na yuktivākye sākṣātkāraphale pratyakṣasyaiva pramāṇasya tatphalatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15622: te tu parokṣārthāvagāhinī sāmānyamātramabhiniviśate natu viśeṣaṃ sākṣātkuruta iti tadviśeṣasākṣātkārāyāvṛttirupāsyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15623: sā hi satkāradīrghakālanairantaryasevitā satī dṛḍhabhūmirviśeṣa sākṣātkārāya prabhavati kāminībhāvaneva straiṇasya puṃsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15627: sa khalvayaṃ sākṣātkāraḥ śāstra yuktiyonirvā syādbhāvanāmātrayonirvā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15628: na tāvatparokṣābhāsavijñānaphale śāstrayuktī sākṣātkāralakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaphalaṃ prasotumarhataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15635: kaścitkhalu śuddhasatvogarbhastha iva vāmadevaḥ śrutvā ca matvā ca kṣaṇamavadhāya jīvātmano brahmātmatamanubhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15637: ataścāvṛranarthikā yanniraṃśasya grahaṇamadrahaṇaṃ vā na tu vyaktāvyaktatve sāmānyavaśeṣavatpadmarāgādivadityata āha #
GSP33vacbhamu:15641: ayamabhisandhiḥ---satyaṃ na brahmasākṣātkāraḥ sākṣādāgamayukttiphalamapi tu yuktyāgamārthajñānāhitasaṃskārasacivaṃ citameva brahmaṇi sākṣātkāravartīṃ buddhivṛttiṃ samādhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:15642: sā ca nānumānitavahmisākṣātkāravatprātibhatvenāpramāṇaṃ tadānīṃ vahnisvalakṣaṇasyaparokṣatvātsadātanaṃ tu brahmasvarūpasyopādhirūṣitasya jīvasyāparokṣatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15653_1: pratyayapravāhe sākṣātkārāvadhau vyaktitāratamyaṃ prati kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15654: tadevaṃ vākyamātrasyārthe 'pi na drāgityeva pratyaya ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15655: tatvamasīti tu vākyamatyantadurgrahapadārthaṃ na padārthajñānapūrvake svārthe jñāne drāgityeva pravartate /
