GSP33vacbhamu:15896: yadi śāstrabodhitaphalaprasavasāmarthyamapratibaddhamāgantukena kenacit karmaṇā tatastatphalaṃ prasūta evāti na śāstravyāghātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15899: yatrāpi nirguṇāyāṃ paravidyāyāṃ doṣoddheśo nāsti tatrāpi tatsvabhāvālocanādeva tatprakṣayaprasavasāmarthyamavasīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15900: nahi tatvamasivākyārthaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭanikhilakartṛbhokktṛtvādivibhramo jīvaḥ phalopabhogona yujyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:15904_0: nanūktaṃ saṃbhaviṣyanti sāvasthā jīvātmano yasyāṃ paryāyeṇopabhogādvā yogarddheḥ

GSP33vacbhamu:15912: nanu satsvapi karmāśayāntareṣusukhadukhaphaleṣu mokṣaphalāt karmaṇaḥ samudācarato brahmabhāvamanubhūyātha labdhavipākānāṃ karmāntarāṇāṃ phalāni bhokṣyanta ityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15914: nahi kāryaḥ sanmokṣo mokṣo bhavitumarhati brahmabhāvo hi saḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15921: apūrvādhānaparamparayā jñānasya mokṣaphale kalpyamāne jñānasya parokṣaphalatvamadṛṣṭārthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:15926: adharmasya svābhāvikatvena rāgādinibandhanatvena śāstrīyeṇa brahmajñānena pratibandho yuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15930: yathā devadatto dakṣiṇenākṣṇā paśyatītyukte na vāmena paśyatīti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15931: ubhe hyevaiṣa ete taratīti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ, brahmajñānena duṣkṛtaṃ bhogena sukṛtamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15932: 'kṣīyante cāsya karmaṇi' iti ca sāmānyavacanaṃ 'sarve pāpmānaḥ' iti viśeṣaśravaṇātpāpakarmāṇīti viśeṣe upasaṃharaṇīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15933: tasmādbrahmajñānādduṣkṛtasyaiva kṣayo na sukṛtasyeti prāpte pūrvādhikaraṇarāddhānto 'tidiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15934: no khalu brahmavidyā kenacidadṛṣṭena dvāreṇa duṣkṛtamapanayatyapi tu dṛṣṭenaiva bhoktṛbhoktavyabhogādipravilayadvāreṇa taccaitattulyaṃ sukṛtepīti kathametadapi nocchindyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15935: evaṃ ca satina śāstrīyatvasāmyamātramavirodhaheturanahi pratyakṣatvasāmānyamātrādavirodho jalānalādīnāṃ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15941: tadyathā puṇyapāpe anukramya sarve pāpmāno 'to nivartaneta ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:15950: māyaivādinaśca puṇyapāpayoścamāyāmātravinirmitatvena māyānivṛttau na puṇyāpuṇye na tatasaṃskāro vastusantīti kasyānuvṛttiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15951: naca rajjau sarpādivibramajanitā bhayakamapādayo nivṛtte 'pi vibhrame yathānuvartante tathehāpīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15952: tatrāpi sarpāsatve 'pi tajjānasya satve tajjanitabhayakampādīnāṃ tatsaskārāṇāṃ ca vastusattvena nivṛtte 'pi vibhrame 'nivṛtteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15953: atra tu māyā na tajjaḥ saṃskāro na tadgocara iti tucchatvātkimanuvarteta /
GSP33vacbhamu:15955: naca tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃmapatya iti śruterdehāpratīkṣārabdhakāryāṇāṃ yuktā. nahyeṣā śrutiravadhibhedavidhāyinyapi tu kṣipratāparā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15956: yathā loka etāvanme ciraṃ yatsanāto bhuñjānaśceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15957_0: nahi tatra snānabhojane avadhitvena vidhīyate kitu kṣapīyastā pratipādyate. ubhayavidhāne
GSP33vacbhamu:15958: tathāpyanārabdhavipākaṃ karmajātaṃ drāgityeva samucchinatti na tvārabdhavipākaṃ saṃpāditajātyāyurvitatapūrvāparībhītasukhaduḥkhopabhogapravāhaṃ karmajātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15960: anyathā devarṣīṇāṃ hiraṇyagarbhamanūddālakaprabhṛtīnāṃvigalitanikhilakleśajālāvaramatayā paritaḥ pradyotamānabuddhisatvānāṃ na jyogjīvitā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:15961: śrūyate caiṣāṃ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tatvajñatā ca mahākalpakalpamanvantarādijīvitā ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:15962: na caite mahadhiyo na tadīyasamastaphalopabhogapratīkṣā satyapi tatvasākṣātkāre /
GSP33vacbhamu:15963: tāvadeva ciramiti na ciratā vidhīyate. api tu śrutyantarasiddhāṃ ciratāmanūdya dehapātāvadhimātravidhānaṃ tadetadabhisaṃdhāyaucityamātratayāha bhagavān bhāṣyākāraḥ--- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15965: na cedaṃ na jātu dṛṣṭaṃ yadviredhisamavāye viroddhyantaramanuvartata ityāha--- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15967: yadā loke 'pi virodhinoḥ kiñcitkālaṃ sahānuvṛttirupalabdhā tadehagamabalāddīrghakālamapi bhavatīti na śakyā nivārayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:15969: tadevaṃ madhyasthanapratipādya ye bhāṣyakāramāptaṃ manyate tān pratyāha--- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15976: sa cāsanna nirvacanīya iti kuto vastusataḥ karyotpādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15983: yadi puṇyasyāpyaśleṣavināśau hanta nityamapyagnihotrādi na kartavyaṃ yogamārūrukṣuṇā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15986: naca vividiṣanti yajñena dāneneti mokṣalakṣaṇaikakāryatayā vidyākarmaṇoravirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15988: nahyetamātmānaṃ viduṣo vigalitākhilakartṛtvādiprapañcavibhramasya pūrvottare nitye kriyājanye puṇye saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15989: tasmādvividiṣanti yajñeneti vartamānāpadeśo brahmajñānasya yajñādīnāṃ vā stutimātraṃ na tu mokṣamāṇasya muktisādhanaṃ yajñādividhiriti prāpta ucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15992: naca karmaṇāṃ vidyayā virudhyamānānāṃ na vidyākāraṇatvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:15996: evañca vividiṣanti yajñeneti yajñasādhanatvaṃ vidyāya apūrvamarthaṃ prāpayataḥ pañcamalakārasya nātyantaparokṣavṛttitayā jñānastutyarthatayā kathañcidvyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15998: jñānasyeva hi prāpakaṃ satkarama praṇaḍyā mokṣakāraṇamityupacaryate# /
GSP33vacbhamu:15999: yata eva na vidyodayasamaye karmāsti nāpi parastādapi tu prāgeva vidyāyāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16007: kāmyakarmaviṣayamaśle,vināśavacanaṃ śākhāntarīyavacanaṃ ca tasya putrā dāyamupayantīti //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16010: asti vidyāsaṃyuktaṃ yajñādi ya evaṃ vidvānyajetetyādikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16012: tatra yathā brāhmaṇāya hiraṇyaṃ dadyādiyukte viduṣe brāhmaṇāya dadyātra brāhmaṇabruvāya mūkhāyeti viśeṣapratilambhaḥ tatkasya hetostasyātiśayavatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16014_1: prāpte 'bhidhīyate--yadeva vidyayā karāti tadevāsya vīryavattaramiti tarabarthaśrutervidyārahitasya
GSP33vacbhamu:16016: tasmādastyasyāpi kayāpi mātrayā paravidyotpādopayoga iti vidyārahitamapi yajñādi paravidyārthinānuṣṭheyamiti siddham //18 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16019: anārabdhakārya ityasya nañaḥ phalaṃ bhogena nivṛttiṃ darśayatyanena sūtreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:16020: asya tūpapādanaṃ purastādapakṛṣya kṛtamiti neha kriyate punaruktibhayāt //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16021: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:16026: athāsmin phalavicāralakṣaṇe vāṅmanasi saṃpadyata ityādivicāro 'saṃgata ityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16028: aparavidyāphalaprāptyarthadevayānamārgārthatvādutkrāntestadgato vicāraḥ pāramparyeṇa bhavati phalavicāra iti nāsaṃgata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16029: nanvayamutkrāntikramo viduṣo nopapadyate 'na tasya prāṇā utkrāmantyatraiva samavanīyante' iti śravaṇāttatkathamasya vidyādhikāra ityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16044: tattvasya dharmiṇo vācaḥ pralayavivakṣāyāṃ tviha sarvatraiva paratreha cāvibhāgasāmyātkiṃ paratraiva viṃśiṣyādavibhāga iti na tvatrāpi /
GSP33vacbhamu:16051: āgamo hi dṛṣṭānusārataḥ prakṛtau vikārāṇāṃ layamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:16052: na ca vācaḥ prakṛtirmano yenāsminniyaṃ līyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16058: yata eva prakṛtivikārabhāvābhāvanmanasi na svarūpalayo vāco 'pi tu vṛttilayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16059: ata eva ca sarveṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāmidriyāṇāṃ satyeva savṛttike manasi vṛtteranugatirlayo na svarūpalayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16060: vācastu pṛthak grahaṇaṃ pūrvasūtre udāharaṇāpekṣaṃ na tu tadeveha vivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16063: yadi svaprakṛtau vikārasya layastato manaḥ prāṇe saṃpadyate ityatra manaḥsvarūpasyaiva prāṇe saṃpattyā bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16064: tathā hi manaḥ iti nopacārato vyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16066: annamayaṃ hi somya mana ityannātmatāmāha manasaḥ śrutirāpomayaḥ prāṇa iti ca prāṇasyābātmatām /
GSP33vacbhamu:16068: tathā ca prāṇo manasaḥ prakṛtiriti manaso vṛttimataḥ prāṇe laya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-- satyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:16071: khayoniprāṇāḍikayā tu mitho vikārayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvābhyupagame saṃkarādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16072: tasmādyo yasya sākṣādvikārastasya tatra laya ityannasyāpsu layo na tvabvikāre prāṇe 'nnavikārasya manasaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16073: tathā cātrāpi manovṛttervṛttimati prāṇe layo na tu vṛttimato manasa iti siddham //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16076: prāṇastejasīti tejaḥśabdasya bhūtaviśeṣavacanatvādvijñānātmani cāprasiddheḥ prāṇasya jīvātmanyupagamānugamāvasthānaśrutīnāṃ ca tejoddhāreṇāpyupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16080: tasmāttejasyeva prāṇavṛttipravilaya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--- sa prakṛtaḥprāṇo 'dhyakṣe vijñānātmanyavatiṣṭhate tattantravṛttirbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16088: vijñāyate 'neneti vijñānaṃ pañcavṛttiprāṇasahita indriyagrāmastena sahāvatiṣṭhata iti savijñānaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16095: tathāpi sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena vidyānāṃ śrutyantarālocanayā vijñānātmani layo 'vagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16096: na ca tejasastatrāpi laya iti sāmpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16101: tejaḥsahacaritāni bhūtānyupalakṣyantāṃ tejaḥśabdenādhyakṣe tu kimāyātaṃ tasya tadasāhacaryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16104: yadā hyayaṃ prāṇo 'ntarāle 'dhyakṣaṃ prāpyādhyasaṃparkavaśādeva tejaḥprabhṛtīni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi prāpnoti tadopapadyate prāṇastesīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16124: praśaṃsāśabdo 'pi karmaṇāṃ prayojakatayā prakṛṣṭamāśrayatvaṃ brūte sati nikṛṣṭa āśrayāntare tadupapatterityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16127: atrābhṛtatvaprāptiśruteḥ paravidyāvantaṃ pratyetaditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16135: sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ hi sphuṭataraḥ pratipipādayiṣite vastuni pratyayo bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16136: na tu viduṣaḥ sakāśādviśeṣavanto 'vidvāṃso vidhīyante yena vidyāprakaraṇavyākhyāto bhavedapi tu vidyāṃ pratipādayituṃ lokasiddhānāṃ tadanuguṇatayā teṣāmanuvāda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16142: ayaṃ vidyopakrama ārambhaḥ prayatna iti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:16143: tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati-- neyaṃ parā vidyā yato nāḍīdvāramāśrayate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16145: na cāsyāmātyantikaḥ kleśapradāho yato na tatrotkrāntirbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:16150: siddhāṃ kṛtvā bījabhāvāvaśeṣaṃ paramātmasaṃpattiṃ vidvadaviduṣorutkrāntiḥ samarthitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16152: kimātmani tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ tatvapravilaya eva saṃpattirāhosvidbījabhāvāvaśeṣeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16156: tatrāprakṛtau na vikāratatvapravilayo yathā manasi na vāgādīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:16157: sarvasya ca janimataḥ prakṛtiḥ parā devateti tattvapralaya evātyantikaḥ syāttejaḥprabhṛtīnāmiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-- 'yonimanye prapadyante śarīratvāya dehinaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16159: ' ityavidyāvataḥ saṃsāramupadiśati śrutiḥ seyamātyantike tattvalaye nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16160: na ca prāyaṇasyaivaiṣa mahimā vidvāsamavidvāṃsaṃ vā pratīti sāṃpratamityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16169: kasmānna mūrtāntaraiḥ pratibadhyata iti śaṅkāmapākartumidaṃ sūtram-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16173: tacca sūkṣmaṃ svarūpataḥ parimāṇataśca svarūpameva hi tasya tādṛśamadṛśyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16174: yathā cākṣuṣasya tejaso mahato 'pi adṛṣṭavaśādanudbhūtarūpasparśaṃ hi tat /
GSP33vacbhamu:16175: parimāṇataḥ saukṣmyaṃ yato nopalabhyate yathā trasareṇavo jālasūryamarīcibhyo 'nyatra pramāṇatastathopalabdhiriti vyācaṣṭe-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16177: ādigrahaṇena cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdho vā anyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhya iti saṃgṛhītam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16181: yathā hi kācābhrapaṭalaṃ svacchasvabhāvasya na tejasaḥ pratidhātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16189: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- dṛṣṭaśrutābhyāmūṣmaṇo 'nvayavyatirekābhyāmasti sthūlāddehādatiriktaṃ kiñciccadāmātsūkṣmaṃ śarīramiti //11 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16198: yadi hi prāṇopalakṣitasya sūkṣmaśarīrasya jīvātmanaḥ sthūlaśarīrādutkrāntiṃ pratiṣedhecchrutiḥ tata etadupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16200: na tasmātprāṇa utkrāmantīti hi tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānāvamarśinābhyudayaniḥ śreyasādhikṛto dehi pradhānaṃ parāmṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16201: tathā ca tasmāddehino na prāṇaḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīramutkrāmantyapi tu tatsahitaḥ kṣetrajña evotkrāmatīti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16202: sa punaratikramya brahmanāḍya saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaparyantaṃ saliṅgo jīvaḥ parasminbrahmaṇi līyate tasmātparāmapi devatāṃ viduṣa utkrāntirata eva mārgaśrutayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16208_0: tathā hi -- ārtabhāgapraśnottare hyekasminpakṣe saṃsāriṇa eva jīvātmano 'nutkrāntiṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16208_1: parigṛhya na tarhyeṣa bhṛtaḥ prāṇānāmanutkrānteriti svayamāśaṅkya prāṇānāṃ pravilayaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16209: śarīrasya ca te itiśarīrameva tadapādānaṃ gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16212: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehi parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16214: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehī parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16216: dehadehinordehiparāmarśinā sarvanāmnā deha eva parāmṛṣṭa iti pañcamīpāṭhe vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16219: api ca prāptipūrvaḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāprāpte /
GSP33vacbhamu:16220: aviduṣo hi dehādutkrāmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti viduṣo 'pi tatsāmānyāddehādutkramaṇe prāpte pratiṣedha upapadyate na tu prāṇānāṃ jīvāvadhikaṃ kvacidutkramaṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena tanniṣidhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16221: apicādvaitaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭanikhilaprapañcāvabhāsajātasya gantavyābhāvādeva nāsti gatirityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16223: apadasya hi brahmavido mārge padaiṣiṇo 'pi devā iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16232: tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditānīndriyāṇyekādaśa sūkṣmāṇi ca bhūtāni pañca /
GSP33vacbhamu:16242: itarā tu evamevāsya paridṛṣṭuḥ ityādikā vidvatpratipattyapekṣā tāttvikapramāṇāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16247: avidyānimittaśca vibhāgo nāvidyāyāṃ vidyayā samūlaghātamapahatāyāṃ sāvaśeṣo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16252: tatra kiṃ vidvānavidvāṃścāviśeṣeṇa mūrdhādibhya utkrāmatyāho vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva,
GSP33vacbhamu:16255_0: tasyopasaṃhṛtavāgādikalāpasyocciktamiṣato vijñānātmanā oka āyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasyāgraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16255_1: tasya jvalanaṃ yattatprakāśitadvāro viniṣkramadvāro vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva niṣkrāmati
GSP33vacbhamu:16261: hārdavidyāśeṣabhūtā hi mūrdhanyā nāḍī gatyai upadiṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16262: tadanuśīlanena khalvayaṃ jīvo hārdena sūpāsitena brahmaṇānugṛhītastasyānusmaraṃstadbhāvamāpanno mūrdhanyayaiva śatādhikayā nāḍya niṣkrāmati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16263: hṛdayādudgatā hi brahmanāḍī bhāsvarā tālumūlaṃ bhittvā mūrdhānametya raśmibhirekībhūtā ādityamaṇḍalamanupraviṣṭā tāmanuśīlayatastayaivāntakāle nirgamanaṃ bhavatīti //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16266: rātrāvahani cāviśeṣeṇa raśmyanusārī sannādityamaṇḍalaṃ prāpnotīti siddhāntapakṣapratijñā //18 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16272: amuṣmādādityātpratāyante raśmayanta āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā bhavanti ya ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante #
GSP33vacbhamu:16277: candramasā khalvaṃmayena saṃbadhyamānānāṃ sūrīṇāṃ bhāsāṃ candrikātvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16279: ye tyāhuḥ-- sa yāvatkṣipyenmanastāvadādityaṃ gacchediti nirapekṣaśravaṇādrātrau prete nāsti raśmyapekṣeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16284: ye tu manyante vidvānapi rātriprāyaṇāparādhena nordhvamākramata iti tānpratyāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16286: nityavatphalasaṃbandhena vihitā vidyā na pākṣikaphalā yukteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16287: ye tu rātrau pretasya viduṣo 'harapekṣāṃ sūryamaṇḍalaprāptirācakṣate tanmatamāśaṅkyāha--- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16300: viduṣo 'pi ca bhīṣmasyottarāyaṇapratīkṣaṇamaviduṣa ācāraṃ grāha- yati 'yadyadācarati śreṣṭhastattadevetaro janaḥ' iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16306: kāla evātra prādhānyenocyate na tvātivāhikī devatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16308: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryate smārte caite# /
GSP33vacbhamu:16309: smārtīmupāsanāṃ pratyayaṃ smārtaḥ kālabhedaviniyogaḥ pratyāsatteḥ na tu śrautīṃ pratītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16310: atra yadi smṛtau kālabhedavidhiḥ śrautau cāgnijyotirādividhistatrāgnyādīnāmātivāhikatayā viṣayavyavasthayā virodhābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16311: atha pratyabhijñānaṃ tathāpi yatra kāla ityatrāpi kālābhidhānadvāreṇātivāhikya eva devatā uktā ityavirodha eveti //21 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16312: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16319: gantavyamekaṃ nagaraṃ prati vakreṇādhvanā gatimapekṣya ṛjunādhvanā gatistvarāvatī kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16321_0: atha taireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ nopapadyate pathyantarasya nivartanīyasyābhāvāttasmātparānapekṣā
GSP33vacbhamu:16321_1: evaite panthāna ekabrahmalokaprāptyupāyā vrīhiyavāviva vikalperanniti prāpte pratyucyate-
GSP33vacbhamu:16323: saparvā hi panthā nagarādikamekaṃ gantavyaṃ prāpayati nābhāgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16324: tatra kimete raśmyaharvāyusūryādayo 'dhvanaḥ parvāṇaḥ santo 'dhvanaikena yujyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:16325: āho yathāyathamadhvānamapi bhindantīti saṃdehe 'bhede 'pyadhvano bhāgabhedopapatterna bhāgibhedakalpanocitā, gauravaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16326: ekadeśapratyabhijñānācca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvopapatternānekādhvakalpanā / athaitaireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ na tāvadarthāntaranivṛttyarthaṃ tatprāpakaireva vākyāntarairvirodhāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:16328: na caikaṃ vākyamaprāptamadhvānaṃ prāpayati tasya cānapekṣatāṃ pratipādayatītyarthadvayāya paryāptaṃ,

GSP33vacbhamu:16695: santi hi khalu kānicidvastusvarūpasādhyāni kāryāṇi yathā strīvastusādhyāni dantakṣatamaṇimālādīni /
GSP33vacbhamu:16697: tatra manorathamātropanīte pitrādau bhavantu tajjñānamātrasādhyāni kāryāṇi natu tatsādhyāni bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16699: puṣkalaṃ bhoga#miti prāpte 'bhidhīyate- pitrādīnāṃ samutthānaṃ saṃkalpādeva tacchruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16701: pramāṇāntarānapekṣā hi śrutiḥ svārthaṃ gocarayantī na pramāṇāntareṇa śakyā bādhitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:16702: anumānameva tu svotpādāya pakṣadharmatvādivanmānāntarābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ svasāmagrīmadhyapātenāpekṣamāṇaṃ sāmagrīkhaṇḍanena tadviruddhayā śrutyā bādhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16705: tathāhurāgaminaḥ-ko hi yogaprabhāvādṛte 'gastya iva samudraṃ pibati sa iva daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ sṛjati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16711: anekadhābhāvaścarddhiprabhāvabhuvo manobhedādvā stutimātraṃ vā kathañcidbhūmavidyāyāṃ nirguṇāyāṃ tadasaṃbhavādasatāpi hi guṇena stutirbhavatyeveti //10 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16717: ata eva saubharerabhivinirmitavividhadehasyāparyāyeṇa māndhātṛkanyābhiḥ pañcāśatā vihāraḥ pairāṇikaiḥ smaryate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16720: yadyapi nirguṇāyamidaṃ bhaumavidyāyāṃ paṭhyate tathāpi tasyāḥ purastādanena saguṇāvasthāgatenaiśvaryeṇa nirguṇaiva vidyā stūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16723: tasmānmanaḥ śarīrendriyayoga aiśvaryaśālināṃ niyameneti mene jaiminiḥ //11 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16726: manaseti kevalamanoviṣayāṃ ca sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavatīti śarīrendriyabhedaviṣayāṃ ca śrutimupalabhyāniyamavādī khalu bādarāyaṇo niyamavādau pūrvayorna sahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16729: kāmeṣu hi ramaṇaṃ samanaskendriyeṇa śarīreṇa puruṣāṇāṃ siddhameveti nāsti śaṅkā manoyogasyeti tadvyavacchedo vyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16736: dvādaśāhamṛddhikāmā upeyurityupāyicodanena ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satramupayantīti ca dvādaśāhasya satratvaṃ bahukartṛkasya gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16737: evaṃ tasyaiva dvādaśāhena prajākāmaṃ yājayediti yajaticodanena niyatakartṛparimāṇatvena dvirātreṇa yajatetyādivadahīnatvamapi gamyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16738: saṃprati śarīrendriyābhāvena manomātreṇa viduṣaḥ svapnavatsūkṣmo bhogo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16741: yadi punaḥ suṣuptavadabhogo bhavet naiṣā śrutirupapadyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:16751_1: prādeśikaḥ sanna dehāntarāṇi svabhāvanirmitānyapi nānāpradeśavartīni sāntaḥkaraṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:16757: evaṃ nirmāṇaśarīrāṇyapi sendriyāṇīti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate-śarīratvaṃ na jātu syādbhogādhiṣṭhānatāṃ vinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16758: sa tridheti śarīratvamuktaṃ yuktaṃ ca tadvibhau //
GSP33vacbhamu:16759: sa tridhā bhavati pañcadhā saptadhā navadhetyādikā śrutirviduṣo nānābhāvamācakṣāṇā bhinnaśarīrendriyopādhisaṃbandhe 'vakalpate nādehahetu(bhūta)bhede /
GSP33vacbhamu:16760: nahi yantrāṇi bhinnāni nirmāya vāhayanyantravāho nānātvenāpadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16761: bhogādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ ca śarīratvaṃ nābhogādhiṣṭhāneṣu yantreṣviva yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16764: naca sarvagatasya vastuto vigalitaprāyāvidyasya viduṣaḥ pṛthagjanasyevautpattikāntaḥkaraṇavaśyatā yena tadautpattikamantaḥkaraṇamāgantukāntaḥkaraṇāntarasaṃbandhamasya vārayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:16765: tasmādvidvān sarvasya vaśī sarveśvaraḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ sendriyamanāṃsi śarīrāṇi nirmāya tāni caikapade praviśya tattadindriyamantaḥkaraṇaisteṣu lokeṣu mukto viharatīti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16766: pradīpavaditi tu nidarśanaṃ pradīpaikyaṃ pradīpavyaktiṣūpacaryate bhinnavartivartinīnāṃ bhinnavyaktīnāṃ bhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16773: salilamiva salilaḥ salilaprātipadikātsarvaprātipadikebhya ityupamānādācāre kvipi kṛte pacādyaci ca kṛte rūpam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16778: āsu kāścicchrutayaḥ suṣuptimapekṣya kāścittu saṃpattiṃ tadadhikārāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16779: aiśvaryaśrutayastu saguṇavidyāvipākāvasthāpekṣā muktyabhisaṃdhānaṃ tu tadavasthāsatteryathāruṇadarśane saṃdhyāyāṃ divasābhidhānam //16 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16784: 'āpnoti svārājyaṃ' 'sarve 'smai devā balimāvahanti' 'sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' ityādiśrutibhyo viduṣaḥ parabrahmaṇa ivānyānadhīnatvamaiśvaryamavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16785: nanvasya brahmopāsanālabdhamaiśvaryaṃ kathaṃ brahmādhīnaṃ na tu svabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16790: na ca viduṣāṃ parameśvarādhīnaiśvaryasiddhitvāttadgatamaiśvaryaṃ yena laukikā iva rājāno mahārājādhīnaḥ svavyāpāre vidvāṃsaḥ parameśvarādhīnā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16791: na khalu yadadhīnotpādaṃ yasya rūpaṃ tattadrūpādūnaṃ bhavatīti kaścinniyamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16792: tatsamānāṃ tadadhikānāṃ ca darśanāttathā hyantevāsī gurvadhīnavidhaḥ tatsamastadadhiko vā dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16794: tadiha niratiśayaiśvaryatvāt parameśvarasya mā nāma bhūvanvidvāṃsastato 'dhikāstatsamāstu bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16797: tadete svatantrāḥ santastadvyāpāre jagatsarjane 'pi pravarteranniti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate-nityatvādanapekṣatvāt śrutestatprakramādapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:16799: jagatsargalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ kāraṇaikasvabhāvasyaiva hi bhavatu āho kāryakāraṇasvabhāvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:16800: tatrobhayasvabhāvasya svotpattau mūlakāraṇāpekṣasya pūrvasiddhaḥ parameśvara eva kāraṇamabhyupetavya iti sa evaiko 'stu jagatkāraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16806: apica samapradhānānāṃ hi na niyamavadaikamatyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti yadaikaḥ sisṛkṣati tadaivetaraḥ saṃjihīrṣatītyaparyāyeṇa sṛṣṭisaṃhārau syātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:16809_1: sa eva teṣāmadhīśa iti tattantrā vidvāṃsa iti parameśvaravyāpārasya sargasaṃhārasya neśate //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16812: yataḥ parameśvarādhīnamaiśvaryaṃ tasmāttato nyūnamaṇimādimātraṃ svārājyaṃ na tu jadatsraṣṭṛtvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16818: tathā pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtānīti vikāravarti rūpaṃ tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divīti nirvikāramāha rūpam //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16819: darśayataścāpare śrutismṛtī nirvikārameva rūpaṃ bhagavataste ca paṭhite /
GSP33vacbhamu:16820: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi brūṣe saguṇe brahmaṇyupāsyamāne yathā tadguṇasya niravagrahatvamapi vastuto 'stīti niravagrahatve viduṣā prāptavyamiti tadanena vyabhicārayate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16821: yathā savikāre brahmaṇyupāsyamāne vastutaḥ sthitamapi nirvikārarūpaṃ na prāpyate tatkasya hetoḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16823: tathā tadguṇopāsanayā vastutaḥ sthitamapi niravagrahatvaṃ nāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16825: upāsakasya tadakratutvaṃ ca niravagrahatvasyopāsanavidhyagocaratvādvidhyadhīnatvāccopāsanāsu puruṣasvātantryābhāvātsvātantrye vā prātibhatvaprasaṅgāditi //20 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16833: saha parameśvarasyātiśayena vartata iti viduṣa aiśvaryaṃ sātiśayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16834: yacca kāryaṃ sātiśayaṃ tacca yathā laukikamaiśvaryam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16836: tathāca kāryatvādantavatprāptamiti tacca na yuktamānantyena tadviduṣāṃ tatra pravṛtteriti //21 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16848: na caitannirvāṇaṃ svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ yenānityaṃ syādityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16851: so 'yaṃ śāṅkarabhāṣyajātaviṣayo vācaspateḥ sādaraṃ saṃdarbhaḥ paribhāvyatāṃ sumatayaḥ svārtheṣu ko matsaraḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16863: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śaṅkarabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ# /
